column2: Terra Alegria is a luxurious project by M1 Homes located in Whitefield, Bangalore is offering lavishly crafted and aesthetically designed 3 BHK and 4 BHK villas. The project is currently under construction and will consist of 103 well planned lavish units spanned over a large acre of landscaped area. Terra Alegria price rate starts at Rs. 69 Lac onward. Project Details:Terra Alegria, an exquisite residential development located in Whitefield, Bangalore by the well experienced M1 Homes is offering lavishly crafted and aesthetically designed 3 BHK and 4 BHK villas. Terra Alegria plot areas for its 3 BHK villa range from 1700 sq. ft. to 2591 sq. ft. and 4 BHK villa areas range from 2330 sq. ft. to 2500 sq. ft.Terra Alegria villas are being luxuriously developed with a strong RCC frame structure and high standard features like ceramic tiles and vitrified tiles flooring in every room, decorative entrance doors and internal flush doors, concealed electrical wiring with premium quality PVC conduits, granite kitchen platform with stainless steel sink and tiles dado above counter, anodised aluminium sliding windows, good quality sanitary ware fittings and good quality CP fittings, throughout every villa etc. Terra Alegria Bangalore facilitates its residents with a huge landscape garden, open space with flower garden, club house, outdoor tennis courts, power back up, swimming pool, security facilities, visitor parking, intercom facility, children’s play area, rain water harvesting and kids play pool with water slides etc. including other amenities and facilities. Highpoints:Terra Alegria Bangalore locality is a prime feature as it is easily accessible to the rest of the city and has various basic civic utilities like Shanknipura Bus Stop, Madhusudhan Ramakrishnappa Farm, SLN Medical & General Store, Central Bank Of India, Government Higher Primary School, and HP Petrol Pump etc. in close proximity from the infrastructure.
column3: M1 Homes-We are m1 Homes, a part of the m1 Group. Besides Bangalore being m1 Group headquarters, we also have extended our arms in the United States and Dubai in the Middle East. Conceived by a team of immensely talented professionals from Real Estate domain, we expertise in property development and wealth advisory services. Our precision in risk assessment and detailed research based investment opportunities makes us take judicious and informed decisions regarding our developmental projects. Our CSR activities too encompass a wide spectrum through m1 Foundation. Women Empowerment in the real estate space being our biggest step forward in this regards. We endeavor in all our sincerity and honesty, to empower women and grant them a sense of equality in all decisions related to Real estate investments. The farmer community is very close to our hearts. We also endeavor through our m1 Foundation, to enable granting them their rights, which otherwise could possibly be misused. These are small steps towards building a magnanimous future and we wish to contribute in every possible way.
column6:

Touted as the New Bangalore, Hoskote has emerged as the latest hottest Investment destination. Announcement of the Chennai-Bangalore express way that will pass through here has ignited the real estate market, with villa townships, apartments and plotted projects sprouting up almost overnight and real estate prices in an almost perpetual upward spiral.Project USP:Large covered space on grassland set amidst beautiful flower plants.Huge Landscaped Gardens and Parks to add a touch of green to your every day.

column2: DSR Lotus Towers is a project by DSR Groups, located in Whitefield, Bangalore, offering currently under construction 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. It consists of 176 units spanned over 2 towers. DSR Lotus Towers price rate starts from Rs. 64.8 Lac onward. The project is strategically located and equipped with various modern amenities .Project Details:DSR Lotus Towers located in Whitefield, Bangalore, is a project by DSR Groups offering lavish, luxurious and currently under construction 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. DSR Lotus Towers plot areas for its 2 BHK flat ranges from 770 sq. ft. to 996 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range from 1082 sq. ft. to 1232 sq. ft.DSR Lotus Towers apartments are designed with RCC frame structure and high quality interiors like vitrified, anti skid ceramic tiles flooring in every room, laminated wooden flooring in master bedroom, concealed wiring with modular switches, black granite kitchen counter, CP sanitary fittings etc.DSR Lotus Towers is a RERA Certified Project. DSR Lotus Towers provides numerous essential amenities for its residents like 24*7 power back up, swimming pool, lift, 24*7 security facility, intercom facility, gym, kids play area, flower gardens, rain water harvesting, canopy walk, waste disposal, conference room, multipurpose hall, fire fighting equipment etc. and many more.Highpoints:DSR Lotus Towers special amenities include large open space, grand entrance lobby, dance studio, jogging & strolling track and a club house. The project is just 500 m from Shantiniketan Commercial Block, 1.8 km Vivanta by Taj, 0.28 km from Sharada Vidya Mandir, 1.4 km from Narayana Hospital, 1.5 km from the proposed ITPL Namma Metro Station, 13.5 km from MG Road and 43.3 km from Bengaluru International Airport etc. including many others in the vicinity.
column3: DSR Group was established more than 2 decades ago in 1988 with the vision of transforming the real estate industry and today after the journey of so many years, its projects stand testimony to the shining excellence and brilliance in execution. Commanding an unparalleled expertise, the group has spread its operations across South India across many real estate verticals, catering to various categories of clients. DSRs repertoire has a wide array of exclusive projects which have been crafted to international standards.With diversified business interests across many portfolios, DSR today has achieved staggering success, thanks to its partners, associates, and employees. Its success is shared and cherished among its people who work towards the common goal of a promising and prosperous future. Customer satisfaction is the corner stone of our companys philosophy. We constantly strive for perfection in our service by understanding the customer needs and providing innovative and customized real estate solutions. The locations of our projects are so carefully chosen that they provide immense potential for investment.All through its existence, DSRs ideals of quality, innovation, and attention to the needs of its clients have always been of utmost importance. These ideals remain at the core of every endeavor of DSR. The DSR brand itself stands for quality, commitment, and innovation which manifest in all that it does and stands for. The group has several projects underway in Bangalore, Hyderabad, and Chennai catering to the customer with varied needs and tastes. Professional to the core and passionate about standards in construction, the company is moving fast forward into the future.

column2: Overview:Vasudha Springs is a project offering affordable homes in the fastest developing city of Bangalore. The project has been developed by the famous Vasudha Builders, Whitefield – Bangalore. Offering a freehold ownership for these ready to move in flats, the project has 92 well planned units built into a single huge tower. Project Details:Vasudha Springs apartments presents to you considerately built 2 and 3 BHK homes. The homes are priced from 39.9 Lac onwards making them pocket friendly. The Vasudha Springs floor plan ensures that you have well ventilated huge homes that will give you a steady supply of bright light throughout the day and will give you a healthy and peaceful life. The 2 BHK flats are spread over an area between 1120 sqft and 1290 sqft and the 3 BHK flats in Vasudha Springs are spread over an area between 1295 sqft and 1450 sqft.Vasudha Springs reviews approve of the state of the art amenities provided in the society along with the quality infrastructure and technically sound equipment used for construction. - These vaastu compliant homes have basic facilities such as swimming pool, kids play area, guarantee security service, gymnasium, fire fighting equipment, power back up, etc.- Other amenities include park, intercom facility, rainwater harvesting, internet, Wi-Fi connectivity, water storage, reserved parking space for residents, etc. Highpoints:The beautiful tracks for exercise – jogging, cycling and strolling and the operational club house are the main USPs of the project. These along with the close proximity to many schools, hospitals and shopping centres make Vasudha Springs, Bangalore worth considering. Public transport is also easily available for stress free commutation.For any more details regarding the project, you can check the updated Vasudha Springs photos and brochures. Make sure to book your dream home as soon as possible, as the numbers are limited.

column2: Overview Sumadhura Soham Whitefield, Bangalore is a remarkable residential project by Sumadhura Infracon Private Limited. Sprawling across acres of verdant greenery this residential society offers 295 units distributed among 14 towers. The project offers a mix of 2, 2.5, 3 & 3.5-bedroom flats ranging between 1170-2000 sqft. The flat rates of Sumadhura Soham Whitefield are priced affordably to meet the necessities of every segment of home buyers. About the Project Conveniently located with all the facilities at your doorstep, this residential project is a best option if you are hunting for a luxuriant home at an unbeatable price. So, hurry up and a book a flat now in Sumadhura Shikharam Whitefield, Bangalore. All these residential apartments have been designed with spacious floor plans which make them worth consideration. Blessed with plenty of fresh air & natural light, all the well-ventilated residential apartments of Sumadhura Shikharam Whitefield invite you to live a blissful living. Breathe a new life and unwind yourself in the calm and peaceful surroundings of this marvellous residential haven. Sumadhura Shikharam Whitefield offers a pool of top-notch amenities like clubhouse, jogging & strolling tracks, gym, outdoor tennis courts, aerobics room, kids play area, etc. Highpoints Sumadhura Soham Whitefield offers seamless connectivity to a numerous IT companies like Accenture, Dell, TCS, L&T Infotech, and IGATE to name a few. Lots of national/international schools are situated within close vicinity such as Vibgyor High, The Deens Academy, Ryan International, Vydehi School of Excellence and Chrysils International. Whitefield is also famous for housing several popular malls like Cosmos Mall, Phoenix Market City, Forum Value and Inorbit Mall. Narayana Multispeciality Hospital, Satya Sai Medical Institute, Yashomati Hospital, Manipal Hospital and Sai Baba Hospital are some of the major healthcare facilities situated close by. Connectivity to public transport facilities is yet another highpoint of this neighbourhood.
column3: With over a decade of experience in the real estate sector, Sumadhura Group has established itself as a premier residential property developer in the country with significant presence in the metropolitan city of Bangalore. Our unique customer centric business model has a proven track record of innovation and quality, and has been instrumental in the group

column3: Nester is a niche real estate developer based in Bangalore. We were founded in 2006 and are now into our fourth project. As a company we are deeply committed to delivering high quality, futuristic homes by way of flats, premium apartments, row houses, commercial, villaments and other plotted communities that our customers can thrive in and cherish. Our projects are designed to build communities that are environmentally sustainable. Nester is known as a premium apartment developer and our strong growth has enabled us to diversify into medium and large sized commercial work spaces and building refurbishments.Over the last decade we have earned a reputation as quality apartment developers.

column2: Overview Developed by Sumadhura Infracon Pvt. Ltd., Sumadhura Eden Garden is a new-launch residential project located in the prominent neighborhood of Whitefield, Bangalore. Sprawling across 14 acres of beautiful land, this brand new project features 22 majestic towers holding 1113 luxurious units. Designed to offer a premium lifestyle, this well-planned residence offers elegant 1, 2 & 3 BHK homes varying from 660 – 1523 sqft. Praised with good reviews, Sumadhura Eden Garden price list starts from the affordable price tag of Rs. 24 Lacs onwards. Project details Incredibly priced and brilliantly designed, Sumadhura Eden Garden showcases the true mastery of skilled craftsmanship that will definitely impress you. Sleek & beautiful, the well-ventilated residential apartments of Sumadhura Eden Garden situated in the sought-after residential address of Doddabanahalli, Whitefield, Bangalore are one of the best place to settle in with your family. Assuring a peaceful living, these light-filled abodes are creatively decorated with eye-pleasing interiors & exquisite exteriors. The pollution-free environment encircling this residence promote a healthy lifestyle with lots of positivity & divinity. All the basic facilities like 24hours water supply, power backup and round the clock security have been provided. Cricket pitch, barbeque, basket ball court, skating ring, tennis court, palm court, kids play area and a lavish swimming pool are some of the breathtaking features of this RERA certified residential project. Highpoints Without any doubt, the handpicked location is the main highpoint of Sumadhura Eden Garden located in Whitefield, Bangalore. Good proximity to various established IT companies of Whitefield and easy public transport connectivity make this region a best residential place. Ryan International School, Narayana Multispecialty Hospital and many more reputed schools & hospitals are situated within close proximity. Sumadhura Eden Garden Whitefield, Bangalore is definitely one of the most promising & ambitious project to invest your money. So, cash in and book now.

column2: Pavani Fortune by Pavani Homes is one of the popular residential project in Marathahalli, Bangalore.
column3: Owning a house is a long nurtured dream for many. To have a home, you have to own one.The goal of any home is to see that all the elements in the home add to a homely feeling and utilization of space.Mr. P.V RAGHAVA RAO founded PAVANI GROUP IN 1995 to promote Apartment construction in Nellore town, at a point of time when Apartment Culture was still new there. He thus become pioneers in Apartment Industry within a short span of time. with all his hard-work, foresight and vision the group of companies has completed 14 projects and five projects are in progress and many more in the anvil, spreading all over south India, Viz. Hyderabad, Chennai, Nellore and Bangalore.PAVANI HOMES, backed up by ten years of experience in architectural planning, design and implementation, has come of age, in that, the company has analyzed the demanding choosy requirements of home owners that encompass above parameters and they are determined to a deliver a home tailor made for each owner, snug fitting his or her aesthetics, psychology and ethical Standards. PAVANI HOMES keep in its mind the futuristic requirements. This calls for world-class specifications and high standards of construction practice. Backed up by highly and experienced Civil Project Directors with their team of young field engineers, who have completed a number of projects in and around Bangalore, Chennai, Nellore and Hyderabad covering Residential, Commercial Buildings, PAVANI HOMES is never short of concept for timely completion of high quality buildings. While doing so they ensure that they do not end up functional Architectural cul-de-sac.

column3: The Aishwarya Homes is promoted by a team of technocrats and professionals. The Lath family, who has conceived the idea of construction of luxury building and apartments at Jaipur, is the family with many doctors, engineers, MBAs, CAs, advocates and everyones valuable inputs have been key to the functioning of the group. The Lath family in association with close relatives and friends has created Aishwarya Homes (Builders and Developers) way back in 2008. Since then the group has crafted four ultra luxurious apartments at Vidhyadhar Nagar and Ajmer Road, Jaipur.Mr. Sanjay Gupta, the architect and civil engineer, family friend of Lath family is actively associated with the group to manage and develop construction activities. column2: OverviewMahaveer Promenade by the renowned Mahaveer Group presents 125 units spread across 2 towers. Available in 2-bedroom units, apartments in Mahaveer Promenade, Whitefield is well-ventilated abodes available in the price range of Rs.55.3 Lac to Rs. 62.1 Lac. The project features 11 floors and covering over 3.24 acres of prime space.Project DetailsMahaveer Promenade apartments are perfectly planned living spaces offering ample natural air and sunlight to create a refreshing aura. Mahaveer Promenade in Whitefield is a wonderfully created project featuring 11 floors matching international standards and modern demand. There are 2 BHK flats available in carpet area ranging between 1169 sqft to 1274 sqft having vitrified flooring across the rooms and balcony adorned with ceramic tiles while toilet has anti-skid ceramic tiles, main door teak wood frame with BST shutters, internal door features Sal wood frames with moulded/flush shutters, sanitary fittings and accessories in toilet are from top brands, fixtures and fittings used are premium quality from top-notch brands.These extravagantly designed residential apartments in Mahaveer Promenade, Whitefield are Vaastu compliant and offers a myriad of fascinating modern amenities like Club House, Jogging & Strolling Track, Cycling Track, Power Back Up, Swimming Pool, Lift Service, Security, Parking for both residents & visitors, Intercom Facility, Gymnasium, Indoor Games Room, Kids Play Area, Aerobics Room, Flower Gardens, Library And Business Centre, Indoor Squash & Badminton Courts, Multipurpose Courts and much more.HighpointsEach floor in Mahaveer Promenade boasts skilfully designed apartments with pioneering facilities to augment lifestyle of its residents. Mahaveer Promenade price is also reasonable considering the quality of living the project offers. Railway Goods Loading Junction is 5 KM, The Forum Value Mall is 2.4 KM and hospital like Vydehi Hospital Bus Stop is just 2.1 KM away from the residential project.

column2: Overview Cynosure White Spaces Whitefield, Bangalore is one of the much-awaited residential venture undertaken by Cynosure Homez. The project covers an area of 1.5 acres and consists of 108 residential units sheltered within 2 towers. These units are a mixture of 2 and 3 BHK flats spanning across 866 – 1550 sqft. Cynosure White Spaces flat prices are listed within the moderate price bracket of Rs. 32.0 Lacs - 63.0 Lacs. Project details Cynosure White Spaces floor plans clearly show that the rooms are well-proportioned and are auspiciously built according to vaastu principles. The balconies are also well-placed and the windows are placed such that there is smooth passage for fresh winds and sunlight to every corner of the house. The built-up area of the 2 BHK flats varies from 866 sqft - 1000 sqft and cost within Rs. 32.9 Lacs - 38.0 Lacs. The 3-bedroom apartments are priced from Rs. 47.5 Lacs - 54.7 Lacs and measure within 866 - 1000 sqft. Cynosure White Spaces reviews are authentically positive, which makes these apartments a value-driven asset and are certainly not to be missed. The society is well-packed with a large group of premium amenities like: For sports lovers, there is a huge cricket stadium, basketball court, tennis court, skating rink and many more other sporting facilities.There is stunning swimming pool, which is apt for both the elite swimmers and fun seekers.The well-furnished lounge with upscale ambiance to hang out with your friends, colleagues, etc. Highpoints Well-placed just few kilometres away from ITPL, Phoenix Mall, Delhi Public School and some of the best medical facilities, Cynosure White Spaces location is the unique selling point of this residence. Easy public transport connectivity makes this locality a preferred one. To get a complete visual interpretation of the flats, browse through Cynosure White Spaces photos. Bookings are open so hurry up and make one of these flats your dream home!!!

column2: Overview: Strategically located in one of the best localities of Bangalore, Whitefield- Sanvi Sankalpam is blessed with all the necessary facilities at hand. These apartments are one of the prominent residential venture very well constructed by Sanvi Property Developers. Under construction, these living spaces offer exquisite lifestyle. Built across one exquisite tower, this society comprises of 76 elegantly crafted units which offer all the facilities necessary. Estimated in the range of Rs. 37.0 Lac - 42.0 Lac, these living spaces of Sanvi Sankalpam flats are quite spacious and offer luxuries like never before. About the project : With positive reviews, Sanvi Sankalpam is located in one of the best, upbeat and prime localities which is value to the living spaces. Sanvi Sankalpam reviews are quite positive and favourable, trust us and be rest assured for life. With luxuries and amenities like never before, Sanvi Sankalpam apartments stand out in every aspect which is quite a rare thing to find. Sanvi Sankalpam floor plans are definitely worth your time if you are planning to invest in this project and so are Sanvi Sankalpam photos to have a clearer picture of your dream home. Advertising variety of 2 BHK apartments, these living spaces range from 792 sq. ft. to 1145 sq. ft. offering luxurious lifestyle while the 3 BHK apartment units are sized 1460 sq. ft. Highpoints: These flats offer excellent variety of dwellings thereby offering the prospective buyer different sizes and spaces to choose as per their necessity. The project is very well located close to various major destinations which include Hope Farm Circle, Channasandra, ITPL, Whitefield Global School, Forum Value Mall, Whitefield Metro Station and Sri Sathya Sai Hospital which are all within close proximity. With all the conveniences and facilities, this project is certainly worth your investment Hurry up, book now

column2: Sprawled over 8 acres at Marathahalli Road , Rohan Vasantha is miles from the noise of the city, yet minutes from civilisation. Weave your way through landscaped gardens and shimmering waterscapes.Step into our 2 or 3 bedroom apartments and find all the elements that make a great home. Things like privacy, light, space and ventilation . that's why we call our apartments, PLUS Homes: Perfect ventilation, Lively light, Utmost privacy and Smart space. So, what makes a PLUS home unique?To begin with, we use space to build bigger rooms, not passages. Our entrances do not directly open into bedrooms or living rooms. Large windows give you a view of the cityscape, not your neighbour's apartment. And because natural light does not penetrate more than 18 feet from a source, we make sure there are several sources.
column3: Incepted in 1993, the Rohan Group today, is a strong, multifaceted, multi-disciplinary and vibrant organization, committed to delighting our customers through innovation. We strive to achieve the highest degree of technical excellence while maintaining the finest standards of business practices in all our endeavours. It is this trait that has always attracted the most talented people to our company.While we seek to bring in newness and fresh energy into the organization, we've never under-valued our old relationships. All the stakeholders who have been with us through our journey and those who keep joining the family are a standing testimony of our beliefs.Such strong teamwork, dedication and sheer hard work have ensured that we have won a major industry award every year since the day we started.

column3: Sowparnika Projects and Infrastructure Pvt Ltd, since its inception in 2003, has grown into one of South Indias leading property developers in the Affordable Housing Segment. Headquartered in Bangalore, Sowparnika started with projects of mere 30,000 Sq.Ft. graduating to massive projects spanning over three million Sq. Ft. Achieving excellence in providing affordable housing, we have helped countless people realise their dreams of owning a house. At Sowparnika, we have systematically developed in-house expertise for competencies like architectural, QC and QS, plumbing, electrical, block work and fabrication activities and hence contributes to our success in achieving cost-effective construction. Currently, we have projects across several major cities in South India such as Bangalore, Mysore, Trivandrum, Chennai, Coimbatore, Tirupur, Changanassery and Guruvayur

Headquartered in Bangalore, Sowparnika started with projects of mere 30,000 Sq.Ft. graduating to massive projects spanning over three million Sq. Ft. At Pranavah we focus our attention to the finer details, because we believe in providing you with nothing less than best.We build homes to suit people of all strata, so be it a luxury condominium or an economic apartment, we offer the best services and do not compromise on quality.

column2: Vishnu Priya Group introduces Parimala Trinity, a residential township, at Marathahali, Bangalore. It is a depiction of the touch of excellence that experienced builders like Vishnu Priya Group, whose work ethics revolve round the needs of customers, provide. With a total of 185 deluxe apartments, Parimala Trinity covers only 35% of the construction area. A picturesquely landscaped setting and lavishly built apartment homes with the 2 BHK and 3 BHK flats make Parimala Trinity an oasis of comfort, luxury and tranquility. Featuring an excellent swimming pool, well-equipped fitness center, flower gardens, walking trails, club house, park, amphitheater and event space, this residential project has alluring amenities that are sure to satisfy and fulfill the expectations of each and every resident. The basic amenities like security, internet and wi-fi connectivity, intercom facilities, and maintenance staff make this living space complete and convenient.Located at a distance of only 1.90 kilometer from Bellandur Road Railway Station, Parimala Trinity allows its residents to enjoy the natural beauty of the country without compromising the advantages of the city.

column2: The ultimate concept of comfortable living is having a home in a quite and peaceful location and yet near to the hotbed of the City.Chourasia Manor II makes this dream combination a possibility.Bangalore essentially has a very strong economy and business investment is just roaring. It is one of the fastest growing cities and among the top contributors to the GDP of the Indian Economy. Also known as India’s Silicon Valley and the Garden City, Bangalore is the largest exporter of India’s Information Technology (IT) and allied services. The city is witnessing the growth of numerous real estate pockets, due to the explosive growth of population in the city and the extensive focus on development of infrastructure. This end-user demand driven market is also known to be the dream market for investors and PE funds it is also BBMP Approved,  OC and CC Provided.
column3: With nearly two decades of contribution in the construction and infrastructure industry, we believe that our works reflect the values and aspirations of our clients. We aim to exceed client's expectations and create "a built environment" of lasting impact.Behind VKC Developers, (one of the top Builders and Developers in Bangalore) is the same thrust manifested by Chourasia Group, which offers world-class construction solutions with modern infrastructure across our offices and works establishments in India. At the heart of our success is the perfect blend of man and machine, working in unison and to a precise plan, to create world-class construction and infrastructure.VKC Developers is a member of CREDAI (Confederation of Real Estate Developers' Association of India), Bangalore, which is the apex body for private real estate developers in India.Our success and reputation of excellence is a direct result of our superior project management systems. This ensures perfect synchronization of manpower, equipment, construction schedules, materials sourcing and availability. The result is optimal utilization of men, machines, and finances resources to deliver quality construction on time and to defined costs.We perfectly manage combination of in-house teams, partnered and resources and outsourced services, ensuring smooth execution of projects regardless of size, complexity or deadline.

column2: OverviewSapthagiri Developers brings to you a grand residential project named Saptagiri Sannidhi, which is advantageously located in Marathahalli, Bangalore. The spacious and well, ventilated flats of this project are up for sale in Marathahalli, Bangalore. Saptagiri Sannidhi price list for thoughtfully built 2 BHK and 3 BHK flats range between Rs. 45.6 Lac,  66.7 Lac.Project detailsSaptagiri homes in Marathahalli Bangalore are worth considering if you are thinking to invest your valuable money in a home of your vision. The area occupied by spacious 2 BHK flats varies from 950 sqft to 1196 sqft whereas the area of 3 BHK flats varies from 1310 sqft to 1385 sqft.This project is currently under construction and it offers you the opportunity of living life in the five-star classiness in Marathahalli, Bangalore. Undoubtedly, this project is a great place to lead a quality lifestyle.Saptagiri Sannidhi is in close proximity to VIBGYOR High School, Munnekolalu Cross bus stop, Brookfield Mall, Bank of India ATM, Apollo Pharmacy, Indian Oil Petrol Pump and all other day to day requirements are easily accessible within a short distance.HighpointsThe beautiful homes of this project offer you highest privacy and with the soothing surroundings, you can live a peaceful life. Also, some of the world class amenities are the major highlights of this project. Modern amenities such as male and female change rooms, community hall, single pole basketball court, 24 hours security, cricket practice pitch, kids play area, swimming pool, gym, jogging track and so on make this an unmatched project in the entire city.Saptagiri Sannidhi reviews and photos will make you understand this project in a better manner. On the whole, if you looking for a stunning house at an affordable price then don't miss this golden chance book a flat now in Saptagiri Sannidhi.

column2: OverviewImpressive Assetz East Point situated in Marathahalli, Bangalore is well planned and solicitously developed by the builders of Assetz Homes and they are well known for various residential and commercial projects in the IT sector of Bangalore. You have an option to choose well ventilated apartments of 1BHK, 2BHK and 3BHK at a reasonable price range that varies between Rs.82.4Lakhs to 1.30Crore.About the ProjectAssetz East Point is an ideal residential hub which comprises of 10 multi floor towers with 425 delightful units. This is one of the best residential projects designed in a graceful manner.   Also, you can buy most excellent 4BHK penthouses at an affordable price. Assetz East Point Marathahalli, Bangalore is worth considering if you are looking for a spacious flat as the units of this project are spread across an area that varies between 780 to 3400sq ft.Residents of Assetz East Point can enhance their standard of living with luxurious flats with airy and well ventilated spaces. In addition, the project includes all the world class amenities to ensure residents get to enjoy an outstanding lifestyle. HighpointsWith all the significant facilities Assetz East Point is the best destination to lead a happy and peaceful life. Location is the major plus point of this project, as one can easily access most of the places in Bangalore within a short distance.Even some of the well known schools, hospitals, shopping centers and clinics are in close proximity such as New Horizons Gurukul and New Horizons Engineering College both are accessible with 1.7Km radius. Apollo Clinic which provides quality health care services is hardly 2.9Km away. If your desire is to enjoy all the above mentioned conveniences then book a flat right now in Assetz East Point without any second thought.

column2: Nitesh Cape Cod is an ongoing project by Nitesh Estates. This project is covers 4.5 acres of land with 50% open space in Marathahalli, Bangalore. Nitesh Cape Cod comprises of 417 units with various configurations spread across 8 well-designed towers.Project detailsIt invites you to experience a new way of living with sustainable landscape design that provides ecological benefits. Without any issues Nitesh Cape Cod which is RERA certified offers 2, 3 and 4 BHK apartments which are spacious at the same time well-ventilated. The floor plan of this project is excellent and every living space is a unique blend of technology and eco-friendly measures.Without any housing complaints the 2BHK apartment is spread across 1340 sqft area while the 3BHK apartment covers an area of 1664 sqft and the area of 4BHK apartment is 2384 sqft. The price list of these apartments offered in Nitesh Cape Cod lies between Rs. 68.0 Lakhs - 1.25 Lakhs.Some of the amenities offered in Nitesh Cape Cod include billiards and table tennis to play your favorite game during leisure, exclusive lounge for indoor games for you to have fun in weekends, entertainment hall to relax and spend some time with your loved ones, world-class exercise station to maintain your physical fitness and a lot more. To access these entire facilities book a flat now in Nitesh Cape Cod.HighpointsNitesh Cape Cod is in close proximity to ORR, Sarjapur Road and Hosur Road. A number of Tech Parks and IT companies like Embassy Tech Square, Wipro Corporate Office, Salarpuria Tech Park, Prestige Cessna Business Park, Prestige Tech Park, Infosys etc exist in the vicinity; thereby resulting in an influx of a lot of residents, investors and real estate developers here. Various shopping malls, schools, colleges, hospitals etc also exist in this area.
column3: Nitesh Estates the real estate arm of the Nitesh Group, is an integrated property development company headquartered in Bangalore, India, with presence across 4 asset classes.Nitesh Estates develops state-of-the-art Homes, Hotels, Office Buildings and Shopping Malls. In barely 8 years of operations, the company has more than 20 million sq ft of premium living, retail and work spaces under various stages of development.Nitesh Estates is India's most recognized Luxury Real Estate Brand, and is responsible for many of South India's most recognized developments. Superior Quality, Attention to Detail and Perfection are the standards that Nitesh Estates demands throughout its projects - from Homes to Hotel and from Office Buildings to Shopping Malls. The experience of owning a Nitesh Estates property and living the Nitesh lifestyle is unparalleled.

column2: Overview Purvi Mithila Marathahalli, Bangalore is a beautiful project by Sai Purvi Developers. This project features 4 towers with 600 units, which are offered with 2 and 3 BHK configurations. Measuring from 1150, 1830 sqft, the flat prices of Purvi Mithila cost within Rs. 66.0 Lacs 90.0 Lacs Browse through the impressive Purvi Mithila photos and floor plans for better understanding about the project.  About the project Highly acclaimed with good reviews, Sai Purvi Developers are pioneered in delivering 100 Percentage vaastu compliant homes for a healthy and prosperous living. The makers have also chosen an enviable location for its projects to offer a smooth and convenient lifestyle to its residents. Sai Purvi Mithila reviews are extremely positive and the ambiance of the surrounding lush greenery is simply breath-taking. These brand new apartments are offered with freehold ownership rights and promise handsome price appreciation.  Also, available for rent, Sai Purvi Mithila apartments are supremely well ventilated and are also well lit with immense natural light all along the day. Seasoned with striking interiors and eye catching exteriors, the aesthetic beauty of these homes will surely leave spellbound. Neatly finished with fancy flooring and adorned with superior quality specifications, these homes are designed for stylish living. Enjoy a rich lifestyle with world-class amenities like a clubhouse, swimming pool, gym, meditation area, kids play area, banquet hall, cycling and jogging track, indoor games room, indoor squash courts, badminton courts and much more other exclusive features available right next door. Highpoints Marathahalli is one of most sought-after locality of Bangalore and houses innumerable reputed educational institutions, hospitals and shopping malls. Great public transport connectivity and good proximity to workplaces has been the strong factor of this area. Located in the outstanding city of Bengaluru, Karnataka - Sai Purvi Mithila apartments are truly worth every penny of your investment. So, hurry and book a flat now

column2: Overview: Oceanus Triton is an aesthetically developed project by Oceanus Group located in Bellandur, Bangalore offering spaciously crafted and elegantly designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. The project is ready to move into and consists of 78 units spanned over 1 well planned tower. Oceanus Triton Bangalore apartments are well equipped with all features and just a stone’s throw away from various civic utilities.  Project Details:Oceanus Triton, a residential project located in the area of Bellandur, Bangalore by Oceanus Group is offering spaciously crafted and elegantly designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. Oceanus Triton floor plan for its 2 BHK flat ranges approx. 1248 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range approx. 2055 sq. ft. Apartments in Oceanus Triton are meticulously designed with certain interiors such as good quality tiles flooring in all rooms, attractive doors with fittings, concealed wiring with modular switches and sufficient electrical points, granite kitchen counter top with sink, good quality CP fittings and branded sanitary ware fixtures in bathroom etc. among others.Oceanus Triton features numerous best modern day amenities and facilities for its residents such as a club house, jogging & strolling track, power back up, swimming pool, lift, 24 hour security facilities, reserved parking, service & goods lift, visitor parking space, maintenance staff, banquet hall, gymnasium, kids club, DTH television facility, flower gardens, rain water harvesting, recreational pool, water storage, multipurpose courts, waste disposal, conference room, event space and fire fighting equipment etc.Highpoints: Oceanus Triton is a beautiful and elegantly developed project offering aesthetically designed apartments. Oceanus Triton Bangalore locality has basic civic utilities like Kaikodrahalli Bus Stop, Doctor Levine Memorial Hospital, Village Supermarket, PVR Soul Spirit, and ibis Bengaluru Techpark Hotel etc. in close vicinity. You can check out Oceanus Triton photos on magicbricks.
column3: A Group where thought is deliberately integrated into every facet of business. Where every square foot of space exudes maximum utility. Where stereotypes are discarded. Where traditional values seamlessly merge with youthful enthusiasm. Where managerial and administrative prowess go hand in hand with creative skills and sound technical know how, to deliver to every customer, spaces designed on pure Intelligence.Renowned for its choice of locations when planning a project, and the future it promises for the investors. Because, with every home that Oceanus builds, comes that guarantee of not just the best of comforts and conveniences, but of immense value-appreciation. Because Oceanus firmly believes, that a home of ones own is among the most Precious things in life.Steadfast in adherence to statutory requirements. Revered principles of the ancient wisdom of Vaastu followed in letter and spirit. Equally conscious is the Group, to its responsibility towards our environment, needless to mention the numerous water, waste-management, greening and other eco-friendly initiatives. Because, beyond just offering living spaces, is our bigger aim-that of making life much sweeter.A group with a keen eye for detail. Where every aspect of a project, from foundation to finishes, is diligently monitored by trained professionals. Tiles, paints and fittings are handpicked after meticulous scrutiny for performance and durability. Architecture, landscaping and other services are rendered by the best in their respective fields. Because, Oceanus believes in offering living spaces of finest quality. Such is its eye for aesthetics.

column2: Open the doors of your heart to Rohan Jharoka- the blissful haven that truly values your privacy. Relax in a luxuriously spacious home with a view of beautiful surrounding and the sky above with abundance of natural light and ventilation. These are just some of the many pluses our unique 'Plus Home' concept bestows upon you. Be blissfully yourself in eco-homes of Rohan Jharoka that give you an enriched lifestyle while nurturing the environment.
column3: Rohan Group is a construction and a real estate company with innovation at its core. Founded in 1993, it aimed at building a healthier lifestyle for the city-dwellers and greater sustainability for the ecosystem. The years that followed saw the company making several firsts in the industry - all directed towards achieving this single-minded goal.Rohan Group has diverse interests in real estate, industrial contracting, infrastructure development, and logistics. It has been awarded the prestigious DA2 plus rating consistently for the last 9 years by CRISIL, Indias leading credit rating institution. Its residential projects in Pune and Bangalore continue to earn the coveted 7-star rating for excellence in design and safety.

column3: As one of the pioneers in the Bengaluru real estate market, we have been known for changing the landscape of the city since 1983. To us, what matters the most is the delight our customers get when they are home. This has gained us the reputation of a quality developer who constantly seeks excellence in the industry.Sterling Developers was founded by Ramani Sastri - Chairman and Managing Director, whose far- sightedness combined with the diligence of Shankar Sastri - Joint Managing Director, has shaped our reputation for excellence in creating value for our customers. Under their leadership, we have built some of the best properties in Bengaluru including luxury flats, premium apartments, exquisite villas and commercial complexes. In 2006, we set foot in Pune, extending our commitment of quality homes, luxury apartments and villas, to todays discerning customers across the country. Our mission is to build homes that compromise on nothing.

column2: Kumari Amaranthine is built by Kumari Builders and Developers, a leading group in real-estate market in Bangalore. It offers spacious and dexterously designed 2BHK and 3BHK apartments spread across 9 floors.Project detailsRERA Certified - Kumari Amaranthine offers 2BHK and 3BHK Apartments of many sizes. The magnitude of area included in this project varies depending on the number of BHK. The master plan of Kumari Amaranthine is designed in such a way that these apartments comprises of extensive space with appropriate freshening at every corner of the house. The interiors are delightfully crafted with fashionable tiled floor, granite counter slab in kitchen, modern sanitary fittings in the bathroom and huge windows for apposite daylight.Spanning across 2.00 acres Kumari Amaranthine consists of 99 units in one ingenious tower. The 2 BHK apartments are spread across an area that varies between 1130 - 1190 sqft whereas the area of 3 BHK apartments ranges between 1270 - 1530 sqft.Kumari Amaranthine at Bellandur in Bangalore allows only the best for its inhabitants and is fully furnished with up-to-date facilities for you to experience a wholesome and healthy life. The inviting flats have well-designed floor plans and modern specifications.HighpointsKumari Amaranthine is strategically located and provides direct connectivity to nearly all other major points in and around Bangalore. It is one of the most reputable addresses of the city with easy access to many famed schools, shopping areas, hospitals, recreational areas, public gardens and several other public facilities.Numeral tech parks and IT companies like Embassy Tech Square, Wipro Corporate Office, Salarpuria Tech Park, Prestige Cessna Business Park, Infosys etc exist in the vicinity; thereby resulting in an incursion of a lot of residents, investors and real estate developers here. Don't miss this chance without any delay book a flat now Kumari Amaranthine.

column2: Overview Alpine Eco situated in Marathahalli, Bangalore is an iconic residential project offering 2BHK and 3BHK luxurious apartments that are spread across an area of 7.5acres. There are total 650 units spread across 11 towers of 12 floors each priced within the budget of Rs.62lakhs and Rs.1crore. Project Details Apartments at Alpine Eco are up for sale at an affordable rate and are perfect from the perspective of investment. The floor plan of Alpine Eco comprises of units in the configuration of 2BHK and 3BHK where 2BHK are available at an area size ranging between 1055sq.ft. and 1458sq.ft. while 3BHK units are sized between 1664sq.ft. and 1975sq.ft. This luxuriously appointed project aims at offering an upscale lifestyle with all the high-end recreational and sporting amenities. Sports enthusiasts and fitness freaks will enjoy choosing from a variety of activities at the aerobics center, basketball court, cricket pitch, lawn tennis court, squash court, table tennis and skating rink. Swimming pool along with toddler’s pool ensure that the entire family enjoys a refreshing swim. With such an extensive gamut of facilities, it is not surprising that many are preferring to even rent apartments at Alpine Eco in Marathahalli. Highpoints   This gated community is known for its advanced security features at it offers round the clock security along with CCTV surveillance. With the premises there is an ATM, crèche and grocery shop. The location is also one of its highpoints as it enjoys proximity to other areas such as Brookefield, Doddanekundi and Chinnapanna Halli. Malls such as Phoenix Marketcity is also situated only 20 minutes away. Alpine Eco truly encapsulates the essence of a premium lifestyle by offering a seamless combination of lavish accommodation and plush facilities. Book now a flat in this marvellous project to experience an unmatched lifestyle.

column2: OverviewMalibu Sparkling Wings - a luxurious and attention-grabbing project developed by Malibu Projects. Malibu Builders Bangalore reviews are all on the positive side and are well-known for on time delivery. Located in Marathahalli, Bangalore, this under construction project comprises of 72 capacious units and 2 towers. These premium units of 2 and 3 bedrooms configurations are available at the budgeted price starting from Rs. 57.1 Lac.About the projectMalibu Sparkling Wings floor plan represents all that one looks for in a home. The spacious 2 BHK flats are occupying an area ranging from 1041 sqft to 1122 sqft and the area of capacious 3 BHK flats varies from 1281 to 1397 sqft. These apartments are available only through the resale procedure.These stylish residential apartments are situated in the relaxing and soothing nature's lap and every inch of interiors and exteriors are designed accurately. The spacious and well-ventilated 2 BHK as well as 3 BHK flats have been designed very cleverly with lots of attention given to comfort and luxury.Malibu Sparkling Wings includes a number of amenities such as 24 hours bore well water supply, playground for children, parking facilities, round the clock security service, power backup through a generator, intercom facility and beautiful gardens.HighpointsThe flat rates of Malibu Sparkling Wings are negotiable, which is an added advantage for the home buyers. Malibu apartments in Bangalore are located just off the Marathahalli and Outer Ring Road. Also, the locality is well connected to some of the IT and corporate hubs, school, colleges, health care centers, entertainment and shopping destinations.Malibu Sparkling Wings reviews and photos will help you understand this project in a better way. If you wish to live a life filled with joy, act quick and book a flat now.

column3: A Group where thought is deliberately integrated into every facet of business. Where every square foot of space exudes maximum utility. Where stereotypes are discarded. Where traditional values seamlessly merge with youthful enthusiasm. Where managerial and administrative prowess go hand in hand with creative skills and sound technical know how, to deliver to every customer, spaces designed on pure Intelligence.Renowned for its choice of locations when planning a project, and the future it promises for the investors. Because, with every home that Oceanus builds, comes that guarantee of not just the best of comforts and conveniences, but of immense value-appreciation. Because Oceanus firmly believes, that a home of ones own is among the most Precious things in life.Steadfast in adherence to statutory requirements. Revered principles of the ancient wisdom of Vaastu followed in letter and spirit. Equally conscious is the Group, to its responsibility towards our environment, needless to mention the numerous water, waste-management, greening and other eco-friendly initiatives. Because, beyond just offering living spaces, is our bigger aim-that of making life much sweeter.A group with a keen eye for detail. Where every aspect of a project, from foundation to finishes, is diligently monitored by trained professionals. Tiles, paints and fittings are handpicked after meticulous scrutiny for performance and durability. Architecture, landscaping and other services are rendered by the best in their respective fields. Because, Oceanus believes in offering living spaces of finest quality. Such is its eye for aesthetics.

column2: Eternity Astral is a project by Eternity Structures Private Limited located in Bellandur Bangalore.  It is build on an area of 1 Acre encompassing 76 units across 2 towers. The floorings are made of Vitrified Tiles, Ceramic Tiles and Anti Skid Tiles.  Eternity Astral comprises of 1BHK, 2BHK and 3BHK Flat.  1BHK Flat has area 840 Sq-ft having 1 balcony and 1 bathroom. 2BHK Flat has a range of area from 980 Sq-ft to 1145 Sq-ft having 2 balcony and 2 bathroom. 3BHK Flat has a range of area from 1385 Sq-ft to 1565 Sq-ft having 3 balcony and 3 bathroom.  Launched in December 2013, Eternity Astral offers Ready To Move properties. The project is approved by Bruhat Bengaluru Mahanagara Palike. It is approved by various banks like Axis Bank, DHFL and SBI. The major Amenities in the project are  Earth quake resistant. Lift and Multipurpose Hall. Multipurpose Courts. Large Clubhouse and Premium branded fittings. .

column2: DNR Reflection in Bellandur, Outer Ring Road, is anexclusive residential project offering 179 residential apartments occupyingimpeccably designed towers of G+12 floors. Spread across 3.5 acres, theluxurious condominiums are configured as 3 and 4BHK units.Project detailsDNR Reflection enjoys access to one of the well known lakesof Bangalore as the lake at Ibblur is only a short distance away. The 3 and4BHK residential apartments are spacious and lavishly designed fitted withpremium fixtures and fittings. 3BHK apartments are available in the area sizeranging between 1920 sqft and 2100 sqft while 4BHK apartments are sized between2725 sqft and 3230 sqft. With 75% open space, DNR Reflection is positioned in amanner that one can enjoy unmatched views of the surroundings from each of thewell appointed flats.Designed keeping in mind international standards, DNRReflectin in Bellandur offers all the comforts that one desires of a premiumresidential project. Besides the plush accommodations, it is also known for itsextensive array of unique facilities and conveniences provided. column2: An epitome of luxury amidst natures bliss, the Orchid Lakeview is a lavishly built real estate project consisting of two main blocks of 15 storeys. Orchid Lakeview is built by Goyal and Co. in the vicinity of Bellandur Lake, a prime beauty in Bangalore that is close to the Bellandur railway station, the Apollo Clinic hospital, educational institutions and the airport. The Orchid Lakeview property has an 8 meter driveway that encircles the 2 wide blocks. Vehicles can access this motorway and drive around the blocks, which have an approximate 30,000 sq-ft area of open, green spread between the driveway and the compound wall. The space can be used for jogging or walking or simply relaxing on a park bench. The project is huge with 2 and 3 bedroom apartments spread over an area between 1270 sq-ft and 1800 sq-ft. The two main blocks of Orchid Lakeview has a Podium in between its stretch, which serves as an epicentre of infinite amenities. This includes a swimming pool with a toddler pool attached to it, a play area, a gymnasium, a multi-purpose hall, a resting area for the elderly, a party hall, beautiful garden terrace for multi-use purpose and a clubhouse with exciting indoor activities. The ground floor has expansive garden area spread outside the blocks with a basketball court and multipurpose court for entertainment. Each tower comprises of two automatic lifts and electric supply is constant with 100 percent backup for lifts, pumps etc.

column2: OverviewUrban Lake Front is among the finest residential projects developed the famous Inner Urban Infraestate. Located in Bellandur, Bangalore, this project consists of 48 lavishly designed units, which are sprawling across a single tower. Urban Lake Front 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments price list vary between 57.7 Lac 76.0 Lac.Project detailsUrban Lake Front apartments in Bellandur, Bangalore are thoughtfully constructed as per vaastu principles to ensure prosperity for the people in these flats. The luxurious 2 BHK and 3 BHK flats are available in various area sizes ranging from 1113 sqft to 1500 sqft.As the project is located in close proximity to Iblur Lake, you can flawlessly enjoy the attractive views of green environment anytime. The project is surrounded by lush green area due to which your home will enjoy cross ventilation all the time and ample natural light also enters all the rooms.High class amenities such as intercom facility, banquet hall, gym, kids play area, indoor games room and a lot more are offered here to live a comfortable life in a cool atmosphere.HighpointsOC has been already obtained for these unfurnished flats, which is an added benefit for the buyers. Also, Urban Lake Front Bellandur address is well-connected to places in and around the city including Up To School Worksheets, Dr. Sunny Medical Center, Nelivigi Eye Hospital and Surgical Centre, HDFC Bank ATM, National Public School and BMTC Bus Depot Agra.Urban Lake Front reviews given by the visitors and buyers are all on the positive side and you can also view Urban Lake Front photos to obtain the exterior views of the apartments. This project is a perfect example of well designed apartments and world class amenities. Don't wait, book a flat today to live luxuriously with your family.

column2: OverviewSipani Classe II is a luxury complex that features beautifully designed apartments that offers you a classy mixture of lavish lifestyle and luxurious amenities. Including a wide range of beautiful apartments and a luxurious penthouse in this project, you will also enjoy living in a magnificent area. Sipani Classe II at Koramangala, 8th Block, Bangalore is offering you a 2bhk and 3 BHK residential apartments area ranging 1165-1560 sq.ft. with the price per sq.ft. from 7300-9000. Open your windows and cool wind gushes in along with a scenic view outside. With the most modern amenities at hand, Sipani Classe – 2 is your chance to upgrade to a cosmopolitan living environment. Close to nature yet close to the city, these homes offer the balance of relaxed living without letting you miss out on the fun of life.Project DetailsSituated in one of the poshest and high-class locations Sipani Classe - 2 will be a dream come true for people who want to have a world-class lifestyle. Apartments in Sipani Classe - 2 are located at an excellent locality and here you will enjoy life in a hasty tone and fuzziness in Bangalore. The project offers world class facilities and amenities that will match your standards with top-line specifications. The project enables you to stay connected with all the major points of interest in and around city Bangalore.With high-end specifications and quality construction, you will love to live in a place where interior work attracts every eye and offers you a secure life. You can gift your family a luxurious home at an affordable price range. This well-designed and graceful project is in close proximity to all the places in the city, for example, Tibet Mall, Apollo Spectra Hospitals, Syndicate Bank ATM, KSRTC Pick up Point KMF BMTC bus stop, National Public School, Dr, Batra Homeopathy Clinic, Barbeque Nation, PVR Cinema and much more.For your healthy life and fitness the project comes with well-equipped gymnasium, swimming pool, multipurpose room, indoor games, power backup, car parking, security, children's play area, clubhouse, rainwater harvesting, health club, billiards room, piped gas connection, lift, party hall, Vaastu compliant and water supply.

column2: OverviewDeveloped by one of the reputed names in the real estate world, Prestige Kew Gardens from Prestige Group is a marvellous project located in Yemalur, Bangalore. Nestled amidst verdant greenery, this project is designed to offer 979 residential apartments in the configuration of 1BHK, 2BHK, 2.5BHK and 3BHK units. Modern & classy, the residential apartments are sized between 615 to 1607sq.ft. About The ProjectNo matter how big or small your family is, this well planned project boasts spectacular homes ranging from cosy 1BHKs to spacious 3BHKs. Devised as per Vaastu rules, these well ventilated apartments are a true blessing for every occupant. 15 acres of prime land is dotted 979 elegantly designed residences that are tucked away into 16 low rise towers and stunning landscapes. Enriched with high-end specifications & fixtures and tastefully done with premier flooring for a timeless look Prestige Kew Gardens flats will certainly make you fall in love with them. Flooded with lots of fresh air and natural light, these flats are best to live and experience a blissful life with your family. Prestige Kew Gardens Yemalur, Bangalore offers easy & smooth connectivity to a number of IT Parks and MNCs such as HP, ITPL, Brigade Tech Park and much more. Presence of lots of prominent schools and world-class medical facilities make Prestige Kew Gardens Yemalur indeed one of the best residential dwelling places. Owing to its excellent connectivity and the well-established social infrastructures, Yemalur in Bangalore also promises good price appreciation in the near future. HighpointsLoaded with top-notch amenities like clubhouse, swimming pool, various sporting facilities and other recreational provisions investing into this project is surely a worthy decision. Turn your dream of owning a happy home by booking a flat in Prestige Kew Gardens, Yemalur.

Some of the projects by Prestige Group Are Prestige Four Seasons, Prestige Gulmohar, Prestige Kew Gardens, Prestige Boulevard, Prestige Shantiniketan, Prestige Glenwood, Prestige Garden Bay, Prestige Technostar and the list is endless.

column2: Overview Raheja Residency by Raheja Builders is a beautiful residential society with completely ready-to-move-in apartments. Situated in one of finest address of Koramangala, Bangalore, this society offers 560 residential units distributed among total 8 towers. Raheja Residency offers a wide range of 1,2 & 3-bedroom flats with area size starting from 600sqft to 1600sqft. The flats of Raheja Residency are up for sale with a price tag ranging between Rs1.05 Cr – Rs1.65 Cr.  Project Details All the homes of this society have been designed carefully to provide maximum space and comfort to its residents. 1BHK Flats of this society measure 600 sqft, 2BHK homes are available with dimensions of 1195 sqft whereas the 3BHK units are spread across 1600 sqft. These units are crafted by skilled engineers and have brilliant floor plans. Well-lit with lots of sunlight and blessed with fresh breeze, the well-ventilated residential apartments of this society are perfect place to dwell in. Raheja Residency Koramangala, Bangalore is a well-planned residential development and offers an array of modern amenities to offer the residents all the aspects of urban living. The amenities provided include clubhouse, gymnasium, swimming pool, kids play area, meditation area and many more. Ample parking space, 24hour security, power backup and 24hour water supply facilities are also provided by the builders. Highpoints Attractive with stunning tree-lined boulevards and housing several luxurious commercial & residential establishments – Koramangala is considered as one of the affluent neighbourhood of Bangalore City. Easy connectivity to public transport facilities has immensely helped the residents with good conveyance. Koramangala also have numerous good schools & hospitals like National Public School, Bethany High School, Bangalore Public School, Apollo Spectra Hospitals and ESI Hospital to name a few. Popular shopping malls like Gopalan Innovation, Mega Mart and Max Fashion are also available in this area.

column2: Prestige Acropolis, introduced by Prestige Construction, is a residential township located at Koramangala, Bangalore. Priced between Rs. 2.20 crores and Rs. 3.88 crores (price per sq-ft ranging from Rs. 8333 to Rs. 13000), this project has 2 and 3 BHK multi-storey apartments covering areas from 2292 sq-ft to 3600 sq-ft.Prestige Acropolis in Koramangala is one of the most popular residential projects located at a distance of 6.26 kilometers from the Ulsoor Metro Station. Equipped with the most basic as well as the most advanced amenities like piped gas, air-conditioning, intercom facilities, waste disposal, maintenance staff, elevators, power backup, RO water system, internet or Wi-Fi connectivity, water storage, and visitors car parking, Prestige Acropolis looks after all the needs of its residents. Vaastu compliance, banquet halls, conference room, strolling and jogging track, bar/lounge, goods and service lift, food court or cafeteria, reserved car parking space for the residents, parks, laundry service, swimming pools, gymnasium, rain water harvesting and club house make every resident of Prestige Acropolis comfortable and proud.Situated at a distance of only 2.29 kilometers from the prestigious Indian Institute of Planning and Management, 2.24 kilometers from the AP Aparan Hospital, 2.62 kilometers from the Mattasans Super Market, and just a few meters from the HDFC Bank, Prestige Acropolis is well-connected with every kind of convenience and benefit close by.

column3: The Prestige Group owes its origin to Mr. Razack Sattar, who envisioned a success story waiting to take shape in the Retail Business in 1956 itself. Since its formation in 1986, Prestige Estates Projects has grown swiftly to become one of South India's leading Property Developers, helping shape the skyline across the Residential, Commercial, Retail, Leisure and Hospitality sectors.Prestige Court on K.H. Road in Bangalore set the pace for the Groups rapid growth which now stands at over 191 Completed Projects spanning a total developed area of over 64.06 million sqft. It also has another 64 ongoing projects comprising around 65.45 million sqft, which include Apartment Enclaves, Shopping Malls and Corporate Structures, spread across all asset classes.Prestige Constructions, an ISO 9001:2000 certified company is the only Real Estate Developer in Bangalore to have won the reputed FIABCI Award for its software and residential facilities. The Prestige Group owes its origin to Mr. Razack Sattar, who envisioned a success story waiting to take shape in the Retail Business in 1956 itself. Since its formation in 1986, Prestige Estates Projects has grown swiftly to become one of South India's leading Property Developers, helping shape the skyline across the Residential, Commercial, Retail, Leisure and Hospitality sectors.
Prestige Court on K.H. Road in Bangalore set the pace for the Groups rapid growth which now stands at over 191 Completed Projects spanning a total developed area of over 64.06 million sqft. It also has another 64 ongoing projects comprising around 65.45 million sqft, which include Apartment Enclaves, Shopping Malls and Corporate Structures, spread across all asset classes.
Prestige Constructions, an ISO 9001:2000 certified company is the only Real Estate Developer in Bangalore to have won the reputed FIABCI Award for its software and residential facilities. Prestige was also recently awarded the Crisil DA1 Developer Rating in recognition of the quality of their projects and the ability to deliver completed projects in a timely manner, making them the ONLY Property Developer across India to have received this distinction.
Today, Prestige stands as a giant and with aggressive growth plans across the Residential, Commercial, Retail and Hospitality Sectors in Bangalore, Goa, Hyderabad, Mangalore, Cochin and Chennai, lies a bright future ahead.

column2: Projected across 2.80 acres of beautiful land, Sobha Morzaria Grandeur by the famous builders Sobha Ltd is an attractive residential project located in Koramangala, Bangalore. This is RERA certified project featuring 129 units distributed among 2 towers. These units are available with 2,3 & 4 BHK configurations and the flat rates of Sobha Morzaria Grandeur are priced within the range of Rs. 1.50 Cr – Rs. 4.95 Cr. Project details Well-equipped with all the desirable modern amenities, these luxurious homes are designed with complete precision. The spectacular interiors and the exquisite exteriors, crafted under the guidance of expert artisans will surely impress you. The dynamic floor plan of Sobha Morzaria Grandeur has been applauded with confident reviews by thousands of happy home-buyers. Exclusively planned, all these homes draw plenty of natural light & fresh breeze. Also available for immediate rent, the well-ventilated residential apartments of Sobha Morzaria Grandeur are indeed worth consideration. The phase I is fully completed and the flats are absolutely ready for possession whereas Sobha Morzaria Grandeur Phase II is still under-construction. Wide range of plush amenities such as party hall, squash court, gym, swimming pool, children’s play area and much more promise a smooth and lavish lifestyle. Prime facilities like 24hours water supply, round the clock power supply and 24x7 manned security at the main entrance make this residential estate a true haven. Highpoints Replete with well-developed social infrastructures, Koramangala is one of the best residential place to settle in Bangalore. Public transport connectivity has immensely helped the residents with good conveyance to nearby places and adjoining areas. Another plus point of this residence is the effortless connectivity to IT companies such as Oracle, Accenture, Honeywell, etc. If you are hunting for a high-end accommodation, then Sobha Morzaria Grandeur is an ultimate option. So, walk in and book a flat now.
column3: With three decades of experience in creating resplendent interiors of palaces and masterpieces in the Middle-East, Mr. P.N.C. Menon founded Sobha Limited (formerly Sobha Developers Ltd) in 1995 with a clear vision to transform the way people perceive quality. Today, Sobha, a Rs. 25 billion company, is one of the largest and only backward integrated real estate players in the country.Headquartered in Bangalore, Sobha is primarily focused on residential and contractual projects. The Companys residential projects include presidential apartments, villas, row houses, luxury and super luxury apartments, plotted development and aspirational homes replete with world-class amenities. In all its residential projects, the company lays a strong emphasis on environmental management, water harvesting and high safety standards. .The backward integration model is one of the key competitive strengths of Sobha. This literally means that the Company has all the competencies and in-house resources to deliver a project from conceptualisation to completion. Backward integration includes an interiors division, a metal works and glazing factory, and a concrete products factory. Sobha has also diversified into retail business with spring mattresses under the brand name Sobha Restoplus. More than 27 variants of mattresses are produced by the mattress division using cutting-edge machinery of international quality.

Today, Sobha, a Rs. 25 billion company, is one of the largest and only backward integrated real estate players in the country.
Headquartered in Bangalore, Sobha is primarily focused on residential and contractual projects. The Companys residential projects include presidential apartments, villas, row houses, luxury and super luxury apartments, plotted development and aspirational homes replete with world-class amenities. In all its residential projects, the company lays a strong emphasis on environmental management, water harvesting and high safety standards. .The backward integration model is one of the key competitive strengths of Sobha. This literally means that the Company has all the competencies and in-house resources to deliver a project from conceptualisation to completion. Backward integration includes an interiors division, a metal works and glazing factory, and a concrete products factory. More than 27 variants of mattresses are produced by the mattress division using cutting-edge machinery of international quality.

column3: As one of the pioneers in the Bengaluru real estate market, we have been known for changing the landscape of the city since 1983. To us, what matters the most is the delight our customers get when they are home. This has gained us the reputation of a quality developer who constantly seeks excellence in the industry.Sterling Developers was founded by Ramani Sastri - Chairman and Managing Director, whose far- sightedness combined with the diligence of Shankar Sastri - Joint Managing Director, has shaped our reputation for excellence in creating value for our customers. Under their leadership, we have built some of the best properties in Bengaluru including luxury flats, premium apartments, exquisite villas and commercial complexes. In 2006, we set foot in Pune, extending our commitment of quality homes, luxury apartments and villas, to todays discerning customers across the country. Our mission is to build homes that compromise on nothing.

This credo combined with uncompromising values, customer-centricity, robust engineering, and transparency in business operations, has placed it among the most preferred real estate brands in both residential and commercial segments

The Company has grown from strength to strength, having successfully completed 48 residential projects and 2 commercial projects spanning 23.54 million square feet (PPLs economic interest –20.93 m sq ft). Currently, it has 24.87 million square feet, 17,895 units (PPLs economic interest – 22.03 m sq ft, 16,188 units) of projects under development, with an additional 22.73 million square feet(PPL’s economic interest – 18.98 m sq ft) in projected development. An ISO 9001 certification by DNV in 1998 and a DA2+ rating by CRISIL are testament to Puravankaras reputation as a real estate developer of the highest quality and reliability standards.

The Group commenced operations in Mumbai and has established significant presence in the metropolitan cities of Bangalore, Kochi, Chennai, Coimbatore, Hyderabad, Mysore and overseas in Dubai, Colombo and Saudi-Arabia.
&developerLogo=https://img.staticmb.com/mbimages/project/Puravankara-Projects-1393934404336-D-Logo.jpg&yearOfExp=43

column2: Prestige Pine Wood is a project by Prestige Estate Projects located in Koramangala, Bengaluru offering aesthetically designed currently under construction 2 BHK, 3 BHK and 4 BHK apartments consisting of 256 units and 3 towers. Prestige Pine Wood price rate starts at Rs. 1.4 Cr onward.Project Details:Prestige Pine Wood located in Koramangala, Bengaluru is a project by Prestige Estate Projects offering spaciously designed currently under construction 2 BHK, 3 BHK and 4 BHK apartments. Prestige Pine Wood plot areas for its 2 BHK flat ranges from 1249 sq. ft. to 1385 sq. ft.; 3 BHK flat areas range from 1839 sq. ft. to 1866 sq. ft. and 4 BHK flat areas range from 2462 sq. ft. to 2503 sq. ft.The project has designed the apartments with anti skid tiles in the balcony and toilet, vitrified tiles flooring in all the other rooms, decorative main door, etc.Prestige Pine Wood is a RERA Certified Project. Prestige Pine Wood is also integrated with numerous amenities like power backup, swimming pool, lift, security, park, reserved parking, services & goods lift, visitor parking,  intercom facility, maintenance staff, banquet hall, gym, indoor games room,  kids play area, DTH television facility, library, rain water harvesting, water storage, multipurpose courts, meditation area, waste disposal, conference room and fire fighting equipment.Highpoints:Prestige Pine Wood is located in the greenery and beautiful location of Koramangala, Bengaluru. Special amenities of the project include a club house, jogging & strolling track and cycling & jogging track. Prestige Pine Wood is in close proximity to Forum mall, Oasis Mall, EGL and Flipkart office. It also has excellent connectivity to the Outer Ring Road and M. G. Road. Nearest utilities in the vicinity include Jn Of 80 And 100 Feet Road, Tibet Mall, EuroKids, Apollo Spectra Hospitals, Syndicate Bank ATM etc.
column6:
Highlights


Strategically located in Residential area with close proximity to malls ( Forum mall, Oasis mall ) and office ( EGL, Flipkart ). Good connectivity to outer ring road and M.G road.Project USP:-Prestige Pine Wood is a High-Rise Residential Development in the midst of a well-established and sought after location, at Koramangala (Jakkasandara) Bangalore. Koramangala, located at the heart of the city has good proximity to IT hub and recreational zones. Prestige Pine Wood consist of 256 premium apartments and offers a combination of 2, 2.5, 3 and 4 bedroom units, and sits on a prime land of 2.5 acres and is placed in such a way that it provides maximum natural light and ventilation.

column2: Citrus Polaris is a project by Citrus Ventures Pvt. Ltd. located in Hennur, Bangalore, offering luxurious designed currently under construction 4 BHK villas. Citrus Polaris price rate starts from Rs. 1.53 Cr onward. The project is nicely equipped with all high quality amenities and civic utilities within the vicinity.Project Details:Citrus Polaris located in Hennur, Bangalore is a project by Citrus Ventures Pvt. Ltd., with their 6 years of real estate experience, offers spacious, lavish and currently under construction 4 BHK villas. Citrus Polaris plot areas for its 4 BHK villas range approx. 1880 sq. ft. with 4 balcony and 4 bathrooms.Citrus Polaris villas are designed with good interiors like ceramic tiles, vitrified tiles flooring, teak wood frame doors, granite kitchen counter top, premium CP fittings and fixtures, concealed wiring with high quality modular switches etc.Citrus Polaris is a RERA Certified Project. Citrus Polaris also provides numerous basic amenities for its occupants like security facility, swimming pool, gym, jogging track, play area, tennis court, outdoor games, rain water harvesting, club house, library, table tennis, billiards, security, etc. and many more.Highpoints:Citrus Polaris is well built in a very essential and prime location of Hennur, Bangalore. The locality has a green surrounding and is also well connected to the rest of the city. Citrus Ventures Pvt. Ltd. strives to give its residents their dream home with their amazing infrastructure and aesthetic design, all in very affordable prices. Various utilities like Kaveri Nagar Bus Stop, Patel Public School, Samsung Smart Plaza, Syndicate Bank ATM, Reliance Fresh, Dr Batra’s - Homeopathy Clinic, Adyar Ananda Bhavan, PKN Cinemas, Gold's Gym, Indian Oil Petrol Bunk, etc. all lie in very close proximity of the project.

column2: Ramky One North is one of the popular residential developments in Yelahanka, neighborhood of Bangalore. It is among the ongoing projects of Ramky Estates and Farms Limited which aim to create spaces with subtle design that reverberate with warmth, comfort and luxury.Project detailsRamky One North encompasses each tower of 13 floors with over 754 apartments; Ramky One North offers premium floor plans such as 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments with well-designed living and dining areas. The project aims to provide comfortable and sophisticated apartment enclave accommodating facilities provided for the convenience of the residents.From stylish flooring to spacious balconies, standard kitchen size and high-quality fixtures, every little detail here grants it an attractive look. All the amenities in the brochure are all ready and waiting for you including club house, lift, security, park, swimming pool, intercom facility, reserved parking, etc.HighpointsYelahanka where this project is located is a suburb of Bangalore, originally envisaged as a satellite town of the city. The plus point of the locality is its weather, which is pleasant throughout the year as it is higher in altitude than the rest of the city. Besides, which, it also has several well-maintained lakes. The locality is clean, secure with private security in most gated communities. Yelahanka as an address is a nice locality to stay. This locality is very livable locality with educational institutions. It enjoys good connectivity to grocery shops, super markets, hospitals, schools, banks and ATMs. It is just at 15km away from International Airport as well connected to Bangalore City.A simple home surrounded by nature and filled with the love and beauty is what you'll get at Ramky One North. So what's stopping you, book a flat now and enjoy all the above facilities.
column3: About Ramky Estates and Farms Ltd :Since its inception in 1994, the Hyderabad-based Ramky Group has been developing projects that positively impact both the environment and the economy.Ramky Estates and Farms Ltd., the real estate division of the Group, has a proven track record of over 20 years in creating world-class projects, encompassing the whole gamut of real estate, including residential projects, commercial projects, and integrated townships. The Division constantly strives to create designs that are both sustainable and green, and which reverberate with warmth, comfort, and luxury. To date, we have successfully delivered 7 million sq.ft. Of living and work spaces, with 6.5 million sq.ft. Under development, and another 30 million sq.ft. Of prime space in the pipeline.
