A residential apartment complex that meets the highest standards of perfection, it is located within duo Marvel Layout, which has BDA approval. 'President Leon' features the finest amenities and is constructed 100% according to vaastu. Here you have a choice of 3BHK luxury apartments (Cellar + Ground + 4 Floors) in the vicinity of the International Airport, Manyata Tech Park, Doddaballapur Industrial Area, major international schools, reputed hospitals, etc. All this comes to you from president properties, as an entity, entirely based on benchmarked standards of quality, aesthetics and client satisfaction. President Properties is an integrated urban real estate development company focused on premium developments across Bangalore with its corporate office located at Sahakarnagar. The company aspires to be among South India’s top real estate companies. PRESIDENT PROPERTIES brand reflects trade attributes of impeccable professionalism and bench mark of quality. Every individual who is a part of PRESIDENT PROPERTIES strives to ensure quality in the areas of design, project management, execution and development. We aim to build inspirational development for our customers with distinctive design, quality construction and finishing. Everything we do is aimed at delighting our customers and ensuring their loyalty over the long term, surpassing customer’s expectations.

PRESIDENT PROPERTIES pays as much attention to what the resident will not see as to the exteriors that they will enjoy. From the concrete in the foundation to the wiring hidden in the walls every component meets executive specifications before the property is released. Although one may never see these time consuming process, they see the results-homes that are not only beautiful but safe, quite and energy efficient.

PRESIDENT PROPERTIES’s core values of Transparency, Clear Titles and Ethical Business Practices has set the company apart. A strict adherence to statutory compliance has earned PRESIDENT PROPERTIES admiration from all its delighted customers.

column2: Marvel's an exquisite set of apartment, each a delight to the resident. Built on a connoisseur's platform, due attention has been given to the minutest details, which makes the project a lifestyle destination. Any eye shall rejoice at the beauty of the Marvel. And any heart shall agree that the ideal home has arrived. Right here... At Marvel!Architectural splendour. That would be the quintessence of Marvel, Ventilation, Natural light, Landscaped areas, Spacious hallways. All these add to your joy and make daily living not a routine, but something special. The future of luxury living has descended upon Marvel to let you embrace the future in all its magnitude.Well, life is meant to rejoice. To live every moment to the fullest. To smile. To laugh. To share happiness and cheer. To give our loved ones the best in us. This philosophy is carried forward at Marvel. Choose between various amenities to keep you entertained round the clock, through the year. Don't wait for the future. Experience it now... at Marvel!

column2: SMR Vinay Estella is a high rise residential project by SMR Holdings located in the prime area of Yelahanka, Bangalore offering simply planned luxurious 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. The infrastructure is currently under construction and will develop 315 units spread over 3 lavish towers. SMR Vinay Estella Bangalore price rate starts at Rs. 44.3 Lac onward.  Project Details: SMR Vinay Estella, a project located primly in Yelahanka, Bangalore by the well experienced SMR Holdings is offering luxurious and spaciously designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. SMR Vinay Estella plot areas for its 2 BHK flat range from 1230 sq. ft. to 1460 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range from 1615 sq. ft. to 2010 sq. ft. SMR Vinay Estella features best in quality world class amenities and facilities such as cafeteria, bar & lounge, jogging & strolling track, private terrace & garden, swimming pool, park, multipurpose hall, dance studio, gymnasium kids play area, aerobics room, flower gardens, canopy walk, multipurpose courts, meditation area, conference room, premium branded fittings, sky deck, earthquake resistant, health club, large open space, multipurpose hall, solar energy, kids play pool with water slides and event space & amphitheatre etc. among others for its residents. SMR Vinay Estella apartments are well designed with high standard interior features, premium quality fittings and fixtures and concealed wiring and plumbing etc. throughout every flat.  Highpoints:    SMR Vinay Estella is a fabulously designed residential venture located in the midst of nature equipped with the best amenities and architectural features. SMR Vinay Estella Bangalore locality is booming and has utilities in close vicinity like Sri Sri Ravishankar Vidya Mandir, Vinayaka Nagar Bus Stop, Aveksha Hospital, Syndicate Bank, Apollo Pharmacy, Galaxy Cinemas, Chikkabettahalli Lake, and Indian Oil Fuel Pump etc. are available for the residents.
column3: SMR Holdings At SMR Holdings, we value our vision, which is top-quality constructions and we believe its this earnest vision that has laid the foundation to our success and also has rendered us the status of uniqueness. Indeed, we have been reckoned as one of the leading construction houses in South India and we have been emphatically positioning ourselves to contribute to our customers by giving our best. The most significant factor considered while building beautiful homes is the conviction; as we take great pride in our integrity and commitment. We adhere to all the important factors involved and have an eye for intricate details. At SMR, we believe not just in the details but also in the comprehensive process, with focus on project management and quality control, we have been giving our customers world-class spaces to live in.

column2: Vajram Tiara is a premium residential property consisting of 237 spacious 3 & 4 BHK condominiums. Located in fast-growing and vibrant Yelahanka, Tiara meets the expectations of discerning customers who aspire to have a tranquil and luxurious lifestyle. Tiara incorporates contemporary modern architecture and its InNovative design ensures individual homes benefit from abundant natural light and cross ventilation. The project boasts of close to 75% open space and each apartment block is interlaced with aesthetic green landscapes and water bodies making it a veritable paradise of living space.

column2: Pavani Oakridge by Pavani Homes is one of the popular residential project in Kundalahalli, Bangalore. It has lavish yet thoughtfully designed 1 tower and 60 residences.
column3: Owning a house is a long nurtured dream for many. To have a home, you have to own one.The goal of any home is to see that all the elements in the home add to a homely feeling and utilization of space.Mr. P.V RAGHAVA RAO founded PAVANI GROUP IN 1995 to promote Apartment construction in Nellore town, at a point of time when Apartment Culture was still new there. He thus become pioneers in Apartment Industry within a short span of time. with all his hard-work, foresight and vision the group of companies has completed 14 projects and five projects are in progress and many more in the anvil, spreading all over south India, Viz. Hyderabad, Chennai, Nellore and Bangalore.PAVANI HOMES, backed up by ten years of experience in architectural planning, design and implementation, has come of age, in that, the company has analyzed the demanding choosy requirements of home owners that encompass above parameters and they are determined to a deliver a home tailor made for each owner, snug fitting his or her aesthetics, psychology and ethical Standards. PAVANI HOMES keep in its mind the futuristic requirements. This calls for world-class specifications and high standards of construction practice. Backed up by highly and experienced Civil Project Directors with their team of young field engineers, who have completed a number of projects in and around Bangalore, Chennai, Nellore and Hyderabad covering Residential, Commercial Buildings, PAVANI HOMES is never short of concept for timely completion of high quality buildings. While doing so they ensure that they do not end up functional Architectural cul-de-sac.

Hyderabad, Chennai, Nellore and Bangalore.

PAVANI HOMES, backed up by ten years of experience in architectural planning, design and implementation, has come of age, in that, the company has analyzed the demanding choosy requirements of home owners that encompass above parameters and they are determined to a deliver a home tailor made for each owner, snug fitting his or her aesthetics, psychology and ethical Standards. PAVANI HOMES keep in its mind the futuristic requirements. This calls for world-class specifications and high standards of construction practice. Backed up by highly and experienced Civil Project Directors with their team of young field engineers, who have completed a number of projects in and around Bangalore, Chennai, Nellore and Hyderabad covering Residential, Commercial Buildings, PAVANI HOMES is never short of concept for timely completion of high quality buildings. While doing so they ensure that they do not end up functional Architectural cul-de-sac.

column2: OverviewGayatri Ocean Blue is well-located in Kundalahalli, Bangalore and constructed by SRI Gayatri Constructions. Gayatri Ocean Blue layout plan has 80 units across 4 towers. Units are available to move in. Project DetailsGayatri Ocean Blue Bangalore is a popular residential area. Gayatri Ocean Blue floor plan has 2 BHK flats (1105 sqft, 1130 sqft, 1135 sqft, 1145 sqft, 1160 sqft, 1165 sqft) and 3 BHK flats (1570 sqft, 1589 sqft, 1590 sqft). The price isRs.53.0 Lac -Rs.90.0 Lac (â?¹ 4,778 per sqft - 5,663 per sqft). The average price in the locality isRs.5476 per sqft.Gayatri Ocean Blue has a club house to involve members of the society in lots of activities.All the world-class amenities are provided including 24 hours power back up, high-speed lift, safety or security, planted space, intercom facility, maintenance staff, fitness centre, indoor games room, kids club, flower gardens, air conditioning, indoor squash courts, badminton courts, Vaastu Shastra compliance and firefighting equipments or accessories.Complex has ample parking space for residents as well as visitors.HighlightsGayatri Ocean Blue is at a perfect location as it is quite close within 1-5 km to major markets, bus stop, shopping complex, educational institutions, healthcare centres, atm(s), places of worship, grocery stores, medical stores, famous food joints, movie hall, planted space, fitness centre and petrol pumps. Ryan International School, Kephee Preschool, VIBGYOR High School, Serra International Preschool, Vidya Vikas School, Atlanta Montessori School, Air Force School and Ravindra Bharathi Global School are the educational institutions located within 1-6 km from Gayatri Ocean Blue residential area. ATMs are available at the walking distance from this area. Gayatri Ocean Blue photos can be checked online at magicbricks website. You can also Gayatri Ocean Blue location for sightseeing.

column2: Sobha Gateway of Dreams is a project by Sobha Developers located in Panathur, Bangalore, offering skilful and thoughtfully designed currently under construction 1 BHK and 2 BHK apartments. It consists of 6500 units spanned over 25 floors. Sobha Gateway of Dreams price rate starts from Rs. 58 Lac onward. The project is developing world class apartments equipped with basic amenities in affordable prices for the residents to get a lavish experience.Project Details:Sobha Gateway of Dreams located in Panathur, Bangalore, is a project by Sobha Developers offering currently under construction 1 BHK and 2 BHK apartments. Sobha Gateway of Dreams plot areas for its 1 BHK flat range from 645 sq. ft. to 936 sq. ft. and 2 BHK flat areas range from 1000 sq. ft. to 1210 sq. ft.Sobha Gateway of Dreams apartments are being designed with RCC frame structure and high quality interiors like vitrified tiles, ceramic tiles flooring in every room, concealed copper wiring with modular switches, granite kitchen counter top, branded sanitary CP fittings etc.Sobha Gateway of Dreams is a RERA Certified Project. Sobha Gateway of Dreams provides numerous essential amenities for its residents like 24*7 power backup, swimming pool, security facility, intercom facility, banquet hall, gym, library, RO water system, air conditioned, vaastu compliant, internet & Wi-Fi connectivity, club house, jogging & strolling track, outdoor tennis courts and private terrace & garden etc. and many more.Highpoints:Sobha Gateway of Dreams is being developed in Panathur, Bangalore. Various utilities like Balagere Bus Stop, VIBGYOR High School, Belandur Road Railway Road, Sankara Eye Hospital, Axis Bank ATM, City SuperBazaar, Apollo Pharmacy, The Fat Chef, Mahaprabhu Ramlal Siddhayoga Kendra Yoga Centre, HP Petrol Pump, etc. all lie in very close vicinity of the project.

column2: Your dream of owning a perfect home is now a reality as the developed named L & T Realty brings to you Raintree Boulevard which is located in Hebbal, Bangalore. It offers spacious and skillfully designed 2BHK, 3BHK and 4BHK apartments.Project detailsRaintree Boulevard comprises of totally 20 towers out of which 17 towers are under construction and 4 towers i.e First Phase are launched which includes 300 units. The project is legally approved by various banks as well as Bruhat Bengaluru Mahanagara Palike and is also RERA certified.In this project the 2 BHK Flat covers an area of 1320 sqft with 1 balcony and 2 bathrooms. The area of 3 BHK Flat ranges between 1645 to 1985 sqft consisting 2 balconies and 3 bathrooms. The 4BHK Flats covers an area of 2470 to 2790 sqft with 2/3 balconies and 3/4 bathrooms. The floorings are made of vitrified tiles and ceramic tiles which look very attractive.This prestigious project has been intelligently carved with impressive floor plans and quality construction. Raintree Boulevard is a perfect blend of air-conditioned residential apartments and high-class amenities such as Club House, Gymnasium, Swimming Pool, Indoor Games Room, Banquet Hall and Outdoor Tennis Courts to name a few.HighpointsHebbal is a sought after locality based in the center of Bangalore, enjoys the benefits of being the IT hub in mid of a mesh of easy connectivity facilities. Hebbal is undoubtedly one of the most demanded residential hotspots of the nation. The extremely well-developed infrastructure, connectivity routes that links you with all parts of the city are the major advantages of this locality.If you are planning to buy an abode then Raintree Boulevard is worth considering which is all set to meet your requirements. Book a flat now and be assured of owning a quality home.

LandT Realty - Larsen and Toubro is multinational in technology, engineering, construction, manufacturing and financial services, our solutions are marketed in over 30 countries worldwide. LandT Realty is its real estate arm. Backed by LandT’s rich experience of over 75 years in the construction industry, LandT Realty has made an extremely successful foray into the real-estate industry. 
Pursuing the philosophies of ethics, quality, assurance, and diligence, LandT Realty has seen a sustained growth since its inception. It has redefined the real-estate industry in India with its transparent, customer-focused approach and continuous quest for world-class quality. 
As of today, LandT Realty is present across West, South and North India with many residential, commercial and retail projects. Committed to creating landmarks of excellence, we have built business parks, Transit Oriented Development like the Navi Mumbai - Seawoods Grand Central, and many other such coveted residential buildings and complexes. 
We believe in progress with harmony. All our projects are deeply committed to environmental protection and community welfare.

column2: OverviewSNN Clermont, a Stunning and magnificently designed luxury residential project. SNN Clermont, which is synonymous with sheer splendor has been located in Hebbal, in the suburbs of Bangalore city. SNN Clermont is offering well-crafted 3BHK and 4BHK extra-spacious residential flats sprawled majestically on a serene area amidst nature’s grandeur. SNN Clermont is presently under construction and it has been constructed and conceptualized by renowned SNN Builders. SNN Clermont price range starts at Rs.1.92 Crores Onwards. Project DetailsSNN Clermont, a splendid and well- ventilated LEED Gold Rated residential project by SNN Builders has been embellished by several primary& modern amenities. SNN Clermont is smartly located in Hebbal in India’s Silicon Valley i.e Bangalore. SNN Clermont is providing 3BHK and 4BHK spacious flats facing mesmerizing Nagawara Lake. SNN Clermont’s 3BHK flat area ranges between 2466-2526 sqft and it is also offering spacious 4BHK apartments that bear an area between 3067 –5260 sqft.In SNN Clermont Bangalore there is never ending sports and Fitness utilities like Badminton, Basketball, Lawn Tennis Courts.It also has a well-maintained Swimming and Toddler Pool.Together with Physical Health, you can ensure your Sound Mental Health in Yoga, Meditation Area.SNN Clermont, a secured gated community features Top-Notch Amenities and basic facilities like Automatic Lift, Power Backup, ample space for Reserved and Visitors Parking and much more.For Comfort, Entertainment and Socialisation of its residents  SNN Clermont has Community Hall, Party Lawn, Barbeque-Pit accompanied by a long list ahead.High PointsThe U.S.P of SNN Clermont is its location advantage with the settings of perfectly harmonious natural grandeur and cool breeze from the nearby lake. SNN Clermont also bears facilities like ICICI Bank ATM, Nilgiri’s Grocery, Prithvi Theatre, Medplus etc nearby. To give you a fancy life full of zest and sparkle, SNN Clermont Residential project is offering lavish yet thoughtfully designed apartments which are located in an area which is a preferable place to invest as well as reside.

column3: Century Real Estate, with its headquarters in Bangalore, India was founded by Dr.P.Dayananda Pai and Mr.P.Satish Pai in the year 1973 with the primary objective of transacting in the simple buying and selling of land. More than 35 years later, the Company has evolved into an integrated, full service real estate development company that has transformed Bangalores urban landscape and is credited with several of Bangalore's landmark developments such as Manipal Centre, Taj Residency, Vijaya Bank Head Quarters and Diamond District to mention only a few. Century Real Estate has the unique distinction of having purchased land on M.G.Road at INR 5 per square feet way back in 1973 where today the quoted prices are in the range of INR 20,000 per square feet.Regarded as one of the oldest and most respected companies in the Real Estate space in India, the growth of Century Real Estate has practically mirrored the growth of Bangalore as one of Asias fastest growing cities. Today, we are the largest owners of real estate in Bangalore with a land bank in excess of 3000 acres representing more than USD 2 billion in asset value and a development portfolio of over 10 million square feet comprising hotels, office buildings, residences, educational institutions and integrated townships spread across South India.

column2: Balaji Krupa project is located off Basaveshwara Nagar Yelahanka in the North of Bangalore. North Bangalore is assured to be the next economic centre of Bangalore. Proximity to the International Airport, planned infrastructure such as the Elevated Expressway (Bellary Road), High Speed Rail Link, Bangalore Metro Rail, etc. have been the major growth drivers for residential development in North Bangalore. Also, the Government is aggressively promoting this area for future economic activities. The planned Information Technology Investment Region (ITIR) near Devanhalli, Aerospace SEZ planned near the International Airport and the proposed Devanhalli Business Park are the key drivers for residential development in North Bangalore. Jakkur Main Road is close to Manyata Technology Park, is close to this area with the presence of MNC companies and IT Park. Jakkur is now part of Bruhat Bangalore Mahanagara Palika (BBMP). As the development of Bangalore city towards the new airport continues, many professionals have started inhabiting the area; water supply as well as proper electrical facilities extend through the entire stretch on Jakkur Main Road.
column3: Balaji builder-Balaji Builders is a company whose philosophy lies in the commitment to create architectural marvels using state-of-the-art technology and global architectural, construction and business practices. We are passionate about providing cost effective and holistic solutions for our customers. The founders of the group have been operating in Jaipur In the field of construction since 1998.

column2: A fine creation by SLS Developers, SLS Signature situated at Panathur, Bangalore is an ultimate place to look for both a resale flat or an accommodation for rent. Featuring 4 splendid towers with total 300 units, SLS Signature is successful residential society praised with tons of positive reviews. The society offers a wide mix of 2 & 3 BHK ready-to-move-in apartments for the home-seekers. These homes vary from 1084 sqft to 1375 sqft and are offered at an unbeatable price. Project details Laid out across 3-acres of property, this residential project situated in one of the prime residential address of Bangalore is an ideal for a life-long investment. All the well-ventilated residential apartments of SLS Signature Panathur, Bangalore are bestowed with fresh breeze & warm sunshine. Encircled by rich surroundings and brimmed with an array of modern amenities, these abodes invite you live a well-balanced life with your loving family. Celebrate every moment of your life with complete bliss at this residence which are attractive with brighter living spaces, immaculate bathrooms, spacious kitchens and charming balconies that provide incredible views of the surrounding area. Meditation area, indoor games room, kids play area, swimming pool, club house, 24hour security, round the clock water supply and much more promise a stress-free and smooth living which you always desired for. Highpoints SLS Signature Panathur, Bangalore is a RERA certified residential project located in one of the favourite residential destination. Good proximity to important areas like Whitefield, Marathahalli & Koramangala is one of the chief advantage of this area. Excellent connectivity to public transport facilities is an additional benefit. Presence of good schools, hospitals, shopping malls and other necessities make this region preferable. If you been looking for a perfect home for your family, then walk in now and book a flat at SLS Signature Panathur, Bangalore
column3: The company is constructing luxury Multistorey Apartment in Bangalore under the leadership of qualified and experienced Proprietor with an intention to construct beautiful luxury Multistorey Apartment with natural light, cross ventilation and by following Vaasthu principles, apart from value additions like soothing landscapes and ultra-modern amenities.SLS Developers was established in response to the growing need for quality housing. We have been engaged in various residential projects catering to an elite taste, especially for people from IT back ground and Multinational Companies.The company is well established with qualified and experienced architects, structural engineers, civil engineers, marketing executives and all other consultants / professionals.The customer is the foremost in our mind. While excelling in building magnificent structures we also build everlasting relationships with customers. Our expertise and commitment have gained us a goodwill that we cherish to preserve and enhance. Commitment to quality and time are the hallmark of all our endeavors.

column2: Amidst the busy Brooke Fields, Oasis Breeze lay spread over 2.5 acres of land. This 2 and 3 BHK apartment is at close proximity to ITPL and other MNC companies on the road towards Whitefield. Adjacent to AECS layout this place has good connectivity to all the near and far places in Bangalore. The Airport, Railway station, bus station and metro rails are in reachable distance from this property. These 11 towered apartments have houses in the range of 1124-1196 sq ft area. Built with contemporary design and a landscaped garden at the entry point of each tower the first look at this property is breezy. The flat comes with amenities like kids play area, swimming pool, rentable commercial space, indoor play area etc.The Oasis group are prominent for their buildings, excellent craftsmanship, bath and kitchen accessories, and the spacious interiors. The apartment is of type luxury at moderate cost. Being one of the most sought after area in Bengaluru for its connectivity, with multitude of shopping malls, eating joints, hang out places and most important community services like schools and hospitals, the AECS layout and Kundanahalli gate where this building suite is located is admirable.The oasis Breeze is a real pleasure to love and enjoy living.

column2: Embassy Lake Terraces is the home that you have always wanted. A home without compromises set in the heart of new Bangalore. A home for people, who have lived, worked or travelled across the globe and experienced the best. Designed to international standards and specifications by the Singapore based Andy Fisher Workshop Embassy Lake Terraces is architecturally nuanced to take advantage of its location by the Hebbal and Nagavara lakes. The unique twisted architecture affords singular views of the two lakes and the greenery all around. It is a virtual ocean of peace and tranquility-amidst the hustle and bustle of one of North Bangalore emerging hubs.
column3: Embassy Group, a leading development firm in real estate commenced its operations in 1993 led by Jitendra Virwani, Chairman and Managing Director of the group. The establishment has developed 37 MN SFT of Commercial, Residential, Retail, Hospitality and Industrial Warehouse spaces and holds an extensive land bank of 1,700 acres across the country. The operation spans across Indian and international markets that include Bangalore, Chennai, Pune, Coimbatore, Serbia in Eastern Europe and Malaysia.

column2: Innovative Oak Garden is one of the popular residential developments in Panathur, neighborhood of Bangalore. It is among the ready to move projects of Innovative Developer. It has lavish yet thoughtfully designed residences in 2 Blocks. The best part of this project is the living spaces are available for rent at a very affordable price that ranges between Rs. 49.2 Lac - 79.5 Lac.Project detailsInnovative Oak Garden is a beautiful masterpiece constructed by Innovative Group of Constructions. It offers spacious and smart homes that are perfectly equipped with all the modern amenities. The society includes 228 apartments that offer 2 BHK as well as 3 BHK units and it spread in an area of about 3.3 acres. This is promising society that ensures the quality construction and comfortable life. It is designed in a way that it offers a perfect view of vast open space and greenery.Without any housing complaints the project includes independent flats which are constructed as per vaastu principles. Out of the many world class facilities, the major amenities in Innovative Oak Garden include club house, lift, security, park, reserved plus visitors parking and a lot more.HighpointsThis well-planned society is very close to all the important places on the city Bangalore like ORR, IT Hubs, Mall, International Schools, Colleges, Hospitals and Supermarket. The houses are very beautifully designed and offer contemporary interior work. This society is very close to all the civic utilities like Bhoganahalli bus stop, Vibgyor High School, More Mega Store and Maruthi Medical Store. The address of this RERA Certified project is one of the happening places in Bangalore.The project offers you world class amenities and features for a perfect life that is affordable too. Book a flat now in Innovative Oak Garden for a blessed life with your family.

column2: Overview Strategically placed in the midst of happening locality flourished with IT Parks, schools & hospitals – Godrej Platinum is an ambitious residential project by the famous Godrej Properties. Located in Hebbal – Bangalore, this gorgeous residence spread across 2-acres of property offers 135 residential units distributed among 2 towers. The project offers 3 & 4 BHK flats and penthouses with the area size ranging from 2,893 - 3,915 sqft. The flat rates of Godrej Platinum Hebbal, Bangalore are priced starting from Rs 2.63 Cr. About the Project These residential homes are perfectly ready-to-move-in and can be either purchased or rented as per your requirement. The mesmerising views of the shimmering Hebbal Lake from every apartment is the main attraction of this Godrej Platinum. The well-ventilated residential apartments of Godrej Platinum Hebbal, Bangalore are bright & airy, thus creating a friendly home ambiance. Designed to upgrade your lifestyle and offer you a perfect home, every abode of this project has been tailored by professional engineers & artisans. Some of the eco-friendly measures like solar panels for electricity generation, rain water harvesting and low E-glazed windows has earned this project a pre-certification from IGBC with ‘Gold' ratings. So, if you wish a green home for precious family where they are able to breathe fresh air, book a flat now in Godrej Platinum Hebbal, Bangalore. This gorgeous residential project also offers a series of modern amenities like temperature controlled indoor swimming pool, gymnasium, mini theatre and is also self-contained with a cafeteria. Highpoints Easy connectivity to public transport facilities, adjoining areas and various IT companies has ranked Godrej Platinum Hebbal, Bangalore higher among the search list of home buyers. Heritage School, Elements Mall and Colombia Asia Hospital are some of the prominent landmarks to Godrej Platinum. It merely takes a 15minutes short drive to reach NH-44 from Godrej Platinum.
column3: Godrej Properties Ltd. follows the Godrej Properties Ltd. philosophy of Innovation and Excellence in the real estate industry. Godrej Properties Ltd. is the first real estate company to have achieved ISO Certification. The company is currently developing landmark projects in 12 cities across India. To create landmark structures, Godrej Properties Ltd. collaborates with outstanding associates and reputed names. Over the last few years, Godrej Properties Ltd. has received over 50 awards and recognition's for developing residential, commercial and township projects. The company aims to deliver superior value to all stakeholders through extraordinary and imaginative spaces created out of deep customer focus and insight.

column2: Legacy Group has started another well-liked residential project Legacy Cirocco in Bellary Road at Bangalore. The Bellary road connects to various important institutions and offices of the city. Positioned next to Vidyashilp School, the structure is stretched over 2 acres with 94 units of astonishing apartments. There are 3 BHK and 4 BHK luxurious apartmentsextending from 4150sqft to 5650sqft. The flooring is done by Italian marble in all the corridors with the granite steps and modern railings. There are elevators functioning 24 x 7 with capacity of 6 people. The Kitchen is quite a marvel comprising 2-inch tiling over the counter with single bowl sink in kitchen and dual bowl in utility. There is water treatment plant for purified water ensuring healthy livings.With over 20 years of real estate construction experience, Legacy Group has installed all the modern amenities in the apartments with finest material. The electric wiring has been done by experts safeguarding safety of one and all.AmenitiesThe luxurious apartments have following amenities for effectively lessening the efforts of residents.Power Back UpSwimming PoolParty HallAir Conditioned liftsPlaygroundBalconyInvertor ACKids Play AreaIntercom FacilitySecuritySteam and Sauna to relax after exercisesMaintenance StaffReserved ParkingVisitors ParkingPrivate GardenWaiting Area for Visitors

column2: Overview: This architectural masterpiece by House of Hiranandani is being offered in Hebbal, Bangalore. Glen Gate is under construction, however, you can always visit Hiranandani official website for Glen Gate photos as well as Glen Gate floor plans. Spanning across 3 beautiful as well as huge towers, these towers comprise of 576 aesthetically designed apartment units which are priced at the range of Rs 90.3 Lac - 1.10 Cr which is an added advantage. Glen Gate flats offers mesmerising view of the Hebbal lake located upfornt, while offering a range of apartment spaces to choose from 1245 sq. ft. to 1810 sq. ft. About the project :  One of the best features of investing into this project is because of the Hiranandani Glen Gate reviews which are positive and favourable. Hiranandani Glen Gate Hebbal is one of the posh and high-end projects, with all the necessities at hand, this project is absolutely commendable. Hiranandani Glen Gate address is certainly where you should reside in, if classy yet luxurious lifestyle is what you desire. Glen Gate floor plans are beautifully planned with loads of natural light seeping in the entire abode, brightening your day and getting sun-kissed.              Presenting a perfect fusion of 2 and 3 BHK apartment units, with sizes ranging from 1245 sq. ft. to 1440 sq. ft. for 2 BHK units while the 3 BHK units sized from 1630 sq. ft. to 1820 sq. ft., these dwellings are well designed with conveniences like never before. Adding value to its name and brand, this project, offers comfort in every level of a standard lifestyle. Highpoints: Central locality is what this project has to offer with all the necessities at hand and recreational amenities in pocket, Glen Gate offers close proximity to Bangalore Baptist Hospital, Megamart Stores and Sukrupa School are all located within close proximity, with all these comforts how can you miss this opportunity? Book now!!!
column3: For the last three decades, the Hiranandanis have been single-handedly altering the ethos and aesthetics of real estate in India. The group has built multi-use developments in India on a large scale and have introduced retail, hospitality, healthcare, education and entertainment into their developments. With a unique approach to engineering, planning and design, the Hiranandanis invest heavily in research and development to ensure they remain at the forefront of value engineering and design.Through the environmentally friendly concepts of New Urbanism, their focus has been on converting suburban sprawls into well-planned urban communities such as the Powai and Thane townships which have won several awards for outstanding urban development. These self-sufficient, integrated communities have become aspirational addresses for Mumbaiites. The group has established various schools, colleges, institutions and hospitals through trusts. Their clubhouses and community spaces have earned international repute and success.All these experiences and expertise are encompassed under the House of Hiranandani, a conglomerate that is set to create new benchmarks for the real estate industry by continuing to break new ground and incorporate path-breaking technology into their design, to create future-ready and intelligent spaces. The House of Hiranandani brings to its customers and stakeholders the benefit of years of experience under one roof, thereby creating a platform from which it will continue its pioneering innovations and set the standard for real estate development in India.

column2: Sterling Pointe, Bangalore, is a well-planned imminent residential venture developed by Sterling Developers Pvt. Ltd. located at Kempapura, Hebbal. With 40 spacious, private and limited, 3 bed apartments, Sterling Pointe offers a premium and lavish standard of living coupled with an array of amenities. The project is located in the heart of the future near the Hebbal flyover. This vibrant, well connected and joy - inspiring address is close to Columbia Asia Hospital, Manyata Tech Park, Kirloskar Business Park, Vidyaniketan School and is en route the International Airport.
column3: As one of the pioneers in the Bengaluru real estate market, we have been known for changing the landscape of the city since 1983. To us, what matters the most is the delight our customers get when they are home. This has gained us the reputation of a quality developer who constantly seeks excellence in the industry.Sterling Developers was founded by Ramani Sastri - Chairman and Managing Director, whose far- sightedness combined with the diligence of Shankar Sastri - Joint Managing Director, has shaped our reputation for excellence in creating value for our customers. Under their leadership, we have built some of the best properties in Bengaluru including luxury flats, premium apartments, exquisite villas and commercial complexes. In 2006, we set foot in Pune, extending our commitment of quality homes, luxury apartments and villas, to todays discerning customers across the country. Our mission is to build homes that compromise on nothing.

column9:
https://www.magicbricks.com/propertyDetails/otherProjectsByDeveloper.html?psmid=5094799&devId=58790&devName=Mantri Developers&cityName=Bangalore&cityId=3327&postingType=P&aboutDeveloper=
Mantri Developers  
Mantri Developers is one such builder who has steadily established itself as a trusted realty organization. The passionate Mantri Developers Pvt. Ltd. was built in 1999 by Mr. Sushil Mantri to lead real estate sector with its innovative construction projects involving 2bhk, 3bhk & 4 bhk residential apartments across Bangalore with an area starting from 950 sqft at apartment price starting from Rs. 55 Lac. The group is ground-breaking in significantly changing the infrastructure of south India its several construction projects pertaining to residential building & commercial shops and education, retail & hospitality sectors in just 14 years. The Mantri Developers are renowned for offering Villas, Row Houses, Luxury Apartments, Super Luxury Apartments and Semi-Luxury Apartments in Bangalore with a proven record of delivering 1.4 homes in a single day.
Till date, the company owns a diversified construction portfolio of over 20 million sq. ft. with 11 million sqft under various stages of construction. Recently, they have made tried their feet in the high-growth area of office leasing in Bangalore, Pune and Hyderabad which is spread over 11 mn sqft of the area. Some of the popular projects by Mantri Developers are Mantri Blossom in Bangalore, Mantri Centrium in Bangalore, Mantri Manyata Energia in Bangalore, Mantri New Launch in Bangalore, Mantri Classic in Bangalore, Mantri Lakeview in Bangalore, Mantri Splendor in Bangalore and Mantri Lavendula in Pune, these are just a few of many projects executed by the developers.

column2: KSR Cordelia is a project by KSR Builders & Developers strategically located in Hebbal, Bangalore offering well planned lavishly designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. The project is ongoing construction at the moment and will consist of 272 units spread over 2 towers. KSR Cordelia apartment price rate starts at Rs. 60 Lac onward.    Project Details: KSR Cordelia, a currently under development residential space located in Hebbal, Bangalore by KSR Builders & Developers is offering lavishly designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. KSR Cordelia floor plan for its 2 BHK flat areas range from 1035 sq. ft. to 1256 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range from 1367 sq. ft. to 1462 sq. ft. KSR Cordelia Bangalore features modern day amenities such as jogging track, cycling track, club house, power back up, swimming pool, lift, 24 hour security facilities, park, reserved parking, visitor parking, intercom facility for every unit, gymnasium, indoor games room, kids club, flower gardens, laundry service, air conditioned, multipurpose courts, meditation area, vaastu compliant and fire fighting equipment etc. to name a few.KSR Cordelia apartments designed and developed with key interior specifications such as vitrified tiles flooring in living and dining area, wooden flooring in all bedrooms, teak wood frame main doors with polish finish teak wood panel shutter, sal wood frame internal doors with flush shutter and paint finish, fire resistant concealed copper wiring with modular switches, granite kitchen counter with stainless steel sink and drain board, etc. Highpoints:  KSR Cordelia Bangalore locality is very easily accessible from the other parts of the city. The close vicinity includes utilities like Sriramapura Cross Bus Stop, Vidya Niketan School, Columbia Asia Hospital, Divya Pharmacy, Body Tone Fitness Gym and Kotak Mahindra Bank ATM etc. You can find KSR Cordelia photos on magicbricks.

column2: With an aim to provide luxurious home at a very unbeatable price, Vasathi Housing presents Vasathi Avante at the prime area of Hebbal, Bangalore. Laid out across 5-acres of land parcel, this residential project features 3 towers with total 380 units. Choose from a wide range of well-designed 2, 2.5 & 3-bedroom apartments measuring from 1053 sqft to 1460 sqft. The flat rates of Vasathi Avante Hebbal are priced starting from Rs. 52.6 Lacs to Rs. 85.0 Lacs. Project details Well-placed just behind Manyata Embassy Business Park, Vasathi Avante Hebbal is an ongoing residential development with possession by December-2017.  Every apartment is brilliantly designed, so that fresh air & sunlight peeps in from every nook & corner. The well-ventilated residential apartments of Vasathi Avante Hebbal with brilliant floor plans are surely worth considering. All the apartments of this RERA certified residential project has been devised as per vaastu science, to promote a healthy and prosperous living. Acknowledged with lots of positive reviews, Vasathi Avante Hebbal also offers numerous the residential apartments. Some of the well-known amenities provided include swimming pool, air-conditioned gymnasium, jogging track, tennis court, children’s play area, wellness center and much more. The society is also self-sustained with library, supermarket, shopping center, playschool, fast food center, bank, ATM and a pharmacy to offer a smooth & comfortable living. Highpoints Easy access to numerous software companies and MNCs is indeed one of the highpoint to make Vasathi Avante Hebbal a preferred residential destination. This project is Green Home certified affiliated to the norms of IGBC with Gold ratings. Connectivity to public transport facilities is an added advantage. Vibgyor High, Federal Public School and B G National Public School are situated within just 5kms. Book a flat now in Vasathi Avante Hebbal, Bangalore and discover a whole new world of luxurious living.
column3: Vasathi Housing Limited is an ISO 9001:2008 certified organization that is committed to excellence and on time delivery. Established in the year 2009, Vasathi has acquired a prominent position in a short span of time through building energy efficient and environment friendly residential projects. Vasathi Housing offers lasting value, with an emphasis on contemporary designs, optimized layouts and cutting-edge technologies.Dedicated to be green compliant, Vasathi homes are designed as per LEED guidelines.Vasathi strongly believes in honouring its commitments. The company is committed to deliver all its projects on time as it understands the financial impact of delay on the customer. LEED stands for Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design.

column2: OverviewHiranandani Glen Classic is a project by House of Hiranandani, located at Hebbal, Bangalore. Hiranandani is a leading real estate brand in the market. The Group majorly focuses on superior quality and excellent services in architecture. Hiranandani Glen Classic, a RERA certified project, offers quality home at affordable prices. The starting range for the apartments is 52 lakhs and varies up to 1.35 crore. About the ProjectHiranandani Glen Classic consists of 288 units, 3 towers and 19 floors. The project is currently under construction and covers an area stretched over to 6050 per square feet to 8108 per square feet. The project has its base at Hebbal, Bangalore. Many famous educational institutions, business centers and hospitals surround the area. The project is located in North Bangalore and is connected with the Outer Ring Road and Bellary Road. Thus, the location is quite central. The project offers 1 BHK, 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments with different floor plans. The build –up area for the same is 655 square feet, 1270-1295 square feet and 1650-1821 square feet respectively. The designing material used for the apartments is ultra-fashionable. Teak wood frame and shutters are used for the main doors. The use of vitrified tiles for flooring in the kitchen, bedrooms, balcony, living room and toilet gives a modish look to the apartments. Granite platform with stainless steel sink is used in the kitchen. House of Hiranandani provides facilities such as lift, gymnasium, car parking, fire fighting systems etc. under this project. HighpointsEvery apartment under the Hiranandani Glen Classic project is vastu compliant.Apartments are located at a distance of 400 meters to the Outer Ring Road and 1.5 kilometers to the NH7.Amenities such as Billiards, Card Room and Pool Table are provided for the purpose of entertainment.
column3: Since our inception into Indias urbane terrains, we have upturned the way living spaces are designed. And with that, we have transformed the ethos and aesthetics of real estate in India. Pillared by a unique approach to designing and planning, we invest heavily in research and development ensuring that each of our developments surpass industry benchmarks and redefine value engineering and design. Our name, since the beginning, has been associated with excellence and we are creating sustainable value for our customers, stakeholders, business associates, employees and society at every step of our development. Through environmentally friendly concepts of New Urbanism, our focus has been on transforming suburban sprawls of land into well-planned urban communities that nourish an outstanding sense of living. And our developments stand as living proof. Apart from residences, we have established numerous schools, colleges, institutions and hospitals through affiliates, trusts, clubhouses and community spaces, all of which have earned unmatched international repute. Symbolic to our construction, our developments encompass the ether of the residents lives entirely, by introducing retail outlets, hospitality centers, healthcare and educational institutions etc. within the realms of House of Hiranandani community. Our aim is to integrate every family into a bigger, more inclusive community. We are cognizant of the fact that we have maneuvered successfully through a turbulent time in this industrys history. As we move forward, we will carry our legacy forward proudly and will persevere to take it to new heights through a committed adherence to the values that we stand for. These values that manifest in our passion for perfection and endless innovation and advancements.

column2: OverviewPrestige misty waters located in Hebbal, Bangalore developed by Prestige Group is built with superior craftsmanship linked to the precision of modern technology. The project is well connected by different modes of transportation and is in close proximity of various civic utilities. About the projectThese residential apartments have been meticulously designed imparting versions in layout to match the personal necessities of the buyers. Well-ventilated apartments are available at an affordable price ranging from Rs.73.7Lakhs to 2.15Crore. Prestige misty waters constitute 4 thoughtfully planned towers which include entirely 558 residential units.Mesmerizing Prestige misty waters comprises of 2, 3 and 4BHK flats. The area of elegant 2BHK flat varies from 1134 to 1141sq.ft. The 3BHK unit is spread across 1987sq.ft area. Whereas the 4BHK flat cover an area of 2375 to 2476sq.ft.Wonderful altitude, world class amenities and a refreshing landscape makes you discover a home where you will wake up each new day with a renewed vigor. Moreover the project provides all the world class amenities such as exclusive jogging and strolling track, etc.HighpointsPrestige misty water is truly the place to live. Its world-class features act as a springboard to happiness, fill your life with incomparable joy and make every sunrise an occasion to look forward to, with renewed enthusiasm. Travelling to close places and areas is completely convenient with exceptional connectivity to public transport facilities.Social infrastructures are to be found at a stone throw distance including Bangalore Baptist Hospital and State Bank of India both are situated at a distance of not more than 1.04Km. Also, Esteem Mall is accessible within 3.28Km radius. What are you waiting for, book a flat right now in Prestige misty water and accomplish your fantasy home.

The Prestige Group owes its origin to Mr. Razack Sattar, who envisioned a success story waiting to take shape in the Retail Business in 1956 itself. Since its formation in 1986, Prestige Estates Projects has grown swiftly to become one of South India's leading Property Developers, helping shape the skyline across the Residential, Commercial, Retail, Leisure & Hospitality sectors.

Prestige Constructions, an ISO 9001:2000 certified company is the only Real Estate Developer in Bangalore to have won the reputed FIABCI Award for its software and residential facilities. Prestige was also recently awarded the Crisil DA1 Developer Rating in recognition of the quality of their projects and the ability to deliver completed projects in a timely manner, making them the ONLY Property Developer across India to have received this distinction.
Today, Prestige stands as a giant and with aggressive growth plans across the Residential, Commercial, Retail and Hospitality Sectors in Bangalore, Goa, Hyderabad, Mangalore, Cochin and Chennai, lies a bright future ahead!

column2: Overview:Vaishnavi North 24 is a project by Vaishnavi Group in the strategic location of Hebbal, Bangalore offering 2 BHK and 3 BHK spacious apartments. It consists of 180 units spanned over 3 towers. Vaishnavi North 24 price rate starts from Rs. 92.2 Lac onward. The project is developing a thoughtfully designed infrastructure on a total project area of 2.74 acres.Project Details:Vaishnavi North 24 is offering lavishly designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. The project aims to provide the best living space in Bangalore. Vaishnavi North 24 plot areas for its 2 BHK flat range from 1170 sq. ft. to 1199 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range from 1639 sq. ft. to 1730 sq. ft.Vaishnavi North 24  spacious infrastructure is designed with vitrified tiles flooring, timber laminated flooring in master bedroom, teak wood frame doors, granite kitchen platform with SS sink, branded fitting and fixtures etc.Vaishnavi North 24 will provide numerous high quality amenities and facilities for its occupants like jogging & strolling track, multipurpose hall, indoor squash & badminton courts, flower gardens, aerobics room, vaastu compliant, children’s play area, indoor games room, gymnasium, swimming pool etc. among others.Highpoints:Vaishnavi North 24 is a 3 side open architecture with world class specifications. The area is very convenient as various basic civic utilities lie in the vicinity and has great connectivity via different types of transportation. Vaishnavi North 24 locality is just 1 km from the Hebbal Flyover. Various utilities and landmarks like Bangalore Cantonment Station, Hosmat Hospital, RBANM's High School, GPO Bus Stop, Big Bazaar, Karnataka Bank ATM, Yasho Pharma, The Oberoi, Inox Cinema, Lalbagh Botanical Garden, Heliport at JW Marriott, The Grand Magrath Hotel, Indian Oil Petrol Pump, etc. are in the vicinity of the property.

column2: Pramuk MM Meridian makes a superb home for the entire family.Pramuk MM Meridian offers 25 floors of spacious 3-bedroom luxury apartments as well as 4-bedroom duplexes with the size and feel of a villa that make stylish and safer alternatives to owning an independent home. Superior quality finishes, basement car parking and a quiet and serene environment are to be expected.Each residential unit is Vastu compliant and detached from the common area by virtue of extending out from a central core – offering residents maximum privacy, a sense of spaciousness and a great view all around.A full range of facilities are available for leisure pursuits, including two swimming pools, a well-equipped gymnasium, a modern clubhouse and a roof-top garden themed party area.

column2: Honey Dew is a sprawling luxury project spread across the magnificent area and offers beautifully designed apartments in Bangalore. Here you will be able to enjoy the contemporary lifestyle in a well-planned apartments in Bangalore. The surrounding beauty offers you a perfect place where you will feel rejuvenating. If you are looking for residential apartments then consider buying your own space at Honey Dew, Horamavu, Bangalore. Honey Dew price is very affordable and it feature 60 units that inspire you to live life to the fullest.Project DetailsThe builders of Honey Dew in Bangalore designed and developed this residential project with perfect harmony which you can call home. Honey Dew floor plan offers unique blend of spacious area and well-ventilated rooms. Honey Dew in Horamavu is beautifully designed with unbound comforts & the all the modern amenities like gymnasium, banquet hall, maintenance staff, multipurpose hall, waste disposal facility, rain water harvesting system, conference room, outdoor tennis courts, power back-up security, visitor parking, swimming pool, lift, park, kids play area, cafeteria/ food courts, bar lounge, outdoor tennis courts, conference room and much more.Details like Honey Dew price, Honey Dew photos are easily available online you can search for further details on our website. The apartments in Honey Dew in Bangalore are a perfect blend of modernity and elegance. The project offers 2 BHK and 3 BHK luxurious apartments in Horamavu, Bangalore. The well-designed Honey Dew comprises of unique interior work that attracts many of the home buyers and this project comes with lavish lifestyle.  Balcony flooring is finished with anti-skid tiles and the kitchen flooring is completed with ceramic tiles. The living/dining flooring is finished with vitrified tiles and the master bedrooms in every units are done with vitrified tiles. All the units beautifully decorated with designer doors. Kitchen are fully furnished with granite platform and stainless steel sink. Toilet are well-equipped with designer sanitary wares and the flooring is adorned with anti-skid tiles.

column2: OverviewDesigned with modern luxuries, latest interiors and smart floor plan, the Crossandra in Horamavu, Bangalore is enclosed in lush greenery. Located in one of the most prominent areas of Bangalore, the Crossandra is situated between beautiful Haramavu Agara Lakeside and Haramavu Main Road to Kalkere. Equipped with high- end facilities, the Crossandra is a ready to move - in society that is designed to offer affordable housing in Horamavu, Bangalore and is equipped with 2 towers and 170 residential flats. Available for sale at prices starting from Rs. 66.6. Lac, these 2BHK and 3BHK residential apartments are constructed in many sizes.Project detailBuilt with a smart layout, each apartment at Crossandra offer proper cross ventilation and natural sunlight. If you book a flat in Crossandra, you get to live a lakeside lifestyle as each apartment here provides serene view of the lake. You can explore Crossandra price, Crossandra photos, Crossandra floor plan, flats in Crossandra etc. and all the other important information at Magicbricks. The project is constructed by the Akshya Developers that was established in Bangalore and works on its core values of innovation, consistency and reliability.The residential flats in Crossandra feature RCC framed structure, 8 inch, 6 inch 4 inch cement concrete blocks for external and internal walls, internal walls and ceiling plastered with lime rendering, external walls with textured finish, main door with teak wood frame and teak moulded skin doors, other doors with hard wood frame with skin doors, UPVC sliding windows with safety grills, vitrified tiles in kitchen, living, dining room, balconies and all bedrooms, kitchen with 2 ft granite platform with glazed tiles dado upto 2 ft height above the granite platform with stainless steel sink, toilets with sanitary fittings ceramic tiles flooring and glazed tile dado upto 7 ft height, emulsion paint for internal walls and apex paint for external walls. The Crossandra is loaded with many amenities within the boundaries of the society.In your leisure time you can enjoy swimming and can even go to the club house, gym, amphitheater, children’s play area, badminton court etc.Basic facilities like covered parking, visitor’s parking, intercom facilities, 24 hours water supply, 24 hours security, rain water harvesting pit, generator backup and sewage treatment plant are also available for your convenience.The society offers easy connectivity to public transport, NH-44, Swamy Vivekananda Road, Bangalore International School, Vibgyor High school, Sri Chaitanya Techno School, Apollo Hospital, Srinivasa Eye Hospital, Cavalier Hospital, Columbia Asia etc.

We are a professionally managed organization with a dedicated team overseeing all aspects of real estate.

AKSHYA DEVELOPERS is synonymous with quality and trust since its inception has built its reputation brick by brick, not just meeting expectations, but far exceeding them. Customers come first is a motto zealously followed by our Chairman Mr. Seelam Venkatesh, management expert with a civil engineering background. His passion has percolated down the line forming the backbone of our organization. 

As a result, the AKSHYA DEVELOPERS need no advertising, they are sold by our happy customers, Building beautiful homes that are nestled in natural surroundings yet a stone’s throw away from the hustle- bustle of the city is a dream we have been realizing several decades. This has gone towards making us the most valuable property developer, known for creating urbane, amenities-rich communities.

Lendi Park, a pioneering gated community concept that includes plots & we have been developing properties with strong customer focus We wouldn’t call it expansion though... we prefer to say – we took a step closer to our passion for ultimate customer satisfaction & we have committed to long-term business strategies in the communities we serve.

The speed at which Akshya Developers have journeyed in this industry and the incredible volume we have built is a reflection of our deep passion, commitment and expertise. It is the amalgamation of multifarious strategic initiatives that have raised the company to the pinnacle of excellence.

In the coming years the company plans to focus on the residential sector, retail, hospitality, IT Parks and educational institutions in Bangalore, Hyderabad and Vishakhapatnam.
Concern for the environment always begins from within oneself.

column2: Overview:Sovereign Unnathi is a project by Sovereign Developers. It is located in Kalkere, Bengaluru with 25 towers and 1600 units with 2, 3 and 5BHK apartments spread across 12.50 acres. The project offers luxurious, spacious and aesthetically designed apartments, equipped with all basic amenities and in close proximity to all civic utilities. Sovereign Unnathi is an urban look on housing for the simple yet luxurious. Project details:Sovereign Unnathi located in Kalkere, Bengaluru is a project by Sovereign Developers, established in 2005, which offers housing with spacious and skilfully designed 2, 3 and 5BHK apartments with state-of-the-art amenities to fulfil every home-owners lavish lifestyle. The flats have an area ranging from 856-3400 sq. ft.The 2BHK ranges in 856 sq. ft; 3BHK is 1585 sq. ft. and the 5BHK is 3400 sq. ft. They are designed to support the comfortable living for the residents that the project promises.The numerous amenities include lifts, water supply, power backup, fire fighting systems, security, intercoms, car parking, gymnasium, club house and children’s play area. Other special lifestyle amenities include badminton court, indoor games, lawn tennis court, spa, swimming pool, toddler pool, garbage disposal, landscape garden, paved compound, rain water harvesting, sewage treatment, internal street lights, library, shopping centre, visitors parking, letter box panel at stilt floor, party lawn etc. among other things. Highpoints:Sovereign Unnathi is strategically place in a small residential area of Kalkere with a well developed road and railway network.It is in close proximity to NMPC Hospital, 1 km from Horamavu Main Road, 9 km from Columbia Asia Hospital etc among others.3 km from Podar International School, 3 km from National Highway – 44 etcPopular landmarks near the property include Koshys, Sri Chaitanya Techno School, HDFC Bank, Gopalan Signature Mall, and Suvee Boutique Hotel

column2: Overview This elegant residential project Cumins Genesis, Horamavu, Bangalore is offering variety of 2, 3 and 4 bhk apartments in Bangalore. Including 176 units spread over 5 towers in Cumins Genesis, this residential apartments features well-designed floor plan and beautiful interior work. Cumins Genesis in Horamavu, Bangalore price is affordable and offers lavish lifestyle. Spread across the wide area of 1 acres this well-designed society offers all the locational benefits and amenities.About the Project Cumins Genesis is known for affordable housing and elegant residential apartment that offers luxurious lifestyle under affordable budget. You can consider buying your dream home in this beautifully crafted building in a peaceful and tranquil living environment. Cumins Genesis, Bangalore is an ideal place, where you can invest in properties and this residential apartments. You can lead a safe and secure life with your family and enjoy the best of everything. The project is also known for its beauty, range of world class amenities and the locational benefits. The apartments in this beautiful society are design is contemporary style yet looks simple and elegant. The lush green garden ensure that each apartments in this beautiful society offer cross-ventilation. The project surroundings is perfect where you can enjoy life at its best. Cumins Genesis price is affordable and the living space in this society has specifications of 2bhk, 3bhk and 4bhk apartments. The residential project Cumins Genesis is well-equipped with all the major amenities like badminton court, amphitheatre, multipurpose hall, fountain, 24x7 security system, swimming pool, indoor games area, Cricket pitch, basketball court, RO System, visitor parking, grocery shop. column2: SLV Nakshatra is a project by SLV Structures located in Hormavu, Bengaluru offering lavishly designed ready to move 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. It consists of 68 units, 5 floors spanned over 1 tower. SLV Nakshatra is equipped with all the high end amenities and is also close to various civic utilities.Project Details:SLV Nakshatra located in Hormavu, Bengaluru, is a project by Space India Builders, with their 13 years of experience in the real estate market offers lavish ready to move 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. SLV Nakshatra plot area for its 2 BHK flat ranges from 1026 sq. ft. to 1116 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range from 1350 sq. ft. to 1404 sq. ft.SLV Nakshatra apartments are being designed with teak wood door frame, vitrified, anti skid and ceramic tiles throughout the flat; concealed wiring with fire resistant wires, granite kitchen counter top, CP fittings etc.SLV Nakshatra is a RERA Certified Project. SLV Nakshatra also provides many essential amenities for its residents like lift, 24*7 water supply, 24*7 power backup, fire fighting equipment, intercom, car parking, gym, club house, children’s play area etc.Highpoints:SLV Nakshatra special lifestyle amenities include 24*7 security, CCTV camera security, gated community, jogging track, swimming pool, multipurpose hall and eco friendly amenities like landscape garden, paved compound and rain water harvesting. The project is just 1 km from NH – 44, 8 km from Bangalore International School, 8 km to Elements Mall and 5 km to Baiyappanahalli Railway Station. It is located in a rapid growing suburb and is in close proximity to various utilities like Koshys, Sri Chaintanya Techno School, Gopalan Signature mall, Suvee Boutique Hotel, State Bank of India etc. All these amenities and utilities are provided to the residents just a stone’s throw away.

column2: Developed by Prestige Group - Prestige Gulmohar is an ongoing residential project situated in the thriving locality of Horamavu, Bangalore. This project consists of 5 towers with total of 404 well-planned residential units spread across 3.27 acres of vibrant greenery. The apartments are available with 2, 2.5 & 3-bedroom configurations with the varying area size from 1169 sqft to 1752 sqft. The flat rates of Prestige Gulmohar Horamavu, Bangalore are currently priced starting from Rs. 65 Lacs onwards. Project details For a plush living, all the well-planned residential units of this magnificent project are crafted with premium quality construction and are loaded with top notch amenities. The attractive floor plans of Prestige Gulmohar Horamavu will surely impress you. Well-located with all the prime facilities in close proximity, this residential project is an ultimate choice if you are seeking perfect home for your family. This project is nearing completion and the possession of Prestige Gulmohar residential apartments will begin very soon. Clubhouse, swimming pool, indoor games room, kid’s play area and a well-equipped gymnasium are some of the alluring amenities available to keep you entertained in your leisure time. This gated community assures a complete worry-free environment to live with 24x7 security surveillance. Highpoints This is a RERA certified project enclosed within the landscaped greenery, thus providing a serene atmosphere to live a healthier life. Within just 5-6kms, you can locate a number of good schools like Sri Chaitanya, New Baldwin International Residential, Vibgyor High and Sinclairs High.NMPC Hospital, ESI Hospital and Srivijaya Hospital are situated within close proximity. Great connectivity to public transport facilities is one of the primary factor to make this area a perfect dwelling place. So, hurry up and book a flat now in Prestige Gulmohar Horamavu, Bangalore and enjoy all the colors of luxurious living with complete bliss.

Prestige Group
With more than three decades of experience in building world-class projects, Prestige Group has transformed the Real Estate Industry by exuding high business ethics. Initiated in 1986, the group has successfully completed around 210 projects covering over 80 million sqft of land that is affordably priced. With the state-of-the-art engineering techniques and highest quality materials in its construction projects, Prestige Group has decisively recognized itself as one of the prominent developers. Presently the group has 53 ongoing residential & commercial projects covering 54 million sqft. There are 35 forthcoming projects with over 48 million sqft of top-notch property area. 
Being the outstanding realty player of the country, the company assures in presenting sustainable habitats and workplaces featuring all modern amenities. Some of the projects by Prestige Group Are Prestige Four Seasons, Prestige Gulmohar, Prestige Kew Gardens, Prestige Boulevard, Prestige Shantiniketan, Prestige Glenwood, Prestige Garden Bay, Prestige Technostar and the list is endless.

column2: Athish Pride is a project by RGM Homes located in Horamavu Bangalore.  It is build on an area of 21780 Sq-ft encompassing 40 units across 1 towers.  Athish Pride comprises of 2BHK and 3BHK Flat.  2BHK Flat has a range of area from 1005 Sq-ft to 1120 Sq-ft having 2 balcony and 2 bathroom. 3BHK Flat has a range of area from 1175 Sq-ft to 1285 Sq-ft having 2 balcony and 3 bathroom.  Launched in January 2017, Athish Pride offers Under Construction properties. The project is approved by Bruhat Bengaluru Mahanagara Palike. It is approved by various banks like Axis Bank, LIC Housing Finance, Punjab National Bank and SBI. The major Amenities in the project are  Indoor Squash & Badminton Courts. .

column2: Overview: ASN Galaxy is strategically located in Horamavu, Bangalore by the well experienced ASN Developers offering lavish and elegantly designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. The infrastructure is currently ongoing construction and consists of 72 units spanned over 1 tower. ASN Galaxy price rate starts from Rs. 44 Lac onward. Project Details:ASN Galaxy is an ongoing project by ASN Developers offering aesthetic and lavishly designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. It is being precisely designed in the prime location of Horamavu, Bangalore. ASN Galaxy plot areas for its 2 BHK flat range from 1160 sq. ft. to 1255 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range from 1324 sq. ft. to 1350 sq. ft. ASN Galaxy apartments are designed with certain skills and a well thought plan. The structure has a strong foundation and interiors like ceramic tiles flooring in balcony and toilet, laminated wooden flush doors, concealed copper wiring with modular switches, modular kitchen with granite platform and SS sink, sanitary fittings, and branded fixtures etc.ASN Galaxy amenities and facilities for its residents include a club house, bar & lounge, jogging & strolling track, power back up, swimming pool, lift, 24*7 security facilities, reserved parking, gym, kids play area, rain water harvesting, vaastu compliant, grand entrance lobby, multipurpose hall etc. and many more in the property adding to the lavish lifestyle. Highpoints:ASN Galaxy is a gated community being constructed by ASN Developers in the happening location of Horamavu, Bangalore. It is well equipped with modern amenities for a pleasurable experience and is closely connected to rest of the city via various modes of transportation. Various utilities like Horamavu Bus Stop, Sri Chaitanya School, Asha Nursing Home, Syndicate Bank ATM, Maruthi Medical, Little Italy, Wolver Home Theatre, Gold's Gym etc. are all in the vicinity.

column2: DS Max Solitaire is one Finest and Best in class residential project by DS Max Properties in the locality of Bangalore. This project has all the Best In class and ultra modern amenities installed in it for people.DS Max Properties are one of the leading and fastest growing builder and developer in the field of Construction. They are the most trusted and preferred realty developer in Bangalore. They have taken many projects under them and completed them in a given period. One of the Completed Project of DS Max Properties is the DS MAX Scion. This residential project has all the Luxurious and Ultra Modern Facilities for the people such as children playing area for kids to play in their free time. Wi-Fi  and Broadband Internet Connection is also Available in this project. Rain water harvesting with large tanks is also included in this project. Spacious Gym with a/c with all advance machines. Project Features:The walls are covered with concrete Blocks. All the floors have white vitrified tiles. The structure is made up of RCC Frame Structure for safety. The project has 2 and 3 BHk Flats for the people. The area of the building 1110 sq ft to 1740 sq ft to the people. All the rooms are Vaastu Compliant according to builders.Highlights:  It is only 1.0 km away from Deva Matha Central School. It is only 2.9 km away from the Xaviers dance Studio. It is only 1.6 km away from BET College. It is only 1.2 km away from Vibgyor High School.It is only 2.1 km away from Chethana Child Clinic.It is only 2.1 km away from koshys Hospital. It is only 1.2 km away from HDFC Bank ATM .It is only 2.5 km away from the state bank ATM.

DS Max Properties 
DS Max is well-known & trusted name in the realty sector, was founded Dr. K. V. Satish and is acknowledged with Infra Realty Achiever Award and Bharat Gaurav National Award. Working as per the customer-centric approach, the company has been successful in delivering many 1bhk, 2bhk, 3bhk & 4bhk residential apartments in Bangalore with area starting from 536 sqft and prices being as affordable as 15 Lac plus and housing, commercial building, IT Hubs, Hospitals & much more without compromising the quality that too within the pre-set timelines. DS Max has developed many projects in Bangalore and other cities that are a perfect example of luxurious housing couples with modern amenities. Over the years, DS-MAX has exponentially grown and is intensifying its scope outside Karnataka as well. 
Since its foundation, DS-MAX Properties has worked tremendously in setting its foot in the industry. Their persistent determination has led them to excel in all spheres of developmental process with the awesome responses from their valued customers. Some of their eminent projects are DS MAX Starwood in Bangalore, DS MAX Suncrest in Bangalore, DS Max Sigma Nest in Bangalore, DS Max Sunshine in Bangalore, DS Max Serenity Nest in Bangalore, DS MAX Silver Wood in Bangalore, DS Max Splash in Bangalore, DS MAX SPARK in Bangalore, Satellite Splendor in Bangalore, DS Max Sprint in Bangalore and much more.

column2: Take a moment to stop and look. Inhale a deep lungful of air. Slow down and appreciate life at Mirabilis, a project that will evoke a sense of awe in you. Located just off Horamavu Main Road, one of the hottest destinations in North Bangalore, Mirabilis has seven pristine white towers nestled amidst lush greenery and is close to a natural lake. What is more with unique features like a Tree Atrium, Yoga, Meditation pavilion and Jogging Tracks longed paved greenery, every aspect here has been designed tastefully to encourage community and neighbourly interactions at all levels and age groups. In short, every moment spent in this project is a Mirabilis moment.
column3: Kolte-Patil has been creating landmarks for 25 years.Founded 2 decades ago and guided by a simple yet profound philosophy; Creation, not construction, Kolte-Patil Developers Ltd. is one of the foremost real estate companies which is headquartered in Pune. Listed on NSE and BSE Kolte-Patil is Punes largest developer and has completed 1.3 crore sq. ft. of landmark developments in Pune and Bengaluru. It is also present in Mumbai with some upscale redevelopment projects.Headed by a team of visionaries and dynamic leaders, Kolte-Patil has till date built projects in multiple segments such as residential, commercial, retail, IT parks, and integrated townships. The long standing mission of the company is to dedicate itself to create spaces that blend in with the surroundings and exude vitality and aesthetic appeal, making the spaces present-perfect and future-proof. The core values of the company honesty, innovation, excellence eco-friendliness, technology, sustainability, value and commitment to time schedules are perfectly aligned with the living and working spaces it builds

column2: OverviewThoughtfully developed by one of the well-known developers SVS Constructions, Trend Square Precioso is a wonderful residential project situated in Horamavu, Bangalore. This project consists of 140 spacious units spread across 2 dazzling towers. Trend Square Precioso price list for these spacious 2 BHK and 3 BHK accommodations vary from Rs. 44.2 Lac to 83.7 Lac.Project detailsThe project is approved by various banks like HDFC Bank, Indiabulls, ICICI Bank, State Bank of India etc., and the project is currently in under construction stage. Trend Square Precioso floor plans are excellently planned to impress all the home seekers.The spacious and well ventilated 2 BHK and 3 BHK flats are spread across an area ranging between 930 sqft, 1643 sqft. The residents of this project can enjoy the stunning views of landscape and beautiful surroundings by standing in their spacious balconies.The project is tucked with the modern amenities such as children play area, gym, intercom facility, badminton court, elder's park, landscaped area, tennis court, jogging track, party hall, cricket bowling machine, abundant water supply etc. Also, the security of this project is on the higher side with CCTV surveillance and security guards.HighpointsBeing an unmatched project in the complete city is the main highlight of this project. Trend Square Precioso address also adds to the list of highlights. It just takes 10 minutes from the address of this project to reach Manyata Tech Park, Byappanahalli Metro and Samsung office. Further, some other attractive places like Phoenix mall, Forum value mall and Outer Ring Road are accessible within 3Km radius.Trend Square Precioso photos will help you understand this project in a better way. Altogether discover a whole new style of living by booking a flat now in Trend Square Precioso.
