column2: OverviewDeveloped by Total Environment, After The Rain is one of the wonderful residential projects in Yelahanka, Bangalore. Spread across 21 acres of land, this under-construction project offers 96 units of 4 BHK configurations. The rates of 4 BHK Villas lies between the range of Rs. 3.30 Cr 5.0 Cr. Thoughtfully designed Total Environment villas are up for sale.About the projectThis gated community consists of spacious and airy villas spread across an area that varies from 3200 sqft to 5120 sqft. The villas are excellently designed with brilliant floor plans.The top class amenities that are offered in this project include clubhouse, meditation area, indoor squash and badminton courts, water storage system, kids play area, kids club, indoor games room, swimming pool, lift, ample parking space and a lot more.This premium project is worth considering if you are looking to purchase a spacious villa in a happening and calm locality. Spend your time with your loved ones by enjoying scenic views from the spacious balconies. Fine-looking tiles, French windows, high end fittings and fixtures, beautifully painted walls are among the major highlights of this project.HighpointsDeveloped by Total environment, After The Rain address is in close proximity to some of the well known schools, hospitals, shopping destinations, banks and a lot more attractive places. This project is hardly few kilometers away from Hebbal and BIAL(Bangalore International Airport). Stone Hill International School, Sri Maruthi Hospital, Bettahalasur Railway Station and Muneshwara Temple are also close by.Total Environments After The Rain reviews are all positive and After The Rain photos will surely give you a clear idea of this project. Book a villa now and grab your dream of owning a beautiful house.
column3: We believe that it is the people at Total Environment that make the difference and deliver what our customers need. From our promoters to our craftsmen who work on our buildings, the commitment to quality remains unchanged. We work together as an integrated team from concept to completion. This high degree of interaction between architecture design, structural design and the construction teams, ensures that every little detail gets the close attention it deserves.

column2: OverviewDeveloped by Ubercorp Infrastructure LLP, Uber Paxina is a brand new venture located in Jayanagar, Bangalore. This project shelters 11 residential units that are embedded in 1 elegant tower. They are currently under construction and are nearing possession.Project detailsUber Paxina floor plan is intelligently designed  offering 2BHK and 3BHK flats that are perfectly designed with excellent specifications. Uber Paxina 2BHK flats are spanning over 1233 sqft to 1395 sqft whereas 3BHK flats are available within 1629 sqft.  These abodes are airy and bright that offer a luxurious living. The grand lobby greets you in and is covered with vitrified tiles. The gorgeous staircases connecting the floors are adorned with granite tiles. Moreover, living/dining room and bedrooms are covered with durable vitrified tiles. The bedrooms are well appointed with A/C facility to offer you a comfortable environment to live in. The kitchen is outfitted with granite counter top and also RO water facility is available. The taps and other fittings are of branded Jaguar adds a new taste to the entire flat. However, there are two separate connections for bore water and corporation water. Also, round the clock hot water facility is available as geysers are installed in all the bathrooms.  Uber Paxina photos offer you with a deep insight of this project whereas reviews of Uber Paxina are quite helpful for you to take decision.Rich amenities offered are noted below:-          Rain water harvesting, internet/Wi-Fi connectivity, intercom facility, reserved parking, lift, security and power backup  are available to facilitate the needs of residents.HighpointsUber Paxina, in Jayanagar, Bangalore has easy access to KSRTC Pick up point KMF BMTC Bus Stop, Growing Wonders Montessori, Gangamma temple, Little Italy, Lalbagh Botanical Garden, Pink Fitness - Women's Fitness and Weight Loss Jaya Nagar and  Shell Petrol Pump .   Download Uber Paxina Brochure  and book now.
column3: In 2015 an elite team of individuals join hands to create Uber Corp infrastructure with a focus to develop quality buildings with an emphasis on affordable luxury and spacious homes. The company has been now evolved into a dynamic organisation rapidly developing projects in Bengaluru and other parts of South India. Before founding Uber Corp, the core team members have been a part of a well-known real estate and consulting firms. From refined residential properties and conversant commercial spaces to eloquent spas, they created some of the most iconic landmarks in Bengaluru. As a team that has worked together for years, they comprehend and complement each others strengths, the reason behind the seamless functioning and project management. The teams passion for good design, their sound technical knowledge, commitment to quality and business ethics translates into Intelligent and beautiful living spaces in Urban Bengaluru.

Your personal world of luxury, S2 Carnation will give you the feeling of leading a luxurious lifestyle.

column2: DSR Waterscape by DSR Infrastructure Private Limited is one of the much anticipated residential development located at Horamavu, Bangalore. Planned across 4.06 acres of beautiful land, this project is impressive with 5 wonderful towers sheltering 334 residential units. Scheduled for possession by June 2019, the flat rates of DSR Waterscape are priced reasonably within Rs. 38.9 Lac - 86.5 Lac. Project details Well-located in a peaceful neighborhood, this project upcoming project boasts total 211 two-bedroom flats measuring from 1179 to 1255 sqft and 123 three-bedroom apartments spread across 1435 to 1752 sqft. Surrounded by lots of greenery and brimmed with lots of fresh air, the well-ventilated residential apartments of DSR Waterscape are definitely worth buying to live a contented life. Brilliant design, tons of positive reviews from the investors and the spacious floor of DSR Waterscape make this project a promising investment destination. Robustly constructed, these earthquake resistant structures are beautifully designed with high-end specifications, fancy flooring and vibrant furnishings to provide quality homes with a slice of luxury. Some of the eco-friendly measures like rain water harvesting, water treatment plant, etc., and the project layout with 74% open green spaces make this residency a fine place to settle in. High-class lifestyle is guaranteed with top-notch amenities like a Wi-Fi enabled clubhouse, fitness zone, spa, Jacuzzi, joggers park, yoga court, amphitheatre, cricket pitch, basketball post and much more other noteworthy features. Highpoints Situated just 15 minutes away from Byappanahalli Metro Station, this RERA certified project is just 10kms away from Manyata Tech Park which make DSR Waterscape a boon to professionals working here. Horamavu is one of the calm and serene locality of Bangalore with numerous schools & hospitals within close proximity. A flat in this upcoming project is indeed a worthy decision. So, walk in and book a flat now in DSR Infrastructure.
column3: DSR Group was established more than 2 decades ago in 1988 with the vision of transforming the real estate industry and today after the journey of so many years, its projects stand testimony to the shining excellence and brilliance in execution. Commanding an unparalleled expertise, the group has spread its operations across South India across many real estate verticals, catering to various categories of clients. DSRs repertoire has a wide array of exclusive projects which have been crafted to international standards.With diversified business interests across many portfolios, DSR today has achieved staggering success, thanks to its partners, associates, and employees. Its success is shared and cherished among its people who work towards the common goal of a promising and prosperous future. Customer satisfaction is the corner stone of our companys philosophy. We constantly strive for perfection in our service by understanding the customer needs and providing innovative and customized real estate solutions. The locations of our projects are so carefully chosen that they provide immense potential for investment.All through its existence, DSRs ideals of quality, innovation, and attention to the needs of its clients have always been of utmost importance. These ideals remain at the core of every endeavor of DSR. The DSR brand itself stands for quality, commitment, and innovation which manifest in all that it does and stands for. The group has several projects underway in Bangalore, Hyderabad, and Chennai catering to the customer with varied needs and tastes. Professional to the core and passionate about standards in construction, the company is moving fast forward into the future.

column2: Arun Patios an elegant passion, and well designed 248 apartments, aesthetically designed high class flats. These flats cater to the middle income group with simple contemporary layouts with pragmatic price tags. Arun Patios is located in North Bangalore at Kenchenahalli, Yelahanka, Bangalore. It is strategically located near yelahanka after Ramanashree resort, less than 0.5 km from Doddaballapur high way and just 15 minutes drive from Hebbal fly over.Arun Patios in total is constructed in the area of about 245678 sq.fts. It consists of Stilt floor + Ground floor + 3 Upper floors where in stilt floor for car parking. There are five blocks consisting of one bed room, two bed room and three bed room flats. One bed room flat would cover area of around 700 sq.ft to 830 sq.ft, two bed room flats covers about 1115 sq.ft to 1215 sq.ft and three bed room flats covers 1190 sq.ft to 1420 sq.ft.

column2: Overview: Enrich Kempegowda Enclave is a project by Enrich Properties located in Yelahanka, Bangalore offering customisable and spacious residential plots. It is currently under construction and will consist of 106 units spread over a large area of land. Enrich Kempegowda Enclave price rate for these plots starts from Rs. 30 Lac onward.Project Details:Enrich Kempegowda Enclave, a residential project based in Yelahanka, Bangalore by Enrich Properties is offering lavish and aesthetically crafted residential plots of different dimensions to meet the potential buyer’s needs. Enrich Kempegowda Enclave plot areas for its residential spaces range from 1161 sq. ft. to 2407 sq. ft.Enrich Kempegowda Enclave features few basic amenities for its occupants such as power back up, 24 hour security facilities, park, children’s play area, reserved parking, internal wide roads with street lights, water and sanitary connection for every plot, gated community, grand entrance with security cabin, water supply, water storage, etc. to name a few.Enrich Kempegowda Enclave plots are carefully and skilfully crafted by the developers so the residents can experience a lifestyle they have never seen before. The residents can customise the plots with their own touch of specifications for their dream abode. They can construct lavish villas with a strong foundation and fully equipped with all sorts of amenities and facilities. Highpoints:Enrich Kempegowda Enclave locality is one of the fastest growing suburb of Bangalore, making this project a good choice for investment by potential buyers or investors. It is a lifestyle gated community and has many great advantages to give to its occupants. Enrich Kempegowda Enclave vicinity includes many basic civic utilities like Bangalore International Airport, Lakshmipura Cross Bus Stop, I Aim Health Care, Karnataka Bank ATM, Nandini Bar And Restaurant, Chikkabettahalli Lake, ESSAR Petrol Bunk, and HeliPad etc. are all part of close proximity.
column3: After understanding the demand nuances of the market and considering the Unique Selling Proposition of the City of Bangalore the group has developed well thought projects that have immediately captured the imagination of potential customers.Each project has been selected by the promoters after considering carefully various criteria for the promotion of the projects. As a result, the group has had instant success in the marketing of each project. The main criteria the promoters have considered are, scenic beauty, proximity to essential facilities such as schools, colleges, medical facilities in Integrated Gated Townships.We, Enrich Properties, have diligently built a credible reputation with our main focus on Real Estate across Bangalore. Having aggregated and developed large tracts of land into BIAAPA, DTCPA and BMRDA approved residential layouts with value-for-money as our foundation. We offer top class finishes, workmanship and quality with transparency in all spheres of business.Our residential projects come with the best finishes, highest specifications, luxurious landscapes and best in line amenities. We offer plotted development with efficient environmental management. We ensure that environment friendly and high safety standards are a common feature in all our projects. We remain committed to deliver world-class projects thanks to the empowered team of highly committed and skilled resources using state-of-the-art technology. We have successfully completed plotted development projects covering around 15 million square feet of plotted area. In addition around 3 million square feet of plotted area is under development Airport Bangalore another 20 million square feet of plotted area are at various stages ranging from the drawing board to statutory approvals.

After understanding the demand nuances of the market and considering the Unique Selling Proposition of the City of Bangalore the group has developed well thought projects that have immediately captured the imagination of potential customers.

Each project has been selected by the promoters after considering carefully various criteria for the promotion of the projects. As a result, the group has had instant success in the marketing of each project. The main criteria the promoters have considered are, scenic beauty, proximity to essential facilities such as schools, colleges, medical facilities in Integrated Gated Townships.

We, Enrich Properties, have diligently built a credible reputation with our main focus on Real Estate across Bangalore. Having aggregated and developed large tracts of land into BIAAPA, DTCPA and BMRDA approved residential layouts with value-for-money as our foundation. We offer top class finishes, workmanship and quality with transparency in all spheres of business.

Our residential projects come with the best finishes, highest specifications, luxurious landscapes and best in line amenities. We offer plotted development with efficient environmental management. We ensure that environment friendly and high safety standards are a common feature in all our projects. We remain committed to deliver world-class projects thanks to the empowered team of highly committed and skilled resources using state-of-the-art technology. We have successfully completed plotted development projects covering around 15 million square feet of plotted area. In addition around 3 million square feet of plotted area is under development Airport Bangalore another 20 million square feet of plotted area are at various stages ranging from the drawing board to statutory approvals.

column2: Overview:G Corp Residences is 234-units project by G Corp Group. It is based in Koramangala, Bangalore. G Corp Residences project is still under construction and offers 3BHK and 4BHK residential apartments with a price range of 1.77 Cr - 3.20 Cr. About the Project:G Corp Residences is a Koramangala, Bangalore based project by G Corp Group. It offers 3BHK and 4BHK residential apartments with a price range of 1.77 Cr - 3.20 Cr and area range of 1647sqft to 2612sqft for 3BHK and area of 2831sqft for 4BHK residential apartments. It provides utmost luxury in the form of interiors, exteriors and amenities. Located in the upmarket Koramangala, G Corp Residences has all the necessary facilities nearby. Talking about the in-house facilities, the project offers all the basic and many luxurious facilities like gym, aerobics room, swimming pool etc. The residential apartments have open glass fecades through which one can gaze at the greenery of G Corp Residences.The floors of the G Corp apartments’ kitchens are installed with vitrified tiles and the living rooms with imported marble. The bedrooms features laminated wooden flooring and the toilet, imported marble flooring. Highpoints:G Corp Residences has many components which separates it from the rest. One of them is a swimming pool with Jacuzzi on the eighth floor of the building. It definitely takes your life to the next level. Moreover, the project features a banquet hall where the residential flat owners can conduct their major events.A meditation room is constructed to promote serenity amongst the people and sculptured gardens are installed which are a blend of art and beauty. With all its amenities, G Corp Residences ensures a lavish and peaceful lifestyle.
column3: The G Corp group in a new avtar has emerged in a decade as a strong conglomerate among the very few property developers having pan India presence, having offices in about 10 major cities. The group has to its credit of having completed over 30 million square feet of quality space. The group is active in all segments of real estate i.e., retail, residential, commercial, township, software parks, Mixed use development etc.The Group is one of the leading professional organization in the Indian real estate Industry. Today with its presence in South, West and the North, the company owes its lineage to GESCO Corporation, a pioneering Real Estate Company.The Group

column2: OverviewMN Orchid is a luxurious project that offers world- class living by providing modern, stylish and well- ventilated flats. The MN Orchid in Yelahanka, Bangalore features signature floor plan to offer ample of open spaces so that you do not feel clustered and can spend quality time with your family. The ready to move MN Orchid is designed to offer affordable housing in Yelahanka, Bangalore as apartment price in society starts from Rs. 93.0 lac. There are 2 towers and 104 residential flats that are available for sale in various combinations of 3BHK, 4BHK and 5BHK apartments. Project detailLoaded with best amenities and facilities, the MN Orchid features premium quality fittings and imported flooring and if you book a flat in MN Orchid, you will live in an environment that lets you relax and prosper. The project is constructed by the M & N Infrastructures that was established in Bangalore in 2013 and is one of the leading real estate developers when it comes to delivering best residential as well as commercial spaces. The residential flats in MN Orchid feature seismic zone II compliant RCC framed structure, RCC retaining walls, concrete solid/hollow block masonry for walls, vitrified flooring for dining room, living room, kitchen and family room, wooden laminated flooring for master bedroom, main door with teak wood frame, veneered flush shutter with melamine finish, other room doors with hard wood frame, concealed fire resistant copper wiring with adequate TV, Telephone, computer points, lights, AC and power point, superior quality emulsion/OBD for internal walls, texture paint for external walls, enamel paint and polish for wood and M.S. surfaces, concealed CPVC plumbing lines with high end sanitary fixtures, 24 hours water supply, overhead tanks in addition to borewell as an auxiliary source.The luxurious society is equipped with modern amenities like landscaped gardens, jogging track, well- equipped children’s play area, basket ball practice board, car parking, swimming pool with separate toddler pool and changing/shower room, table tennis, snooker/pool table, well- equipped children’s play area, multipurpose hall/party hall with rest rooms, rain water harvesting, water softening plant, self- sustained waste management system including STP and a lot more.

column2: Overview:Godrej Avenues offers spacious 2 and 3 BHK flats developed by the famous Godrej Properties, Yelahanka – Bangalore. The price range of the flats in the project is between 44.0 Lac and 84.4 Lac. Godrej Avenues have a total of 600 units divided into 10 expansive towers. The use of latest technology, superior quality materials and equipment to build the homes, makes the project worthy of your consideration. About the Project:The construction of Godrej Avenues spans on an area that has a vast expanse of greenery. The company is an amalgamation of Godrej Properties and MS Ramaiah Group with equivalent shares. Godrej Avenues project spans over an area of 10 million sqft in Yelahanka, a newly evolving retail region of Bangalore. The area has many established commercial enterprises like retails stores and branded stores.Godrej Avenues floor plan shows the amazing architecture planned for the project and will surely encounter maximum buyers attention. The modern amenities provided by the project include broadband internet, club house, intercom, 24 hour backup, play area, security, tennis court, badminton court, basketball court, maintenance staff, community hall, health facilities, swimming pool, cafeteria, indoor games, gymnasium, garden, etc. Your family deserves the best and Godrej Avenues apartments are just the place to gift them for a luxurious life.                                                                                                     Highpoints:The world class amenities along with the glamorous set of smart homes and guaranteed security procedures are the USP of Godrej Avenues. The society is very close to many schools and hospitals such as BMSIT College, Singanayakanahalli and Presidency School etc.More details can be found on the updated Godrej Avenues photos and details on the website. Hurry up and book your flat now. World class homes are waiting for you.
column3: Godrej Properties was established in 1990 as a real estate development company within the Godrej Group of businesses. The company was originally incorporated as Sea Breeze Constructions and Investments Private Limited on February 8, 1985. The companys name was changed to Godrej Properties and Investments Private Limited on July 2, 1990 and subsequently to Godrej Properties Limited on November 23, 2004. Since 1897, customers have trusted Godrej to deliver innovation and excellence across a broad spectrum of services and products. The promise to deliver value drives the organization at every stage of operation. Firstly, the company evaluates the potential of possible locations and is led by a team of qualified managers. Once a location has been identified as a potential development zone, GPL works with only the foremost architects, contractors, and project managers to bring the project to life. GPL knows that its obligation to its customers and partners does not end upon the completion of a project, and therefore, provides post-project professional and accessible support also

The company was originally incorporated as Sea Breeze Constructions and Investments Private Limited on February 8, 1985. The companys name was changed to Godrej Properties and Investments Private Limited on July 2, 1990 and subsequently to Godrej Properties Limited on November 23, 2004. Since 1897, customers have trusted Godrej to deliver innovation and excellence across a broad spectrum of services and products. The promise to deliver value drives the organization at every stage of operation. Firstly, the company evaluates the potential of possible locations and is led by a team of qualified managers. Once a location has been identified as a potential development zone, GPL works with only the foremost architects, contractors, and project managers to bring the project to life. column2: OverviewUnicon North Brooks 46 by Unicon Shelters Pvt. Ltd, Yelahanka, Bangalore is a mesmerizing residential society. It provides the breathtaking views of the Veerasagara Lake. This society comprises of 264 units which are spread across 4 towers, and the prices of Unicon North Brooks 46 are totally affordable. Unicon North Brooks 46 reviews are quite positive, making it the most ideal location to dwell with your dear ones.Project DetailsThe waterfront apartments of Unicon North Brooks 46 are indeed the most peaceful places to reside. This project comprises of 2 BHK and 3 BHK flats, and 3 BHK pent houses which are designed with top class home accessories. Modular electrical switches, aluminum sliding windows fitted with glass and mosquito mesh shutters, good quality CP fittings and granite kitchen counter are some of the features of the flats in Unicon North Brooks 46.The wooden framed main doors and the internal doors are finished with crystal white enamel paints, and fitted with brass fittings. Unicon North Brooks 46 floor plans are finished with vitrified flooring, ceramic flooring, external emulsion paints, plastic emulsion paints and oil bound distemper paints.This community offers all the basic services and modern amenities such as laundry service, maintenance staff, meditation area, banquet hall, kids club and multipurpose court.Kids play area, rain water harvesting, park, flower gardens, jogging track, cycling track etc are also available.HighpointsThe mesmerizing lake creates an overall cool and serene atmosphere.  The ultra modern club house and the swimming pool are the perfect places to unwind during your spare time. Nandi Hills, Ramanashree California Resort and Angsana Resort are some of the tourist attractions located in the vicinity.Delhi Public School, Canadian International School, Reva Institute of Technology and Brindavan College of Engineering are some of the educational sectors located in the close proximity. Check the Unicon North Brooks 46 photos, and book a luxurious unit now.
column6:

column2: Overview: Embassy Boulevard is a project by embassy group located in Yelahanka, Bangalore offering spaciously crafted and exquisitely designed 4 BHK and 5 BHK villas. The development of the project is currently ongoing and will consist of 170 lavish units. Embassy Boulevard price rate starts at Rs. 6.30 Cr onward. Project Details:    Embassy Boulevard, a residential project located in the happening area of Yelahanka, Bangalore by embassy group is offering luxurious and spaciously designed 4 BHK and 5 BHK villas. Embassy Boulevard plot areas for its 4 BHK villa range from 3935 sq. ft. to 4105 sq. ft. and 5 BHK villa areas range from 5900 sq. ft. to 7310 sq. ft.Embassy Boulevard villas are being designed with premium standard interiors such as Italian marble flooring in every room and engineered wooden flooring in bedrooms, teak wood frame doors, concealed PVC copper wiring with modular switches, aluminium powder coated UPVC sliding windows with plain glass, designer bathrooms with good quality CP fittings and good quality paint in every unit etc.Embassy Boulevard Bangalore features numerous amenities such as a club house, bar & lounge, jogging & strolling track, outdoor tennis courts, power backup, swimming pool, lift, 24 hour security, park, reserved parking, maintenance staff, multipurpose hall, gymnasium, indoor games room, landscape garden, rain water harvesting, indoor squash & badminton courts, multipurpose courts, waste disposal, conference room, and fire fighting systems etc.Highpoints:Embassy Boulevard is a well designed vibrant integrated township offering exquisite and spacious villas spread over 51 acres of total project area. The layout features several dimensions of its villas to meet the needs of potential buyers or investors. Embassy Boulevard Bangalore locality has access to various basic utilities like Government Lower Primary School, Sathya Sai Hospital, HDFC Bank ATM, Cafe Coffee Day, H A M park 2, Fitness Gym, etc.

column3: Fern Valley Group is a Bangalore based builder as well as a property development company having its operations in Cochin and the Gilchrist besides Bangalore. Since 1993 FERN VALLEY GROUP have provided quality homes built on customer eccentric relation, by providing hallmark Premium Living Environments at affordable prices to thousands of satisfied clients.Fern Valley Group is being lead by Mr. Paul Fernandez, an MBA in Finance from U.K, who has over two decades of experience in managing the Finance and Administration of the giant oil conglomerate
column9:
https://www.magicbricks.com/propertyDetails/otherProjectsByDeveloper.html?psmid=5007260&devId=64353&devName=Fern Valley Group&cityName=Bangalore&cityId=3327&postingType=P&aboutDeveloper=
Fern Valley Group is a Bangalore based builder as well as a property development company having its operations in Cochin and the Gilchrist besides Bangalore. The Group have an extensive regional presence and marketing network. Since 1993 FERN VALLEY GROUP have provided quality homes built on customer eccentric relation, by providing hallmark Premium Living Environments at affordable prices to thousands of satisfied clients.

Fern Valley Group is being lead by Mr. Paul Fernandez, an MBA in Finance from U.K, who has over two decades of experience in managing the Finance and Administration of the giant oil conglomerate – Arabian American Oil Company (ARAMCO).
The dynamic group, led by Mr. Paul Fernandez, one of the pioneers in industry has witnessed consistent growth over two decades. The group’s projects in Bangalore, Cochin and the Nilgiris include Californian style Villas in gated community Villa Projects and Luxury Apartment Projects. Through personalized service, innovative design and flawless execution, Fern Valley has successfully put a smile on the faces of every one of its clients.

Bangalore! Once known for its salubrious weather and verdant landscapes has often been referred to as the Pensioners Paradise or the Garden City of India and has been subjected to aggressive and unprecedented changes over the last decade. It has been transformed from a relatively tranquil city into a major software hub and Business Center, offering tremendous potential for growth in various fields especially in the field of Property Development. This feel good factor of overall development of Bangalore has prompted the Promoters Mr. Paul Fernandez to incorporate the Flagship Company of the Group, Fern Valley Resorts Pvt. Ltd. in the year 1995 under the Indian Companies Act and start its operation.

column2: Overview: Pyramid Mahika is a project by Pyramid Builders And Developers located in Yelahanka, Bangalore offering lavishly crafted and meticulously designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. The infrastructure is ready to move into and consists of 212 units spanned over 4 towers. Pyramid Mahika Bangalore price rate starts at Rs. 36.4 Lac onward.  Project Details:    Pyramid Mahika, a project located in the prime area of Yelahanka, Bangalore by Pyramid Builders And Developers is offering lavishly crafted and meticulously designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. Pyramid Mahika plot areas for its 2 BHK flat range from 935 sq. ft. to 1036 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range from 1314 sq. ft. to 1756 sq. ft.Pyramid Mahika apartments are designed with vitrified tiles flooring in all rooms, teak wood frame main doors with skin panelled shutters and Sal wood frame internal doors, modular electrical switches and concealed branded wiring, black granite kitchen counter top with SS sink and drain board, three track aluminium powder coated windows, branded CP fittings and good quality white sanitary fixtures etc. Pyramid Mahika features several best in class amenities and facilities for its residents like jogging & strolling track, 24 hour security facilities, power supply, water supply, intercom facility, reserved parking space, children’s play area, CCTV camera surveillance, outdoor tennis courts, and fire fighting equipment etc. among many more. Highpoints: Pyramid Mahika is one of the most prestigious apartment complexes in the fast growing locality of Yelahanka, Bangalore. Pyramid Mahika Bangalore locality is well connected and just 1 km from the International Airport. The vicinity includes numerous basic civic utilities like Shivanahalli Bus Stop, Mallya Aditi International School, Yelahanka Junction, Dr. Agarwal’s Eye Hospital, Corporation Bank ATM, Ganesh Theatre, Café Coffee Day, and Indian Oil Petrol Pump etc. for fulfilling the resident’s needs.

column2: OverviewGolden Palms Project is developed by Golden Gates Properties, Hennur, Bangalore. This luxurious society provides 490 well designed units which are spread across 8 huge towers. Golden Palms prices range between 70 Lac to 90 Lac which is quite affordable.Project detailsGolden Palms flats include 2 BHK as well as 3 BHK elegantly designed units. The 2 BHK flats are available within the range of 1535 sq ft to 1710 sq ft, whereas the 3 BHK units are available in the size 1835 sq ft. This society is situated amidst lush green surroundings, away from the hustle bustle of the city.Golden Palms floor plans are well designed with the combination of ceramic tiles, vitrified tiles and anti skid ceramic tiles. It features French windows, teak wood door frames, and superior quality sanitary fittings.Golden Palms apartments are equipped with all the basic as well as luxurious amenities required for a lavish lifestyle. Some of the basic facilities are as follows:Power backup, security, ample water supply, lift facility, intercom facility, are some of the basic facilities that are provided.It also provides indoor games room, club house, jogging track, kids play area, internet connectivity, multipurpose courts, flower gardens, park and much more.Golden Palms photos will give you a clear idea of this beautiful society.HighpointsThe main USP of this society is worth mentioning. All the apartments of this society are perfectly crafted as per vaastu principles. One can enjoy the scenic beauty and mesmerizing green vistas view by residing in these apartments.These flats are bright and well ventilated, making it totally worth your investment. Kothanur Bus Stop and Shandong Chinese Restaurant are situated at a distance 1.9kms from this society premises. Hurry up, and book a flat and live a life of happiness and prosperity.
column3: Golden Gate Properties Ltd is a Bangalore based Public Limited Company that started its operations in 1995. In a short period, it has emerged as one of the leading developers in South India with its excellent projects of outstanding quality, reliability, affordability and efficient after-sales service.The Company has 5 on-going projects at strategic locations in Bangalore and Hyderabad. The company engages various national and international architects (like HOK, USA) for its projects. It has its own team of construction with huge and latest equipment including imported shuttering materials for speedy construction and equipments like cranes, batching plants, trucks etc

column2: Located in the city of Bangalore and in Banashankari, Sterling terraces have established wonderful scope for the small families as well as the bigger families so that they can book a flat in Sterling Terraces and enjoy a status in the society. It takes the pride for its incomparable value and the contemporary services that it provides for its lifestyle choices. The residential complex is although situated in the outskirts of the city yet is close to the city and therefore enjoys both the facilities of a calm atmosphere and a busy one throughout the day. The 2, 3, 4 BHK apartments with the study room of Sterling Terraces are Vaastu compliant ensuring that you are within a field of positive energy all the time. The apartments have a free flow of fresh air and natural lighting which enhances healthy living, while the design of the apartments is also suitable for a modern lifestyle. Among the apartments in Banashankari, the Sterling Terraces is the landmark. The units are 216 and the architects are the Venkataramanan Associates. The Sterling Terraces are combined with the diligence of various joining directors. The metro station is around 7mins distance and the bus stand and the auto route is just 10 minutes from this destination. If you believe in enjoying the small pleasures of life then your home should be a haven of peace and tranquility all over

column2: OverviewSaketh Hillside by 5 Elements Realty is positioned in Banashankari, Bangalore. This project offers 4 towers with 180 elegant units that are perfectly ready to occupy. Saketh Hillside price list begins from Rs.50.0 Lac - 68.0 Lac that are quite affordable.About the projectSaketh Hillside, Bangalore offers well-ventilated 2 and 3BHK apartments spanning over 1120 sqft to 1595 sqft . Additionally, gorgeous interiors and exteriors are eye catching. Saketh Hillside apartments are quite attractive and are perfectly designed as per vaastu rules.  Provision for aqua - guard point and exhaust fan are provided in kitchen.Saketh Hill Side Bengaluru, Karnataka offers world class recreational amenities like club house, bar/lounge, jogging and strolling track, outdoor tennis courts, cycling and jogging track, swimming pool and event space and amphitheatre. Other facilities like reserved parking, service/goods lift, water storage, waste disposal, early learning centre and rain water harvesting are available for the residents comfortable lifestyle. After a hectic day, you can feel relax and experience calmness in this meditation area provided.5 Elements Realty,  Bangalore are reputed builders in real estate market offering developed plots, villas, bungalows and premium apartments. They provide best homes with excellent high end amenities. They are well known for their excellent quality of construction and stunning infrastructure. Just glance over the Saketh Hillside reviews and photos to get a brief view of this project. HighpointsSaketh Hillside enjoys awesome connectivity to various infrastructures like KSRTC Pick up point Katriguppe BMTC Bus Stop, National Hill View Public School, Rakshitas, Maharaja Agrasen Hospital, Narayana Swamy – Akshaya, Axis Bank ATM, MedPlus, Chung Wah Hotel, Sri Eshwari Theatre, Ramanjaneyanagar West End Park and Sankalpa Yoga. However, it is well connected to various modes of public transport like autos and taxis. Book a flat now in this Saketh Hillside and enjoy the best.

column2: OverviewTata the Promont situated in Banashankari, Bangalore is well planned and developed by Tata Housing Development. This project is spread across 4 towers that consist of 306 residential flats. Tata the Promont price ranges in between 2.30 crores to 3.72 crores. The areas of these flats vary in size ranging from 2376 sqft to 6410 sqft area. Tata the Promont floor plan encompasses 3 and 4 BHK flats.About the ProjectLavishly spanning over 20000 sqft area in 3 levels, The Promont clubhouse gives the best refreshment and enjoyment without needing to step out of your home. Tata the Promont is crafted beautifully with modern architecture. This project provides lavish living with dual height lobbies in each of the towers featuring dual height and terrace gardens in all the residences. Each flat has branded modular kitchen. The bathroom in every 4 BHK unit is fitted with a high end Jacuzzi. The Tata the Promont photos give you a clear idea about the project and its design.The project offers an array of world class amenities to experience the bliss of a luxurious lifestyle. If you love being in water, you’ll enjoy unique outdoor infinity edge pool, temperature controlled pool and a Jacuzzi, a that gives you fabulous and scenic views ofBangalore.  You can Experiment with different routines of workout at the gymnasium. There’s even a squash court for the avid racquet swinger. The project also provides basic facilities like water supply, power backup, security and maintenance staffs.HighpointsThe renowned Sri Chaitanya Techno School is situated within the periphery of 2km. Bhuvaneswari Nagar Bus Stop is situated at a radial distance of 2.5km. State of Bank of India is the banking facility available within the vicinity of 2.8km.
column3: Tata Housing Development Company, a fully owned subsidiary company of Tata Sons, was established in the year 1984 by the legendary JRD Tata. The real estate major has gone strengths from strengths since 2006, developing into a holistic company with many landmark real estate projects across the country to its credit. The company is known for spearheading the cause of low cost housing for the economically weaker section of the country. Tata Housing builders follow the mission to delight thecustomers by provision of quality life spaces stemming from continuous innovation. Recognized for its ethical business practices and superior construction quality, the company has quickly become one of the most preferred real estate developers of India. The awe-inspiring designs of their constructions do not cease to marvel their customers even today also. Their pioneering work in the field of sustainable green development and commitment to low-cost housing has earned acclaim and awards.

column2: Located in Kaggadasapura, Bangalore, is Aishwarya Lakeview Residency providing spacious apartments studded with facilities such as community hall and security with intercom. The project comprises of seven blocks consisting of 150 residences. 2BHK flats having a size of 900 sq. ft. and 3BHK flats having a size of 1400 sq. ft. are available. Important utilities like Total Mall, Gopalan Mall, Garuda Mall, Shanti Food Line, Beijing Bites, Chandras Restaurant, Malabar Biriyani and Curries, KSF Foods, Shishya BEML Public School, Indian Public School, National Public School and many others are situated in the vicinity. The project has been approved by Bangalore Development Authority, Bangalore Water Supply and Sewerage Board and Bangalore Metropolitan Region Development Authority. Housing loans can be acquired from HDFC Bank, Axis Bank, State Bank of India, Kotak Mahindra Bank, State Bank of Mysore and other leading financial institutions.

column2: Located in Varthur, Bangalore - Myhna Maple is an ambitious ongoing residential development by Myhna Properties Pvt. Ltd. Situated just off Sarjapur Road, this premium residence offers 2, 2.5 & 3-bedroom apartments spread across 5.5 acres of verdant surroundings. The project features 532 thoughtfully constructed units distributed among 5 towers. The quoted price of Myhna Maple Varthur, Bangalore tagged from Rs. 40.7 Lacs to Rs. 83.3 Lacs is simply irresistible. These flats are available from 1045 sqft to 1600 sqft of area. Project details Offering magnificence with refreshing & tranquil surroundings, Myhna Maple Varthur have been receiving lots of reviews from the on-lookers and investors. Finely crafted with detailed attention to every aspect of the project, this residential oasis promises a harmonious living with your family. Designed as per the modern needs of home-buyers, these enticing homes are undoubtedly a long-term investment asset which simply can not be resisted. Well-placed away from the chaos of the city, the well-ventilated residential apartments of Myhna Maple Varthur are a perfect place to unwind after a hectic day. A galaxy of indoor & outdoor amenities kid’s paly area, coffee lounge, multi-purpose courts, library, swimming pool, clubhouse, gym, skating ring, exclusive landscapes and much more guarantee a wholesome living with a slice of luxury. Highpoints Strategically located in one of the dream destinations of Bangalore – Myhna Maple Varthur is all set to be a favourite residence among home-buyers. Besides, offering good connectivity to public transport facilities, this locality also offers good proximity to KK English High School, Gear International School, Carmelaram Railway Station, Krupanidhi College, Wipro Corporatd Office, Forum Value Mall and many other important places. A home in this RERA certified project is definitely a wise decision which you will be proud of. So, hurry up and book a flat now in Myhna Maple Varthur, Bangalore.

column3: Established in 2002, ZIVA VENTURES commenced its operations with a group of developers. Riding on the growth wave of real-estate, the group made a strategic shift into constructions of villas, apartments and Residential plots/sites. From then on it transformed into a new breed of builders and carved an enviable niche for itself in the real estate arena, offering great quality of living spaces at extremely competitive prices. ZIVA VENTURES achieves customer delight by offering unmatched living experience through continued quality consciousness, which is steeped in every aspect and stage of the construction cycle, right from project conception, through execution and delivery.The Company's vision as a real estate development company is to develop self-reliance in our esteemed customers and help them to have a home of their own. Wrapped around this vision is the company's mission to deliver unique, integrated lifestyle, work place environments and planned developments. One of its main focus areas is developing integrated master planned communities wherein the developments have one or more community facilities, including hospitals, schools, retail and commercial buildings enabling a "LIVE, WORK and PLAY" theme within the same development.

column2: Overview Prestige Glenwood is a magnificent residential development spread across 15acres of verdant greenery which is inclusive of total 116 luxurious villas. Developed by the popular real estate giant Prestige Group, this residence is located in Budigere, Bangalore and offers 3 & 4 BHK villas ranging from 2,800 - 3,694 sqft. Prestige Glenwood price list starts from the exclusive price of Rs. 2.02 Cr. Project details The premium 3 & 4 BHK villas of Prestige Glenwood are also available with current resale value and can also be accommodated for immediate rent. The 3 BHK villas measuring 2800 sqft cost Rs.2.02 Cr whereas the 4 BHK villas spread across 3694 sqft are available for Rs. 2.66 Cr. Known for delivering quality homes with unmatched amenities & high-end specifications, the makers of this wonderful creation are considered as one of the top property developers of India. These well-ventilated villas have been crafted with superior quality flooring and have also been provided with CCTV & intercom based security, thus ensuring a safe living. Power backup and round the clock facilities are additional benefits. Environmental safety measures like rainwater harvesting pits, water treatment plant and landscaped gardens with abundant greenery make this RERA certified project an eco-friendly development. Cherished with good reviews, Prestige Glenwood Budigere, Bangalore offers an array of world class amenities such as club house, swimming pool, jogging track, gym, fitness club, badminton court and amphitheater to name a few. Highpoints Strategically placed just 25 minutes away from the NH 48, this residence is a fine dwelling place of Budigere, Bangalore. Narayana E-techno School & College lies within close proximity and so is the reputed Swamy Vivekananda College of Pharmacy. Excellent connectivity to public transports all along the day is an add-on benefit. Book a flat now in Prestige Glenwood Budigere, Bangalore and make a smart investment.

column2: Godrej Reflections is the new variety and new conception by the presumed property builder Godrej Properties. The skillful architectonics in this scheme is being completed by applying the most recent technologies and hence, is measured to be the highly commendable address proffering unlimited delight to each and every occupant. The building of Godrej Reflections Bangalore is extensively extended beyond ample acres of land having highly charming greeneries that are wholly increasing the duration of till your eyes can reach. Godrej Reflection is handily situated@ Harlur road off Sarjapur Road, Bangalore as well as enjoys close nearness to all social amenities.  Extensive over acres of terra firma is single of the cautiously designed project that is decorated with all the accelerating features of ultra avant garde epoch, enabling you to the intellect the uniqueness in addition to quality at each end. Therefore, Godrej Reflection permits you to lead a life more favorably in the happiest manner witnessing the most worldwide level amenities permitting you to feel tainted from the wonderful living.For a buyer, there are numerous options available in the city which can help him to find his dream property here. In this era, usually the developers display the properties in a manner that can draw a pink picture in front of the buyers, but some developers just believe in presenting the realities. One of such property developer is Godrej Properties that have a nationwide presence in this segment. May the need of a buyer is 1 BHK & 3 BHK or 4 BHK Apartments, this developer has each of such properties in his catalog. One more of the beautiful project from the same developer is upcoming at Harlur Main Road, the Sarjapur area of the Bangalore city.Godrej Reflections Bangalore is in the limelight these days as it is in pre-launch state and offering a property that one always dream of.  The project has 1, 3 and 4 BHK homes in the plan which means may the buyer have any family size; he can fulfill a dream of getting a right flat here. The price of the property is also very much affordable compared to the local property market. Spread on a vast area of 12.5 acres of land; there is almost nothing left that one may need in the township and this project does not proffer it. The 265 units in this township can make one imagine the gigantic size of the project which is close to all the facilities in life. The size of homes here varies from 775 to 336 sq. ft. Hence it can be a perfect property for the small family of two members to a large family that stays jointly. As per the sources from the developers, the property possession is expected in the year 2022. Hence for one who wants best of the class property here, it is just a matter of few more years.Godrej Reflections Harlur Road has ground floor plus 19 floors in each tower, and there are two towers planned in the project. It is a known fact about the developer Godrej Properties that dwellers here need not worry about the amenities and to the project Godrej Reflection also this rule applies rightly. The Project has all the modern amenities offered which include a huge garden with excellent landscaping as well as kids play area and swimming pool. It has a classic gym, an amphitheater and a clubhouse fixed with world-class facilities. Not to forget the amenities here include jogging track and a yoga deck for the fitness freaks dwelling here. For the tennis lovers, the developers have provided a tennis court as well.

column2: SNN Raj Spiritua is a project by S N N Builders strategically located in Banashankari Bangalore.  It is build on an area of 1 Acre encompassing 69 units across 1 towers. The floorings are made of Engineered /Imported Marble Tiles, Engineered Wooden, Vitrified Tiles and Matt Finish Tiles.  SNN Raj Spiritua comprises of 3BHK and 4BHK Flat.  3BHK Flat has range of area from 2425 Sq-ft to 2440 Sq-ft having 2 balcony and 3 bathroom. 4BHK Flat has range of area from 3300 Sq-ft to 3335 Sq-ft having 3 and 4 balcony and 4 bathroom.  Launched in January 2015, SNN Raj Spiritua offers Under Construction properties.

We are in the business of improving quality of people’s lives by designing and constructing living spaces for our customers to enjoy a lifestyle. column2: A life in a modern suite is what a person demands from life. Living the life on the edge is another one of the things that one demands. In this ever-growing population of the country, finding such a house which offers you almost all the basic facilities and soothes all your desires are really tough to find, considering that the main aim of the builders is to provide housing facilities and not quality living. But now, Century Infiniti comes to the rescue, giving you all the basic amenities along with a very splendid living experience.One of the things that the builder flaunts about the project is the location. The location being in the Sarjapur in Bangalore. The site is merely 12 kms away from the railway station, 55 kms away from the International Airport and about 4 kms from the Central Bangalore, which makes it a very ideal location for residents. The builder further offers the customers all the basic amenities, like a play area, swimming pool and multiple other basic facilities that one demands from a builder. The builder is claiming to give possession by August 2016, and has further stated that the project is unfurnished and has 3 BHK apartments of 1891 sq-ft.

column2: Prestige South Ridge, introduced by Prestige Group, is a residential township located at Banashankari, Bangalore. Priced between Rs. 2.10 crores and Rs. 2.70 crores (price per sq-ft ranging from Rs. 8076 to Rs. 9310), this project has 3 and 4 BHK multi-storey apartments covering areas from 2600 sq-ft to 2900 sq-ft. Distributed among 9 towers, it has more than 264 spacious houses in 5 residential blocks. Prestige South Ridge in Banashankari has got Mysore Road on the west, J.P. Nagar and Jayanagar on the east, Basavangudi and Hanumanthnagar in the north, Uttarahalli and Padmanabhanagar in the south, and is thus well-connected. The Prestige Group that has built Prestige South Ridge had given Bangalore its first global-standard shopping mall, i.e. The Forum at Koramangala. It is a renowned and trusted group having won many prestigious awards.Prestige South Ridge offers excellent modern amenities like kids play areas and swimming pools, gymnasium and health club, party hall and rentable community space. The landscaped gardens are laced with cobbled paths and shimmering water bodies, thus making the scenic beauty serene. Basic and advanced amenities like power backup, security, elevators, internet and wi-Fi connectivity, library and business center, rain water harvesting, multipurpose courts, recreational pool, and outdoor tennis courts, make Prestige South Ridge, a complete and enjoyable living space.

With more than three decades of experience in building world-class projects, Prestige Group has transformed the Real Estate Industry by exuding high business ethics. Some of the projects by Prestige Group Are Prestige Four Seasons, Prestige Gulmohar, Prestige Kew Gardens, Prestige Boulevard, Prestige Shantiniketan, Prestige Glenwood, Prestige Garden Bay, Prestige Technostar and the list is endless.

column2: The SNN Raj Grandeur is one of the super luxurious and lavish residential project with SNN Construction. This project has all the state of the art, and luxurious amenities installed in it for the people. Project total Area -4.5 AcreSNN Construction is one of the top most and leading builder and developer in the field of real estate of Bangalore. They are well known for their luxurious and super luxurious facilities and projects for the people. They have undertaken many projects and completed them in a given period. They have their design and own method of building projects. One of the ongoing projects of SNN Construction is the SNN Raj Grandeur. This project has all the luxurious and lavish amenities installed in it for the people such as a Well spacious garden with sitting arrangement is also available in this project. Rainwater Harvesting with big elevated tanks is also available in this project. All in one Community hall for meeting parties and other function of the people and many more things available for the people.Project features: All the rooms are Vaastu Compliant as per the builder. The project offers 2 and 3 BHK apartments for the people. The area of the flats starts from 1230sq ft to 1885 sq ft to the people. The structure is made up of RCC Frame Structure for safety. The floors are covered with white, vitrified tiles in all the flats.Highlights:  It is only 1.3 km away from Oxford Educational Institution.It is only 1.2 km away from Oxford College Of Engineering.It is only 2.2 km away from Stepping Stones International school.It is only 2.2 km away from Lawrence School.It is only 3.1 km away from Srishti College.
column3: Established in 1994, SNN Builders have completed over 40 projects covering more than 12 million sqft. SNN Builders property development portfolio is diverse in scope and style, attracting considerable interest from not just end consumers but also from many investors.Since their inception, SNN Builders has made great strides in changing the lifestyle of Bengalureans. Having understood the core philosophy behind comfortable living, they have been innovating constantly to give their customers the best. The key competitive advantages are SNNs sound financial backing, availability of large resources and high level of management expertise. SNNs corporate philosophy is to focus on balancing the evolving needs of a modern city while maintaining and conserving the environment. Most of their ongoing and upcoming projects are located in South and North Bangalore with a range of 1, 2, 3, 4 BHK residential Apartments, Penthouses

column2: In the heart of Banashankari, South Bangalore, Prestige brings to you a home that matches your need for privacy, while still being connected with the outside. Prestige Brooklyn Heights is a secluded world of its own, where you can lead a life of unabashed elegance in the manner that you are used to.Just 94, three and four Bedroom Homes designed with your needs in mind, a view that sweeps your breath away, ample landscaped open spaces to meet and mingle when you decide to descend to the earth, and all the lifestyle amenities you demand to make your life more fulfilling define this Residential Development. The city with all its conveniences is accessibly close and yet unobtrusively distant to insulate you from its bustle and bother.Read on and discover how style and sophistication combine to offer you the perfect home. Come Add Prestige to Your Life

column2: Royal Legend! A masterpiece, inspired by the timeless Eastern and Central European architecture: Gambrel rooftops and turrets, flat arches, ornamental boulevard fountains, pergolas and gazebos - a unique style that combines the finest classical elements with modern attributes. Royal Legend is situated at Bommanaalli (BTM 4th Stage), just off Hosur Road at the end of the Central Silk Board flyover, Royal Legend comprises designer two and three bedroom apartments in eleven independant towers, set in a five and a half acre expanse of verdant land. A haven of a home, it is inclose proximity to the Electronic City, Jayanagar and Bannerghatta Road, just 9 kms from the City Center and 3 kms from Koramangala Shopping Area.

column2: Mahaveer Turquoise is one of the projects of Mahaveer Group which is for the Youth. It is for the hungry, tech-savvy, financially liberating as well as driven youngsters who want to invest now to reap the benefits for the future. Situated in close proximity to Electronics City, off Hosur Road and to the proposed Basapura Metro station, this property is situated in one of the emerging investment hotspots of South Bangalore.Home-buyers seeking apartments for rent in Electronics City now have an excellent opportunity. Designed to cater to the dynamic and young working class, this project is accessible from the much happening IT suburbs. Electronics city and Sarjapur Road are home to a number of companies, specifically belonging to the information technology industry and have the largest tech parks spread over an estimated 20000 acres of land. Due to a large number of work-spaces in this area, Electronic City has been given access to almost all extremes of the city via the Hosur Road Elevated Expressway. The Expressway, a 10 km long route connects Electronic City all the way to Silk Board as well. Mahaveer Turquoise is also closely located to the proposed airport on Hosur Road and the current International Airport, therefore, enabling easy entry and exit points to the property. Find your dream home at Mahaveer Turquoise, specially built keeping in mind the three important aspects of Luxury, Elegance, and Comfort. This property is set to provide you with unlimited access to all the essentials of a city life while also ensuring you find your peace amidst the chaos.
column3: Mahaveer Group, South India's first and only ISO 9001:2015 real estate company is synonymous with quality homes and landmark projects dotting the cityscape of Bangalore. column2: OverviewUrban Ecospace located in Sarjapur, Bangalore is beautifully designed and excellently developed by Inner Urban Infraestate. The project is spread across 1 tower that is inclusive of 180 residential units. Urban Ecospace prices are reasonable ranging in between 24.9 lakhs to 44.2lakhs. Urban Ecospace floor plan is designed to include 2 and 3 BHK residential apartments. The area of these apartments lies in the range of 943 sqft to 1467 sqft area. Browse through Urban Ecospace photos and brochure to get complete view about the project. This project is still under construction.Project DetailsUrban Ecospace offers capacious and well designed 2 and 3 BHK residential apartments. The area of 2 BHK apartments ranges in between 943 sqft to 1182 sqft area. The 3 BHK apartment’s areas differ in size ranging from 1398 sqft to 1399 sqft area. The project is approved by all the leading banks such as State Bank of India, IDBI Bank and Axis Bank and these banks also provide loans for buying a home in this project.Urban Ecospace specifications include coloured glazed designer tiles up to the false ceiling for walls in the washrooms, POP Punning on the interior as well as exterior walls, Anodised aluminium sliding window, concealed electric wiring, Decorative laminated main door, kitchen with granite cooking top and stainless steel sink, Attractive fitting for main door, ceramic tiles in the balcony and kitchen, vitrified tiles in the living room, master bedroom and other bedrooms and anti skid tiles in the washrooms.Urban Ecospace offers a variety of amenities such as:-          Intercom Facility, Swimming Pool, Indoor Squash and Badminton Courts, Gymnasium, Banquet Hall, Security, Kids Play Area and Power Back Up within the residential complex.HighpointsUrban Ecospace is situated in the close vicinity to IT hub i.e. ITPL, ORR and Electronic City.The project is well connected to various means of transport.

Casagrand Builder Private Limited
Casagrand Builder Private Limited is one of the leading construction company in India which was incorporated back in 2004. The ISO Certified Chennai based Real Estate Development Company has created skyline in construction sector under the leadership of M. Arun Kumar - Founder and K.R. Anerudan Managing Director. Known for its exceptional skills in the development of premium living space and affordable housing, Casagrand has completed several projects comprising of 1bhk, 2bhk, 3bhk & 4bhk residential apartments with area ranging from 559 sqft at 33.3 Lac price, housing complex and luxury villas in Coimbatore, Bangalore & Chennai. 
Till date, Casagrand Builder Private Limited has developed over 9 million sqft of prime residential real estate buildings in Chennai across 68 landmark properties with more than 4000 happy customers. The realty company works on the philosophy of building superior living spaces with premium amenities, classy designs and tasteful interiors. Some of the projects under the brand name are Casagrand Irene in Chennai, Casa Grande Masseys in Chennai, Casa Grande Monte Carlo in Chennai, Casagrand ECR 14 in Chennai and there are many more.
&developerLogo=https://img.staticmb.com/mbimages/project/Casa-Grand-1512032648918-Casagrand-Builder-Pvt-ltd-1511242355321-ll.jpg&yearOfExp=14

column2: A luxury residential project spanning across 10 acres of land located at a quick developing area of Sarjapur, Bangalore. The project site is close from the outer ring road, STRR and the proposed Peripheral Ring Road and yet enjoys a pollution free environment dipped in the natural beauty, which is centrally located between 3 major IT hubs viz.ITPL, Electronic City & Outer Ring Road. The drive to Bangalore International Airport (BIA) is shortened through National Highway 207 (NH207) which will soon be Satellite Ring Road (STRR), making it the one of the most sought after and easily accessible residential township.

column2: OverviewSai Metro City is an ongoing project that offers affordable housing in the city. It is valued at Rs 18 lakhs and extends upto 27.8 lakhs.Project DetailsThe project is located in Chikkanahalli-Kamanahalli village which is in close proximity to Kugur village,Sarjapura.  Spread across 150 acres, it is a township project that offers a wide range of amenities. The modern facilities are amenities are plugged into this project like dedicated water and power supply facility, complete gated community with round the clock security, rainwater harvesting, themed garden, landscape gardens, sewerage water treatment facility, international club houses are available. The project also offer entertainment areas like basketball court, tennis court, badminton court, beach, volleyball court along with a club house to entertain the people to the core. The park spreads across 44 acre and is a lively place that offers peace of mind for people of different age group. Here, the visitors can have a silent morning walk or spend the evening with their kids or let the kids steal the show. The project is a complete package for the buyers who desire for modern lifestyle away from daily din and noise of the city.High PointsWhat makes this project the most sought after is its location.  Kugur Lake which is stretched around 100 acres, surrounded by the reputed schools and colleges, and by Vartur High Tech Area and corporate houses like Infosys SEZ and proposed WIPRO university. Also, it is situated nearby to the international club house located in Peripheral Ring Road and STRR Ring Road. The project is definitely must buy for the customers who really want to convert their home into a dream home. Come, make your dream come true, by owning this house. Enquire the details about the project. Go, ahead!

column2: Overview:SPA Eco City is a ready for possession residential project by SPA Group located in Sarjapur, Bangalore offering spacious and skilfully designed residential plots. The project consists of 403 units spread over a total project area of 40 acres specifically designed for every individual’s lavish lifestyle. SPA Eco City price rate starts from Rs. 32.4 Lac onward.  Project Details:SPA Eco City is a project strategically developed in the happening locality of Sarjapur, Bangalore by SPA Group offering spacious and skilfully designed residential plots, which can be customised to a certain level. SPA Eco City plot areas for the 403 units of residential space range from 1200 sq. ft. to 5400 sq. ft.SPA Eco City residential plots are customisable to a certain extent but have specifications such as being developed on a earthquake resistant RCC frame structure and designed with interiors like vitrified tiles flooring in every room, designer doors, good quality sanitary fittings, concealed wiring with branded modular switches, designer bathroom with branded CP fittings, and premium quality fixtures etc.SPA Eco City has numerous amenities for its occupants such as a club house, cafeteria, bar & lounge, jogging & strolling track, outdoor tennis court, dance studio, power backup, swimming pool, lift, security, park, reserved parking, visitor parking, intercom facility, maintenance staff, banquet hall, indoor games room, kids club, children’s play area, rain water harvesting, RO water system, water storage, air conditioned, canopy walk, multipurpose courts, waste disposal, and event space etc. among others.Highpoints:SPA Eco City is the first resort style gated community designed with a perfect balance of nature and landscaped land. The plot is spread over 40 acres and offering spacious residential plots. SPA Eco City locality is just 20 min from Electronic City and 10 min from the upcoming Infosys Campus at Sarjapur.
column6:
Highlights


Location Advantages:20 Mins drive to Electronic City and Wipro Corporate Office.10 Mins drive to Upcoming Infosys Campus at Sarjapur.10 Mins drive to 18 hole Golf Course, Shopping Malls, Upscale Restaurants and Micro Breweries in the neighborhood.20 Mins drive to renowned Hospitals like Narayana Hrudayala, Columbis Asia and Sparsh, and Schools like TISB, Indus International, Inventure Academy, Greenwood High etcAmenities Grand entry gate and plazaWell engineered cobbled/asphalted roads LED/Solar streetlightsCaptive electric transformers and well-designed panels Minimum power of 3KVA provided to each plotSeparate, concealed, underground electrical, data and telecom cabling Engineered and perfectly modelled storm water drainage systemRainwater harvesting and engineered groundwater recharging pitsExclusive water storage tank and bore wells for 24/7 water supplyFunctional Sewerage Treatment PlantConcealed underground sewerage system with theft proof manholesSeamless wheelchair and pram-friendly pathways, also enabling unhindered walking/joggingStreet furnitureTrash cansBicycle racksExtensive landscaping to provide an attractive and healthy ambiencePlantation of trees and plants with sound and dust absorption propertiesStrategic plantation of aromatic plants and fruit trees for use by community ownersReflective road signage for all roads.

SPA Group, A Rs. 1000 Crore well diversified business conglomerate. Headquartered at Kolkata, the Group diversified in Bangalore in 1993 to setup high value horti based industry along with real estate developments and strategic land aggregations. The SPA Group’s flagship is SK Oil Terminals, an ISO 9000 liquid warehouse company with an installed storage capacity of 1,40,000 Kl, the largest in eastern India and among the top three in the country in the private sector.

The Groups real estate ventures are spearheaded by Prashant Kajaria, a nature-loving entrepreneur with a passion to develop unique lifestyle communities, 18 years of combined experience in real estate and passion for nature is helping the group in developing unique life changing concept based communities, One of which is Indias first-of-its kind country estate style living named as Frangipani Country Estates. The, dedicated Smart tuition classrooms, Dance and Music Academy, 24Hrs fully serviced Business Centre are just a few amenities to suggest how your quality of life would be at SPA Eco City.

column2: Hilife Magnifique is a project by Hilife Ventures located in Varthur, Bengaluru offering skilful and aesthetically designed 2 BHK, and 3 BHK apartments. It consists of 96 units and 1 tower. Hilife Magnifique price rate starts from Rs. 81 Lac. OnwardProject Details:Hilife Magnifique located in Varthur, Bengaluru, is a project by Hilife Ventures with 12 years of real estate experience under its belt offering spacious 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. Hilife Magnifique plot area for its 2 BHK flats range from 1095 sq. ft. to 1250 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flats range from 1480 sq. ft. to 1605 sq. ft. Hilife Magnifique is designed with high quality interiors and well equipped amenities to meet the lifestyle needs. All the apartments are done with vitrified tiling, teak wood door frame, granite kitchen platform, jaguar CP fittings, etc.Hilife Magnifique is a RERA Certified Project. Hilife Magnifique also has many basic amenities like power back up, swimming pool, lift, security, park, intercom facility, banquet hall, gym, indoor games room, kids play area, flower gardens, water storage, waste disposal, indoor squash & badminton court, meditation area, conference room, fire fighting equipment etc. Other special amenities include a club house, jogging & strolling track, and cycling & jogging track.Highpoints:Hilife Magnifique is located strategically in Varthur, Bengaluru. The surroundings have all the utilities and facilities required to fulfill the residents necessities. It is 5.7 km from Kalamandir Bus Stop and 7.4 km from Sankara Eye Hospital. The project is just 3 km of close proximity to utilities like CS-Panathur bus stop, VIBGYOR High School, Cosmos Mall, Belandur Road station, and other grocery stores, parks, gyms, restaurants, pharmacy etc. With a great neighbourhood and close proximity to so many utilities, Hilife Magnifique makes for the perfect investment.

column2: The only project that matches your innermost desires for your perfect home is Icon Sanctuary villas. This exquisite gated community, a creation by ICON Homz matches your lifestyle as well as everything you have been looking for in a house. Still ongoing with possession slated for 2018, the villas are available in the price range of Rs.75 lakhs and Rs.88 lakhs.Project detailsIcon Sanctuary is coming up with 3 BHK lavish lifestyle habitats of hi-end villas in a tranquil location of Sarjapur, Bangalore. It opens up a world of fun with all ultra modern amenities, infrastructure and unmatched recreation facilities. Icon Sanctuary price list offers 3BHK villas spread across 1750 - 2010 sqft at a budgeted price that varies between Rs.75 Lakhs and 88 Lakhs. The villas are adhering to vaastu principles spreading positive vibes all around.Being strategically located in Sarjapura, these 3 BHK villas are surrounded with international schools like Indus International School, Oakridge International School, Greenwood High, St Patrick Academy etc. The project is located in amidst lush green landscape, but not far from the daily life needs. BMTC bus stop is accessible within short distance, so does the shopping area. Also it just takes 15 mins drive to reach Wipro corporate office and 20 mins to reach Forum value mall, Whitefield.HighpointsIcon Sanctuary gives you that choice to live under the bright blue sky with lush greenery. RERA certified, Icon Sanctuary offers amenities such as indoor games, intercom facility, club house, swimming pool, meditation hall, amphitheater, open lawns, security etc. Also, maintenance staff is available so that services can be accessed with no trouble. You can take for granted; owning a villa in Icon Sanctuary fills your life with joy in most unique and luxurious way. To own a villa all you have to do is book now.
column3: ICON Homz - Live, Grow, Shine The place for villas, apartments and villa plots We are residential real estate developers based in Bangalore offering awe-inspiring villas, apartments, and villa plots at affordable price points. We focus in the emerging and growing areas such as Hosur road, electronic city, and Sarjapur road. With proven track record, we have successfully completed iconic residential projects - villas, apartments and villa plots - in Bangalore. Our focus remains in offering value for our customers and optimizing the functionality of usable space in our projects.

column2: NBR TRIFECTA, BangaloreConstructed by the NBR Group, the NBR TRIFECTA covers the total area of 60 acres and features 563 units. Approved by DTCP, this lavish and gated society is situated on the Sarjapur-Hosur Road that is one of the known and main areas of Bangalore. Located just adjacent to the National Highway 207, this society offers easy connectivity to all the man areas. The society offers residential plots of various sizes to meet your diverse lifestyle demands and is equipped with all modern amenities to complement your lavish lifestyle. The NBR TRIFECTA is equipped with many amenities like squash court, park, spa, multi- purpose compound hall, water drainage facility, 24/7 security, electricity and water sully, club house, swimming pool, indoor and outdoor games etc. that lets you have a relaxing and comfortable time with your family. When you enter the world of NBR TRIFECTA, all you do is to spend quality time with your loved once. Why buy?The NBR TRIFECTA comes with many locational benefits and connecting roads from this society are Hosur Road, Sarjapur Road and Old Airport Road. The society is also located nearby all the educational institutes, IT campus, railway station, heritage places, hospitals etc.

column9:
https://www.magicbricks.com/propertyDetails/otherProjectsByDeveloper.html?psmid=5083406&devId=58256&devName=NBR Group&cityName=Bangalore&cityId=3327&postingType=C&aboutDeveloper=
NBR Developers & Builders Pvt. Ltd., is a young, dynamic and vibrant real estate developer from Bangalore formed to fulfil the aspirations of people to have their own house. NBR Property Developer has pledged itself towards fulfilling this aspiration of people and has since 1998 worked in creating residential plots in Hosur, Plots, Villas, Apartments, Houses, Lands, Real Estate, Flats for sale.

The Company is managed by NBR Brothers Mr. Nagabhushan Reddy & Mr. Aswathnarayan Reddy. The Company commenced its operations in Bangalore in the year 1998. Its primary business is creation of residential plots and building residences. In addition, it has also identified infrastructure development as business line for future growth. Its operations span across various aspects of real estate development, such as land identification and acquisition, project planning, designing, marketing and execution.

The Company's vision as a real estate development company is to develop self-reliance in young people and help them to have a home of their own. Wrapped around this vision is the company's mission to deliver unique integrated lifestyle and work place environments and planned developments. One of its main focus areas is developing integrated master planned communities means wherein the developments have one or more community facilities, including hospitals, schools, retail and commercial buildings enabling a "LIVE, WORK and PLAY" theme within the same development.
&developerLogo=https://img.staticmb.com/mbimages/project/NBR-Group-1386913073840-Company-logo.jpg&yearOfExp=20
