column2: Designed to offer affordable housing, the Prestige Tranquility is crafted to perfection to suit your needs, tastes and preferences. Located in the quietest location of Budigere, Bangalore, the society offers you all the comfort, peace and freedom that you need to live your life on your own terms. The project is built by the Prestige Group that was established in 1986 and is a popular name in the real estate world. The group has spread its branches in all directions of Bangalore and has developed around 350 residential and commercial projects. Spread across the huge area of 38 acres, the project features latest architecture, smartly constructed floor plan, 17 towers and 2368 apartments that are available in various sizes.Project detailThe Prestige Tranquility is equipped with amenities like club house, coffee lounge and restaurants, jogging and strolling track, park, indoor games room, aerobics room, indoor squash and badminton courts, aerobics room, meditation area, swimming pool, flower gardens, gym, rain water harvesting, conference room, outdoor tennis courts and a lot to complement your modern lifestyle. The flats in the Prestige Tranquility feature anti0 skid ceramic ties in balcony and toilet, vitrified tiles in kitchen, living/dining room, master bedroom and other bedroom, main door with moulded wooden flush shutter and frame, internal door with wooden frame and flush shutters, concealed wiring in PVC conduits with modular switches, granite counter with stainless steel sink with single bowl and drain board in kitchen, UPVC/aluminum framed windows, cement paint on external walls, distemper paint on internal walls and ceramic tiles dado in kitchen and toilets. Located in Bangalore, the Prestige Tranquility offers easy connectivity to MG Road, Garuda Mall, Hosmat Hospital, Bangalore Cantonment, schools, hospitals, colleges and all the other prime areas.High pointsThe society features helipad in sky tower and offers free club membership.

The Prestige Group owes its origin to Mr. Razack Sattar, who envisioned a success story waiting to take shape in the Retail Business in 1956 itself. Since its formation in 1986, Prestige Estates Projects has grown swiftly to become one of South India's leading Property Developers, helping shape the skyline across the Residential, Commercial, Retail, Leisure & Hospitality sectors.

Prestige Constructions, an ISO 9001:2000 certified company is the only Real Estate Developer in Bangalore to have won the reputed FIABCI Award for its software and residential facilities. Prestige was also recently awarded the Crisil DA1 Developer Rating in recognition of the quality of their projects and the ability to deliver completed projects in a timely manner, making them the ONLY Property Developer across India to have received this distinction.
Today, Prestige stands as a giant and with aggressive growth plans across the Residential, Commercial, Retail and Hospitality Sectors in Bangalore, Goa, Hyderabad, Mangalore, Cochin and Chennai, lies a bright future ahead!

column2: DS-MAX Starline is a G+4 floor, 2 & 3 BHK apartment located conveniently at Electronic City-Phase 2, Bangalore. This apartment is perfectly located in the area, where development of IT companies at its peak. E-city Phase II comprises of proposed Metro Station, connecting M. G. Road as an added advantage to the residence of Starline, for fast and hassle free travel to other parts of the city. It offers you a choice of spacious, brilliantly designed flats, set in 1 Block with 136 flats gloriously designed to meet our customers’ expectations. It is also equipped with every amenity that your lifestyle demands, and a massive recreational area that includes clubhouse. And this wasn’t incentive enough, add to it is the stress-busting advantage of being able to beat the traffic and stroll to work.

DS MAX Properties Private Limited
An award-winning real estate company, the DS-MAX Properties Pvt. Ltd. is based in Bangalore and was established with an aim to “Share the Joy of Living” amongst all sections of the society. Being one of the known and preferred real estate developer in Bangalore, the group has made continues efforts towards quality management, innovation and equal attention to even minor details. The company’s strength is its customer- centric approach and this approach has always helped the group in receiving positive and overwhelming response from its valued customers.  The group offers lavish and huge 1BHK, 2BHK and 3BHK apartments that are available in various sizes and vary from 765 sq.ft. to 1456 sq.ft.
Successfully expanding its presence beyond Karnataka, the group focuses on offering high quality homes at competitive pricing and that also in sought- after locations. The aim of the company is to offer best quality homes with latest amenities and excellent architecture. Having the passion to serve, the company is truly dedicated in understanding the needs of customers and then implementing those needs. 
The company has constructed luxurious properties in every part of the Bangalore and has created a new landmark with its every project. The properties in North Bangalore are DS- Max Sonata, DS- Max Spring Field, DS- Max Skycity, DS- Max Skyscape, DS- Max Sparkle- Nest etc., properties in West Bangalore include DS- Max Splendid, DS- Max Star- Nest etc. properties in South Bangalore include DS- Max Starry, DS- Max Starline, DS- Max Savera, DS- Maz silverwood etc. and DS- Max Seagull is a property in East.

column2: Overview:  Dreaming of owning a home in Bangalore, but scared of the rising prices? Well, here is a good news for all those who wish to purchase a home in a good locality of Bangalore.  Sowparnika Flamenco, Sarjapur – Bangalore  presents to you brilliantly constructed 1, 2 and 3 BHK homes. The project is developed by the famous  Sowparnika Projects & Infrastructure, Sarjapur – Bangalore .  Project Details:  The  apartments in Sowparnika Flamenco  are moderately priced between 17.0 Lac and 39.8 Lac. The project has a huge tower that houses 264 units planned to perfection. The  flats in Sowparnika Flamenco  are still under construction and will be delivered for possession between December 2020 and January 2021. Spacious, well ventilated and sunny flats are designed as per the  Sowparnika Flamenco floor plan . The 1 BHK homes are spread over an area range between 425 sqft and 450 sqft, the 2 BHK flats span over an area range of 747 sqft and 778 sqft and the 3 BHK flats are built over an area between 907 sqft and 996 sqft.The  reviews of Sowparnika Flamenco  appreciate the world class amenities offered by the project.- Kids play pool with water slides, CCTV camera, internet, Wi-Fi connectivity, rain water harvesting, kids play area, maintenance staff, intercom facility, reserved parking for members, 24x7 guaranteed security service, lift, swimming pool and power back up, etc. are some of the facilities offered here.  Highpoints:  Along with the affordable homes that it offers,  Sowparnika Flamenco – Bangalore  gives you easy access to other parts of the city with the easily available public transport. The area that it is located is very near to the IT hub and is a fast developing region of the city.This is a one-time opportunity and should not be missed at any cost. You can go through the  updated Sowparnika Flamenco photos  to know what we are trying to say. Get your home today!!!

column2: Overview Shri Sai Lake Ville Varthur, Bangalore by the famous MK Builders Pvt. Ltd., is a premium residential society offering 2 and 3 BHK flats with differing area size from 1105 sqft to 1665 sqft. This multi-storey residential block houses 95 apartments and is elegantly crafted by the builders. Shri Sai Lake Ville price list is smartly quoted that ranges within Rs. 36.0 Lacs - 55.0 Lacs. Project details Shri Sai Lake Ville reviews are great and the 2 BHK flats of this society occupy an area of 1105 sqft to 1200 sqft while 3 BHK units are sized from 1490 sqft to 1665 sqft. The builders behind the construction of this beautiful residential block are one of the leading real estate company of the city.  MK Builders Bangalore reviews are also favourable and the builders have gained enough appreciation for their honest, dedication and commitment. Shri Sai Lake Ville apartments are brilliantly designed and the floor plans have been carefully executed as per vaastu guidelines. The facilities and amenities that make this residential oasis an outstanding dwelling destination are: -Clubhouse, swimming pool, canopy walk, kids play area, rain water harvesting, indoor squash, badminton courts, multipurpose courts, kids club and gymnasium.-Outdoor tennis courts, intercom facility, library and business centre, reserved parking, conference room and guest accommodation.-Maintenance staff, waste disposal, power backup, security and all other prime facilities are also provided. Highpoints This well-planned society enjoys a great location with direct access to various IT corridors of Bangalore and is also complemented by the stunning beauty of the shimmering Varthur Lake which is situated alongside this residence. Railway stations, bus stops, schools, hospitals, malls and other leisure facilities are also located in the vicinity. Varthur is a convenient place to live in, so book a flat now. For more details about the society by MK builders, have a look at Shri Sai Lake Ville photos.

column2: Overview Spanning across 1-acre of prime land, Golden Lotus Varthur, Bangalore by Upscale Homes features a wide collection of 108 luxurious units embedded with a single 11 storey building. Spread across 1137, 1391 sqft, these luxurious flats are offered with 2 and 3 BHK configurations and the flat prices of Golden Lotus varies starting from Rs. 52.0 Lacs, 79.9 Lacs. Project details Golden Lotus apartments are tastefully designed with eye-catching interiors, premium rooms, well-fitted kitchen, standard fittings and also offer easy access to all the recreational facilities like shopping malls, restaurants, cinema halls, etc. Upscale Golden Lotus rent option is also available if you have just wish to live in this residence for a limited period of time.  Built by Upscale Homes, one of the reputed builders of Varthur, Bangalore, Upscale Golden Lotus reviews are remarkably positive and all these brand new apartments are offered with freehold rights. In order to offer a world-class living to its residents, this residential society offers a pool of modern amenities like:Swimming pool, clubhouse, gymnasium, kids club, amphitheatre, meditation area, kids play area and many more other leisure amenities are available right at your doorstep.This multi-storey building has been provided with a Schindler lifts, power backup facility, round the clock security and fire fighting equipment.Enjoy the breathtaking beauty of the flower gardens and parks, which ensure a complete peace of mind. Highpoints Varthur is a favourite residential neighbourhood for working professionals as it offers easy access to RMZ EcoSpace, ITPL, Prestige Tech Park and Embassy Tech Village. Columbia Asia Hospital, VIMS Hospital, Oakridge International School, Inventure Academy and Forum Value Mall are some of the prestigious landmarks of this residential development. Golden Lotus photos are available online for more details. Book a flat now and make a safe and lucrative investment.
column6:
Highlights


Rmz Eco Space 8.7 Km.Embassy Tech Vilg.6.8 Km.Sakara Hospital 8.6 Km.Cessana Bus. Park 6.8 Km.Vims Hospital 8.2 Km.Prestige Tech Park 6.8 Km.Forum Value Mall: 3.5 Km.ITPL: 8.7 Km.Colmbia Asia: 3.5 Km.TISB, Inventure Acadamy, Okridege International School, Greenwood High: 4 Km.Project USP:-Architecturally designed for maximum fresh air circulation in to the entire complex and flat. Improved indoor air quality, Go Green.76 percent open area (Building footprint 24 percent), which implies more open space, maximum lighting and ventilation , Go Green.Seismic II zone, IS-1893 compliant RCC framed structure. Superior Safety.State-of-the-art Elevators of Schindler make - Fully automatic with Machine room less and Gearless technology and completely safe with Automatic Rescue Device and Overload detec tion.Design for future: Common services are designed considering the usability, scalability, maintainability, organic growth, future needs of the inhabitants like.Stand by power, back up: Diesel Generator sizing done for 120 percent of the todays maximum requirement.EB power: Transformer sizing done for 120 percent of the todays maximum requirementSTP, WTP: Plant sizing done for 120 percent of the todays maximum requirement.Water storage tanks: Sizing done for 120 percent of the todays maximum requirement.Building metering: The use of meters to track the use of utilities (such as water and electricity) per unit to enhance the electricity, water performance of residential dwelling unit(s) and maintenance cost proportionate to the actual consumption.Lightning protection system: use of sophisticated Early Streamer Emission (ESE) Air Terminals for Better Safety. New climate models predicted a 50precent increase in lightning strikes across the world during this century as a result of global warming.Vastu: House plans are developed keeping practical vastu in mind.AAC, CLC, Clay bricks providing excellent thermal insulation, sound insulation and wall dampness proof! A green building material, Go Green.State-of-the-art Swimming pool: This pipe-free Compact Filtration System is extremely sturdy, most energy efficient, and very easy to maintain, Go Green.Use of water-efficient fixtures from GROHE AG and water closets from AMERICAN Standard, Go Green.Wall Mounted European Water Closet with concealed flush valve! Better Hygiene.Single lever hot and cold mixer with overhead showerAdvanced composite plumbing system for joint free bathroom piping- Composite (PE-ALPE) pipes with SS, Brass adaptors, Maintenance free.Granite vanity top, under counter pastel colour washbasins Neat and Clean look.Dual plumbed: The building with two sets of pipes: one for drinking water and one for recycled.Dry and wet area separation in all bathrooms. Better Hygiene.Concealed plumbing lines in ducts: this helps in maintaining the appearance of the area and preserving the aesthetic look of your building.

column2: Unicca Emporis by Unicca Builders in Varthur, Bangalore is a well designed residential project offering 214 units spread across 5 towers of 16 floors. The apartments are available in the price range of Rs.70.10 lakhs to Rs.2.15 crore. Project Details Unicca Emporis from Unicca Builders is a thoughtfully designed residential project featuring 2BHK and 3BHK apartments at a rate of Rs.5000 and Rs.9800 per sqft. This project provides luxurious and premium residences in area size of 1402 sqft and 2194 sqft. Encompassing an area of 3.25 acres, the residences in this project are beautifully designed and provide a bunch of high-end amenities for residents to enjoy. Some of the well known facilities include gym, tennis court, clubhouse, cycling and jogging track, infinity swimming pool, kids play area etc. Essential amenities such as round the clock security, rainwater harvesting, solar fencing, car parking space and power backup are also included. The apartments are not only well designed, they invite lot of natural light and cross ventilation too and offer spectacular views of the Varthur Lake. The price of Unicca Emporis residences oscillates between affordable and high-end depending on the type of apartment one chooses to invest in. Catering to the elite segment, the apartments are draped in luxurious fittings and fixtures to help residents experience and enjoy a stunning lifestyle. Highpoints Unicca Emporis in Varthur, Bangalore is particularly known for some of its unique features facilities such as spa, infinity edge swimming pool, sky lounge and private plunge pools. According to Unicca Emporis reviews, this RERA certified project leaves no stone unturned in offering all the luxurious facilities and amenities to ensure residents truly enjoy a high-end lifestyle. To reside amid luxury and experience sheer bliss, invest now in Unicca Emporis in Varthur, Bangalore.
column3: From the very first inception of a design, UNICCA is committed to making the completion of each project a reality. The core strength of our commitment is reflected in our projects with focus on our clients and a dedication to deliver. At UNICCA our goal is to create products that improve the way our customers live. At home, at work, and at play. With the future in mind, we are creating livable communities while remaining committed to environmental sustainability. Backed by over a decade of solid experience, our key focus remains on building exceptional properties in some of the most desirable cities across India.As builders, project managers and developers we have formed an experienced team that have the unique ability to control every aspect of a property development project, ensuring that quality remains a constant and common objective and we provide you with the advantage of opulence to create your dream home.

column2: Setting a new trend in the residential apartments segment, Hilife Greens represents Pragna Group & Hilife Ventures' response to the demands of the modem buyer with a unique blend of luxury and style. We see it as our mission to deliver residences that extend beyond the simple proposals of ""high-quality apartments"". Therefore we offer a complete environment in which to make a life.Pragna Group & Hilife Ventures brand is built entirely around customer satisfaction; to satisfy the ever growing demands of the discerning buyers and taking into account the prevailing market trends, our expertise lies in the creation of beautifully designed homes, typified by classic architecture and contemporary internal and external layouts. Our team includes creative architects and designers, experienced planning and technical specialists, efficient construction experts, effective sales and marketing professionals and dedicated customer care executives. We take pride in bringing fresh revolutionary ideas to the property market, on the same proven principles of our previous projects Hilife Magnifique, Pragna Whistlingwoods, Pragna Uptown and Hilife Titre. Thanks to this approach, we are proud to say that ours is a company that is respected, trusted and relied upon by our customers, associates, vendors and employees alike.
column3: Pragna Group and Hi-life Ventures is built entirely around the evolving customer requirements and satisfaction. Therefore, our brief to our team is very simple - customers expect nothing but the best. Starting thus, from the identification of properties, to design, to construction and after sales service, we make no compromises.Our dedicated professionals (which includes creative architects and designers, planning and technical specialists, construction experts, sales and marketing professionals and customer care executives) bring this vision to life by creating beautifully designed homes, typified by classic architecture and contemporary internal and external layouts. Our passion to fresh revolutionary ideas to the property market has led to create Hilife Magnifique, Pragna Whistling Woods, Pragna Uptown and Hilife Triflora and earned us the respect and trust of all our customers, associates, vendors and employees

column2: OverviewDruva Daffodils is a lavish residential project located in Varthur, Bangalore where every units comes with beautiful interior and exterior work. These apartments are designed in a way that it offers wonderful homes with contemporary design and modernised floor plan. Druva Daffodils is well-equipped with modern amenities and developed with exquisite technology which will make your life extremely delightful. In a magnificent area of 1 acres this project feature 80 units, where the residences can choose to own their apartments at an affordable price. Druva Daffodils has been designed with proper attention which ensure to fulfil the expectations and needs of all its residents. Project DetailsDruva Daffodils price is affordable where you can own your living space or invest in property for higher return. The project is offering luxury, warmth and stylish lifestyle where you get a perfect chance to enhance your living standards. This residential project symbolizes architectural excellence, balance of beauty and comforts. It is truly a perfect place to live your precious moments with your loved ones. Druva Daffodils floor plan in its residential apartments is designed by Druva Infratech which offers well-designed 2BHK and 3BHK apartments with ample ventilation and flow of natural light. If you buy your apartment at Druva Daffodils in Bangalore then you will be able to find yourself in an area that is well-connected with public transportation and other important places in the city. Druva Daffodils offers plethora of amenities and facilities for example, club house, jogging and strolling track, cycling and jogging track, power back-up, swimming pool, lift, security, park, reserved parking, flower gardens, air conditioned, vaastu complaint, intercom facility, gymnasium, banquet hall, fire fighting system and much more. The interior work will mesmerise you with the beautiful flooring and walls covered with glazed tiles. All the bathrooms in every unit are finished with branded sanitary wares. The kitchen includes granite platform and the walls are covered with glazed tiles.

column2: Spectra Sylvan is a project by Spectra Constructions Private Limited strategically located in Kaggadasapura Bangalore. Spectra Sylvan comprises of 1BHK, 2BHK and 3BHK Flat.  1BHK Flat has area 1000 Sq-ft having 3 balcony and 2 bathroom. 2BHK Flat has range of area from 1125 Sq-ft to 1250 Sq-ft having 2 and 3 balcony and 2 bathroom. 3BHK Flat has range of area from 1500 Sq-ft to 1600 Sq-ft having 3 balcony and 3 bathroom.  Launched in June 2011, Spectra Sylvan offers Ready To Move properties. column2: Overview:Ecolife Elements Of Nature is a project by Ecolife Developers located primly in Varthur, Bangalore offering 2 BHK and 3 BHK spacious apartments. It consists of 299 units spanned over 4 towers and is currently under construction. Ecolife Elements Of Nature price rate starts from Rs. 52.2 Lac onward.Project Details:Ecolife Elements Of Nature is a currently under construction project offering skilfully crafted and aesthetically designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. The project is being developed by Ecolife Developers in the strategic location of Varthur, Bangalore. Ecolife Elements Of Nature plot areas for its 2 BHK flat range from 899 sq. ft. to 1129 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range from 1152 sq. ft. Ecolife Elements Of Nature apartments are designed with certain specifications like ceramic tiles, vitrified tiles flooring in every room, teak wood frame doors, concealed conduits with good quality copper wire, black granite kitchen platform, branded fittings etc.Ecolife Elements Of Nature has various basic amenities and features for its residents like lifts, 24*7 security facilities, jogging & strolling track, banquet hall, vaastu compliant, party hall, library, gymnasium, indoor games room, kids play area, flower gardens etc. and many others.Highpoints:Ecolife Elements Of Nature is second largest gated community present on the Panathur-Varthur Main Road. Ecolife Elements Of Nature locality is just 4 km from Sarjapur Marathahalli ORR, 5.7 km from Whitefield and 6 km from IT Tech Parks like Embassy Tech Square, RMZ Eco Space and Prestige Tech Park. The vicinity has various basic civic utilities for the residents like Varthuru Police Station Bus Stop, Chrysalis High Varthur, Vijaya Bank ATM, The Dr's Hospital, MedPlus, Godrej Nature's Basket, The Fat Chef, Petboro Pet Resort and Kennels, HP Petrol Pump, and Whitefield Total Fitness etc.
column3: Ecolife Developers is a group of dynamic professionals from diverse fields of construction, planning and architecture. What we share in common is not just a strong background of domain expertise, but a deep desire to maintain harmony with nature through our work.The Ecolife team is looking to shape the skyline of Bengaluru with meaningful developments that respect the planet, pay attention to every natural element, and create a life of friendly balance for conscious modern citizens.
column6:

column2: Golden Star is located on the fast growing Brookfield's - ITPL Road. It is just a 10 minute drive from the Airport and 5 min to ITPL.Golden Star has apartments that are like independent homes with 5 star facilities like extensive landscaped gardens with fountains, a mini club house, Gym, Swimming pool, capsule lifts, departmental store etc. A new venture of Golden Gate Properties comprising of 148 flats. All the apartments have independent walls (like an independent house) and each excellently ventilated apartment preserves your individuality and yet, blends beautifully with the lush green surroundings. Golden Gate's Philosophy is to make life better. It's how our dream travels; beyond a mere four walls. It wafts into the garden outside the window; peeps into your child's mind, and even peeks into the future. Our dream is not just to better your homes, but to give you a far richer environment, a beautiful new world. Apartment area: 1290 sft (2bhk), 1490 sft (3bhk)
column3: Golden Gate Properties Ltd is a Bangalore based Public Limited Company that started its operations in 1995. In a short period, it has emerged as one of the leading developers in South India with its excellent projects of outstanding quality, reliability, affordability and efficient after-sales service.The Company has 5 on-going projects at strategic locations in Bangalore and Hyderabad. The company engages various national and international architects (like HOK, USA) for its projects. It has its own team of construction with huge and latest equipment including imported shuttering materials for speedy construction and equipment's like cranes, batching plants, trucks etc.

column2: Sobha Clovelly is the signature residential project of Sobha Limited. A premium development, the project features a range of elegantly planned luxury homes with a beautiful natural setting. The project comprises of 2 stunning towers which are spanning across 3.25 Acres of land.Project detailsBeing RERA certified Sobha Clovelly features 23 floors with 137 units of 3 and 4 BHK apartments. Designed as per international standards the apartments are spacious and offer unhindered view and easy ventilation. The 3 BHK Flat covers area that ranges from 1346 to 2353 sqft having 1/2 balconies and 3/4 bathroom while the 4 BHK Flat is spread across an area that varies between 2773 sqft and 4690 sqft with 3 balconies and 3/4 bathrooms.With excellent floor plans Sobha Clovelly is planned to be a blend of well-planned apartments, ingeniously crafted interiors, international standards of quality and a range of exclusive services and recreational amenities. Some of the amenities offered are badminton court, basketball court, lawn tennis court, swimming pool, table tennis, toddler pool, yoga/meditation area and a lot more.HighpointsThe location of Sobha Clovelly is a prime destination for many house seekers in Bangalore which is located in the southern quadrant of the city. The locality is in proximity to the highway leading to Kanakpura Road. The location is excellent and most convenient. All basic facilities are within reach for instance shopping complexes like Big Bazar, Pai Mall are at a stone throw distance. Also, parks, schools, medical centers and banks are easily accessible hence the project is most preferred by many home seekers.This project is under construction hence the possession is slated to given in 2019. Before the opportunity of owning a spacious home is taken away by others, act smart and book a residence of your choice in Sobha Clovelly.
column3: With three decades of experience in creating resplendent interiors of palaces and masterpieces in the Middle-East, Mr. P.N.C. Menon founded Sobha Limited (formerly Sobha Developers Ltd) in 1995 with a clear vision to transform the way people perceive quality. Today, Sobha, a Rs. 25 billion company, is one of the largest and only backward integrated real estate players in the country.Headquartered in Bangalore, Sobha is primarily focused on residential and contractual projects. The Companys residential projects include presidential apartments, villas, row houses, luxury and super luxury apartments, plotted development and aspirational homes replete with world-class amenities. In all its residential projects, the company lays a strong emphasis on environmental management, water harvesting and high safety standards. .The backward integration model is one of the key competitive strengths of Sobha. This literally means that the Company has all the competencies and in-house resources to deliver a project from conceptualisation to completion. Backward integration includes an interiors division, a metal works and glazing factory, and a concrete products factory. Sobha has also diversified into retail business with spring mattresses under the brand name Sobha Restoplus. More than 27 variants of mattresses are produced by the mattress division using cutting-edge machinery of international quality.

column2: Overview: Godrej Air is an elegant residential project by the quite experienced Godrej Properties located meticulously in Hoodi Circle, Bangalore offering 1 BHK, 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. The project consists of 487 units spanned over 8 high rise towers and is currently ongoing construction. Godrej Air price rate starts at Rs. 42.4 Lac onward. Project Details:    Godrej Air, a project skilfully based in Hoodi Circle, Bangalore by Godrej Properties is offering aesthetically crafted 1 BHK, 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. Godrej Air plot areas for its 1 BHK flat range from 706 sq. ft. to 716 sq. ft.; 2 BHK flat areas range from 1108 sq. ft. to 1430 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range from 1639 sq. ft. to 1853 sq. ft. Godrej Air Bangalore features many modern amenities and facilities such as a club house, cafeteria, jogging & strolling track, outdoor tennis court, power back up, security, lift, swimming pool, park, reserved parking, service & goods lift, intercom facility, maintenance staff, banquet hall, gymnasium, indoor games room, kids play area, piped gas, rain water harvesting, water storage, multipurpose courts, vaastu compliant, waste disposal, large open space, multipurpose hall, activity deck, and event space etc.Highpoints:Godrej Air is well planned and executed residential project offering lavish and aesthetically luxurious 1 BHK, 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. The residents can enjoy world class amenities and a serene environment over the large open space. Godrej Air Bangalore locality is in close proximity to the leading IT companies, global schools, best-in-class healthcare centers, and malls etc. Various basic civic utilities like Metro Depot, RBANM's High School, Hosmat Hospital, Lido Mall, The Oberoi, Big Bazaar, Dr Batra’s - Homeopathy Clinic, Inox, Kushal Indoor Garden, and Indian Oil Petrol Pump etc. are part of the vicinity.
column3: Godrej Properties Ltd. follows the Godrej Properties Ltd. philosophy of Innovation and Excellence in the real estate industry. Godrej Properties Ltd. is the first real estate company to have achieved ISO Certification. The company is currently developing landmark projects in 12 cities across India. To create landmark structures, Godrej Properties Ltd. collaborates with outstanding associates and reputed names. Over the last few years, Godrej Properties Ltd. has received over 50 awards and recognition's for developing residential, commercial and township projects. The company aims to deliver superior value to all stakeholders through extraordinary and imaginative spaces created out of deep customer focus and insight.

column2: Gopalan Grandeur is expertly developed by Gopalan Enterprises which is a renowned name that excelled into prominence over a decade in the real estate sector. Located in Hoodi, Bangalore the project is naturally lit on all the three sides and offers delightful classified and spacious 2 and 3 BHK homes. These homes are reasonably priced as the price list starts from Rs. 90.0 Lakhs.Project DetailsCertified by RERA, Gopalan Grandeur is build on an area of 5 acre encompassing 558 well-ventilated units spread across 8 towers. The floorings of these 2 and 3 BHK abodes are made of vitrified tiles and ceramic tiles.Gopalan Grandeur offers ready to move properties in Hoodi, Bangalore. With unmatched floor plans the area of 2 BHK Flat ranges from 1360 to 1530 sqft with 2 balconies and 2 bathrooms. Whereas the 3 BHK Flats cover an area of 1805 to 2000 sqft with 3 balconies along with 3 bathrooms. Moreover, the project is approved by various banks like Axis Bank, HDFC, LIC Housing Finance, Punjab National Bank and SBI.A conveniently planned residential extravaganza, Gopalan Grandeur is designed on the principles of vaastu, with all modern amenities and delightful extras that meet the needs of your unique way of life.HighpointsLocated in the prime locality the project enjoys excellent connectivity all over Bangalore. International Airport, hospitals, railway stations, bus stops, metro stations, Whitefield Railway Station, Phoenix Mall, ITPL, Vydehi Hospital and Cinemas are located at an arm's distance. With all these benefits this project is seeks the attention of all home buyers.Experience a unique lifestyle in perfect countryside homes. Book a flat now as Gopalan Grandeur offers some of the most elegantly designed residential homes in Bangalore to choose from. Every flat at Gopalan Grandeur is more than value for money.

Gopalan Enterprises
Since its inception in 1984, Gopalan Enterprises has established itself as a leader in the property segment of Bangalore. The company has completed tremendous projects involving residential flats/apartments, commercial buildings and ventures across SEZ, entertainment & hospitality sector. Through the cutting edge technology and coordination with the finest service providers in infrastructure, Gopalan Enterprises has positioned itself as the prominent Real Estate entity. They have an active presence in the Knowledge City with a portfolio of esteemed clients. The company aims to build healthy customer relationships through their considerate passion towards innovation. With over 3 decades of admirable experience in the realty sector, Gopalan Enterprises have significantly launched several 2bhk & 3bhk residential flats/apartments with area ranging between 1125 - 2825 sqft at 65 Lac to 1.54 Cr. and many commercial projects across Bangalore. Backed by a team of professionals possessing in-depth knowledge of realty sector, the company is dedicated to providing premium housing solutions. column3: The Raja Group has relished a enriching and ascending era in Bangalore. Started in 1890, when Bangalore was at a nascent stage and being actively involved in the exponential boom and development, we can confidently state the journey has been fulfilling and a wondrous learning experience. Initially Raja Group started trading Grains from which entered into a wide spectrum of other businesses like Silk, Jewellery, Automobiles, Hospitality and Software. Presiding a phenomenal success in these ventures, we identified the potential in the Real Estate market and decided to capitalize it. This marked the beginning of Raja Housing ltd.

column2: Overview Pavani Divine located in Hoodi, Bangalore is one of the beautiful creation by Pavani Group. Theproject comprises of 2 towers with total 165 residential units, which vary from 1200 sqft - 1418 sqft. Offered with 2 and 3BHK configurations, Pavani Divine flat prices cost within Rs. 54.7 Lacs 78.3 Lacs. Check out the photos of Pavani Divine to get the overall visual details of the flats. About the project Marvellously designed with the brilliant concept of no common walls between two flats, these homes are apparently blessed with good ventilation & natural light round the year. Designed to inspire, both the interiors and the exteriors of these abodes have been fantastically crafted that will surely impress any home buyer. Located in the well-known area of Hoodi, Bangalore – Pavani Divine 2BHK flats measure from 1200 sqft 1418 sqft and are priced within Rs. 54.7 Lac Rs 63.8 Lac. The 3BHK apartments are spread across 1382 sqft 1768 sqft, which cost between Rs. 62.3 Lac - Rs 78.3 Lac. Pavani Divine floor plan has been cleverly planned, so as to provide spacious and comfortable homes to every home-buyer. This well-maintained gated community has been bestowed with some of the premium amenities & facilities like swimming pool, gymnasium, kids play area, security, and intercom facility to name a few. Set around soothing environment, this residential haven invites you to discover a whole new living experience with your family. Highpoints Centrally located in the heart of the city with several well-established IT companies namely Accenture, IBM, Wipro, etc., has made this project a perfect living habitat among the professionals working here. Gopalan International Schools and Sri Satya Sai Super Speciality are in the vicinity. An apartment in Pavani Divine, Hoodi, Bangalore is definitely a smart investment. So, hurry up and book a suitable flat now.

https://www.magicbricks.com/propertyDetails/otherProjectsByDeveloper.html?psmid=5109801&devId=54801&devName=Pavani Group&cityName=Bangalore&cityId=3327&postingType=C&aboutDeveloper=
Owning a house is a long nurtured dream for many. To have a home, you have to own one. The goal of any home is to see that all the elements in the home add to a homely feeling and utilization of space.
Mr. P.V RAGHAVA RAO founded PAVANI GROUP IN 1995 to promote Apartment construction in Nellore town, at a point of time when Apartment Culture was still new there. He thus become poineers in Apartment Industry within a short span of time, with all his hard-work, foresight and vision the group of companies has completed 37 projects and 4 projects are in progress and many more in the anvil, spreading all over south India, Viz.Hyderabad, Chennai, Nellore and Bangalore. 
PAVANI GROUP, backed up by twenty one years of experience in architectural planning, design and implementation, has come of age, in that, the company has analyzed the demanding choosy requirements of home owners that encompass above parameters and they are determined to a deliver a home tailor made for each owner, snug fitting his or her aesthetics, psychology and ethical Standards.PAVANI GROUP keep in its mind the futuristic requirements. This calls for world-class specifications and high standards of construction practice. Backed up by highly and experienced Civil Project Directors with their team of young field engineers, who have completed a number of projects in and around Bangalore, Chennai, Nellore and Hyderabad covering Residential, Commercial Buildings, PAVANI GROUP is never short of concept for timely completion of high quality buildings. While doing so they ensure that they do not end up functional Architectural cul-de-sac.
&developerLogo=https://img.staticmb.com/mbimages/project/Pavani-Group-1510029927744-Pavani-Group.GIF&yearOfExp=22

Keerthi Estates, established in 1990 and founded by Mr. Anil Kumar Reddy, has achieved excellence and prime quality in the fields of construction and innovation. The vision statement is to build exquisite residences and commercial spaces with quality assurance . Over the last two decades, Team Keerthi has grown in manifold ways and has specialized expertise in luxury apartments that provide value per square feet .Keerthi's logo is a depiction of hardwork, as it represents our strength and perseverance and is a reflection of the team's focus and belief in customer satisfaction. Today's home needs inspire Keerthi to create endless experiences for myriad clients looking to settle in a new and refreshed residential space in every aspect. 

From High-End luxury homes to modest residences , we provide a holistic approach to help you choose a home that fits your needs. We believe in the right to justify a comfortable, luxurious home that you can come back to and spend important moments with your family within a secure environment. Our efforts are to primarily re-create this luxury, provide comfort and support families. 

Keerthi Estates has been monumentally successful in constructing innovative residential and commercial spaces in Hyderabad and Bengaluru. With over 3 million square feet constructed, and more than 2500 happy Keerthi families, Keerthi's efforts are to continue re-creating luxury in Indian spaces.

column2: Saideep Hulas is a project by SaiDeep Estates located in K R Puram Bangalore.  It is build on an area of 2 Acre encompassing 108 units across 1 towers. The floorings are made of Vitrified Tiles and .  Saideep Hulas comprises of 2BHK and 3BHK Flat.  2BHK Flat has a range of area from 1240 Sq-ft to 1265 Sq-ft having 1 balcony and 2 bathroom. 3BHK Flat has a range of area from 1658 Sq-ft to 1712 Sq-ft having 3 and 4 balcony and 3 bathroom.  Launched in March 2015, Saideep Hulas offers Under Construction properties. The project is approved by Bangalore Development Authority. It is approved by various banks like Bank of Baroda, HDFC, Indiabulls, LIC Housing Finance and SBI. The major Amenities in the project are  Park. Lift and Multipurpose Hall. Kids Play Pool With Water Slides, Indoor Squash & Badminton Courts and AEROBICS ROOM. Large Clubhouse and Grand Entrance lobby. .

STRUCTURE ,RCC framed structure,Solid concrete block of 200mm for outer wall and 100mm for internal partition wall,Floor to floor height will be maintained at 2.9m, WALL FINISH ,Internal wall in the living, dining, bedrooms, kitchen and lobby will be finished with 2 coats of putty, 1 coat of primer and 2 coats of OBD,Ceiling will be finished 2 coats of putty, 1 coat of primer and 2 coats of OBD,Exterior faces of the building will be finished with 1 coat of primer and 2 coats of emulsion paint,Utility & toilets will be finished with 1 coat of primer and 2 coats of OBD,Toilet walls will be finished with glazed ceramic tiles upto 7 feet height,Utility walls will be finished with glazed ceramic tiles upto 4 feet height, FLOORING ,Foyer, living, dining, kitchen and bedrooms will have 600 x 600 mm vitrified tile flooring,Bathrooms, Utility, and balcony will have 300 x 300 mm matte finish ceramic tiles,Terrace floor will have screed finish with threaded grooves,Common areas and staircase will have granite/tile flooring, KITCHEN ,Platform will be done with granite slab 600mm wide at a height of 800mm from the floor level and will be provided with stainless steel sink with drain board (Nirali or equivalent),Dado tiles upto 600mm from granite slab,Provision for exhaust and water purifier point,CP fittings will be Jaguar/ Roca or equivalent, BATHROOM ,Polished granite slab with Counter top wash basin Jaguar/ Roca or equivalent in master bathroom,Wall mounted basin Jaguar/ Roca or equivalent in all remaining toilets,Floor mounted W/C with health faucet Jaguar/ Roca or equivalent in all bathrooms,CP and sanitary fittings will be Jaguar/ Roca or equivalent,Wall mixer Jaguar/ Roca or equivalent will be provided,Provision for Geysers will be provided in all bathrooms, ENTRANCE DOOR ,Main door will be flush door of 7 feet height with polish finish with godrej or equivalent locks, tower bolts, door viewer, safety latch, door stopper etc., BEDROOM DOOR ,Skin moulded shutter doors of 7 feet height with Godrej or equivalent locks, thumb turn with keys, door stopper, etc., BATHROOM DOOR ,Skin moulded shutter doors with waterproofing on inner side of 7 feet height with thumb turn with key, WINDOW ,Windows will be UPVC sliding panel with see- through plain glass with MS grills wherever applicable,Balconies with UPVC framed french doors and toughened glass will be provided without grills,For ventilators UPVC frame with suitable louvered glass panes, ELECTRICAL FITTING ,Cables and wiring will be Finolex or equivalent,Switches and sockets will be Anchor roma/ Schneider or equivalent,Split air conditioner points will be provided in master bedroom and provision in other rooms,Modular plate switches, MCB and ELCB (Earth leakage circuit breaker) system,Telephone and TV(DTH) points will be provided in living and master bedroom,USB charging port in living/dining and master bedroom,Master electrical control switch near to main entrance to control all major electrical points,

column3: Founded and formed by Mr. BM Jayeshankar and Mr. BM Karunesh, the Adrash Developers was established 28 years ago and got fame as the innovative creator of luxurious lifestyle. Established in Bangalore, the group constructed its first residential property in 1996 and after that there was no looking back. Defining the future of architectural excellence, the group offers eco- friendly, secure and self- sufficient lifestyle. All the projects offers by Adarsh Developers, including, apartments and villas are crafted to perfect and are accurately executed. Offering affordable housing, the group provides 2BHK, 3BHK and 4BHK apartments starting from 98 lacks and covering the size range of 1300 sq.ft. to 4860 sq.ft. In order to acquire a distinct position in the real estate world, the group follows the mantra of offering the perfect houses at best prices to keep customers happy and satisfied. The group makes sure that the customers get international quality houses, eco- friendly environment and latest amenities. The famous and luxurious projects by Adrash Developers are Adrash Palm Retreat- Bangalore, Adarsh Palm Meadows- Bangalore, Adrash Esplanade- Bangalore, Adarsh Vista- Bangalore, Adarsh Garden- Bangalore, Adarsh Serenity- Bangalore, Adarsh Palm Retreat Villas- Bangalore etc.

column2: OverviewDeveloped by Mantri Developers Limited - Mantri Alpyne is a majestic residential society located in Banashankari, Bangalore. Built on 10 acres of land, this project encompasses 11 towers and total 1140 residential units. The society offers 2, 3 and 4BHK flats & 3 bedroom Penthouses. The carpet area of the flats ranges from 975 to 2335 sqft while the area of penthouse varies from 1690 1860 sqft. These affordable residences are best options for those looking to own a home in Bangalore. About the ProjectThe ready-to-move-in & well-ventilated apartments of Mantri Alpyne Banashankari are worth inspecting if you are looking for a luxury home with all the modern amenities. Thoughtfully designed with detailed attention to every nook, the apartments are perfect to dwell in with your family.The towers are well-planned and placed brilliantly in order to provide pleasant and soothing views of the vibrant greenery from all the apartments. All the flats have balconies which not only offer uninterrupted views of the beautiful surroundings but also allow plenty of fresh air & sunlight to seep in.All the rooms are filled with lots of freshness and the natural beauty around will surely leave you enthralled. Clubhouse, swimming pool, gymnasium, jogging and strolling track, outdoor tennis courts and every modern amenity you desired for are readily available at your doorstep. HighpointsStrategic location is the key feature of this reputed township which has made it a favourable residential place. Besides, good connectivity to public transport facilities, the society is also superbly linked with the reputed Bangalore University and the shimmering Uttarahalli Lake. The locality is blessed with the presence of the famous Anjaneya Temple.Grab this opportunity of owning a luxurious flat in Mantri Alpyne Banashankari, if chic lifestyle is what you are looking for!!!
column3: In the supremely dynamic and competitive sphere of property development, one name has consistently been a trail blazer, setting the trends for others to follow. The innovation-led, future-focused Mantri Developers Pvt. Ltd. Established in 1999 by Mr. Sushil Mantri, the company has been the pioneering force behind the rapidly changing skyline of south India, with developments that span the residential, retail, commercial, education and hospitality sectors In just 14 years, the group, with the spirit of innovation at its core, has carved a niche for itself as an industry benchmark for quality, customer focus, robust engineering, in-house research, uncompromising business ethics and the unswerving commitment to timeless values and total transparency in every aspect of its business. These exceptional attributes have made Mantri Developers one of India most preferred real estate brands in south India.

column2: One look at Sobha Heritage will establish this fact. This iconic project with 2 and 3 BHK apartments in Banashankari 3rd Stage is a truly unique offering not just because of its strategic location and a setting that is idyllic, but also because everything here is practically accessible within a traffic free drive. What’s more, this project abounds with exceptional features and is blessed with abundant greenery spread around homes. With features like a Juliet window to gaze from, a winding bicycling track and a jogging track to set the heart racing, beautiful French gardens with antique park benches that reminds one of Europe, a charming Fountain in the Plaza, gorgeous Gazebos spread around the project, a Cascading pool with water spouts, lobbies done in the Baroque, Rococo and Neo Classical styles and more, Sobha Heritage seems to have been designed to give a new definition to Community Living, that epitomizes life at its best.
column3: With three decades of experience in creating resplendent interiors of palaces and masterpieces in the Middle-East, Mr. P.N.C. Menon founded Sobha Limited (formerly Sobha Developers Ltd) in 1995 with a clear vision to transform the way people perceive quality. Today, Sobha, a Rs. 25 billion company, is one of the largest and only backward integrated real estate players in the country.Headquartered in Bangalore, Sobha is primarily focused on residential and contractual projects. The Companys residential projects include presidential apartments, villas, row houses, luxury and super luxury apartments, plotted development and aspirational homes replete with world-class amenities. In all its residential projects, the company lays a strong emphasis on environmental management, water harvesting and high safety standards. .The backward integration model is one of the key competitive strengths of Sobha. This literally means that the Company has all the competencies and in-house resources to deliver a project from conceptualisation to completion. Backward integration includes an interiors division, a metal works and glazing factory, and a concrete products factory. Sobha has also diversified into retail business with spring mattresses under the brand name Sobha Restoplus. More than 27 variants of mattresses are produced by the mattress division using cutting-edge machinery of international quality.

column2: Brigade 7 Gardens is a prestigious 8.5-acre residential township developed by the acclaimed Brigade Group. Located in Banashankari Stage 6, Bangalore – this wonderful township boasts 678 units spread across 7 towers. 2 BHKs & 3 BHKs are the available configurations which vary between 71 sqm to 99 sqm. The flat rates of Brigade 7 Gardens Banashankari Stage 6, Bangalore are tagged from Rs. 57 Lacs onwards. Project details Set in the midst of seven beautiful gardens, these residential apartments are a divine place to live a happy, blissful & healthy life with your loved ones. The vibrant atmosphere filled with positive energies of this residential township will certainly enliven you all along the day. All the well-ventilated residential apartments of Brigade 7 Gardens Banashankari Stage 6, Bangalore are meticulously constructed with spacious floor plans to allow adequate flow of fresh air & sunlight across each room. So, hurry up and book a flat now in Brigade 7 Gardens Banashankari Stage 6, Bangalore and gift your family the joy of living amidst 7 lovely gardens. This luxurious residential township is armed with a number of world-class amenities like a clubhouse, swimming pool, jogging track, tennis court, gym, badminton court, multi-purpose hall, basketball court and is also self-sustained with a convenience store. A home in Brigade 7 Gardens Banashankari Stage 6, Bangalore is truly a lucrative investment deal. So, hurry up and book a flat now. Highpoints This is a wonderfully designed residential project, surrounded by total 7 beautiful gardens. RERA certified, this project offers luxurious 2 & 3-bedroom flats within affordable bracket. Situated in a prime locality like Banashankari, public transport along with other basic infrastructural facilities are easily available. National Public School, Delhi Public School and Dayananda Sagar International School & College are situated at an arm’s distance. An upcoming metro station within just 4 km radius will further boost the connectivity to surrounding areas.
column3: Brigade Group was established in 1986, with property development as its main focus. Today, Brigade Group is one of South India's leading property developers. We are headquartered in Bangalore, with branch offices in several cities in South India, a representative office in Dubai and an accredited agent in the USA. We have a uniquely diverse multi-domain portfolio that covers property development, property management services, hospitality and education. Our projects extend across several major cities in South India: Chennai, Chikmagalur, Hyderabad, Kochi, Mangalore and Mysore.

column2: Overview Brigade Omega, Banashankari, Bangalore belonging to the prestigious Brigade Group offers a selection of lavishly appointed residential apartments in the configuration of 2BHK, 3BHK and 4BHK within the price range of Rs.77.7lakhs and Rs.1.50crore. There are a total of 520 units spread across 3 towers and are priced within Rs.77.7lakhs and Rs.1.50crore. These apartments are available both as a new sale as well as on resale basis. About the Project Brigade Omega in Banashankari, Bangalore offers 2BHK, 3BHK and 4BHK residential apartments in varying sizes. 2BHK units are sized between 1270sq.ft. and 1430sq.ft., 3BHK cover an area between 1650sq.ft. and 1800sq.ft. while 4BHK occupies an area ranging between 2230sq.ft. and 2390sq.ft. Each tower features around 13 storeys and offers beautiful views of the surroundings as it boasts an open area of 74%. Located right across the Thurahalli Forest, this resplendent project offers myriad reasons to enjoy a life blessed with natural beauty and lavish comforts. All the residential apartments are extremely well ventilated and constructed to allow plenty of natural light and air. A host of outstanding features further makes it all the worthwhile to invest in this project such as clubhouse, gym, swimming pool, party area, multipurpose hall, badminton court and basketball court. Highpoints Overlooking a wide expanse of green is a major USP of this project, as one is close to all the essential civic amenities and yet tucked away in the midst of verdant green surroundings. The prime location of Brigade Omega is also an added advantage as the upcoming metro station, Metro Cash & Carry and Delhi Public School are only 4km away. To experience a life of complete bliss and tranquillity, book an apartment now in Brigade Omega in Banashankari.

column2: OverviewDesigned to be 100% Vasthu Complaint, the LBI Bliss in Kadugodi, Bangalore is a society for those selected few who have a dream of owning an independent space of their own. Built with no common walls between two flats, the best part about living in LBI Bliss is that you get to spend uninterrupted quality time with your family and live happily in your own space. Equipped with aesthetically designed, luxurious and well- ventilated residential flats, the LBI Bliss is constructed with 1 tower. The society is designed to offer affordable housing in Kadugodi, Bangalore as these 64 residential apartments are reasonably priced. You can explore Magicbricks for LBI Bliss price, LBI Bliss floor plan, LBI Bliss photos, flat/apartment for sale in LBI Bliss etc.Project detailA perfect combination of healthy and modern living, the LBI Bliss is situated in a pollution- free and a peaceful area and is built with best- quality raw material, smart floor plan and latest interiors. The project is constructed by the LBI Developers that was established in 1981 as a small organization but with its hardwork and dedication the company grew to be a known real estate firm and have made more than 500 clients happy. Featuring all the modern amenities and facilities, the LBI Bliss is built to complement your modern lifestyle.-          Club house, private terrace/garden, dance studio, indoor games room, recreational pool etc. can be visited in your leisure time.-          Keep yourself fit with cycling and jogging track, outdoor tennis courts, swimming pool, gym etc.-          Basic facilities like power backup, visitor parking, lift, maintenance staff, waste disposal, rain water harvesting, reserved parking etc. are available.The residential flats in LBI Bliss feature RCC framed structure, vitrified tiles in all rooms, kitchen with granite platform with stainless steel sink and 2 feet height tiles dadoing above the platform, toilets with 7 feet height dadoing and ceramic anti- skid tiles flooring in all bathrooms and equivalent bathroom fittings, concealed copper wiring, main door with solid teak and teak wood frame polished, internal doors with sal wood, engineered wood, flush doors, aluminum 3 track windows with frame and safety grills, individual TV and telephone points in hall and other bedrooms, internal walls with one coat of primer and two coats of emulsion paint and outside emulsion grills with one coat of enamel paint.

column2: Ranka group, a famous construction company in the state of Karnataka presents in front of you its new residential project namely Ranka Heights in a very prime location of Bangalore. Ranka heights are coming up in Domlur, Bangalore, consisting of three parking levels and nine residential floors. From each apartment gives you a beautiful view of landscaped courtyard which is very pleasing to eye and bringing back the old times courtyard concept to provide ample of sunlight and cross ventilation. The project consists of a well-planned beautiful landscaped garden which is very relaxing for everyone, from kids to elder people. There is a full-fledged club house provided with membership privileges to each apartment holder in the complex. There is a large area given to activities like aerobics, meditation, yoga, Library etc., and many more other features like entertainment area, pool/billiards area, swimming pool etc. The project is at a very close distance from the airport road and is directly accessible and only 3.75 km away from MG road. More than one acre of area is allotted to Courtyards, gardens and lawns. Book your dream house now to experience the whole new experience of living.

The Ranka Group is a Bangalore based conglomerate with interests in Real Estate Development, Infrastructure Projects, Power Generation, Retailing, Contracting & Engineering, Building Construction Products, Architecture, Engineering & Consultancy, Interiors, Housing Finance, Infotech Solutions, Education, Healthcare, Hospitality, Leisure & Entertainment, Jewelry, Textiles and Silks - drawing Synergy from Diversity. Operations span Bangalore, Chennai, Coimbatore, Salem, Erode, Pune, Mumbai, Surat, Ahmedabad, Rajasthan, Gulf, USA, UK, South East Asia, Asia Pacific & Africa. Over six decades of demonstrated consistently successful performance and growth has established brand Ranka as a force to reckon with. The Group is synonymous with reliability, integrity, transparency, simple & straight forward practices in all of its dealings. The Group works with a holistic approach - combining strategy, planning and methodical research to incorporate economic, environmental, technological and community insights. It is the outstanding organizational and team efforts coupled with long term security, loyalty, transparency and integrity that have contributed towards Group's efficient mix of corporation with traditional business values.

column2: Overview:Whitestone Veroso is a project by Whitestone Projects. It is located in Kadugodi, Bengaluru offering luxurious residential apartments - 2 BHK and 3 BHK consisting of 60 units and 1 tower spreading across 1 acre of total project area. The price of these apartment start at a rate of Rs. 48 Lac onwards. The developer has equipped this project with all modern amenities and civic utilities to its residents.Project Details:Whitestone Veroso located in Kadugodi, Bengaluru is a project by Whitestone Projects offering luxury residential developed apartments consisting of 2 and 3 BHKs. The 2 BHK areas range from 1000 sq. ft. to 1120 sq. ft.; and the 3 BHK areas range from 1450 sq.ft. to 1510 sq.ft. The apartments have RCC frame structure, designed with vitrified and anti skid tiles, premium sanitary ware, teak word main doors, etc.The project has some major amenities such as lifts, 24*7 water supply, 24*7 power back up,  fire fighting system, intercom, car parking, gymnasium, club house, children’s play area, etc. The lifestyle amenities include CCTV camera security, property staff, RO system, video door security, sports amenities like badminton court, jogging track, multipurpose court, swimming pool, yoga & meditation area, eco-friendly amenities are landscape garden, paved compound, rain water harvesting, sewage treatment, and other services like cafeteria, library and games area.Highpoints:This project is just minutes away from major highways and metro stations. The project is in quite an emerging and booming locality in terms of real estate market. Investing in this project is sure to bring huge returns. This area has been successful in fetching new buyers for various new projects. It also allows great connectivity to various civic utilities. The project is nearby numerous malls, schools, corporate hubs, hospitals, well reputed institutes, etc among others.
column3: One of the most important financial decisions an individual can make isbuilding a new home. We at Whitestone Projects understand this and arecommitted to building your quality home as well as providing superior customersatisfaction. We also know that building a home requires incredible attentionto detail and entails numerous important decisions. As a service-orientedhomebuilder, we want our homeowners to enjoy this exciting time. These are justa few words we use to describe our company, our people and our commitment tobuild homes that move you. We promise to be right there with you every step ofthe way in creating a place you will absolutely love and will be proud to call home.Whether it choosing the floor plan, features, or options, we will help keep thestress out. That is why we have assembled an experienced and knowledgeable teamto help guide you in making the selections that will make your house truly yourhome. We are not like other builders. Sure you hear this all the time, but ourprinciples are built on a foundation of longtime friendships, localinvolvement, and giving back. Whitestone Projects is a Company with heart. Wedo not just build homes; we believe in investing in local and globalcommunities. Thank you for choosing Whitestone Projects.

column2: VS Sai Ashraya is a project by VSR Ventures located in Whitefield, Bengaluru offering lavishly designed ready to move 2 BHK, 3 BHK and 4 BHK apartments.  It consists of 154 units spanned over 2 towers. VS Sai Ashraya price rate starts from Rs. 48 Lac onward. VS Sai Ashraya is fully equipped with amenities and also in close vicinity to various civic utilities.Project Details:VS Sai Ashraya located in Whitefield, Bengaluru, is a project by VSR Ventures offering spacious ready to move 2 BHK, 3 BHK and 4 BHK apartments. VS Sai Ashraya plot areas for its 2 BHK flat ranges from 975 sq. ft. to 1265 sq. ft.; 3 BHK flat areas range from 1345 sq. ft. to 1695 sq. ft. and 4 BHK flat areas range from 2400 sq. ft. to 3000 sq. ft.VS Sai Ashraya apartments are being designed with polished vitrified tiles in all rooms, anti skid ceramic tiles in the toilet, teak wood frame door, concealed copper wiring with modular switches, granite kitchen platform etc.VS Sai Ashraya also provides numerous essential amenities for its residents like power backup, swimming pool, security, intercom facility, banquet hall, gym, indoor games room, kids play area, rain water harvesting etc. and many more.Highpoints:VS Sai Ashraya also has a special lifestyle amenity like jogging & strolling track for its residents. It is well located and in close proximity of 2 km from State Bank of India, 2.7 km from Goods Loading Terminal and 4.8 km from Alembic Glass Colony. Utilities like Sai Garden bus stop, KIADB Shopping Complex, Chrysalis High Kadugodi, Whitefield station, New Life Hospital, Canara Bank ATM, Grand Supermarket, etc. also lie in the vicinity.

Near to Satya Sai Baba Ashram, this offers quick access to all major destinations like your work place, shopping malls, premier educational institutions like famous International schools and the world class Sathya Sai Baba Hospital to name a few. It is very well connected to the rest of the city and offers easy access to all conveniences, yet recessed from the daily bustle. column2: Sonesta Silver Oak is an imposing edifice located in Thubarahalli, Bangalore. These 2 BHK multistory apartments offer a covered area of 992 Sq ft. In Sonesta Silver Oak by Nirman Sonesta developers a simple address has been taken and converted into a sought after landmark. When life gets stressful you need a haven to escape to from the strain and tension and Sonesta Silver Oak offer just such a haven. The unique design of the residential township of Sonesta Silver Oak is a treat for the heart and mind. At the same time, there is the excellent quality of construction that Nirman Sonesta is well known for. The transparent documentation ensures that you do not get the short end of the stick in the deal. This residential township is located close to many shopping centres. Hospitals and schools are also close by. Moreover, the Railway station is just 4 km away and airport is at a reasonable distance of 35 km. All these civic amenities at a close distance ensure quality of living. On the other hand the amenities within the residential township add to your pleasure. For instance the swimming pool, gym, cycling and jogging track and indoor squash and badminton courts take care of your needs of physical exercise. Flower gardens provide a place where you can rejuvenate your mind. Kids play area is a place where the children can burn off their excess energy.

column9:

Shriram Properties 
Shriram Properties are a popular real estate developers & builders exuding fine dedication in building affordable housing & commercial properties across various localities in Chennai, Bangalore, Kolkata and Vizag. The company was established in 1990 and with an experience of over a decade, Shriram Properties aspires to construct projects to satiate needs of the modern lifestyle with world-class amenities. Till now, they have successfully executed 4.8 million sq. ft. of residential & 1.03 million sq. ft. of commercial projects. Shriram Properties in Bangalore is a renowned for their excellent commitment towards the customers, Shriram Properties has elevated its success to new heights. 
With an exceptional proven track record of completing major projects in Tier 1 & Tier 2 cities, Shriram Properties aims to establish their pan-India presence with a portfolio of construction projects comprising of modern integrated townships, residential apartments and commercial, hospitality, SEZs & retail. This construction company offers 1, 2 and 3 BHK apartment ranging between 44 Lakhs and 4.6 Crore. Today, they have partnered with Starwood Capital Group & Sun Apollo and Walton Street Capital for investments. 
Some of the projects by Shriram Properties that are worth mentioning are Shriram Greenfield in Bangalore, Shriram Smrithi in Bangalore, Shriram Sameeksha in Bangalore, Shriram Suhaana in Bangalore, Shriram Chirping Woods in Bangalore, Shriram Summit in Bangalore, Shriram Panorama Hills in Bangalore and much more.

column2: Oceanus Group presents Oceanus Greendale, a housing destination nestled in the lap of the nature, covered with lush green landscape. The project is strategically located in Banasvadi, Bangalore. The locality is situated at the North East of the Bangalore city and is only 6 km from the city centre. Primarily established as a residential locality, presently Banasvadi has a great demand for residential and commercial plots due to the expansion of the city. Proximity with the international airport and the outer ring road which connects Banasvadito the IT hubs of the region has fuelled the rapid growth in the region. A number of world class hospitals such as, Cenesis, Satya Sai Baba Hospital, Dewans Hospital, and Narayan Maternity Hospital are located close to the project site. The famous Anjaneya Swami Temple is also located in the vicinity. Reputed schools, bank branches, ATMs, shopping complexes all are within short distances from Oceanus Greendale in Banasvadi. The residential township of Oceanus Greendale is now under construction and is planned to encapsulate spacious apartments of different sizes and plans. The residential project will also include all the modern facilities and amenities, like swimming pool, parking, gymnasium, indoor games room, outdoor game courts, power backup, lifts, security and many more in order to provide a privileged life to the residents.
column3: A Group where thought is deliberately integrated into every facet of business. Where every square foot of space exudes maximum utility. Where stereotypes are discarded. Where traditional values seamlessly merge with youthful enthusiasm. Where managerial and administrative prowess go hand in hand with creative skills and sound technical know how, to deliver to every customer, spaces designed on pure Intelligence.Renowned for its choice of locations when planning a project, and the future it promises for the investors. Because, with every home that Oceanus builds, comes that guarantee of not just the best of comforts and conveniences, but of immense value-appreciation. Because Oceanus firmly believes, that a home of ones own is among the most Precious things in life.Steadfast in adherence to statutory requirements. Revered principles of the ancient wisdom of Vaastu followed in letter and spirit. Equally conscious is the Group, to its responsibility towards our environment, needless to mention the numerous water, waste-management, greening and other eco-friendly initiatives. Because, beyond just offering living spaces, is our bigger aim-that of making life much sweeter.A group with a keen eye for detail. Where every aspect of a project, from foundation to finishes, is diligently monitored by trained professionals. Tiles, paints and fittings are handpicked after meticulous scrutiny for performance and durability. Architecture, landscaping and other services are rendered by the best in their respective fields. Because, Oceanus believes in offering living spaces of finest quality. Such is its eye for aesthetics.

column2: Overview Bhavya Serene, a project by Bhavya Builders on Kasavanahalli, Bangalore, is an upcoming residential development offering thoughtfully designed 2 BHK apartments for those looking at comfort combined with elegance. Project Details Bhavya Builders are one of the most reputed builders in the area with many projects under their belt. The idea behind Bhavya Serene, Bangalore is to create stylish yet carefully-designed living options for urban people. There are many advantages to living in Bhavya Serene because there are a lot of amenities that one can enjoy. There is a clubhouse for leisure activities and socializing. Residents can enjoy a well-maintained cycling and jogging track to keep up with their fitness goals. Lift and Intercom Facility is operational at all times for absolute convenience and comfort. For residents to feel safe, there is 24x7 security. Maintenance Staff takes care of all the building repair work. The construction and design of the apartments in Bhavya Serene has been done keeping in mind urban living requirements. The kitchen comes with a provision for an aqua-guard point and the toilets have a provision for geyser. Flooring is done with high-quality vitrified tiles all over the house. Bhavya Serene area per apartment is different and ranges from 1105 sq ft to 1205 sq ft. High Points Perhaps, the biggest advantage to this is the Bhavya Serene location. It is well connected to all places. Within a 3 km radius, one can find South Indian Bank ATM, Central Shopping Mall, Kaikondrahalli Bus Stop, Apollo Pharmacy, supermarkets, churches, temples, restaurants, parks and even PVR Soul Spirit for movies. In a fast developing area, this building comes as a blessing to those who want to have a comfortable living option. Go ahead and get yourself this unique living option at prices starting from just 59 Lac onwards.

column2: Located in Vijayanagar, Bangalore - Salarpuria Sattva Altana is an ambitious residential project by Salarpuria Sattva. Covering a huge land parcel of 12 acres, this splendid project features total 1384 residential units spread across 22 eye-catching high-rise towers. 1, 2 and 3-bedroom apartments are the available configurations to choose from. These units are offered in multiple dimensions ranging from 492 sqft to 1803 sqft. The flat rates of Salarpuria Sattva Altana Vijayanagar, Bangalore are priced starting from Rs. 26.6 Lacs to Rs. 84.6 Lacs. Project details Conveniently located off Magadi Road, Salarpuria Sattva Altana is a brand new residential development with possession of flats by June 2019. Designed brilliant with impressive floor plans, all the well-ventilated residential apartments of Salarpuria Sattva Altana Vijayanagar are blessed with abundant fresh breeze and natural light.  To elevate your lifestyle and offer a high-class living experience, the project offers an array of world-class amenities & facilities like club house, play area, badminton court, swimming pool, 24hour security, broadband internet, Wi-Fi, intercom facility, 100% power backup, indoor games and much more. The society is also self-sufficient with a library, bank/ATM, cafeteria and a beautiful temple. Acknowledged with lots of positive reviews, Salarpuria Sattva Altana Vijayanagar certified by RERA is definitely one of the best option to look for your dream home. Highpoints The builders have smartly chosen a fantastic location for this project with good connectivity to public transports. The famous National Law School & Ambedkar Engineering College are situated within just 10 minutes of drive. It merely takes 10-15 minutes to reach Vijaynagar/Magadi and Mysore Road Metro Stations. The world-class Columbia Asia Hospital and the popular Orion Mall are also easily accessible within just 15 minutes. So, hurry up and book a flat now in Salarpuria Sattva Altana Vijayanagar and enjoy a smooth & balanced life with your family members.
column3: Built on trust, innovation and knowledge-leadership, the Salarpuria Sattva Group is one of Indias leading Property Development, Management and Consulting organizations.Founded in 1986 with the primary focus of developing high quality constructions, the Group has attained leadership positioning in the field and is one of the most preferred brands in the country today. Having pioneered the early development landscape in Bangalore and literally shaping the citys skyline since the mid-80s, the Group has a diverse portfolio of world-class IT Parks, commercial, residential, hospitality and retail properties.A course of natural evolution and diversification led to the formation of the Salarpuria Sattva Group, which blends the traditional strengths of the Salarpuria Sattva Groups development business and the forward-looking diversification into many verticals such as Aerospace, Hi-tech, Education, Facilities Management and Warehousing.Fuelled by an intense eagerness to innovate, deliver value and build trust, the expanding business footprint has spread across many major Indian cities. The unwavering focus has always been to attain complete client satisfaction resulting in successful deliveries that are now recognized as the hallmark of the Group.

column2: Overview Located in Chandapura, Bangalore – Green Acres Phase 2 developed by Sri Srinivasa Developers is truly a green paradise offering affordable residential plots. This project is inclusive of 146 residential plots measuring from 1200 sqft to 2400 sqft. Green Acres Phase 2 plots are priced from Rs. 17.4 Lac to Rs. 26.1 Lacs. Green Acres Phase 2 photos and the site layouts are available online with complete details. About the project Green Acres Chandapura reviews are extremely positive and the developers are one of the reputed names in Bangalore real estate market. The developers always ensured well-planned residential plots that are loaded with all the modern amenities and facilities. Sri Srinivasa Green Acres residential plots hold great future benefits and also fetch good returns in the future. Set in the lap of mother nature, the residential plots of Green Acres Phase 2 are a perfect venue for your dream home. The friendly atmosphere and the rich ambiance of this project will definitely soothe your body, mind and soul. Come and invest in this gated community and take a first step towards fulfilling your dream home. These affordable residential plots are offered with freehold ownership and the prospective buyer can easily avail loans from any well-known banks or other financial institutions. Perfectly outlined as per vaastu rules, these plots come with facilities like security and kids play area. Highpoints The strategic location, just off Chandapura main road is indeed the prime USP of this project. Housing several prestigious residential projects, Chandapura is highly sought-after among investors and property buyers. Good proximity to various IT hubs and excellent public transport connectivity are added advantages. Narayana Hrudayala Hospital and Greendot International School are few well-known landmarks of this project. A residential plot in Green Acres Phase 2, Chandapura, Bangalore is truly worthwhile. So, walk in and book today!!!
