column2: Overview: Salarpuria Sattva Luxuria is a project offering state of the art exquisitely crafted 3 BHK, 4 BHK apartments and 4 BHK penthouses. It is ready for possession located in Malleshwaram, Bangalore by Salarpuria Sattva Group. The project consists of 197 units spanned over 2 high rise towers. Salarpuria Sattva Luxuria price rate starts at Rs. 2.65 Cr onward.  Project Details:    Salarpuria Sattva Luxuria by Salarpuria Sattva Group is offering luxurious 3 BHK, 4 BHK apartments and 4 BHK penthouses based in the fast growing locality of Malleshwaram, Bangalore.  Salarpuria Sattva Luxuria plot areas for its 3 BHK flat range from 2215 sq. ft. to 2475 sq. ft.; 4 BHK flat areas range approx. 3740 sq. ft. and 4 BHK penthouse areas range from 3740 sq. ft. to 4465 sq. ft. Salarpuria Sattva Luxuria features numerous modern day amenities for its residents such as a club house, jogging track, outdoor tennis courts, power backup, swimming pool, 24 hour security facility, ample car parking, maintenance staff, gymnasium, multipurpose hall, indoor games room, DTH television facility, rain water harvesting, etc. to name a few.Salarpuria Sattva Luxuria Bangalore apartments are precisely designed with vitrified tiles flooring, laminated wooden flooring in master bedroom, electrical wiring with elegant modular switches, premium German made granite counter, white sanitary ware, etc. Highpoints:Salarpuria Sattva Luxuria is an extravagant residential project offering exquisite and premium luxury apartments for making the resident’s lifestyle prestigious yet comfortable.  The infrastructure is well laid out and opens on three sides for complete privacy. Salarpuria Sattva Luxuria Bangalore locality is well connected and has various basic utilities such as Kendriya Vidyalaya Hebbal, Narayana Nethralaya, Sandal Soap Factory Metro Station, Syndicate Bank ATM, ISKCON Bangalore, Sheraton Grand Bangalore Hotel, and Bharat Petroleum etc. all lay in the vicinity just a stone’s throw away.

column2: Utopia is located in prime residential area, adjacent to KHB Phase II well known as Surya City phase II Chandapura Anekal Road. It is less than 20 minutes drive from Silk Board through elevated expressway. The entire community has been planned to be friendly, secure and complete with all modern amenities. The project in the midst of Surya City makes a great valuable investment in land. A secure haven of harmonious living with warmth that reflects a welcoming and aesthetically designed entrance arch invites residents as well as guests into the warmth of Utopia. The pleasantness continues thought the length and breadth of the setting with colourful plants and trees that add visual interest and aesthetics.Along with our rich and varied industry experience and a well qualified team of professionals will help you find suitable residential properties as per their own liking. We offer residential house plots procurement services to our valued clients. We ensure you residential plot and luxurious homes that are affordable and can be bought within the specific budget specified by the client in a predefined time frame. We also provide appropriate assistance with respect to the legal formalities and proceedings to ensure hassle-free dealing. By keeping a track with the latest market development, we are involved in providing spacious residential plots and luxurious homes.

column2: Aptly named is this beautiful walled community of 40 acres, that is designed around time-tested Vaastu concepts. About a 100 mtrs from NH7 and only 34 kms from MG Road and Vidhana Soudha (a travel time of only forty minutes) is AeroPride. For the devout, the layout is adjacent to the Jain Temple.Each plot allocated is accessible by a planned network of tar roads, supported by storm water drains. Excellent street lighting, parks and landscaped gardens make ‘Aero Pride’ a matter of ownership delight – as it’s meant to do. This project has also been approved by BIAAPA.Residential plots on offer vary in size and Aishwarya Homes has a selection of excellent choices in home and villa design, should you desire.The ubiquitous club house, gymnasium and swimming pool are of course ‘the simple necessities of life’ at this luxurious choice of layout.

Honesty and a professional outlook, coupled with discipline and a will to please are the benchmarks of this vibrant real estate investment company.

Indeed the properties it has for sale and the growing profile of families who entrust their investments are a matter of pride. All locations are carefully chosen and subsequently designed keeping in mind the weather elements, need for privacy and ‘lung’ space.

Aishwarya Homes is here to stay. With the customer.

column2: OverviewGoyal Footprints is a project located at Thanisandra Main Road, Bangalore. The project is under the possession of Goyal and Co and Hariyana Group. With their relentless efforts and immense dedication, Goyal and Co and Hariyana Group have established a huge reputation is real estate market. The project provides apartments varying between price ranges of 39 lakhs to 65 lakhs. About the ProjectGoyal Footprints consist of 182 units and 4 towers. The project is ready to move and offers 1 BHK and 2 BHK well-ventilated residential apartments.  Location of the place is quite attractive. The Thanisandra Main Road is a central area and places such as hospitals, bus stops, ATMs and shopping malls are situated nearby. You can easily commute via the public transport. Area covered by the Goyal Footprints is approximately 4500 to 5941 per square feet; 1 BHK apartments cover an area of around 663-805 square feet & 2 BHK apartments cover an area of 1092-1094 square feet. Ceramic tiles are used for flooring in the balcony and vitrified tiles are used in areas such as bedroom, living room and kitchen.  Teak wood frames are used for the main door giving it an elegant look. The chromium plated fittings used in the washrooms and the exclusive European Water Closet is also being provided by Goyal and Co and Hariyana Group under this project. HighpointsThere are many unique amenities that are offered under the Goyal Footprints project. Outdoor Tennis Court, Jogging and Strolling Track, Food Court, Lounge, Club House, reserved parking, Swimming Pool and lift are a few to name. Investing in this project not only provides you with the benefits of all such services but you also enjoy a hassle-free life full of luxury and comfort. These affordable apartments can surely make your life a happy place!

column2: Ozone Group Urbana Aqua is a project by Ozone Group strategically located in Devanahalli Bangalore.  It is build on an area of 9 Acre encompassing 552 units across 10 towers. The floorings are made of Superior Quality 2x2 Vitrified Tiles and Ceramic Tiles.  Ozone Group Urbana Aqua comprises of 2BHK, 3BHK and 4BHK Flat.  2BHK Flat has range of area from 937 Sq-ft to 1591 Sq-ft having 1 and 2 balcony and 2 bathroom. 3BHK Flat has range of area from 1145 Sq-ft to 1968 Sq-ft having 2 and 3 balcony and 3 bathroom. 4BHK Flat has range of area from 1874 Sq-ft to 2093 Sq-ft having 4 balcony and 4 bathroom.  Launched in November 2011, Ozone Group Urbana Aqua offers Ready To Move properties. It is approved by various banks like Axis Bank, SBI, IDBI, HDFC, ICICI, DHFL, LIC Housing Finance, Punjab National Bank and Indiabulls.

column2: Located in Devanahalli, Bangalore – Brigade Atmosphere by Brigade Group is the best place to book a beautiful accommodation for your family. Spread across 18 acres of blooming greenery, this upcoming project is impressive with total 109 well-designed 4BHK villas ranging from 280 - 317 sqm. The price of luxurious villas of Brigade Atmosphere cost starting from Rs.1.9 Cr onwards. Project details Scheduled for possession by February 2020, Brigade Atmosphere loaded with all the world-class amenities & facilities is set to offer a comfortable and lavish lifestyle to its residents. Coupled with the positive aura of the refreshing greenery, this residence is truly worth investing. Brilliantly designed with spacious floor plans, these abodes promise a pleasant living with unmatched privacy. Studded with branded fittings & fixtures and adorned with premium flooring, these plush villas exude true essence of style & elegance. Blessed with enough fresh air, the well-ventilated villas of Brigade Atmosphere are also favored with plenty of natural light. King-size bedrooms, spacious living rooms, charming balconies and elite kitchens are some of the salient features of these quality homes. The abundance collection of top-notch amenities which include a well-equipped gym, swimming pool, Jacuzzi, tennis court, health club, children’s play area, multi-purpose hall and many more other facilities make this RERA certified residential project an icon for an opulent lifestyle. Highpoints Situated close to an upcoming SEZs, Devanahalli is one of the bustling locality of Bangalore and is definitely a hottest investment destination. Bangalore international airport, Yelahanka railway station and Manyata Tech Park can be reached within just 45minutes of hassle-free drive. Easy connectivity to public transports and close proximity to schools such as Delhi Public, Sterling, Oxford English, etc., make this area a fine dwelling place. Come and book a villa now in Brigade Atmosphere Devanahalli, Bangalore and enjoy a high-end living.

column2: OverviewYour search for the unsurpassed will now come to an end. Brigade Orchards located in Devanahalli, Bangalore offers spacious and well ventilated 2BHK as well as 3BHK flats at an affordable price. Attentively developed by Brigade Group, upcoming Brigade Orchards is situated in close proximity to Bangalore International Airport and it consists of total 905 units spread across 20 towers. The price list of the well-designed flats in this project ranges between Rs. 52.0 Lac 83.0 Lac.About the projectIt is a well-constructed project in the city that is surrounded by lush greenery where you can enjoy the beauty of nature. The area of 2BHK flats ranges from 1080 sqft to 1390 sqft and the area of 3BHK flats vary between 1290 sqft, 1780 sqft.The flats of Brigade Orchards are constructed beautifully that gives you royal feeling. These residential apartments in Devanahalli, Bangalore are wonderfully crafted keeping in mind all your needs. With greatest possible cross ventilation and natural sunlight entering the apartments, this project makes you feel blissful right from the moment you enter.The top class amenities offered here include coffee lounge and restaurants, swimming pool, kids club, kids play area, guest accommodation, visitor parking, gymnasium, indoor games room and so on.HighpointsAkash International School and Akash Medical Hospital are easily accessible within a short distance from the location of this project. Also, it is well connected to all the social infrastructures such as schools, hospitals, shopping destinations and a lot more.You can also refer the reviews and photos for better understanding of this project. At the time of booking, you have to pay only 10 percent amount and the rest amount can be paid after possession hence book a flat now in Brigade Orchards to opt this financial advantage.

column2: OverviewSprawling across 25 acres of land, Telecom Indus City is located in Devanahalli, Bangalore. Developed by Msquare Developers, this project consists of 600 residential plots that are currently under construction stage.Project detailsApproved by BIAAPA, Telecom Indus City residential plots are encircled by many reputed educational institutions. Within half km radius, you can access IT, BT park and financial city. For those travelling by planes, airport is nearby. Excellent builder has constructed this project, if you dont believe just go through Msquare Developers reviews. Telecom Indus City price list is also quite reasonable to fit your budget.-       Club house is one of the luxurious amenities offered by this project.-       Also, it is well secured by armed security.-       Mesmerising views of park will astonish you.-       Rain water harvesting is an eco friendly feature provided.Apart from outstanding infrastructure, this project also enjoys excellent connectivity to proposed 6 lanes Cargo Road, Devanahalli Business Park (DBP) and financial city.There is good news for you, as these plots are available at discount of 50 percent than the market price. Also, reviews of Telecom Indus City are on the brighter side and you can browse through them to get a proper feedback.HighpointsTelecom Indus City, Devanahalli, Bangalore has good proximity to top MNCs, Bangalore International Airport, National Highway 7, KIADB Park, Software Park, Hardware Park 8 and Financial City. Effortless commuting is possible as it has good access  to various modes of public transports.Download the brochure of Telecom Indus City that will give you a clear detail of this project. Invest in these plots and you will be never at loss. Hence it is a golden opportunity for you. Book now.
column3: In the supremely dynamic and competitive sphere of property development, one name has consistently been a trail blazer, setting the trends for others to follow. The innovation-led, future-focused M-Square Developers Established in 2013 by Mr. Manjunath, an IITen from Chennai who has 2 decades of experience in the Real Estate Industry and is also from a very strong academic back ground. The company has been the pioneering force behind the rapidly changing skyline of south India, with developments that span the residential, retail, commercial, education and hospitality sectors. M-Square Developers has believed that there is only one mantra for success: Quality. This credo combined with uncompromising values, customer-centricity, robust engineering, and transparency in business operations, has placed it among the most preferred real estate brands in both residential and commercial segments.The Company has grown from strength to strength, having successfully acquired more than 500 acres of land for Layout purpose and having tie up with 11 world class Housing Societies to provide plots, townships for a reasonable price to cater all classes of the society but emphasizing more on the middleclass.

In-depth knowledge of the real estate market, appreciation prospects, legal factors, and financing options enable us to draw both investors and property users. Residential, Commercial, Lease or Land and Rentals to Keystone Properties find the perfect fitment between buyers and sellers for mutual satisfaction and our service with uncompromised commitment, quality and committed to be time bound.

We strongly believe that our properties are built on the solid foundation of our customers trust and confidence, which rises sky-high to be a relationship of a life time.

To specify, we go far and beyond the budget evaluation to satisfy our customers and deliver more than what is agreed upon. Because we just dont market properties but, we build lasting relations.

To achieve these milestones, Keystone Properties believes in its team of highly qualified Marketing experts who, hand-pick properties with best-in-class quality construction, structural engineering, design and supervison – who we proudly say, is our backbone.

The love and dedication that our team of marketing professionals put in their work is a key factor in enabling lasting bonds with satisfied customers.
Mission

Our Mission at Keystone Properties is to work under necessities concern to people through strategic locations, Stylish and creative designs, Vastu compliance and affordable rates with ever uncompromising quality.
Vision

Our Vision is to create a positive distinction that is committed for fulfilling peoples dreams.

column2: Overview Offering premium living spaces sprawling across 18 acres, Salarpuria Sattva Park Cubix Devanahalli, Bangalore is a residential masterpiece by Salarpuria Sattva Group. The project comprises of total 7 towers and 1620 units, which are basically 1, 2 and 3-bedroom flats spread across 658 – 1498 sqft. Salarpuria Sattva Park Cubix flat prices range from Rs. 26.3 Lacs - 79.1 Lacs. Project details Salarpuria Sattva Group is trusted and well-known realty firm who have accomplished various famous commercial and residential projects. Though under-construction, Salarpuria Sattva Park Cubix reviews are highly positive and the project is scheduled for completion by March 2022. All these 1620 residential apartments are a great investment deal promising high resale values. The one-bedroom flats measuring 658 sqft cost Rs. 34. 8 Lacs whereas the 2 BHK flats spread across 1009 sqft are priced at Rs. 55.0 Lacs. The 3 BHK flats spanning across 1282 - 1498 sqft cost within Rs. 68.5 Lacs - 79.1 Lacs. Salarpuria Sattva Park Cubix apartments are backed by some enormous modern amenities to gift the residents with a premium lifestyle.-Clubhouse, kids play area, outdoor tennis court, swimming pool, modern gymnasium and aerobics room are some striking features.-CCTV cameras, intercom facility and round the clock manned security will let you live in a complete stress and worry-free environment. Highpoints Salarpuria Sattva Park Cubix location, two luxurious clubhouses and two swimming pools are the delightful aspects of this project. 14-acres of the total project area is open comprising of verdant greenery, thus creating a refreshing atmosphere. There are several upcoming projects within this locality such as a 1000 crore financial city, a science park and an aerospace, which will further add value this residence. So, hurry up and book a flat today and make a secured investment for your future. To know more about the project, feel free to take a tour of Salarpuria Sattva Park Cubix photos and website.
column3: Salarpuria Sattva is one of the promising builders in the field of Real Estate. All Salarpuria Sattva constructions have the highest standards of quality through the construction process. Green initiatives, advanced engineering ensure the best standards in construction since 1986. The group mainly focuses on delivering high-quality spaces and have been powering the goals of emerging as a leading name.The builder has created unparalleled projects for its customers with all sorts of amenities and services that meet the needs. Backed by the professional team of architects and designers who plan as per the current Real Estate trend, they always seek the betterment of their clients and guide them to the best path in the property related section of matters and affairs. Salarpuria Sattva aims to be a number one Real Estate constructor in India and showcase their talent worldwide.

column2: Devanahalli came to prominence after the establishment of the Kempegowda International airport in 2008. Our integrated community is located in close proximity to the International Airport and brings together the elements of deluxe living. A well-appointed club house, lush herbal park and vast expanses of greenery will create a lifetime of joyful memories for you. We have created an ecosystem that is a blend of traditional as well as contemporary designs thereby catering to the tastes of the modern generation. Our luxury apartments in Devanahalli, Bangalore are designed to lend the right ambience.
column3: Since our inception into Indias urbane terrains, we have upturned the way living spaces are designed. And with that, we have transformed the ethos and aesthetics of real estate in India. Pillared by a unique approach to designing and planning, we invest heavily in research and development ensuring that each of our developments surpass industry benchmarks and redefine value engineering and design. Our name, since the beginning, has been associated with excellence and we are creating sustainable value for our customers, stakeholders, business associates, employees and society at every step of our development. Through environmentally friendly concepts of New Urbanism, our focus has been on transforming suburban sprawls of land into well-planned urban communities that nourish an outstanding sense of living. And our developments stand as living proof. Apart from residences, we have established numerous schools, colleges, institutions and hospitals through affiliates, trusts, clubhouses and community spaces, all of which have earned unmatched international repute. Symbolic to our construction, our developments encompass the ether of the residents lives entirely, by introducing retail outlets, hospitality centers, healthcare and educational institutions etc. within the realms of House of Hiranandani community. Our aim is to integrate every family into a bigger, more inclusive community. We are cognizant of the fact that we have maneuvered successfully through a turbulent time in this industrys history. As we move forward, we will carry our legacy forward proudly and will persevere to take it to new heights through a committed adherence to the values that we stand for. These values that manifest in our passion for perfection and endless innovation and advancements.

column3: Goyal and Co is a part of the larger conglomerate Hariyana Group which is into diversified businesses like Shipping, Industrial Gases, Real Estate and Steel Trading. The Real Estate wing of Hariyana Group operates under the brand name Goyal and Co with Orchid being the first name of many of their projects. Goyal and Co has been creating landmark projects for more than 4 decades making it one of the oldest builders in India. Goyal and Co has footprint in Ahemadabad, Mumbai, Bangalore and slowly spreading to other locations in India. Goyal and co has been delivering quality projects in Bangalore since last few years. Primarily having a strong foot in North Bangalore which is the future of Bangalore. To name a few Orchid Woods Hennur Road, Orchid Footprint - Thanisandra, Orchid Nirvana - IVC Road and Allonaville - Off Hennur Road.

column2: Bhartiya City is a project by Bhartiya City Developers Pvt Ltd. strategically located in Thanisandra Bangalore.  It is build on an area of 126 Acre encompassing 2415 units across 19 towers. The floorings are made of Vitrified Tiles, Ceramic tiles and Anti Skid tiles.  Bhartiya City comprises of 1BHK, 2BHK, 3BHK and 4BHK Flat.  1BHK Flat has range of area from 620 Sq-ft to 1170 Sq-ft having 1 balcony and 1 and 2 bathroom. 2BHK Flat has range of area from 895 Sq-ft to 1800 Sq-ft having 1, 2 and 3 balcony and 2 bathroom. 3BHK Flat has range of area from 1280 Sq-ft to 3135 Sq-ft having 1, 2 and 3 balcony and 2 and 3 bathroom. 4BHK Flat has range of area from 2259 Sq-ft to 4200 Sq-ft having 3 and 4 balcony and 4 bathroom.  Launched in November 2012, Bhartiya City offers Ongoing properties. The project is approved by Bangalore Development Authority. It is approved by various banks like Axis Bank, DHFL, HDFC, ICICI, Indiabulls, LIC Housing Finance, Punjab National Bank and SBI.
column3: Bhartiya City Nikoo Homes Phase II in Thanisandra, Bangalore This is a city. But more than that, its an environment. Children here can just be children-climbing up trees and chasing butterflies on the way to kindergarden. Neighbors here arent strangers. People headed to work don't need to account for jams on the way. And the Nikoo home you live in, compares to the very best on earth. From a studio suite to a penthouse, every house has a standardized Italian kitchen, an outdoor deck that seats at least four and access to all the public spaces like link gardens and a clubhouse. Some immensely talented architects, town planners and engineers are working round the clock to bring this vision to life.Well-connected roads to the city where the location is easily accessible by frequent bus and cab services making it a perfect place to live Hazzle Free, Well connected to International Airport, Just 5 km away from Manyatha Tec Park.

column2: Discover living in apartments that are unlike other luxury apartments in Bangalore. The luxury apartments for sale at Cedar and Deodar Blocks that are a part of the 130-acre Brigade Orchards Smart Township in Devanahalli have been built using state-of-the-art pre-cast technology. This specially imported technology ensures that your home is built faster with better quality, a smoother finish and perfectly aligned walls. All these even as the thoughtful amenities, features and lush greenery of the world-class Brigade Orchards surround your home.
column3: Brigade Group was established in 1986, with property development as its main focus. Today, Brigade Group is one of South India's leading property developers. We are headquartered in Bangalore, with branch offices in several cities in South India, a representative office in Dubai and an accredited agent in the USA. We have a uniquely diverse multi-domain portfolio that covers property development, property management services, hospitality and education. Our projects extend across several major cities in South India: Chennai, Chikmagalur, Hyderabad, Kochi, Mangalore and Mysore.

column2: For those who value natures resplendence and its varied gifts, Merusri Springs is a Green Paradise. With the rare to find luxury of large open spaces, this layout brings to you exclusive residential villa plots encompassing the joy of warm community living in a lush and eco friendly setting.Live streaming cameras have been integrated at the township, so that you can view your property at any time and from any whereT op notch expertise in design and planning has created an inspiring environment for healthy living. The cutting edge amenities and facilities are bound to inspire the young and old alike. The smart eco-friendly features incorporated in the layout, some of them for the first time in Bengaluru, are bound to make life just that much more meaningful. Also, the location of the project at Devanahalli makes it eminently accessible and convenient.
column3: Merusri Real Estate Developers Pvt Ltd, is a premium real estate development company in Bangalore, engaged in developing world class communities. Founded in 2013, Merusris aim is to develop quality construction on the challenging real estate scene of Bangalore. We are proud to announce, that, Merusris landmark project Bharathi Enclave, with an Eco-Friendly living concept, has got a 4 star CRISIL Real Estate rating and has set a benchmark on the Bangalore Real Estate market. At Merusri, we have blended our traditional strength of property development with forward looking diversification into other verticals. With Merusri you can be confident that your requirements are fulfilled through our extensive understanding of the market and our wide ranging expertise in property investment management

column2: The Icon is a project by G Corp located in Thanisandra, Bangalore, offering currently under construction 3 BHK and 4 BHK apartments. It consists of 1140 units spanned over 12 towers on a total project area of 21 acres. The Icon price rate starts from Rs. 1.05 Cr onward.Project Details:The Icon located in Thanisandra, Bangalore, is a project by G Corp offering spacious, skilfully developed and currently under construction 3 BHK and 4 BHK apartments. The Icon plot areas for its 3 BHK flat ranges from 1795 sq. ft. to 2050 sq. ft. and 4 BHK flat areas range from 2695 sq. ft. to 3097 sq. ft.The Icon apartments are designed with RCC frame structure and high quality interiors like vitrified tiles, ceramic tiles flooring in every room, laminated wooden flooring in master bedroom, teak wood frame doors, concealed copper wiring with modular switches, granite kitchen counter top, branded sanitary CP fittings etc.The Icon is a RERA Certified Project. The Icon provides numerous essential amenities for its residents like power backup, swimming pool, lift, security, park, reserved parking, service & goods lift, visitor parking, intercom facility, maintenance staff, gym, indoor games room, kids play area, DTH television facility, flower gardens, library, rain water harvesting, water storage, multipurpose courts, conference room, activity deck, outdoor tennis court, event space, fire fighting equipment etc.Highpoints:The Icon special amenities includes indoor squash & badminton courts, canopy walk, barbeque pit, dance studio, jogging & strolling track and club house. The project has a well thought infrastructure equipped with all modern amenities and facilities. It is just 1.6 km from Kensri School, 2.2 km from ICICI ATM and 3.1 km from Sri Sai Nursing Home.

column2: Sobha City is a project by Sobha Ltd strategically located in Thanisandra Bangalore.  It is build on an area of 36 Acre encompassing 508 units across 3 towers. The floorings are made of Superior Quality Vitrified Tiles, Laminated Wood Flooring and Superior Quality Ceramic Tile Flooring.  Sobha City comprises of 2BHK, 3BHK and 4BHK Flat and Villa.  2BHK Flat has range of area from 1340 Sq-ft to 1703 Sq-ft having 3 balcony and 2 and 3 bathroom. 4BHK Villa has range of area from 3735 Sq-ft to 4146 Sq-ft having 1 and 4 balcony and 4 bathroom. 3BHK Flat has range of area from 1478 Sq-ft to 2833 Sq-ft having 2, 3 and 4 balcony and 2, 3 and 4 bathroom. 4BHK Flat has range of area from 3216 Sq-ft to 3764 Sq-ft having 2 and 3 balcony and 3 and 4 bathroom.  Launched in December 2012, Sobha City offers Ongoing properties. The project is approved by Bangalore Development Authority and Bruhat Bengaluru Mahanagara Palike. It is approved by various banks like Allahabad Bank, Axis Bank, Corporation Bank, Deutsche Bank, DHFL, HDFC, HSBC, ICICI, Indiabulls, LIC Housing Finance, Punjab National Bank, SBI and Vijaya Bank.
column3: With three decades of experience in creating resplendent interiors of palaces and masterpieces in the Middle-East, Mr. P.N.C. Menon founded Sobha Limited (formerly Sobha Developers Ltd) in 1995 with a clear vision to transform the way people perceive quality. Today, Sobha, a Rs. 25 billion company, is one of the largest and only backward integrated real estate players in the country.Headquartered in Bangalore, Sobha is primarily focused on residential and contractual projects. The Companys residential projects include presidential apartments, villas, row houses, luxury and super luxury apartments, plotted development and aspirational homes replete with world-class amenities. In all its residential projects, the company lays a strong emphasis on environmental management, water harvesting and high safety standards. .The backward integration model is one of the key competitive strengths of Sobha. This literally means that the Company has all the competencies and in-house resources to deliver a project from conceptualisation to completion. Backward integration includes an interiors division, a metal works and glazing factory, and a concrete products factory. Sobha has also diversified into retail business with spring mattresses under the brand name Sobha Restoplus. More than 27 variants of mattresses are produced by the mattress division using cutting-edge machinery of international quality.

column2: OverviewSurrounded by lavish and green landscapes, the Commanders Galaxy in Thanisandra, Bangalore is a blend of modern and peaceful living. The serene view around rejuvenates your senses and keeps you away from mind away from the daily life stress. These spacious and well- ventilated residential flats are luxurious and elegant and are designed to offer you a comfortable life. Equipped with 1 tower and 43 residential flats, the Commanders Galaxy is a ready to move society that is constructed with a smart floor plan. Designed to offer affordable housing in Thanisandra, Bangalore the Commanders Galaxy offers 2BHK and 3BHK residential apartments at prices starting from Rs. 49.0 lac.Project detailThe vaastu compliant residential flats in Commanders Galaxy are built with no common walls to offer ample of space, openness and privacy so that you can spend some quality time with your family. You can visit Magicbricks and can explore Commanders Galaxy price, Commanders Galaxy floor plan, Commanders Galaxy photos, flats, apartments in Commanders Galaxy and a lot more. The lavish society is constructed by the Jupiter Infrastructure (Bangalore) Private Limited that an infrastructure development company that is equipped with high- qualified professionals who work together to offer you the best residential spaces.The residential flats in Commanders Galaxy feature RCC framed structure with concrete block masonry walls, vitrified tiles in living room and bedrooms, anti- skid, rustic tiles with skirting in toilets, dadoing upto 7ft height in toilet, kitchen with polished granite platform and stainless steel sink, water purifier and premium quality tile dadoing upto 2 ft height above platform, main door with teak wood frame, other doors with salwood frames and shutter, UPVC windows, weather shield paint on external walls, OBD on internal walls, melamine polish on main door etc.Strategically located, the Commanders Galaxy offers easy connectivity to public transport, MG road, schools, colleges, hospitals, IT Hubs, malls and all the other prime areas. The Commanders Galaxy is equipped with many modern amenities like swimming pool, banquet hall, health club, gym, children’s play area, garden, space for walkers, 24 hours security, intercom facility, DG backup for lighting and common areas etc.

 THE RISE OF SAFCO PROPERTIES
We started independent premium budgetary housing projects based in Urban and Central Bangalore, under the name of Safco Properties. Since then, we have delivered 4 multi-storey premium budgetary housing projects and 2 commercial projects, across Bangalore.
 SAFCO PROPERTIES TODAY
Today, we have two ongoing housing projects that are in full swing - Safco Bluesky at Hennur Road and Safco Heights at Horamavu Junction. Plans have also been put in place for 2 upcoming projects in North Bangalore.Also to be venturing out into new verticals constantly.

column2: Overview: NR WINDGATES is a residential venture by NR Green Wood Developers located in the happening area of Thanisandra, Bangalore offering aesthetically crafted spacious 1 BHK, 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. The project is ongoing construction at the moment and will consist of 279 units spread over 4 towers. NR WINDGATES apartment price rate starts at Rs. 46.5 Lac onward.  Project Details:NR WINDGATES Bangalore, a well planned project in the locality of Thanisandra by NR Green Wood Developers is offering aesthetically crafted spacious 1 BHK, 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. NR WINDGATES floor plan for its 1 BHK flat ranges from 497 sq. ft. to 660 sq. ft.; 2 BHK flat areas range from 981 sq. ft. to 1245 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range from 1389 sq. ft. to 1556 sq. ft.NR WINDGATES apartments are being designed with interior features like good quality vitrified tiles flooring in all rooms, designer doors, concealed wiring with modular switches and adequate electrical points, powder coated aluminium windows with glass, granite kitchen platform with stainless steel sink, good quality CP fittings and branded sanitary ware fixtures in bathroom etc.  As the NR WINDGATES photos show, the project is equipped with amenities like club house, jogging & strolling track, cycling track, power back up, swimming pool, lift, 24 hour security facilities, park, reserved parking, service & goods lift, visitor parking, maintenance staff, gymnasium, indoor games room, kids play area, multipurpose courts, rain water harvesting, water storage, meditation area, waste disposal, and fire fighting equipment etc. to name a few. Highpoints: NR WINDGATES aims for the best way of living for all of its residents. NR WINDGATES Bangalore locality is also a key feature and includes various basic civic utilities for the resident’s to fulfil their needs.

column2: Overview Spread across 7-acres, Provident Harmony Thanisandra, Bangalore developed by Provident Housing comprises of total 548 units spread across 15 towers. The project offers 1 and 3 BHK flats measuring between 662, 1262 sqft. The flat prices of Provident Harmony range within Rs. 57.0 Lacs  75.0 Lacs. To get a clear glimpse of these flats, feel free to browse through the attractive floor plans and photos of Provident Harmony. About the project Offering easy access to Manyata Tech Park, Provident Harmony is undoubtedly the right address for your dream. The project offers well-designed apartments that are completely ready for possession. Provident Harmony flat rents are also quite competitive and the reviews are extremely positive, which make this project worthy of your investment. Blessed with good ventilation and ample natural light, the aura of these apartments is simply amazing assuring a healthy living. This well-planned residential project is inclusive of total 54 one-bedroom flats measuring 662 sqft, 36 three-bedroom units spread across 1262 sqft and the remaining 458 apartments measure 1241 sqft and are of 3 BHK configurations. Some of the exclusive amenities provided by the society include a clubhouse, swimming pool, kids play area, multipurpose courts and a well-equipped gym. Waste disposal, reserved parking, rain water harvesting, power backup and round the clock security are some of the other commendable features. Highpoints Well-placed in Chokkanahalli, just off Thanisandra main road, this residence enjoys good proximity to several workplaces of Bangalore, which is prime USP of this project. Supreme connectivity to all means of public transport facilities is yet another plus point. VIBGYOR High School, B G National Public School, Nisarga International Pre-School, Regal Hospital and the world-famous Fortis Hospital are all located within close neighbourhood. Confident reviews and spacious floor plans make Provident Harmony Thanisandra, Bangalore a great investment opportunity. So, hurry up and book a flat now
column3: Provident Housing Limited are the pioneers in making affordable housing out of passion, and caters to the premium affordable housing segment targeting first time home buyers. They have over 38 years of experience in the housing sector; they are present across the country through projects in Bangalore, Hyderabad, Mysore, Chennai, Kochi, Coimbatore, Kolkata and Colombo. The Group also has presence in Dubai, UAE and business representatives in the United Kingdom and the United States. The Group has above 20 million sq. ft. of residential and commercial space currently under construction. They are capable in delivering top quality homes on time, with well designed spacious homes and world class amenities; they would make you a proud owner of your premium home.

Humble beging of safco properties in real estate market in partnership with Central Park Developers with a considerable development portfolio in and around Nelamangala. Later we moved into the space of premium budgetary housing in whole of Bangalore.
 THE RISE OF SAFCO PROPERTIES
We started independent premium budgetary housing projects based in Urban and Central Bangalore, under the name of Safco Properties. Since then, we have delivered 4 multi-storey premium budgetary housing projects and 2 commercial projects, across Bangalore.
 SAFCO PROPERTIES TODAY
Today, we have two ongoing housing projects that are in full swing - Safco Bluesky at Hennur Road and Safco Heights at Horamavu Junction. Plans have also been put in place for 2 upcoming projects in North Bangalore.Also to be venturing out into new verticals constantly.

column2: Overview: Vensai Icon temple tree is a residential project by ICON Homz primly located in Chandapura, Bangalore offering meticulously designed and spacious residential plots. The project will consist of 135 strategically planned units and is currently ongoing construction. Vensai Icon temple tree price rate for these plots start at Rs. 19.2 Lac onward.Project Details:    Vensai Icon temple tree is strategically located in Chandapura, Bangalore by the quite experienced ICON Homz and is offering spacious and skilfully crafted residential plots. Vensai Icon temple tree Bangalore plots are customisable for the occupants as they can build their own home abode in these spaces. The project is being built on a strong frame structure and has spacious plots up for sale. The plots are equipped with many amenities and facilities for the resident’s needs and is available in several dimensions for fulfilling the potential buyer’s demands. Vensai Icon temple tree plot areas for its residential spaces range from 1200 sq. ft. to 2400 sq. ft. It is offering nicely crafted plot with all basic amenities in reasonable and affordable prices. Vensai Icon temple tree features modern day amenities and facilities for the occupants such as power supply, water supply, security facilities, paved internal roads with street lights, children’s play area, car parking space, landscape garden, and special ones like a club house, outdoor tennis court, swimming pool, banquet hall, gymnasium, multipurpose courts, etc. among several others.Highpoints:Vensai Icon temple tree has residential plots meeting several demands and expectations of potential buyers or investors. The project is surrounded with greenery and peaceful environment, away from the hustle of the city. Vensai Icon temple tree Bangalore locality has utilities like Green dot international school, Vemana Hospital, HDFC Bank ATM, GR Farm Fresh, Bharat Petroleum etc. and many more.

With proven track record, we have successfully completed iconic residential projects - villas, apartments and villa plots - in Bangalore. Our focus remains in offering value for our customers and optimizing the functionality of usable space in our projects.

column2: Overview: Unishire The Weave Bangalore is a well known construction in Bangalore with beautifully elevated living spaces and good ambiance. Unishire The Weave Bangalore floor plan is that it has 2 and 3 bhk apartments. Unishire The Weave is Vaastu compliant and designed in a unique way. Project Details: Unishire The Weave flats have Vitrified Tiles in all the rooms and Anti Skid Tiles in toilet and balcony and the doors have Sal Wood/Hard Wood Frame with Waterproof Flush Shutters, and the main door has Teak Wood Frame, Flush Shutter with Veneer on both Sides, internal doors have Sal Wood, Hard Wood Frame, Flush Shutter with Laminate, and the electric provisions are made with Anchor Roma, Finolex or Equivalent Switches and Wires and in kitchen Granite Counter Top with Stainless Steel Sink, in windows they have Powder Coated Aluminium, UPVC Windows, in toilets they have given Jaguar, Equivalent C. P. Fittings, Elegant Sanitary Ware Fittings. Unishire The Weave Bangalore amenities include Club House, cafeteria, Food Court, Jogging and Strolling Track, Power Back Up, Swimming Pool Lift, Security, Park Reserved Parking, Visitor Parking, Intercom Facility, Gymnasium, Kids Club, Kids Play Area, Rain Water Harvesting, Water Storage, Air Conditioned, Vaastu Compliant, Waste Disposal, Outdoor Tennis Courts. Unishire The Weave Bangalore photos in magicbricks, represents how airy the apartment is.Highpoints: Unishire The Weave Bangalore location is close to many amenities like Thanisandra bus stop, Kensri School, Jack of all Threads shopping mall is there, hospital, ATM, Reliance digital grocery store, Adayar Anand Bhavan Restaurant, movies, park, petrol pump, etc., Unishire The Weave Bangalore locality is in a strategic location and is accessible to all the important things one would need. Contact us for more information on Unishire The Weave Bangalore project today.
column3: Right from our inception in 1987, under the guidance of Mr Kirti Mehta, we have always believed in redefining real estate and creating benchmarks for others to follow. From the word go we have made our customers the centre of our universe and our raison detre. Whatever we do is driven by the needs, dreams and aspirations of our customers.UNISHIRE as the name states stands for Unique Communities UNI-Unique SHIRE-Community.This is the reason why we think beyond four walls and beyond brick and mortar. We understand that when someone buys a house, he or she also lays a foundation for being part of a community. At Unishire, we think of the individuals as well as everything that surrounds their daily lives. This has helped us create and offer international living standards to the global Indians who aspire to provide the best to their loved ones.

column2: OverviewDhiraan New York Meadows is well-located in Chandapura, Bangalore. Dhiraan Infrastructure is doing this under construction residential project. Dhiraan Infrastructure is a famous developer in Bangalore with 19 years of experience and they have successfully completed 4 projects till now. Dhiraan New York Meadows layout plan has 236 units across 2 towers. Project DetailsDhiraan New York Meadows has a wonderful layout design. Dhiraan New York Meadows floor plan has 2 BHK flats (965 sqft), 1 BHK builder floor (640 sqft) and 2 BHK builder floor (885 sqft, 900 sqft, 960 sqft, 995 sqft, 1000 sqft, 1015 sqft, 1040 sqft). Flats exterior walls will have weatherproof paint while the interior walls will have oil bound distemper paint. The kitchen, living or dining area and all bedrooms floorings will have vitrified tiles. The toilet and balcony floorings will have anti-skid tiles. The average price in the locality is Rs. 3116 per sqft. Dhiraan New York Meadows photos can be checked online at magicbricks. You can also visit Dhiraan New York Meadows location for more details.Dhiraan New York Meadows will have a club house for the interaction of members of the society.24 hours power back up, artificial pool for swimming, high-speed lift, safety and security, reserved parking, intercom facility, fitness centre, indoor games room, play area for kids and multipurpose courts are all the high-end amenities that will be provided by Dhiraan New York Meadows apartment.The apartment compound will have a banquet hall for conducting parties.HighlightsDhiraan New York Meadows Banglore is at the prime location as it has great connectivity within 1-5 km to educational institutions, atm(s), healthcare centres, fitness centres, bus stand, petrol pumps, chemist shop, grocery stores, shopping complexes, temple, parks and food joints. St. Philomena's School, Lorven Public School Chandapura, Euro Kids Surya Nagar, D American International School, Spurthy Global School and Green Dot Montessori School are some of the educational institutions located near to Dhiraan New York Meadows.

column2: Monarch Serenity is an expansive luxury enclave of magnificent apartments in Bangalore, elevating the contemporary lifestyle. Monarch Serenity in Thanisandra, Bangalore comes with premium 2, 3 and 4 BHK apartments for buyers that are priced Rs. 1.05 Cr onwards on an average. Project details This RERA certified project consist of totally 196 units while average home sizes range between 1226 and 2600 sq ft. Monarch Serenity spreads over an area of 2.50 acres with 14 graceful towers. The smart residences are embellished with charismatic features and will felicitate its dwellers with an extravagant, enriching and luxurious lifestyle. Monarch Serenity is magnificently designed to appeal to the rich taste of contemporary home buyers. Its thoughtfully designed floor plans, layout and pristine surrounding, ensure that you are surrounded by nothing but the best. The amenities in Monarch Serenity comprises of landscaped garden, indoor games, swimming pool, gymnasium, play area, intercom, rain water harvesting, lift, waste disposal, club house, health facilities, tennis court, badminton court, car parking, basement car parking, maintenance staff, jogging track, basket ball court, squash court and several others. Highpoints Monarch Serenity stands unique not only because of its quality, architecture and international standards but also because of its prime location to make it very easily reachable. Companies like Kirloskar, Honeywell and famous institutions like BIT, NITTE while hospitals and shopping complex are in close proximity. BMTC buses offer services in the area hence travelling is not at all a major issue. Location of this project offers decent life style and has easy access to malls, schools, hospitals, restaurants and other day to day needs. Utmost care has been taken by the developers to ensure convenience and connectivity. Book an apartment now as Monarch Serenity brings together contemporary and classic, blending them to create signature residences and lifestyle.

column2: OverviewAspire is located in Vijaya Bank Layout, Bangalore. This residential area has been designed and constructed by Meda Group. Meda Group has successfully completed 4 real estate projects. Aspire floor plan has 72 flats in a building. Flats are ready to move in.Project DetailsAspire Bangalore is one of the aspiring places to live in the high-tech city. Aspire has 2 BHK and 3 BHK flats. The kitchen, living or dining and bedrooms area floorings have vitrified tiles. The balcony and toilet floorings have anti-skid tiles. The exterior and interior walls are painted with the high-quality paint. The kitchen has ceramic tiles dado up to 2 ft height above the working platform. Toilets also have ceramic tiles dado up to 7 ft height above platform. Flats have decorative main doors and decorative laminated internal doors. The kitchen has a premium-quality stainless steel sink. UPVC windows are used in the flats. Toilets have branded CP fixtures. Aspire provides world-class amenities including 24 hours power back up, swimming pool, lift, security, planted space, reserved parking, visitor parking, intercom facility, maintenance staff, banquet hall for parties, gymnasium, indoor games room, kids club, kids play area, flower gardens, rainwater harvesting, retail shop, water storage, courts for multipurpose, meditation area, waste disposal, amphitheatre and firefighting equipments.Aspire apartment has a club house for bringing members of the society together.Jogging, strolling and cycling tracks give the apartment a beautiful look.HighlightsAspire is the best location as has great connectivity to petrol pumps, bus stand, schools, shopping mall, hospital, atms, temple, grocery stores, pharmacy, food joints, movie halls, planted space and fitness centres. Indian Institute of Management Bangalore, Bannerghatta main road, Bangalore is located at the distance of 1.5 km from Aspire apartment. Aspire photos can be checked online at magicbricks official website and you can also visit the location on your own.
column3: A proprietary Concern owned by Sri.H.Suresh. He is a Civil Engineer by profession is in the field of real estate for the past 16 years. A well seasoned, ever working land assembler and a skilled mediator in settling disputes, having all the required connections for the field of real estate. He is specialized in land procurement both inside and outside the Bangalore Urban Limits, through direct negotiations with the land lords, farmers. Initially he has started as a Layout Developer. As on date he had procured over 2500 acres of land both for individuals and for Institutes

column2: Krishvi Projects Private Limited brings to you Krishvi Gavakshi, a distinguished project located in Kadubeesanahalli, Bangalore. Krishvi Gavakshi features 2BHK and 3BHK apartments which are ready to move. These residential apartments are available in the affordable price starting from Rs. 95.0 Lakhs.Project detailsOffering row houses Krishvi Gavakshi is a recently launched project in Kadubeesanahalli, Bangalore East. The floor plan of this project includes 2 BHK apartments spread across 1257 sqft and also 3 BHK apartments covering an area that ranges between 1911 to 2399 sqft.Krishvi Gavakshi brings in some of the basic as well as premium specifications such as 24x7 water supply and power backup, firefighting systems, car parking, gym, club house, children's play area, landscape garden, paved compound, rainwater harvesting units, sewage treatment plants, multipurpose court and swimming pool, among others. One of the best advantages of this project is that it is legally approved by BBMP, BESCOM, BWSSB and is even registered under RERA Act.HighpointsThe location of this unsurpassed project that is Bellandur is located in the South East of Bangalore city and is well-known all over the country for the presence of several high-end residential apartments. It is also famous for being home to the Lake, the largest lake in Bangalore. The passing through Bellandur connects with KR Puram. Further, the ITPL main road branching out from ORR connects this area with Whitefield. Leading technology parks are located within close proximity to Bellandur such as the Technology Park. A number of reputed hospitals, schools, markets and other facilities are also in close proximity. These all conveniences are exactly what make Krishvi Gavakshi so special.Krishvi Gavakshi is exclusively designed to make you feel the magnificence of your lifestyle. By booking now, don't be surprised to feel totally royal and important once you enter Krishvi Gavakshi.
column3: Krishvi, largely recognized as single handedly changing the landscape of Bangalore's residential architecture, is the builder of choice by the working individuals and their families in Bangalore who need the true relaxation and comfort of a home after a hectic day. Along with the state of the art infrastructural facilities, Krishvi emphasizes on in-built and natural ventilation. With a focus on natural ventilation, Krishvi projects itself as a "green builder" by aiming to preserve and conserve nature to its optimum best and provides a stress free and relaxed home for its customers.Over the last 13 years, Krishvi has firmly established itself as one of the leading developers of housing projects meeting the requirements of masses in the Silicon Valley of India - Bangalore. The company also has received the prestigious accreditation from CREDAI formerly known as KOAPA.Krishvi Projects (P) Ltd., with a professional and dedicated team of experienced, technical and financial experts, has successfully completed several projects till date to the complete satisfaction of the customers and aims to continue to strive for excellence.

column2: Overview:Dhanush Royals is a ready to move residential project by Dhanush Builders located in Begur, Bangalore offering spacious and meticulously 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. It consists of 40 units spanned over 1 tower. Dhanush Royals price rate starts from Rs. 37.8 Lac onward. The project has a well planned infrastructure with various features for the comfort of the residents.Project Details:Dhanush Royals is offering lavish and spaciously designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. It is thoughtfully located in Begur, Bangalore. Dhanush Royals plot areas for its 2 BHK flat range from 1160 sq. ft. to 1260 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range from 1410 sq. ft. to 1615 sq. ft. The apartments are designed with high quality interiors as well as exteriors.Dhanush Royals apartments are being designed with RCC frame structure, vitrified tiles flooring, attractive wooden laminated doors, electrical wiring with modular switches, modular kitchen with granite platform and SS sink, and designer bathroom with branded fittings & fixtures etc.Dhanush Royals will provide amenities like jogging track, security, lift, park, reserved parking, swimming pool, visitor parking, intercom facility, dance studio, club house, rain water harvesting, multipurpose courts, vaastu compliant, waste disposal, fire fighting equipment etc. and various others.Highpoints:Dhanush Royals is developed by Dhanush Builders with their 13 years of real estate experience. They aim to create elegant living spaces in affordable prices for any potential buyers. Dhanush Royals locality is well connected and has various utilities in close vicinity of the project like Hongasandra Bus Stop, Sri Chaitanya School, Aratt Lake View, Live 100 Hospital, HDFC Bank ATM, Suvidha Store, Apollo Pharmacy HR, Galaxy Paradise, Keys Select Hotels, Stone Park, Aesthetic Fitness Factory, Bharat Petroleum Petrol Bunk etc. among various other for the resident’s needs

column2: Subha 9 SKY VUE is a premium residential building situated at Chandapura-Anekal Road, which is about 2.5 Kms from Alliance University. The architecture of this project creatively blends contemporary style with the combination of luxurious lifestyle amenities. It is an ideal dwelling for newlyweds and bachelor's as it is well-connected to the city of Bangalore. The site is located only four kms away from Electronic City making it easy for IT professionals to commute. The property offers best in space, comfort and quality in living for people who want more than just a home.The property offers a choice of 1, 2 & 3 spacious bedrooms that are well ventilated and have ample natural light sources to brighten up all the rooms. The property is open from 3 sides allowing residents to take advantage of maximum sunlight, better ventilation, beautiful views and open spaces. The property is spread over 9 floors with stilt parking, with a total of 180 Units currently available. All the Flats are Vaastu Compliant and facilitate Natural Lighting.

column2: Overview:Aries Lakeview Bangalore in Bangalores Jakkur district is a happening ready to move project. The builder Citrus Ventures has designed these flats on a plot containing 182 units spread over 12 towers and offers buyers the option of buying 2 BHK Flats in the range of 1195 sq. ft. to 1381 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flats in the range of 1399 sq. ft. to 1436 sq. ft smart apartments. Project Details:Aries Lakeview Bangalore is a residential project selling out like hotcakes because of its awesome location and attractive price which ranges from Rs.60.0 Lac – 1.20 Cr.Aries Lakeview amenities include Club House, Jogging and Strolling Track, Cycling and Jogging Track, Dance Studio, Power Back Up, Swimming Pool, Lift facility, Security system, Park, Reserved Parking, Service/Goods Lift, Intercom Facility, Bank and ATM, Fully equipped Gymnasium, Kids Club, Kids Play Area, Flower Gardens, Laundry Service, Vaastu Compliant, Fire Fighting Equipment, and standard sanitary fittings. Aries Lakeview Bangalore star features like 24 hours water availability, security, maintenance and attractive photos of Aries Lakeview photos on magicbricks website are the reason why many people are buying flats here.Aries Lakeview locality is clean and pollution free and a great place for one to start a happy life with ones family in the heart of Bangalore. Highpoints: Aries Lakeview location really works for It as it is near the Shivanahalli Bus Stop 7.1km, Trio World School 5.9km, Columbia Asia Hospital Hebbal 5.2km, VIBGYOR High School, Sb store shopping mall, Sakthi Rehabilitation Hospital, Corporation Bank ATM, Roman Catholic Church, Big Market Grocery Stores, Apollo Pharmacy, Huliyappas Donne Biryani Restaurant, Prakash theatre movie hall, Body Tone fitness gym, Village Story Park, JayaPrakash Narayana Park, Jakkur Aerodrome, Hindustan Petroleum all are located in the close vicinity to this location.

column2: The project is having a great edge over the dwellers, since it is having the best amenities along with the advantageous location of the project. The nearness to the schools and colleges and the hospitals are to facilitate the dwellers greatly from the entire project. The Uttarahalli residence at Bangalore is also near to the railway station and airport of Bangalore and from the railway station also. The best thing in the apartments is that the green belt surrounded apartments are having the best facility of the location as it is near to the heart of the city, yet it enjoys a remote and pollution free location.The luxurious gymnasium and the stunning accessories in it is the first sign of luxury, that one will find, once he gets in. The great architecture is having a full specification with designed playgrounds and outdoor games' court. There are lots of indoor games even within the county hall, where the clubhouse is also there for recreational issues. The dwellers won't have to get to some other places for arranging a ceremony, as the wide open, green covered community hall is placed just beside the luxurious swimming pool. The extraordinary furnishes from inside and outside even is provided with strong security also. The security posting at the main two gates and the CCTV vigilance at the corridors makes the arrangement a complete secured one for the dwellers.
column3: DS-MAX Properties Pvt. Ltd is an award-wining real estate development firm, based in Bangalore. Since its inception, DS-MAX Properties has been one of the most preferred and trusted realty developer in Bangalore. Our relentless effort towards innovation, quality management, attention to minute details, our customer-centric approach and an uncompromising attitude towards quality in all spheres of our developmental process have managed to receive overwhelming responses from our esteemed customers time and again. Our properties come with most sought-after locations, competitive pricing and excellent services, thus making us a prestigious brand in the real estate industry. column3: Total Environment is an architect-led real estate design and development firm, with projects that range from residential apartments to corporate campuses.Our vision is to provide an unsurpassed living experience through the creation of sensitively designed spaces.We build completely furnished and individually customized spaces with a focus on good design and sensitive detailing.Our design philosophy is about creating physical environments that are in harmony with their surroundings. Our distinctiveness lies in strong attention to detail, and contemporary design that makes living a joyous experience.We have successfully addressed the real-estate requirements of the new, global citizen.Our strength is the ability to understand and meet their needs through innovative concepts, transparency and personalized service.We combine our expertise with cutting edge technology and an out of the box Approach to make living More comfortable, productive and joyous.Our customers have found in us a partner who in a complete departure from the traditionally negative industry perception, seeks to make the whole experience as warm and personal as the homes we deliver.

We build completely furnished and individually customized spaces with a focus on good design and sensitive detailing.

Our design philosophy is about creating physical environments that are in harmony with their surroundings. Our distinctiveness lies in strong attention to detail, and contemporary design that makes living a joyous experience.

We have successfully addressed the real-estate requirements of the new, global citizen.

Our strength is the ability to understand and meet their needs through innovative concepts, transparency and personalized service.

We combine our expertise with cutting edge technology and an out of the box Approach to make living More comfortable, productive and joyous.

Our customers have found in us a partner who in a complete departure from the traditionally negative industry perception, seeks to make the whole experience as warm and personal as the homes we deliver.

column2: OverviewSkyway is a wonderful residential project introduced by Ewest Ventures to meet the desires of every home buyer. This under construction project is located in Jakkur, Bangalore and it encompasses a single well-planned tower. The spacious 2 BHK and 3 BHK flats in Skyway are reasonably prices across different budgets.Project detailsIn this project, the well-planned building is supported by RCC framed structure and each 2 BHK as well as 3 BHK apartment feature spacious bedrooms, living rooms, bathrooms, balconies and kitchen because Skyway floor plans are thoughtfully designed. The area covered by luxurious 2 BHK and 3 BHK flats is 1200 sqft and 1450 sqft respectively.Further, modular switches are used in all the rooms and points are available in bedroom for the installation of AC. A TV point is also available in the living room and master bedrooms of all the apartments. The spacious bathrooms are equipped with quality fittings and a geyser point is also available.For ventilation purpose, wide sliding windows are available along with mosquito mesh and grills. Well equipped with all the high class specifications, this project is a perfect example of comfort and luxury.Necessary amenities such as power backup, swimming pool, park, gym, rainwater harvesting system, water storage facility, round the clock proper security and a lot more are offered here.HighpointsSkyway address is well-connected to places like Srirampura Village, Telecom Layout, Jakkur Road, Yelahanka, Hobli etc. Other places like Kensri School, ICICI Bank, Prithvi Theatre, Bharat Petroleum and so on are in close proximity to the location of this project. Skyway photos, brochure and reviews will assist you in understanding this project in detail.  What are you waiting for? Book a flat of your choice now to live conveniently in your dream home.

column2: Lakshh Exotica is a luxurious residential project by the Lakshh Infrastructures that is a known name in the world of real estate and aims to offer the best quality houses. The ready to move project is spread across the total area of 0.57 acres and features 30 percent open area. The society offers 1 tower, 5 floors and huge 2BHK and 3BHK apartments that are 16 in total. The Lakshh Exotica is made with high quality materials and that too only using superior construction standards to ensure durability and comfort. Strategically located at the Nagara Bhavi - Mallathahalli road, West Bangalore, the Lakshh Exotica offers easy connectivity to areas like D Group, railway station, Annapoorneshwari, NGF, Upakar, Visweshwaraiah, Mallathalli RTO office, Parvathamma Ramaiah Convention hall, Bangalore University, schools, colleges, hospitals and all the other important areas of Bangalore.Why buy?The Lakshh Exotica offers various amenities to complement your modern lifestyle. These amenities include 24 hours power backup and water facility along with 2 bore wells and Cauvery water, CCTV cameras, security, gas line connections, reserved car parking, rainwater harvesting etc. The high quality society is made using Seismic Zone.compliant structure and solid concrete block masonry, 6 inch external and 4 inch internal.

column2: When a change happens it kindles an awakening and this is Renaissance. The Renaissance holdings assures brilliance in the form of homes for its residents. One more feather in their cap is in the form of Exotica at Jakkur which is demographically closer to new airport at Devanahalli. This building is constructed as two towers facing each other connected by a foyer space from the first floor on wards. With 2 and 3 BHK apartments in their list Exotica offers a neat and comfortable living with wide open spaces and panoramic view of the manicured landscapes around. Located off the Devanahalli road this place is close to Bagmane and Manyatha tech parks and also the residential town Banaswadi. With many malls and retails around this place is well connected to the Bengaluru city through flyovers. The luxury features that enthrall the residents at Exotica are the long walking stretch and benches for elders to relax. Elevators facility, 24 hours security with power back up and water supply is also present. Kids play area constructed with structures is an additional feature of Renaissance Exotica

column2: Overview Offering spacious 2 & 3 BHK apartments for both resale & rent - Pride Springfields is one of the finest creation of Pride Group located in Uttarahalli, Bangalore. Planned across 5 acres of beautiful land parcel, this project consists of 5 elegant towers containing 456 residential units. The apartments range from 929 - 1278 sqft of carpet area and the price list of Pride Springfields start from Rs. 46.12 Lacs. Project details Located just off Kanakapura Road, Pride Springfields is a prime residential pin code that has been welcomed with positive reviews. Offering 360 degree views of the luxuriant greenery, these 2 & 3 BHK abodes invite you live a breathtaking lifestyle. Well-built with spacious floor plans, the 2BHK flats measuring 929 sqft are priced from Rs. 46.12 Lacs onwards while the 3BHK apartments are valued from Rs. 62.70 Lacs onwards. Well-ventilated, the residential apartments of Pride Springfields are blessed with enough fresh air & natural light promising a contented life. Children's play area, swimming pool, gym and jogging track are some of the noteworthy attributes of this RERA certified project. These earthquake resistant structures have been studded with all the prime facilities like 24x7 manned security, round the clock power supply and substantial water supply. Highpoints The makers of Pride Springfields Uttarahalli, Bangalore have wisely chosen an upcoming locality which holds great future benefits in terms of price appreciation and rental values. Easy connectivity to all the forms of public transport facilities has been the major driving force of this area. Top-rated schools & hospitals such as Deccan International School, National Public School, Ring Road Hospital and Metro Hospital are located within just 5km radius. If you been aspiring to live in the beautiful locality of Uttarahalli, Bangalore – then Pride Springfields is an ultimate choice. So, hurry up and book a flat now.

This project has all the state of the art, and luxurious amenities installed in it for the people. Skyline Construction is one of the top most and leading builder and developer in the field of real estate of Bangalore. They are well known for their luxurious and super luxurious facilities and projects for the people. They have undertaken many projects and completed them in a given period. They have their design and own method of building projects. One of the ongoing projects of Skyline Construction is the Skyline Beverly Park. This project has all the luxurious and lavish amenities installed in it for the people such as a Well spacious garden with sitting arrangement is also available in this project. Rainwater Harvesting with big elevated tanks is also available in this project. All in one Community hall for meeting parties and other function of the people and many more things available for the people.Project features: All the rooms are Vaastu Compliant as per the builder. The project offers 2 and 3 BHK apartments for the people. The area of the flats starts from 1030sq ft to 1865 sq ft to the people. The structure is made up of RCC Frame Structure for safety. The floors are covered with white, vitrified tiles in all the flats.Highlights:  It is only 1.2 km away from the Sea Sharada Vidyalaya. It is only 1.9 km away from Poddar Jumbo Kids. It is only 2.5 km away from B G National Public High School.It is only 2.8 km away from Trio World School.
column3: Leaders in all areas of our operations from providing High Quality Value Added Buildings and Services to our customers to fulfilling the aspirations of our employees.Humble beginnings marked with a resolve and dedication leads to incredible results. 125 years back Skyline started off as a family owned enterprise with holdings in coffee plantations, later branching out to property development. In just over two decades since its inception Skyline Constructions has become one of the most trusted builders in Karnataka and recognized by CREDAI - KARNATAKA.Skyline recognized the impending opportunities in the property development industry. With a well dedicated team of architects and engineers under the able leadership of its Managing Director, Avinash Prabhu Skyline started its success story by building world-class quality spaces as well as making concrete relationships that form the framework of its construction process. Skyline earned its clients' confidence with over 60 successfully completed projects, adding up to over four million square feet in industrial, commercial and residential space. The company's dedication to quality and its integrity was soon recognized with the ISO 9001 certification.

column2: OverviewSairam Constructions has launched a splendid project named Abhi Sai Santrupthi located in Nagarbhavi, Bangalore. This project shelters 2 towers with 70 residential apartments.      Project details Abhi Sai Santrupthi floor plan features 2BHK and 3BHK flats that are spanning over 1084 sqft to 1665 sqft. Offered with freehold ownership rights, this project is BBMP approved.  This project has clear tile and completion certificate as well. Everything is elegantly designed right from the living room to the kitchen. Abhi Sai Santrupthi flats are highly advantageous as they are airy and receive plenty of sunlight. Apartment for sale in Nagarbhavi Bangalore  are certainly worth your investment. The entire flooring is vitrified that  fosters a posh look. Also, the exteriors and interiors are quite striking and sums up to the beauty of the entire flat. The kitchen is set up with granite counter top and stainless steel sink that is a necessary requirement of every kitchen. Abhi Sai Santrupthi reviews are  on the positive side and you can have a look through it.Glance through Abhi Sai Santrupthi  photos  and you will realize how decent , elegant every nook and corner of this apartments is. This project is well facilitated with high end amenities such as:-Recreational amenities include jogging and strolling track, cycling & jogging track, kids play area,       gymnasium, indoor squash & badminton courts and early learning centre are provided to uplift your style   of living.-Other essential facilities offered are maintenance staff, fire fighting equipment, intercom facility,       reserved parking, visitor parking and so on. HighpointsSai Ram Constructions, Bangalore are reputed builders in real estate market that are well known for   their excellent quality of construction. Also, good connectivity to various means of public transport is an added advantage. Almost all the social infrastructure are in close vicinity for you to access.      Book now in Abhi Sai Santrupthi and enjoy the best.

column2: Overview Prestige Group launches yet another remarkable project called Prestige Lake Ridge in Uttarahalli, Bangalore. This impressively designed project situated close to Thurahalli Forest offers 12 towers, which is occupied by 1119 residential apartments in the configuration of 1BHK, 2BHK and 3BHK units. The price of these apartments are well within the affordable bracket that ranges between Rs.30.40 lakhs and Rs.80.50 lakhs. About the Project Prestige Lake Ridge in Uttarahalli is a thoughtfully conceptualized project spread across 15.94 acres, which is dotted with 12 towers of 2B+18 floors. The size of the apartments ranges between 661sq.ft. and 1750sq.ft. and rate per sq.ft. is around Rs.4675. Each of the apartments are extremely spacious and contain a separate servant room as well. Prestige Lake Ridge is not only splendidly designed but also offers a plethora of amenities to ensure residents experience a holistic lifestyle. Some of these top-of-the-line amenities include swimming pool, playground, gym, community hall, badminton court, jogging track, clubhouse, landscaped gardens etc. Besides, these amenities there is even a Bank and ATM, cafeteria and temple situated within the premise. Prestige Lake Ridge in Uttarahalli, Bangalore also enjoys a prime location as it is only 2.4km from Outer Ring Road and 2.8km from NICE Peripheral Ring Road. Most of the basic social amenities such as hospitals, malls, banks, schools, restaurants etc. are also easily accessible.   Highpoints Enjoying an abundance of verdant greens, Prestige Lake Ridge gives the residents an amazing opportunity of residing away from the chaos of hectic city life yet being minutes away from all the major neighbourhoods and infrastructural facilities. Great connectivity along with the option of investing in affordable housing without compromising on high-end facilities ensures that it is a must to invest in this project.

Since its formation in 1986, Prestige Estates Projects has grown swiftly to become one of South India's leading Property Developers, helping shape the skyline across the Residential, Commercial, Retail, Leisure & Hospitality sectors.

Prestige Constructions, an ISO 9001:2000 certified company is the only Real Estate Developer in Bangalore to have won the reputed FIABCI Award for its software and residential facilities. Prestige was also recently awarded the Crisil DA1 Developer Rating in recognition of the quality of their projects and the ability to deliver completed projects in a timely manner, making them the ONLY Property Developer across India to have received this distinction.
Today, Prestige stands as a giant and with aggressive growth plans across the Residential, Commercial, Retail and Hospitality Sectors in Bangalore, Goa, Hyderabad, Mangalore, Cochin and Chennai, lies a bright future ahead!

column2: OverviewThe DS Max Saaga is a lavish residential project that not only offers luxury but also provides ultra- comfort to live a modern life. Designed with fine aura, the DS Max Saaga in Uttarahalli, Bangalore is constructed with innovative ideas, modern architecture, smart floor plan and latest interiors to offer a stylish and sophisticated home. Featuring 1 tower and 70 residential apartments, the DS Max Saaga offers 2BHK and 3BHK residential flats. These spacious, stylish, modern and well- ventilate residential apartments are designed to provide affordable housing in Uttarahalli, Bangalore and are available for sale in various sizes.Project detailIf you book a flat in DS Max Saaga, you will be able to enjoy a pleasant atmosphere as you will get proper cross- ventilation and sunlight. The society is constructed by the DS-MAX Properties Pvt. Ltd. that is an award- winning real estate development group in Bangalore and has been offering high- quality residential spaces with all facilities in popular locations at affordable prices. At Magicbricks, you can explore DS Max Saaga floor plan, DS Max Saaga price, DS Max Saaga photos, flat/apartment price in DS Max Saaga along with all the other important information.The residential flats in DS Max Saaga are built with vitrified tiles in living/dining room, master bedroom and other bedroom, anti- skid tiles in balcony and toilet, ceramic tiles in kitchen, main wooden door with laminate on both sides in every room with elegant handles and locks, internal designer doors, electrical wiring with premium quality PVC conduits, kitchen with stainless steel sink, anodized aluminum sliding windows with moulded granite window sill and clear, POP/gypsum plaster finished external and internal walls and designer tiles dado in kitchen and toilets. There are all the facilities and amenities available within the boundaries of the society.Basic facilities like maintenance staff, power backup, lift, security, reserved parking, visitor parking, laundry service etc. are available for your convenience.Jogging and strolling track, kids play area and gym keeps you and your kids healthy and fit.The DS Max Saaga in Bangalore offers easy connectivity to public transport, Kanakpura Road, Gnanabharathi Halt Railway Station, National Public School, Bangalore International Public School, Ekya School, Maharaja Agrasen Hospital, Gopalan Promenade Mall etc.

DS Max is well-known & trusted name in the realty sector, was founded Dr. K. V. Satish and is acknowledged with Infra Realty Achiever Award and Bharat Gaurav National Award. Over the years, DS-MAX has exponentially grown and is intensifying its scope outside Karnataka as well.
