Their persistent determination has led them to excel in all spheres of developmental process with the awesome responses from their valued customers. column2: Legacy Dimora is a residential enterprise by the prominent Legacy Global Projects Pvt. Ltd. that is constructed in Jakkur that is an integral part of the suburbs of Bangalore. This aesthetically designed project is spread out in 3 blocks all having 3 BHK apartments of a standard size i.e. 2700 sq-ft. There are 40 units in all and is loaded with a host of world class amenities like a club house with health facilities, gymnasium, swimming pool, multipurpose hall, kids play zone, intercom, tight security armed with fire fighting equipments, power back up, 24 hours water supply, elevators with ample parking space, beautiful landscaped garden and so on.Legacy Dimora is linked to the city well as it is strategically located with close proximity to facilities like educational institutes like Vibgyor High at a distance of 4.4 km and Manipal Institute at 3.4 km are perfect examples. Even hospitals like GKVK and Ashwini hospitals are at 2.8 km and 2.5 km respectively. The closest bank is Indian bank at 2.6 km. There is no dearth of shopping centres and entertainment zone that include fine dining. The closest eatery is Dominos Pizza at 3.5 km.Detailed planning and constructed in the original style of villas, this project spells opulence amidst nature.

column2: Overview Brigade Northridge by the prestigious Brigade Group in Jakkur, Bangalore is a well conceptualized residential project boasting 600 units occupying 7 elegantly designed towers. 2BHK and 3BHK residential apartments covering carpet area between 80 and 118sq.m is up for sale. About the Project Brigade Northridge situated in Jakkur, Bangalore is splendidly designed to offer all the comforts and facilities one expects from a premium accommodation. Spread across verdant green 7.5acres and overlooking Kogilur Cross Lake, this beautiful project offers every conceivable need and comfort required to experience a blissful life. Priced at Rs.72lakh onwards, 2BHK and 3BHK luxuriously appointed residential apartments are a perfect choice of accommodation for either investment purpose or buying and transforming it into a perfect little dream home. An interesting bunch of facilities further add to the charming appeal of Brigade Northridge in Jakkur that allows one to indulge and enjoy a variety of recreational and leisure activities. Some of these include a gym, swimming pool, kids play area, sports area, indoor games room, multipurpose hall and meditation deck. In order to invest in a 2BHK or 3BHK apartment in Brigade Northridge, one can also choose to take a loan from State Bank of India, Axis Bank, HDFC Bank, ICICI Bank and PNB Housing Finance.  HighpointsLocation plays a pivotal role in determining how good a particular residential project and Brigade Northridge, Jakkur doesn’t disappoint at all as it enjoys proximity to various key areas. Schools and hospitals such as Delhi Public School, Canadian International School, Columbia Asia Hospital and Baptist Hospital can be accessed within the range of 4km to 12km. Manyata Tech Park is about 6.8km away while International Airport is 18km away. Excellent connectivity combined fabulous residential apartments loaded with top-notch amenities are reasons enough to invest in this magnificent project.
column3: Brigade Group was established in 1986, with property development as its main focus. Today, Brigade Group is one of South India's leading property developers. We are headquartered in Bangalore, with branch offices in several cities in South India, a representative office in Dubai and an accredited agent in the USA. We have a uniquely diverse multi-domain portfolio that covers property development, property management services, hospitality and education. Our projects extend across several major cities in South India: Chennai, Chikmagalur, Hyderabad, Kochi, Mangalore and Mysore.

column2: Imagine a well-addressed holistic life amidst sky and lands. Its a life where sky keeps your health on track while the land becomes the platform for celebrations. A life where best of these two worlds i.e sky and land, is made available to redefine your luxury living.And its where your dream of living in a centre of luxury comes true with best of connectivity and conveniences of the city. Spread across 4.5 acres, Arvind Skylands presents 50,000 sq.ft. of open green spaces. The development is strategically located in the fastest growing locale of the city, offering an assortment of facilities under one roof. Discover an extravagant club-life, green landscaping and the best of amenities which makes every moment cherishable in Arvind Skylands.
column3: Built on 80 years old legacy of the Lalbhai Group and established in year 2009, Arvind SmartSpaces Ltd. is committed to deliver a high quality experience to its customers. Were focused on creating real estate solutions that add value to lives. This reflects in the precision of our processes, the simplicity of our transactions and the thoughtfulness in everything we build. Were artisans who take great pride in the process of creation, for the joy it delivers.The company has the vision to create value for all the stake holders by redefining the standards of excellence and trust in the real estate industry. It is focused on creating real estate solutions that add value to life styles across categories.The company has established its presence in residential , commercial and land development space in a short period of time. Following the spectacular success of its projects and significant unmet demand, Arvind SmartSpaces has ambitious plans of coming up with other innovative offerings and mega projects in Ahmedabad and Bangalore catering to residential and commercial space.

column2: Avani Gardens is a project by Avani Builders strategically located in Jakkur Bangalore.  It is build on an area of 1 Acre encompassing 115 units across 2 towers. The floorings are made of Vitrified Tiles and .  Avani Gardens comprises of 2BHK and 3BHK Flat.  2BHK Flat has range of area from 1125 Sq-ft to 1506 Sq-ft having 1, 2 and 3 balcony and 2 and 3 bathroom. 3BHK Flat has range of area from 1120 Sq-ft to 1560 Sq-ft having 1, 2 and 3 balcony and 2 and 3 bathroom.  Launched in November 2013, Avani Gardens offers Ready To Move properties. It is approved by various banks like SBI, HDFC, LIC Housing Finance and Corporation Bank.

column2: The Century Celeste is developed by the famous developers Century Real Estate. They offer with 100 to 500 units with 2BHK and 3BHK of  1089-1900 SQFT. This project is about two blocks and seven storeys. It is located at Bellary Road, Jakkur, Bangalore, Karnataka. These are approved by the BBMP, BDA, BESCOM, Rajanakunte Gram Panchayath, Nelamangala Planning Authority, A Khata. The bank approvals are HDFC bank, Axis bank, LIC Housing Finance Ltd and many more. Amenities:There is a garden /with a play area for kids and a club house. There are many facilities such as health facilities, recreation facilities, rain water harvesting, maintenance staff and a rejuvenation facility of the gymnasium. There are many other modern provisions made such as a tennis court, a community hall, intercom, swimming pool, indoor games, cafeteria and  broadband internet. Security service all the time is also provided with all time power backup facilities.Highlights:The Vibgyor high school is 2.4 kilometers away, and the Nikisa Home Healthcare is 3.0 kilometers away from this place. The Jakkur Railway crossing is at a walkable distance of five minutes, and the airport is just 2.4 kilometers away from Century Celeste

Century Real Estate, with its headquarters in Bangalore, India was founded by Dr.P.Dayananda Pai and Mr.P.Satish Pai in the year 1973 with the primary objective of transacting in the simple buying and selling of land. More than 35 years later, the Company has evolved into an integrated, full service real estate development company that has transformed Bangalore’s urban landscape and is credited with several of Bangalore’s landmark developments such as Manipal Centre, Taj Residency, Vijaya Bank Head Quarters and Diamond District to mention only a few. Century Real Estate has the unique distinction of having purchased land on M.G.Road at INR 5 per square feet way back in 1973 where today the quoted prices are in the range of INR 20,000 per square feet.

Regarded as one of the oldest and most respected companies in the Real Estate space in India, the growth of Century Real Estate has practically mirrored the growth of Bangalore as one of Asia’s fastest growing cities. Today, we are the largest owners of real estate in Bangalore with a land bank in excess of 3000 Acres representing more than USD 2 billion in asset value and a development portfolio of over 10 million square feet comprising hotels, office buildings, residences, educational institutions and integrated township.
&developerLogo=https://img.staticmb.com/mbimages/project/Century-Group-1413911717113-D.gif&yearOfExp=45

column2: Sprawling across 5.70 acres, Century Breeze is a glorious residential development by Century Real Estate. The project is located in Jakkur, Bangalore and offers well-planned 2, 3 & 3.5 BHK apartments varying from 1279 sqft to 1798 sqft. The flat rates of Century Breeze Jakkur, Bangalore are priced starting from Rs. 72.84 Lacs. The project is spectacular with 3 high-rise towers holding 322 residential units. Project details Besides, A Khata & BDA approved, this residence is also RERA certified with possession by December 2019. Situated just 300m away from Bellary Road and located within close proximity of Manyata Tech Park & Galleria Mall, this ambitious residential project is worth consideration. Convenient location, fantastic floor plans and unbeatable price range of Century Breeze, Jakkur, Bangalore have been applauded with lots of positive reviews. The well-ventilated residential apartments of Century Breeze, Jakkur, Bangalore are blessed with adequate breeze & sunlight, keeping the rooms lively. All these abodes are complemented with spacious bedrooms & living rooms, charming balconies, wonderful kitchens and are also armed with an array of modern amenities. The intelligent master plan with 80% open space assure a rejuvenating atmosphere where you are bound to live a healthy & balanced life with your loving family. The project offers a variety of recreational & sporting facilities to keep you entertained in your spare time like squash court, swimming pool and a huge party lawn to name a few. Highpoints With easy reach to Manyata Tech Park, this residence is indeed a dream destination for professionals working here. Reliable connectivity to public transport facilities, Vidyashilp School, Columbia Asia Hospital and Galleria Mall make this project more desirable. Fringed by vibrant greenery, this residence is an ideal place to look for your dream home. So, walk in and book a flat now in Century Breeze Jakkur, Bangalore.

Today, we are the largest owners of real estate in Bangalore with a land bank in excess of 3000 acres representing more than USD 2 billion in asset value and a development portfolio of over 10 million square feet comprising hotels, office buildings, residences, educational institutions and integrated townships spread across South India.&developerLogo=https://img.staticmb.com/mbimages/project/Century-Real-Estate-1386996754527-Developer-logo.jpg&yearOfExp=45

column2: OverviewSobha HRC Pristine is a remarkable residential project that is situated in Jakkur, Bangalore-North. Offering affordable housing in Jakkur, Bangalore, the Sobha HRC Pristine features high- rise towers that are designed with modern architecture. Spread across 8.49 acres, the project not only offers a lot of open space and a smarty constructed floor plan but also features 5 towers that gives enough space to 381 residential apartments. The apartments in Sobha HRC Pristine falls in the price range of Rs. 1.01 Cr. to Rs. 4.52 Cr. About the projectThe residential apartments in Sobha HRC Pristine are surrounded by well- planned open spaces with beautiful landscapes and water bodies. The Sobha HRC Pristine is constructed by the Sobha Limited that was founded in 1995 and has developed 95 real estate projects and 253 contractual projects, which includes 50 ongoing residential projects and 31 ongoing contractual projects.The well- ventilated apartments in Sobha HRC Pristine feature earthquake resistant structure, main entrance door with natural teal polish finished, windows with UPVC frames with clear float glass, skid proof tiling in key areas, premium quality vitrified tiles in kitchen and toilets, CP and sanitary fittings form Duravit or equivalent make, rainwater harvesting drain pipes, modular switches, copper electrical wiring through concealed conduits and 100% power backup. If you book a flat in Sobha HRC Pristine then you get standard elevators in each tower, 3 tier security system and CCTV cameras at all vantage points. Apart from offering 2BHK, 3BHK and 4BHK luxurious apartments, the Sobha HRC Pristine is loaded with amenities to complement your modern lifestyle. These amenities include garden, library, club house, community hall, swimming pool, gym, tennis court, play area, table tennis, billiards, skating rink, aerobics room, kids club, kids play area, meditation area, multipurpose court, conference room and a lot more.Sobha HRC Pristine offers easy connectivity to public transports and is situated near to Kensri School National College of Journalism, Jain Heritage School Presidency College, Mallya Aditi School Kristu Jayanti College, VIBGYOR International School Reva University, Colombia Asia Manyata Business Park, Hospitals Corporate Parks, Aster CMC Kirloskar Tech Park, Baptist Hospital  Mantri Manyata Energia, Motherhood Karle Special Economic Zone etc.

column2: Overview Radiance Iris is a property that is constructed by Radiane Realty. The projected is located near Jakkur Lake, and surrounded by greenery and is a living space for those who love to be with the nature. The property features 3BHK, 4BHK & 5BHK townhouses that signify style and spaciousness with a touch of the French Riviera, a French Connection in Bengaluru. With sizes that range between 1620 and 2902 sq. ft., each townhouse offers ample space for the entire family.Project Details:Radiance Iris is located at Jakkur Lake Bangalore, and is a property constructed by Radiane Realty. These Townhouses are designed with bespoke green spaces that separate one from each other, so that you wake up on an island of peace, and have a pleasant morning. The property is well planned with 60% open space providing a serene escape from the hustle and bustle of city life.Radiance Iris are designed with features of Mediterranean style Townhouses that breathe luxury inside and out, perfect for those looking to live in the lap of luxury. Radiance Iris offers a location that is peaceful yet conveniently located close to some of the best schools, colleges and hospitals of the city. Just 17 km away from the CBD and the airport only 30 minutes away, this is the perfect location for your dream home. Redefine your luxury living with a home at Radiance Iris.Radiance Iris offers individuals with one of the best amenities like Club House, Power Back Up, Swimming Pool, Lift, Park, Intercom Facility, Banquet Hall, Gymnasium, Indoor Games Room, Kids Play Area, Aerobics room, Rain Water Harvesting, Indoor Squash & Badminton Courts, Fire Fighting Equipment etc.Highlights:Radiance Iris has 77 Town Houses, Ground + 2 Structure with Adequate Green Cover, 10 Feet Clear Floor to Ceiling Heights etc. The project has a closer connectivity close to some of the best schools, colleges and hospitals of the city. Just 17 km away from the CBD and the airport only 30 minutes away, this is the perfect location for your dream home.

column2: Overview Peram Group proudly presents Peram Eco City Hoskote, Bangalore – a stunning residential haven with pure fresh air and lots of pleasing greenery. This gated township spanning across 70 acres of beautiful land offers well-planned & well-maintained 42 residential plots measuring 1200 sqft. Project details Peram Group of Bangalore is a prominent realty group of Bangalore, who have excelled in providing vaastu-friendly residential properties infused with all the modern elements required for an urban lifestyle. Apart from delivering finest residential plots, the group is also famous for their commitment and sincerity. Peram Eco City reviews are of clear indication to why these builders are counted one amongst the best realtors of the city. Peram Eco City plots are strategically located in one of the emerging residential neighbourhood of Bangalore, which is witnessing remarkable growth n real estate sector. Good connectivity to ITPL Whitefield, Chennai Expressway, Old Madras Road, Whitefield and other significant areas of Bangalore has made Hoskote an alluring residential address. Peram Eco City photos can be explored to know more about the layout and the master plan. Some of the facilities attached to these plots are listed below:-Round the clock security, good water supply, power connection and all other civic necessities are in place.-For a stunning lifestyle, this gated township is brimmed with a clubhouse, swimming pool, Amphitheatre, banquet hall, gym, kids play area and many more other amenities.  Highpoints The emerging location has to be the star quotient of this gigantic township, which is set to be the highly sought-after residential address of the town. Globe Residential School, VIBGYOR and MVJ Medical College are some of the best educational institutions available close by. Forum Value Mall, a favourite hang-out destination is only few minutes drive away. Likewise, the world-famous Columbia Asia Hospital is also nearby to this gated township. Peram Eco City price list is completed budget-friendly, so hurry up and book a plot now!!!

column3: Adisesh Projects was established in the year 1995, with an aim to build world-class quality construction and deliver best-in-class products at affordable prices. And, over the past 19 years, we have achieved to rise up to the expectations of our customers and investors, and have built a reputation for innovation, quality and trust. We have expanded over time and have numerous sister concern companies. Today, Adisesh Projects is one of the leading property developers in Bangalore. This has been possible due to our commitment and proficiency levels, and our passion to give you the best. We are primarily focused on residential projects-villas and villa plots. Our projects include Adisesh Green City, Adisesh Green Woods in Bangalore and Adisesh Heritage City in Bhiwandi, Delhi. We also have plans for upcoming projects in various parts of Bangalore like Devanahalli, Hoskote and Malur. It is the incorporation of our diverse strategic plans that has raised the company to the peak of excellence. The high standards for which we are known are constantly being improved by our highly skilled team through consistent high design and quality parameters. We have done our best to achieve benchmark quality through our rigid business ethics, everlasting values and transparency towards our customers. Our vision and goal has always been to create world-class living environments for our clients. We are highly focused on delivering international quality products in a timely manner with utmost perfection.

column2: Mornings at Bangalore are about a nip in the air, a light mist swirling about you and a cool wind sending pleasurable shivers down your spine. Wake up to a home where you can get your day off to just such an invigorating start. CMRS Misty Winds is a verdant, well laid out enclave of exquisite Apartments situated on OMR. With a superb elevation, top of the line amenities, a refreshing landscape and a view to fall in love with, every quality in fact that you have come to take for granted from Prestige. Misty Winds is close to all essential conveniences and yet comfortably insulated from the bustle and bother. Just the way you prefer your home to be. Browse through this micro-site and discover a home where you will wake up to each new day with a renewed vigour to take on the world. Misty Winds is located on one of the fastest growing locality in Bangalore off Old Madras Road. It's a Township places itself in close proximity to the 'Knowledge Industrial Corridor comprising of SEZ's and Industrial area'. Making it an ideal choice for those seeking a home midst one of the most happening part of Bangalore.

column2: Definer Serene Drive is one of one of the popular residential project developed by Definer Group.All the efforts that went into the planning and developing of Serene Drive was centered around one proposition – to deliver genuine value for your hard earned money.Serene Drive Offers you a beautifully designed spaces of 132 aesthetically built, self contained homes in two blocks, with it’s own amenities and Facilities spread Over 2 Acres of Land.Every Apartment is skillfully planned and designed in a way such that maximum space is utilized.The apartments are well well-equipped with all modern day amenities to cater the need of its residents. Serene Drive is just 10 minutes drive from ITPL (the biggest IT Park in South India) With many IT campuses, Whitefield is the biggest hub of IT companies in the country and is the actual silicon valley of India. Whitefield has the required social infrastructure in place like schools, hospitals & restaurants etc . With the upcoming malls , many five star hotels, it will be an independent city by itself. Integrated townships (containing software parks, industries & residential) are expected in the vicinity of Whitefield NH4, under the special economic zone (SEZ) scheme. And this area is well connected to the new international Airport which is just an half an hour’s drive from DeFINER Serene Drive.

Mr. Varma is a civil engineer with immense knowledge and experience, making him a renowned name in the construction industry. He is extremely proficient in adding new dimensions to the Art of Construction, be it constructing individual dream homes or independent villas and even apartment complexes.

It is this experience, improvised by further understanding the customer’s needs over time, that has led to many value-enhanced features in our buildings. These precious additions along with sound infrastructure has helped us ensure customer satisfaction..

Today, DeFINER has redefined the benchmark in affordable housing (price between 30 to 50 lakhs) by providing top of the line specifications and amenities that are usually found only in High-end apartment projects costing twice as much.

Our major projects were ‘Definer Residency’, near Bommanahalli and ‘Definer Serene Drive – I’. The list expands now to ‘Serene Drive – II’ between ITPL & Hoskote and ‘DeFINER Kingdom’ located off OMR(Old Madras Road) near Budigere cross which is proving to be the best location for better ROI. column2: We understand what people want from an urban lifestyle - the location, the outlook and the City convenience. Akshaya Quietlands is the established name behind a range of large-scale, mixed use developments in key entertainment, cultural and shopping precincts. This project is meticulously planned, boasting landscaped streets that enhance and protect the natural assets of this beautiful region. An enviable lifestyle becomes your own when you invest in your new home at Akshaya Quietlands. If you are looking for your next property, your search begins and ends here. Akshaya Quietlands promises a seductive mix of busy city life and tranquil living space in one iconic project. Entertaining guests via the Quietlands gymnasium allows you to maintain well being and fitness. Akshaya Quietlands is set within 56 lush green acres. One glimpse of this cluster of presidential villa Plot and you can not help but notice the artistry that went into creating such works of art. Intricate detailing, thoughtful yet insightful little touches and a subtle class make Akshaya Quietlands a truly magnificent home.

column2: OverviewVenus County Premium is an impressive project developed by Aashrithaa Properties Pvt. Ltd. Offering spacious residential plots this project is located in Jigani, Bangalore. Venus County Premium price list for spacious residential plots lie within the range of Rs. 21.5 Lac - 29.0 Lac.Project detailsWith clear documents and all the necessary approvals in place, Venus County Premium plots are available in various area sizes ranging from 1200 sqft to 1500 sqft. These residential plots are available in a gated community and partial construction has been done including the boundary walls.The project is equipped with all the required amenities to live a luxurious life. Modern and unique amenities that are available in this project includeParks with landscaped gardens, children play area, jogging tracks and footpaths, avenue plantation, Wi-Fi network facilities, underground drainage with treatment plant, 24x7 security through CCTV camera surveillance, proper street lights and much more.The time has arrived to make your dream of building a beautiful house come true. The residential plots of Venus County Premium are very spacious so you can comfortably construct your home according to your requirements.HighpointsBox type storm water drain with harvesting chamber and excellent concrete roads within the periphery of this project are the major plus points. Also, the address of Venus County Premium is another highlight as it is in close proximity to places like Nayandahalli Cross, Madapatana Government School, Vijayashree Multi Speciality Hospital, Schwing Stetter India Pvt. Ltd, Balaji Medicals etc. Further, at a distance of not more than few kilometers Electronic City, Micro Labs, Cipla, HCL, APC Circle etc.These spacious residential plots in Venus County Premium are available for sale so book one if you wish to build your dream house as per your taste.

column9:
https://www.magicbricks.com/propertyDetails/otherProjectsByDeveloper.html?psmid=5016945&devId=57777&devName=Value and Budget Housing Corporation Pvt Ltd.&cityName=Bangalore&cityId=3327&postingType=P&aboutDeveloper=
Value & Budget Housing Corporation Pvt. Ltd. (VBHC) is a professionally managed real estate company which believes that good quality living should be within everyone’s reach. The company was co-founded by former MphasiS Chairman, Mr. Jaithirth (Jerry) Rao and former Citibank Consumer Banking Head, Mr.P. S. Jayakumar. VBHC homes are meticulously planned and designed to give one’s family the true experience of modern living. VBHC’s objective is to provide housing that meets high quality standards, ensure speedy completion and deliver at low cost. These objectives are best met through the application of contemporary building technology and the adoption of ingenious industrial engineering processes. The company commissioned a detailed research to evaluate various Form Systems, their comparison with traditional brick-and-mortar building methods and then chose the optimum solution in the Indian context which delivers tremendous time and cost savings. 
 
VBHC has been able to transform real estate development into a lean industrial process with the use of 'form' technology for construction. At present, VBHC has projects in Bangalore, Chennai, NCR & Mumbai.
&developerLogo=https://img.staticmb.com/mbimages/project/Value-and-Budget-Housing-Corporation-1388126285149-Company-Logo.jpg&yearOfExp=

column2: Overview:Prestige Group, Kammanahalli – Bangalore has come up with a new project called Prestige North Point that offers beautifully constructed 2 and 3 BHK homes in Bangalore. The project consists of 184 entities in a single tower. The project is still under construction and the possession of the apartments will be given before long. Project Details:Prestige North Point apartments are built with the age old tradition of creation with a variance. The homes here are a different and unique and overlook the surrounding areas that include the commercial area of Kammanahalli. The floor plan of Prestige North Point states that the tower is of 25 floors, with the ground and 1st floors reserved for retail units and the residual 23 floors reserved for residential units. The 2 BHK flats are spread over an area between 1252 sqft and 1437 sqft, while the 3 BHK flats in Prestige North Point are built over an area range between 1758 sqft and 1971 sqft.The project offers you vast open land around the property and a host of world class amenities that will definitely capture your senses.-  Gymnasium, reserved and visitor parking space, swimming pool, rainwater harvesting, water storage, waste disposal, round the clock security, etc. are some facilities that are available in these vaastu compliant homes.- The other features include lift, indoor games room, multipurpose courts, conference room, meditation area, RO water system, DTH television facility, recreational pool, etc. Highpoints:The main USP of this project is the amenities that have been provided. These will help you de-stress at the end of the day. The reviews for Prestige North Point will tell you that this project is like a breath of fresh air in the concrete jungle of the city.You can check the updated Prestige North Point photos on the website and book your flat once you are satisfied with what you see.
column3: The Prestige Group owes its origin to Mr. Razack Sattar, who envisioned a success story waiting to take shape in the Retail Business in 1956 itself. Since its formation in 1986, Prestige Estates Projects has grown swiftly to become one of South India's leading Property Developers, helping shape the skyline across the Residential, Commercial, Retail, Leisure and Hospitality sectors.Prestige Court on K.H. Road in Bangalore set the pace for the Groups rapid growth which now stands at over 191 Completed Projects spanning a total developed area of over 64.06 million sqft. It also has another 64 ongoing projects comprising around 65.45 million sqft, which include Apartment Enclaves, Shopping Malls and Corporate Structures, spread across all asset classes.Prestige Constructions, an ISO 9001:2000 certified company is the only Real Estate Developer in Bangalore to have won the reputed FIABCI Award for its software and residential facilities. Prestige was also recently awarded the Crisil DA1 Developer Rating in recognition of the quality of their projects and the ability to deliver completed projects in a timely manner, making them the ONLY Property Developer across India to have received this distinction.Today, Prestige stands as a giant and with aggressive growth plans across the Residential, Commercial, Retail and Hospitality Sectors in Bangalore, Goa, Hyderabad, Mangalore, Cochin and Chennai, lies a bright future ahead.

Prestige Court on K.H. Road in Bangalore set the pace for the Groups rapid growth which now stands at over 191 Completed Projects spanning a total developed area of over 64.06 million sqft. It also has another 64 ongoing projects comprising around 65.45 million sqft, which include Apartment Enclaves, Shopping Malls and Corporate Structures, spread across all asset classes.

Prestige was also recently awarded the Crisil DA1 Developer Rating in recognition of the quality of their projects and the ability to deliver completed projects in a timely manner, making them the ONLY Property Developer across India to have received this distinction.
Today, Prestige stands as a giant and with aggressive growth plans across the Residential, Commercial, Retail and Hospitality Sectors in Bangalore, Goa, Hyderabad, Mangalore, Cochin and Chennai, lies a bright future ahead.

column2: OverviewBM Pristine is a well planned and well built residential project by BM Developers located in Gunjur in Indias Silicon Valley i.e Bangalore. BM Pristine is offering a wide range of pocket-friendly yet lavishly crafted  2BHK and 3BHK flats with 70 percent open Area in a soothing, serene and developed area with IT Cluster. The project is currently under construction and it consists of 225 units spanned over 7 towers. BM Pristine price range starts at Rs. 42.4 Lac onwards.Project DetailsBM Pristine, a graceful residential project with 2.50 Acres land by Arvind group nested in Gunjur in Electronic City Bangalore is providing ideally designed 2BHK and 3BHk apartments with effective connectivity to IT majors and Entertainment facilities.BM Pristine floor plans for its 2BHK flat is 1095 - 1365 sqft and 3BHK flat area ranges from 1390 -1635sqft.BM Pristine luxury apartments promise an international lifestyle with specifications that  have Earthquake resistant  RCC framed structure, vitrified tiles and Anti-Skid ceramic tiles flooring of Kajaria or equivalent make, Decorative main door with Teak frame with Moulded Masonite Skin Flush Shutters 3-Track  Powder coated aluminum windows, Granite Platform Kitchen with SS Sink, Concealed copper wiring, Branded Sanitary wares of reputed make, Interior walls with Tractor Emulsion and Exterior walls with branded Ace Emulsion paint etc.BM Pristines amenities include a Power supply with backup, Gymnasium, Intercom facility, 24 hours security system, lift, Fire Fighting equipment etc.To give you an extra-luxurious Lifestyle BM Pristine is encompassed with utilities like Badminton, Basketball and Squash Court, Indoor Games room, Toddler Pool, Swimming Pool, Jogging Track etc. You can check out BM Pristine photos to check out the beautiful open areas that the apartment has.High PointsBM Pristine is offering apartments with Scenic and Serene aura in a pocket-friendly budget at just 5 minutes drive to Greenwood High School, Inventure Academy and 10 minutes drive to Sigma Tech Park, Wipro, ITPL, CISCO Outer Ring Road and Varthur Bus Stand.BM Pristine is also very close to all Social facilities like schools, Banks, Hospitals, malls etc.
column3: At BM Dvelopers, we create comfortable, well-planned urban spaces for both residential and commercial purposes. As one of the foremost builders in Bangalore, our team of professionals ensure that your property is among the best of real estate in Bangalore. Founded by Mr. Gajendra Naidu in the year of 1996, BM Developers brings alive the creativity, integrity and versatility encompassed within each of its projects, with the sole aim of providing superior contemporary living spaces envisioned with a traditional approach, to bring every customer close to nature. Our customer-centric approach focuses on creating harmonious energy and positivity for quality living and lasting relationships with our customers.With an experience over 20 project in past 8 years. Has proven track record on deliver, quality and timeline. Currently we have over 8 ongoing project ranging from 20.5 lakhs onwards. Project are spread across South and East Bangalore.

column2: Eternity Epic is a beautifully designed society that is a blend of best interiors and high quality construction. The society is built by the Eternity Structures Pvt Ltd that is one of the largest growing group in the world of realty sector with the unique point that it offers high quality homes at reasonable price. Designed in between the lush green environment along with beautifully designed landscapes, the project covers the total area of 1 acres and features G+3 floors and 36 units in total. These 36 flats are a mix of 2BHK and 3BHK flats and vary in size to meet your diverse housing needs.The quality houses at Eternity Epic are made with seismic II zone compliant RCC framed structure, concealed plumbing lines with ISI quality CPVC fitting and fixtures, concealed Conduit wiring with copper and fire resistant electrical wire of Anchor or ISI equivalent and all the other best quality raw material. Located in Hulimavu, Bangalore, the project offers easy connectivity to places like cinema theaters, hospitals like Apollo, Fortis, Jayadeva, Nimhans, IT Hubs, schools, colleges etc.Why buy?The luxurious Eternity Epic is loaded with amenities so that you get all the comfort and entertainment within the boundaries of the society. These amenities include well equipped gym, indoor games room, landscaped garden, power back up, 24/7 security service, intercom facility, rain water harvesting, multi- purpose hall etc.

column2: OverviewAkul Residency in Gunjur, Bangalore is a splendidly designed project presenting 2 iconic towers with 129 residential units in the configuration of 2BHK and 3BHK apartments. These apartments are available in varied carpet area combination and are on sale in the price range starting from Rs. 38.5 Lac – Rs. 57.0 Lac. Project Details The ready to move-in apartments in Akul Residency, Bangalore are sophisticatedly planned keeping in mind the need for spacious houses of buyers nowadays. The project offers abodes that are an epitome of strategic design and functional layouts & windows to provide ample access to natural light and breeze for healthy living. Each Akul Residency apartment is aptly ventilated and available in various sizes i.e. 2 BHK Flat in 1030 sqft, 1040 sqft, 1080 sqft, 1120 sqft, 1130 sqft, 1135 sqft, 1140 sqft, 1160 sqft, 1175 sqft, 1195 sqft & 1220 sqft whereas 3 BHK Flat in 1260 sqft, 1355 sqft, 1430 sqft, 1520 sqft, 1545 sqft & 1550 sqft carpet areas.Constructed by Akul Developers, Akul Residency in Gunjur is well-known for a myriad of wonderful features and amenities that leaves no stone unturned to promote comfortable living spaces to masses. The project presents several modern facilities to promote urban lifestyle amongst its residents, some of them are listed below:-There is a jogging, strolling cycling track, swimming pool and meditation area to facilitate healthy living within the premises of the society-For children, there is separate kids play area and kids play pool with water slides-Facilities like 24x7 Power Back Up, Lift, Effective Security System, Reserved & Visitor Parking, Intercom Facility, Maintenance Staff, Rain Water Harvesting, etc. makes every moment spent here worth cherishing and relaxingThe proficient design of the project confirms that every residential apartment in Akul Residency, Gunjur confirms the standards of modern architecture.HighpointsAkul Residency Apartments in Bangalore stands out for its location. Most of the well-known organizations and Tech Hubs like Wipro, Intel Prestige Business Park, Vrindavan Tech Park, Global Tech Park, I.T.P.L, Eco Space, Brook Field, Sigmatech Park, etc. in close vicinity to the project. Furthermore, it enjoys good connectivity to public transport and civic amenities like schools, colleges, banks, hospitals & more are also nearby to the location.
column3: Akul Developer is a name to reckon with in the field of Real Estate and over the years it has proved its metal by delivering the state of art projects. The management takes pride in its diversity as it includes members from fields like construction, consulting, and design, etc. The Company believes in delivering the best and strives to leave no stone unturned in doing so. Transparency, Humility, Honesty and Integrity is what is of utmost importance to them and it has shown these in all of their projects which are mostly concentrated in the Bangalore region. The Firm has successfully completed many lavish projects in the past and with many other in pipeline, it is only going to grow bigger by the day.

column2: Hilife Ventures launches Hilife Triflora, a luxurious and affordable residential development in Gunjur, Bangalore. Hilife Triflora comprises of 3 towers of 5 floors each and the entire project is spread across 1.70 acres of area. The price of apartments at Gunjur in Hilife Triflora is well matched for the ones looking to invest in property at Bangalore.Project detailsThe 2 BHK apartments are spread across a super built-up area of 1050 to 1160 sqft with 1 balcony and 2 bathrooms. The area of 3 BHK apartments ranges between 1310 to 1370 sqft including 2 balconies and 2 bathrooms. A proper floor plan for each room is often overlooked by residents and Hilife Triflora provides most excellent floor plans.Located in the eastern zone of Bangalore, Varthur where this project is located is flourishing on the back of several factors including proximity to commercial structures and strong inter-city connectivity. All the necessary infrastructure like bus stop, hospital, bank & ATM branches, commercial complex, office headquarters, petrol pump, railway station, etc. are present in the neighborhood. The project is strategically located as it is in close proximity to prominent hubs such as Whitefield, Marathalli and Sarjapur.HighpointsHilife Triflora is approved by various banks like Axis Bank, DHFL, HDFC, ICICI, Indiabulls, LIC Housing Finance etc and is also RERA certified. Most of the top class amenities are offered to meet all the requirements of the residents such as security, maintenance staff, gymnasium, indoor games room, indoor games room, waste disposal, internet/wi-fi connectivity, reserved parking, visitor parking and a lot more.With well-ventilated apartments and uncluttered nature space, Hilife Triflora makes you feel that every day is an excursion. Hilife Triflora is one of the best investments in residential properties in Gunjur, Bangalore for this reason book your home now.

column2: Developed by Mantri Developers - Mantri Lithos is an under-construction residential development located in Nagavara, Bangalore. Sprawling across 6-acres of lush greenery, this venture contains 528 well-planned residential units spread among total 8 towers. These units are available with 2 & 3 bedroom flats and penthouse configurations. The area size of these units vary from 1420 sqft - 1920 sqft and the flat rates of Mantri Lithos Nagavara, Bangalore are priced starting from Rs. 93.73 Lacs. Project details The builders have of Mantri Lithos Nagavara, Bangalore have guaranteed the possession of flats by 2018. Well-crafted with attractive floor plans, the well-ventilated residential apartments of Mantri Lithos Nagavara, Bangalore are available for both sale & rent. The pool of modern amenities like clubhouse, gymnasium, swimming pool, amphitheatre, jogging track, etc., make this project worthwhile. Mantri Lithos Nagavara also offers several resale flats to choose from. RERA certified, this residential development boasts spacious 2 & 3 BHK homes which are crafted as brilliantly to provide utmost comfort & unmatched privacy. The fresh breeze and sunlight swaying across all the rooms will enliven you all along the day. The 2BHK homes measuring 1420 sqft are priced Rs. 93.73 Lacs whereas the 3BHK homes with 1920 sqft area are available for Rs. 1.15 Cr. Highpoints Conveniently located in the prime neighborhood of Nagavara, Bangalore is definitely one of the big advantage of this project to invest your money. Besides, offering good connectivity to public transport facilities, this residential society is also well-connected to Govindapura, The Cherry Cart and Columbia Asia Hospital. Embassy Manyata Business & Kirloskar Tech Parks are situated within close proximity.  Schools and malls are available in good numbers in this area. So, hurry up and book a flat now in Mantri Lithos Nagavara, Bangalore and live a blissful life with near & dear ones.

Mantri Developers  
Mantri Developers is one such builder who has steadily established itself as a trusted realty organization. The passionate Mantri Developers Pvt. Ltd. was built in 1999 by Mr. Sushil Mantri to lead real estate sector with its innovative construction projects involving 2bhk, 3bhk & 4 bhk residential apartments across Bangalore with an area starting from 950 sqft at apartment price starting from Rs. 55 Lac. The group is ground-breaking in significantly changing the infrastructure of south India its several construction projects pertaining to residential building & commercial shops and education, retail & hospitality sectors in just 14 years. The Mantri Developers are renowned for offering Villas, Row Houses, Luxury Apartments, Super Luxury Apartments and Semi-Luxury Apartments in Bangalore with a proven record of delivering 1.4 homes in a single day.
Till date, the company owns a diversified construction portfolio of over 20 million sq. ft. with 11 million sqft under various stages of construction. Recently, they have made tried their feet in the high-growth area of office leasing in Bangalore, Pune and Hyderabad which is spread over 11 mn sqft of the area. Some of the popular projects by Mantri Developers are Mantri Blossom in Bangalore, Mantri Centrium in Bangalore, Mantri Manyata Energia in Bangalore, Mantri New Launch in Bangalore, Mantri Classic in Bangalore, Mantri Lakeview in Bangalore, Mantri Splendor in Bangalore and Mantri Lavendula in Pune, these are just a few of many projects executed by the developers.

column2: Located at Guduhatti village, near KHB Phase –III Surya city, adjacent to Electronic city, and surrounded with major, renowned landmark projects and signature villas, this awe-inspiring gated community promises you a great peer neighborhood. Top class educational institutions and medical facilities available within a radius of 5kms minimize you commuting hours in meeting your family needs effectively. Here, greenery in just a way of life and the logical extension to your nature-carving soul. State of the art amenities at Green Valley, in synchrony with modern and futuristic life-style, empowers you to enjoy a harmonious balance of life year after year in utter serenity, optimum security, and absolute simplicity. On offer are the standard 30x40, 30x50, and exclusive 40x60 sites carved with futuristic facilities and extensive greenery. Few odd, but vastu-complaint, sites are also up for grabs
column3: Living up to our name, we are proud to present you the Green Valley -carved out over 12 acre lush green land escape and lung space. column2: Overview: DS MAX Silver Wood is an under construction project by DS MAX Properties Private Limited offering elegantly designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. The project is thoughtfully located in Bommasandra, Bangalore and consists of 85 skilfully crafted units spanned over 1 tower. DS MAX Silver Wood price rate starts from Rs. 26.2 Lac onward.Project Details:DS MAX Silver Wood is a project offering elegantly designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK spacious apartments. It is located in Bommasandra, Bangalore by the quite experienced DS MAX Properties Private Limited. DS MAX Silver Wood plot areas for its 2 BHK flat range from 1050 sq. ft. to 1127 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range from 1276 sq. ft. to 1745 sq. ft.DS MAX Silver Wood apartments are designed with high quality interiors like vitrified tiles flooring in every room, attractive wooden doors, modular kitchen with SS sink and granite counter, concealed wiring with branded  modular switches, high quality CP fittings, sanitary ware fixtures etc.DS MAX Silver Wood amenities and facilities for its residents includes a cafeteria, bar & lounge, jogging & strolling track, private terrace & garden, dance studio, power back up, swimming pool, lift, park, intercom facility, gym, children’s play area, flower gardens, multipurpose courts, sky deck, large open space, multipurpose hall, etc.Highpoints:DS MAX Silver Wood is a perfect opportunity for potential buyers to acquire their dream house with modern equipments and standard specifications. It is located in the industrial suburban of Bangalore booming with residential projects. The project is just 2 km from National Highway 44, 5 km from Ebenezer International School, 5 km from Bommasandra ESI Hospital and 5 km from Azim Premji University. This infrastructure is one of the most prominent projects in Bommasandra to invest in.

Being one of the known and preferred real estate developer in Bangalore, the group has made continues efforts towards quality management, innovation and equal attention to even minor details. The company’s strength is its customer- centric approach and this approach has always helped the group in receiving positive and overwhelming response from its valued customers.  The group offers lavish and huge 1BHK, 2BHK and 3BHK apartments that are available in various sizes and vary from 765 sq.ft. to 1456 sq.ft.

The aim of the company is to offer best quality homes with latest amenities and excellent architecture. Having the passion to serve, the company is truly dedicated in understanding the needs of customers and then implementing those needs.

column2: Janaadhar Shubha Phase IIOverviewJanaadhar Shubha Phase II located in Attibele, Bangalore is excellently developed by Janaadhar India Private Limited. This huge project spans over 10 towers that are wrapped with 648 residential units. Janaadhar Shubha Phase II prices are nominal and affordable. Janaadhar Shubha Phase II floor plan consists of 2 BHK residential flats. The areas of the flats range approximately within 650 sqft to 656 sqft area. Navigate through Janaadhar Shubha Phase II photos & price list to see why this society is worth consideration.Project DetailsJanaadhar Shubha Phase II is RERA certified and also approved by BMDRA.  Janaadhar Shubha Phase II offers residential flats that are provided with newfangled features for the dwellers. This project encompasses flats that are 3 sides open. Investing in a flat of this project is truly worth your every penny. The apartments in Janaadhar Shubha Phase II are built without any compromise in the quality standard. Inspired locations, unmatched elegance and Absolute luxury are the key features of this fabulous project. The homes here are also well ventilated and blessed with natural light all day long. Every flat has a charming balcony where you can enjoy your coffee with your family. The residential flats in Janaadhar Shubha Phase II comply with all the vaastu principles thus assuring good health and prosperity to the residents. If you want to know further details, go through the janaadhar shubha phase ii review.The amenities offered by this project are:-          Event Space & Amphitheatre, Retail Boulevard (Retail Shops), Indoor Games Room, Park, Club House, Fire Fighting Equipment, Water Storage, Kids Play Area, Reserved Parking, Jogging and Strolling Track, Multipurpose Courts, DTH Television Facility, Meditation Area and many more to pen down.HighpointsBMTC and KSRTC connectivity are at your door step.This area is a part of the proposed Satellite Town Ring Road.The project has excellent connectivity to Bangalore Metro in the future.
column3: Janaadhar (India) Pvt. Ltd. is a unique budget housing development company that seeks to blend market principles with a not-for-profit spirit. With a systematic, focused and professional effort, Janaadhar aims to build well designed, high-quality homes - to create an inclusive society, and a better quality of life.Janaadhar has been floated by Jana Urban Foundation (JUF) - a Section 25 not-for-profit company - for implementing the budget housing projects. Janaadhar brings together the expertise of Jana Urban Foundation, Sterling Developers Private Limited and Venkataramanan Associates - in this breakthrough venture.Janaadhar Shubha is a complete housing solution that offers budget homes in a well-planned, secure, self- contained township, where everyone can raise a family and senior citizens can live safely and independently.

Janaadhar (India) Pvt. Ltd. is a unique budget housing development company that seeks to blend market principles with a not-for-profit spirit. With a systematic, focused and professional effort, Janaadhar aims to build well designed, high-quality homes - to create an inclusive society, and a better quality of life.

Janaadhar has been floated by Jana Urban Foundation (JUF) - a Section 25 not-for-profit company - for implementing the budget housing projects. Janaadhar brings together the expertise of Jana Urban Foundation, Sterling Developers Private Limited and Venkataramanan Associates - in this breakthrough venture.

Janaadhar Shubha is a complete housing solution that offers budget homes in a well-planned, secure, self- contained township, where everyone can raise a family and senior citizens can live safely and independently.

column2: RERA Numbers  Cluster 1- PR000313 Cluster 2- PR000337 Cluster 3- PR000353 Janaadhar Shubha is promoted by Janaadhar India Pvt.Ltd., a company dedicated to providing well-designed, high-quality homes on a budget. The company is part of the Jana group of companies and headed by Mr.Ramesh Ramanathan, a very well-known social entrepreneur. Planned as a budget housing solution, Janaadhar Shubha is being developed on an 11.5 acres plot on the Attibele-Anekal Road, on the outskirts of Bangalore city. Located close to several of the citys major industrial belts, the township consists of 1128 apartments. The apartments, which are open from 3 sides, are a true testament to design efficiency and superior planning, applied for the first time in the area of budget housing. Nearby Government Infrastructures: Narayan Hrudayalaya Hospital, Anekal Government Hospital, Anekal Railway Station

column2: Overview: DS Max Stonescape is a project by DS Max Properties located in AnjanaPura, Bangalore offering luxurious and spaciously designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. The project is currently under construction and consists of 141 units spanned over 1 skilfully crafted tower. DS Max Stonescape rate starts from Rs. 23.2 Lac onward.  Project Details:DS Max Stonescape is a residential project by DS Max Properties offering luxurious and spaciously designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. It is currently under construction and located in AnjanaPura, Bangalore. DS Max Stonescape plot areas for its 2 BHK flat range from 830 sq. ft. to 1076 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range from 1228 sq. ft. to 1456 sq. ft.DS Max Stonescape luxurious apartments are designed with interiors like vitrified tiles flooring, attractive natural wooden doors, black granite kitchen platform with SS sink, concealed electrical wiring with PVC conduits, designer bathroom with branded fittings, and premium quality fixtures etc.        DS Max Stonescape has numerous amenities for its residents such as club house, swimming pool, cycling & jogging track, security, park, power backup, reserved parking, visitor parking, intercom facility, gym, children’s play area, DTH television facility, flower gardens, water storage, meditation area, internet & Wi-Fi connectivity, landscaped garden, paved compound, and fire fighting equipments etc. along with several others.Highpoints:DS Max Stonescape is strategically developed project in AnjanaPura, Bangalore, one of the finest spots. DS Max Stonescape locality is in close proximity to several facilities and basic civic utilities. Several facilities like Balaji Layout Bus Stop, Sri Kumaran Children's Home, Sai Surakshaa Health Care, ICICI Bank & ATM, Guru Siddeshwara Cinema Theatre, Sri Sai Ram Medicals, Fish Mart, Capital Club Resort, Art of Living Yoga and Meditation Centre etc. are all part of the vicinity.

DS Max Properties 
DS Max is well-known & trusted name in the realty sector, was founded Dr. K. V. Satish and is acknowledged with Infra Realty Achiever Award and Bharat Gaurav National Award. Working as per the customer-centric approach, the company has been successful in delivering many 1bhk, 2bhk, 3bhk & 4bhk residential apartments in Bangalore with area starting from 536 sqft and prices being as affordable as 15 Lac plus and housing, commercial building, IT Hubs, Hospitals & much more without compromising the quality that too within the pre-set timelines. DS Max has developed many projects in Bangalore and other cities that are a perfect example of luxurious housing couples with modern amenities. Over the years, DS-MAX has exponentially grown and is intensifying its scope outside Karnataka as well. 
Since its foundation, DS-MAX Properties has worked tremendously in setting its foot in the industry. Their persistent determination has led them to excel in all spheres of developmental process with the awesome responses from their valued customers. Some of their eminent projects are DS MAX Starwood in Bangalore, DS MAX Suncrest in Bangalore, DS Max Sigma Nest in Bangalore, DS Max Sunshine in Bangalore, DS Max Serenity Nest in Bangalore, DS MAX Silver Wood in Bangalore, DS Max Splash in Bangalore, DS MAX SPARK in Bangalore, Satellite Splendor in Bangalore, DS Max Sprint in Bangalore and much more.

column2: Maangalya Prosper, we hope. Will see the coming together of 274 like-minded families in a sylvan 4-acre campus. Two blocks of three towers each, occupy just a quarter of the project site - leaving more than 80000 square feet for lovely landscaped gardens and charming community spaces where you can catch up with neighbours, bond with your family or simply watch the evening slip into night.Maangalya Prosper stands tall and proud in the midst of the Anjanapura Township - one of the largest layouts formed by the Bangalore Development Authority in Recent years. The planned layout will translate into orderly development and serene environs. BDA's mini forest in the neighborhood will further enhance the lush greenery both within the projects and outside. Anjanapura has a scenic lake too. With Nature almost your next door neighbor, serenity, and tranquility is assured.

column2: These apartments at VBHC Vaibhava Bangalore have well-established infrastructure which is designed as per the international standards of quality. The flats at VBHC Vaibhava Anekal main road Bangalore are designed to provide an unmatched comfort to the clients. There townships provide a green environment to the residents which ensures a healthy living for the patrons. The builders have ensured that the clients enjoy a healthy living at these posh residences. These apartments also offer an easy connectivity to the patrons. This smooth connectivity makes sure that the residents can visit all the major destinations of the city easily.There are several amenities which are available for the patrons at these residences. The number of facilities comprise of 24x7 security, primary health centre, ATM, power back-up for common areas and lifts and elevators. The amenities also consist of community centre, festival plaza and landscaped gardens with walking area. The facilities also encompass Clubhouse, Jogging Track, Library and Reading Room, Modern Gymnasium and Basketball Court. All these amenities are available for the clients at the most affordable prices.

column9:
https://www.magicbricks.com/propertyDetails/otherProjectsByDeveloper.html?psmid=5016947&devId=54597&devName=VBHC&cityName=Bangalore&cityId=3327&postingType=P&aboutDeveloper=
Everyone dreams of owning a home, a place to come back to, and a place that is truly a reflection of one’s personality!

We are pioneers in the concept of building quality homes that are great on design and easy on the wallet. Our vision is to build meticulously planned and well designed homes that give you value for your money. To achieve this vision, we are setting up an expansive network of integrated housing projects across the country that will apply the best engineering and construction technologies.

There is a strong unmet demand for affordable housing in India, which will continue to increase steadily as a result of urbanization, increasing number of nuclear families, rising income levels and strong desire for home ownership. To cater to this large demand, we are working on various residential projects that focus on cost efficient, quick and high quality construction.

Our residential projects are in the urban periphery and are well-connected to the city's central transportation system. We understand that a residential community is never complete without amenities, and we have ensured that our residential projects have 24x7 security, primary health care centre besides landscaped gardens and a walking track. To ensure a great quality of life while remaining environment friendly, we also have a water treatment plant, a bio gas plant, solar water heating system and solar-powered street lights.

Our flagship project, Vaibhava Bangalore, has been able to transform real estate development into a lean industrial process amenable to mass production with the use of 'form' technology for construction.
&developerLogo=https://img.staticmb.com/mbimages/project/VBHC-1387206723116-d.jpg&yearOfExp=6

column3: For the last three decades, the Hiranandanis have been single-handedly altering the ethos and aesthetics of real estate in India. The group has built multi-use developments in India on a large scale and have introduced retail, hospitality, healthcare, education and entertainment into their developments. With a unique approach to engineering, planning and design, the Hiranandanis invest heavily in research and development to ensure they remain at the forefront of value engineering and design.Through the environmentally friendly concepts of New Urbanism, their focus has been on converting suburban sprawls into well-planned urban communities such as the Powai and Thane townships which have won several awards for outstanding urban development. These self-sufficient, integrated communities have become aspirational addresses for Mumbaiites. The group has established various schools, colleges, institutions and hospitals through trusts. Their clubhouses and community spaces have earned international repute and success.All these experiences and expertise are encompassed under the House of Hiranandani, a conglomerate that is set to create new benchmarks for the real estate industry by continuing to break new ground and incorporate path-breaking technology into their design, to create future-ready and intelligent spaces. The House of Hiranandani brings to its customers and stakeholders the benefit of years of experience under one roof, thereby creating a platform from which it will continue its pioneering innovations and set the standard for real estate development in India.

column2: Salarpuria Sattva Cadenza in Kudlu Gate Junction, Bangalore is an aesthetically rich project offering a spectacular design surrounded with beautiful landscapes and water bodies. Spread across 5.8 acres, this project offers 513 apartments of 1BHK, 2BHK and 3BHK configuration. The towers contain 22 floors housing apartments in the area size ranging between 703 sqft and 1850 sqft. Project Details Salarpuria Sattva Cadenza is a RERA certified project situated on the main Hosur Road in Kudlu Junction Gate and offers vaastu compliant 1BHK, 2BHK and 3BHK apartments. The 1BHK apartments are sized at 703 sqft and 714 sqft while 2BHK cover an area size of 1183 sqft. 3BHK apartments are available in the sizes of 1564 sqft and 1850 sqft. All the apartments are fairly large and spacious and receive plenty of natural light too. These well ventilated apartments are ideal for anyone looking to invest in a 1, 2 or 3BHK apartment. Prospective homebuyers have the option to buy on resale apartments in Salarpuria Sattva Cadenza or even invest in a new property. Alternately, there is also an option to rent an apartment in Salarpuria Sattva Cadenza. A variety of recreational amenities are also included as an integral part of this project such as basketball court, kids pool, kids play area, skating rink, indoor games room, squash court, swimming pool, sauna and steam and billiards room. An abundance of recreational facilities ensures residents get to enjoy an excellent lifestyle. Highpoints Some of the major highpoints on why it is a good idea to invest in Salarpuria Sattva Cadenza include the well defined positioning of this project enjoying access to CBD and proximity to prominent localities such as HSR Layout, Koramangala and Sarjapur Road. It is truly worthwhile to invest in Salarpuria Sattva Cadenza, which offers an excellent opportunity to reside in a premium gated community.

column2: Overview:Rohan Iksha, a project developed by the famed Rohan Builders, Bhoganhalli, Bangalore, offer 2, 3 and 4 BHK premium flats situated amidst lush greenery and state of the art amenities have been provided to make the lives of the consumers comfortable and stress free. Priced moderately between 72.2 Lac and 1.18 Cr, Rohan Iksha consists of a total 550 units in 13 expansive towers. About the Project:Rohan Iksha apartments is still an under construction project with the estimated time of possession being between March 2018 and January 2020. All 2 BHK flats in Rohan Iksha are built on a space of 1317 sqft, the 3 BHK have a space of 1623 sqft and the 4 BHK apartments have a huge area of 2119 sqft. Offering freehold ownership to the buyers, Rohan Iksha is an excessive mixture of technology, innovation and comfort.Spread over an area of 9 acres, each apartment in Rohan Iksha, Bangalore gives you an all-round view of the area, which is only for those who choose to live in these luxurious homes. With superior quality raw materials, considerately designed interiors and fire resistant high quality wiring make this project one of its kind. All modern amenities such as lift, swimming pool, round the clock security, reserved parking, etc. are available in the society. Highpoints:Bhoganahalli Bus Stop is just 0.5km away from the society with Sakra World Hospital and Carmelaram Railway Station being within 3.5km. The best location in Bangalore, a fully functional club house, jogging, cycling and strolling track and door tennis courts are the best things about Rohan Iksha.You can get more details of the project by checking the updated Rohan Iksha photos on the website. Make sure to grab your dream house soon to lead a convenient life full of comfort and happiness.
column3: Rohan Group is a construction and a real estate company with innovation at its core. Founded in 1993, it aimed at building a healthier lifestyle for the city-dwellers and greater sustainability for the ecosystem. The years that followed saw the company making several firsts in the industry - all directed towards achieving this single-minded goal.Rohan Group has diverse interests in real estate, industrial contracting, infrastructure development, and logistics. It has been awarded the prestigious DA2 plus rating consistently for the last 9 years by CRISIL, Indias leading credit rating institution. Its residential projects in Pune and Bangalore continue to earn the coveted 7-star rating for excellence in design and safety.

column2: OverviewMittal Elanza that is constructed in the fastest developing North Bangalore and is beautifully and smartly designed and planned by the known architect Hafeez Contractor. Offering you spacious, elegant and well- ventilated residential flats, the Mittal Elanza in Kogilu, Bangalore helps to create an ideal ambiance with nature for a modern family. Enhancing your lifestyle, the Mittal Elanza provides 2BHK and 3BHK residential apartments that are designed to offer affordable housing in Kogilu, Bangalore. Available for sale at prices starting from Rs. 64.3 lac., these residential apartments are 316 in total. Visit Magicbricks and explore Mittal Elanza price, Mittal Elanza floor plan, Mittal Elanza photos, flat/apartment for sale in Mittal Elanza etc.Project detailSpacious, bright and airy, the Mittal Elanza offers proper cross- ventilation and natural sunlight inside each and every room. The project is constructed by the Mittal Universal that is a known construction company and has been delivering commercial, residential and township projects in collaboration with best construction material companies and technology firms.The residential flats in Mittal Elanza feature RCC framed structure, vitrified tiles flooring and skirting in living/dining room, oil bound distemper paint for walls and ceiling, bedrooms with vitrified tile flooring and skirting and oil bound distemper paint for ceiling and walls, kitchen with vitrified tile flooring, ceramic wall tiling 2 ft above counter level, oil bound distemper paint for walls and ceiling, granite counter and SS with drain board and provision for exhaust fan and water purifier, main door with hardwood frame and Masonite skin shutter with melamine polish, internal doors with hardwood frame with both side Masonite skin shutter with paint, toilet doors with hardwood frame with Masonite skin shutter on external side and laminated on the internal side and aluminum/UPVC glazed windows.Built with all the modern amenities and facilities, the Mittal Elanza in Bangalore is an ideal place to live a comfortable and happy life with your loved ones.-          Keep yourself fit with jogging and strolling track and swimming pool.-          Spend quality time with family in indoor games room, kids play area, sky deck, large clubhouse, large open space etc.Strategically located, the Mittal Elanza offers easy connectivity to public transport, Yelahanka Railway Station, Deeksha Hospital, schools, colleges, hospitals and all the other prime areas.
column3: Mittal Universal is a construction company which proudly wears its 60-year-old legacy even as it looks firmly ahead with a new-age outlook. A history of a strong, people-over-market approach embedded in its foundation, Mittal Universal offers an eclectic mix of forward thinkers and functional creators who strike a balance between local needs and global influences in the development of every property.Reaching out to clients across India and delivering results in every aspect of the industry, the company has a proven track record in creating quality buildings for all manner of projects

Mittal Universal is a construction company which proudly wears its 60-year-old legacy even as it looks firmly ahead with a new-age outlook. A history of a strong, people-over-market approach embedded in its foundation, Mittal Universal offers an eclectic mix of forward thinkers and functional creators who strike a balance between local needs and global influences in the development of every property.
Reaching out to clients across India and delivering results in every aspect of the industry, the company has a proven track record in creating quality buildings for all manner of projects – Residential, Commercial and Townships – in keeping with the vision and requirement of the client. Also, working in collaboration with the world’s best technology firms, construction material companies and design gurus, Mittal Universal caters to every need of the Indian construction and property market, be it low-budget housing, high-end hospitality or designing stunning masterpieces that become benchmarks for the industry.
Aware that knowledge is constantly evolving and critical to innovative growth, Mittal Universal believes in bringing visionaries together in order to implement an effective and time-tested combination of creativity and quality which culminates into landmark properties. This collection for sharp insights into evolving market dynamics and an affinity for the latest construction trends enable Mittal Universal to redesign and redefine the skyline of one of the fastest growing economies of the world.
&developerLogo=&yearOfExp=17

column2: Mahaveer Reddy Structures Pvt. Ltd. introduces new residential project Mahaveer Cygnet which is located at Kogilu, Bangalore. Spread across 1.15 acres of land the project offers 1, 2 and 3 BHK apartments spread across 3 towers. RERA certified - Mahaveer Cygnet offers the best living space at an affordable price.Project detailsThe super build up area of these 1, 2 and 3 BHK apartments varies between 582 to 1411 sqft and it is expected that the residential units will be ready for possession by December - 2019. The main motto of the auspicious project is to provide a peaceful and widespread home as per the basic requirements of a modern family.The project offers most of the modern amenities such as kid's play area, community hall, gym, lift, swimming pool, security, indoor games and a lot more. An abundance of light and ventilation are integral to all apartments in Mahaveer Cygnet. Mahaveer Cygnet comes with ultra-modern apartments for the home-seekers who want to find a proper address near the important locations in Bangalore.HighpointsThe project is located in the prime location and has excellent access to good hospitals, Business Parks and schools in the vicinity. With the expressway that connects to International airport, which is about 18kms away, Mahaveer Cygnet can be touted as one of the best budget friendly residential apartments in North Bangalore. The project offers the impeccable location away from the bustle, yet, is well connected to the city.Let your dreams spread wings in these luxurious ready to move-in homes. At Mahaveer Cygnet experience the flawless excellence of engineering and architecture. Bask in the glory of an ultra-modern yet serene life. Crafted with passion and delivered to perfection, book now an apartment now as life here is the life you always desired.

column2: A perfect combination of peaceful living with some of the most modern facilities. Sobha Palm Court offers a breathtaking lifestyle to all its residents. Create your own evergreen memorable moments at Sobha Palm Court. Developed by Sobha Limited this project is located in Kogilu, Bangalore. The project is approved by Bruhat Bengaluru Mahanagara Palike and is also RERA Certified.Project detailsSobha Palm Court offers ongoing properties and is spread across 4 acres of land with 3 towers consisting of totally 288 units. Sabah Palm Court comes with an admirable floor plan of 3 BHK units spread across 1560 to 1950 sqft area and the overall basic price is 99.2 Lakhs where as the rate per sqft is Rs.6350.    Sobha Palm Court is secured with security cabins at all entrances and exits with CCTV coverage. Also, there is proper electric fitting with lighting fixtures which give lighting of different intensity. Furthermore, the amenities list include open wide space, lush greenery, children play area, skating ring, cricket pitch, yoga studio, playground, community hall, reading corner, swimming pool, parking area, badminton court and basket ball court, indoor games, jogging tracks, club houses and much more.HighpointsThe Sobha Palm Court is luminously located at a prime location of Kogilu Cross, Bangalore. It is already considered as a most important place because of the closeness of necessary infrastructures such as the best schools, education centers, colleges, Mega Marts, shopping malls, markets, health care centers and ATMs. Furthermore, as per the reviews 18 km distance from International airport and 16 km distance from railway stations make this locality more preferable. Further for some more information about the project you can have a glance at the brochure and make sure that you immediately book a flat of your choice before they are taken away by others.
column3: With three decades of experience in creating resplendent interiors of palaces and masterpieces in the Middle-East, Mr. P.N.C. Menon founded Sobha Limited (formerly Sobha Developers Ltd) in 1995 with a clear vision to transform the way people perceive quality. Today, Sobha, a Rs. 25 billion company, is one of the largest and only backward integrated real estate players in the country.Headquartered in Bangalore, Sobha is primarily focused on residential and contractual projects. The Companys residential projects include presidential apartments, villas, row houses, luxury and super luxury apartments, plotted development and aspirational homes replete with world-class amenities. In all its residential projects, the company lays a strong emphasis on environmental management, water harvesting and high safety standards. .The backward integration model is one of the key competitive strengths of Sobha. This literally means that the Company has all the competencies and in-house resources to deliver a project from conceptualisation to completion. Backward integration includes an interiors division, a metal works and glazing factory, and a concrete products factory. Sobha has also diversified into retail business with spring mattresses under the brand name Sobha Restoplus. More than 27 variants of mattresses are produced by the mattress division using cutting-edge machinery of international quality.
column6:

column2: OverviewReflecting elegance and style, the ETA The Gardens in Majestic, Bangalore is a luxurious residential project that features modern, spacious and well- ventilated residential flats. The green surroundings around lets you rejuvenate and relax your senses after a hectic day. Constructed with smart floor plan and latest architecture, the ETA The Gardens overlooks serene beauty and provides you proper cross- ventilated and natural sunlight. Available for sale at prices starting from Rs. 1.35 Cr. The society is designed to offer affordable housing in Majestic, Bangalore. Featuring 10 towers and 937 residential apartments, the ETA The Gardens is a ready to move- in society that offers 1BHK, 2BHK and 3BHK flats in various sizes.Project detailThe luxurious ETA The Gardens is a whole new world in itself and never lets you make any compromises with your modern lifestyle. The project is constructed by the ETA Star Property Developers that was as established in 2004 and is Headquartered in Dubai and develops millions of square feet every year.Spacious and luxurious, the residential flats in ETA The Gardens feature RCC framed structure designed for seismic zone II, concrete solid blocks for walls, marble floor/vitrified tiles in living/dining room, marble floor/ceramic tiles in bedrooms, ceramic anti- skid tiles in kitchen and balcony, entrance door with teakwood frame and teakwood architraves, other doors with hardwood frames, kitchen with black granite slab platform on steel brackets, stainless steel sink and drain board, wall dado upto 600 mm above platform, exhaust fan and power outlets for appliances, toilets with ceramic floor, dado upto false ceiling, water closet, wash basin and bath tub, concealed conduit copper wiring etc. To make your life happening and easy, the society is equipped with all the modern amenities and facilities.-          Facilities like reserved parking, power backup, visitor parking, water storage, lift, intercom facility, security etc. are available.-          Visit club house, indoor games room, aerobics room, kids play area, swimming pool, gym etc. in your leisure time.If you have any queries, you can visit Magicbricks and can explore ETA The Gardens price, ETA The Gardens photos, ETA The Gardens floor plan, flat/apartment price in ETA The Gardens and all the other authentic information.
column3: ETA Ascon Star Group -Emirates Trading Agency-Associated Constructions and Investments (ETA Ascon) Co.L.L.C Group is a multi dimensional and diversified organization. Maintaining a consistent record of technical and engineering brilliance, of building walls as much as breaking barriers, ETA Star has earned immense goodwill and a reputation for the professional execution of turnkey projects.Established in 1973 as a joint venture with UAE is Al Ghurair Group. Headquartered in Dubai, ETA Star Property Developers that was formed in 2004 is an excellent progression of the multi billion dollar ETA Ascon Group. Its pedigree is confirmed consistently through the stamp of quality across the millions of square feet it develops every year. Most of these projects pioneer standards for other developers.
