column2: OverviewAurum Developers Bangalore presents one of its most awaited residential projects - Aurum Four Seasons Villas. The project is centrally located in Doddaballapur, Bangalore and it consists of 60 units of various dimensions. Currently under construction, Aurum Four Seasons Villas price list starts from Rs. 75.0 Lac onwards.  Project detailsApproved by various leading banks, this project is offering spacious residential plots and 3 BHK Villas. The residential plots in this project are spanning across various area sizes ranging from 1200 sqft to 1500 sqft. The luxurious 3 BHK villas are spread across an area ranging from 2215 sqft to 2645 sqft. The spacious 3 BHK villas are available in a gated community, which consists of a grand entrance plaza and decorative wall entrance. Also, a beautiful water feature at the entrance is all set to welcome you the moment you enter this project. Aurum Four Seasons Villas is also tucked with all the necessary facilities such as           -          Piped gas connection, flower gardens, power backup, kids play area, indoor games room, park, gymnasium, private terrace and much more.The location of this stunning project is well connected to places like Bangalore International Airport, railway station, Anuradhapura Yelahanka Road, Sri Devaraj Urs International Residential School etc. Aurum Four Seasons address is worth considering, if you want to invest in a villa or a residential plot.HighpointsThe project is surrounded by lush greenery and is located in the north Bangalore. It consists of totally 90 villas out of which 62 villas are in phase I and 25 villas in phase II. Further, a shopping mall is also available within the periphery. Aurum Four Seasons reviews and photos will make you understand this project in a better way.Aurum Four Seasons villa and plot prices are reasonable so immediately book a plot or a villa to experience living in a high class gated community.

column3: Brigade Group was established in 1986, with property development as its main focus. Today, Brigade Group is one of South India's leading property developers. We are headquartered in Bangalore, with branch offices in several cities in South India, a representative office in Dubai and an accredited agent in the USA. We have a uniquely diverse multi-domain portfolio that covers property development, property management services, hospitality and education. Our projects extend across several major cities in South India: Chennai, Chikmagalur, Hyderabad, Kochi, Mangalore and Mysore.

column2: OverviewPurva Riviera welcomes you to reside in its bright ventilated elegantly designed residential apartments. Developed by the famous Puravankara Projects Ltd, this Purva Riviera is located in an advantageous location i.e. Marathahalli, Bangalore.  This project comprises of 15 elevated towers with 802 units that are absolutely ready to move in.  Purva Riviera apartment price ranges between Rs. 94.5 Lac  to 2.35 Cr. Inclusive of 2BHK, 3BHK and 4BHK units,  Purva Riviera floor plan are quite spacious that are spread across 1250 sqft to 3900 sqft . Also, they quite impressive with eye catching elegant features.Project detailsPurva Riviera offers the options of living in 1BHK and 2BHK apartments on rental basis. If you want a 3BHK then it is also available for rent in Purva Riviera. Purva Riviera 2BHKs are also available on sale and hence you can choose the flat according to your specifications. Glance over these Purva Riviera images to get an overview of the entire project.Purva Riviera marathahalli address is an ideal one stop address for home seeks.Starting from designer doors, good quality paints to designer tiles, all of them are exclusively selected to fit your taste. Purva Riviera provides wide range of amenities like a lavish club house, coffee lounge & restaurants, bar/lounge, jogging and strolling track , cycling & jogging track and swimming pool . Also, other facilities include power back up, lift, security, park, reserved parking and service/goods lift for convenience.HighpointsPurva Riviera is positioned is a highly beneficial locality as it enjoys proximity to major IT companies as the location is a main IT hub. Sankara Eye Hospital is the nearest medical aid in case of medical emergencies. Commuting is quite easy as KR Puram Railway Station is hardly 4 kms away.Start living in this Purva Riviera to experience a whole new lifestyle. So book now.
column3: Established in 1975 in Mumbai, the Puravankara Projects Ltd has been following its mantra for success that is quality. Today, the group is a known for constructing the best commercial and residential projects and all because of the customer- centric service, sturdy engineering and complete transparency in business operations. Covering around 23.54 million square feet, the group has successfully completed 2 commercial and 48 residential projects till now. The reputed company has got an ISO 9001 certification by DNV in 1998 and a DA2 rating by CRISIL. Following the concept of affordable, group offers luxurious 2BHK, 3BHK, 4BHK and 5BHK apartments that are available on sale from 56 lacks. These flats falls in the size range of 1194 sq.ft. to 3217 sq.ft. so that you do not have to make any compromises.
column6:
Highlights


Purva Riviera is well connected to major IT companies as the location is a major IT hub. It is just a 10 minutes drive from MG Road. City International Airport is about 30 to 40 kms from it. KR Puram Railway Station is only 4 kms from Riviera. There is a bus stand also named as Purva Riviera bus stand which is at a walkable distance. Sankara Eye Hospital is the nearest hospital.

Established in 1975 in Mumbai, the Puravankara Projects Ltd has been following its mantra for success that is quality. Today, the group is a known for constructing the best commercial and residential projects and all because of the customer- centric service, sturdy engineering and complete transparency in business operations. Covering around 23.54 million square feet, the group has successfully completed 2 commercial and 48 residential projects till now. The reputed company has got an ISO 9001 certification by DNV in 1998 and a DA2+ rating by CRISIL. Following the concept of affordable, group offers luxurious 2BHK, 3BHK, 4BHK and 5BHK apartments that are available on sale from 56 lacks. These flats falls in the size range of 1194 sq.ft. to 3217 sq.ft. so that you do not have to make any compromises. 
The group was established in Mumbai but has also made a name in cities like Chennai, Hyderabad, Kochi, Mysore and Bangalore and overseas in Colombo, Saudi- Arabia and Dubai. The projects offered by Puravankara are Puravankara Limousine Home, Purva Westend, Purva Sunflower, Purva Bluemot, Purva Oceana, Purva Grandbay, Purva Highland, Purva Whiteball, Purva Swanlake etc.

column2: Mantri Espana is perfectly crafted so as to lead a comfortable and lavish lifestyle to its residents. Developed by Mantri Developers this project is strategically located in Marathahalli, Bangalore. The location of the residence is placed wherein you won’t feel any disturbance after a frantic day. Project details Marvelous Mantri Espana is one of the RERA Certified projects and is approved by various banks like Axis Bank, HDFC, ICICI, India Bulls, Punjab National Bank and SBI.  Mantri Espana offers ready to move properties spread across 13 Acres of land encompassing 339 units which are spaciously built across 13 towers. This project comprises of 3, 4, 5BHK and 5+BHK accommodations and the floorings are made up of Italian marble, imported marble and vitrified tiles which add supplementary attractiveness to these units. The price lists of these adobes are starting from Rs.2.01 Crore including charges like registration, maintenance, GST, etc. The 3BHK unit is spread across 2635 sq ft whereas the 4BHK unit covers an area ranging between 3785 - 4055 sqft. The area of 5BHK Flat varies between 4010 - 4965 sqft. Furthermore, the spacious 5+ BHK Flat cover an area of 10285 sqft.Mantri Espana includes all the best amenities such as amphitheater, outdoor party area with barbeque pits, indoor party hall and multipurpose hall, etc. which make your life worth living.HighpointsThe location of Mantri Espana i.e Marathahalli is a fast developing suburb in the Bangalore city. With strong roadway connectivity to its adjoining areas the project enjoys excellent connectivity to major MNC Companies. The project is also at close proximity to the old and new International Airport near Devanahalli. Also, most of the shopping malls, schools, hospitals, etc., are nearby. Hence those who are looking for ready to move properties book a flat now and be a part of Mantri Espana.
column3: Mantri Developers Pvt. Ltd. Established in 1999 by Mr. Sushil Mantri, the company has been the pioneering force behind the rapidly changing skyline of south India, with developments that span the residential, retail, commercial, education and hospitality sectors. In just 15 years, the group, with the spirit of innovation at its core, has carved a niche for itself as an industry benchmark for quality, customer focus, robust engineering, in-house research, uncompromising business ethics and the unswerving commitment to timeless values and total transparency in every aspect of its business. These exceptional attributes have made Mantri Developers one of India is most preferred real estate brands in south India. As part of its diversified portfolio that is cumulatively spread over 20 million sq. ft. under various stages of construction in residential, retail, office, hospitality, and townships in the high-growth urban centers. Under residential segment, Mantri Developers offers villas, row houses, super luxury apartments, luxury apartments and semi-luxury Apartments. The Company has an enviable track record of having delivered 1.4 homes, every single day. Mantri Developers is committed towards developing ecologically sustainable projects, with a strong emphasis on environmental management and safety standards. The company is also in the forefront of using cutting-edge technological innovations like home automation systems to complement the state-of-the-art architecture of its smart home projects.

column2: Ahad Euphoria is a project by Ahad Builders Pvt. Ltd located in Sarjapur Road Bangalore.  It is build on an area of 8 Acre encompassing 685 units across 1 towers. The floorings are made of Vitrified Tiles.  Ahad Euphoria comprises of 1BHK, 2BHK, 3BHK and 4BHK Flat and Penthouse.  1BHK Flat has a range of area from 525 Sq-ft to 550 Sq-ft having 1 balcony and 1 bathroom. 4BHK Penthouse has area 525 Sq-ft to 550 Sq-ft having 2 balcony and 3 bathroom. 2BHK Flat has a range of area from 858 Sq-ft to 1063 Sq-ft having 2 balcony and 2 bathroom. 3BHK Flat has a range of area from 1275 Sq-ft to 1729 Sq-ft having 1 and 3 balcony and 2 and 3 bathroom. 4BHK Flat has a range of area from 1862 Sq-ft to 1863 Sq-ft having 2 and 4 balcony and 3 and 4 bathroom.  Launched in August 2015, Ahad Euphoria offers Ongoing properties. It is approved by various banks like Axis Bank, HDFC and SBI.

column2: DSR White Waters is a sunning residential project located on Carmelaram Road, Gunjur, off Sarjapur Road, Bangalore. Developed by the famous DSR Infrastructure, this residential haven laid out over 2.5 acres offers 211 units with 2 & 3 BHK apartment configurations to choose from. The area size of 2BHK Flats vary from 1057 – 1192 sqft while the 3BHK Flats measure from 1362 – 1589 sqft.  The flat rates of DSR White Waters Sarjapur Road, Bangalore are priced within the bracket of Rs. 48.7 Lac - 73.0 Lac. The residential units are spread across 3 beautiful low-rise towers. Project details Designed with brilliant floor plans with no common walls in between, all the residential apartments of this fabulous project are a dream come true for those seeking luxurious home at an unbeatable price. These units are completely ready-to-move-in and are available for sale as well as rent. Besides, being built with sheer elegance, the well-ventilated residential apartments of DSR White Waters Sarjapur Road, Bangalore also draw sufficient amount of fresh breeze and sunlight. DSR White Waters Sarjapur Road, Bangalore feature a luxurious clubhouse with Wi-Fi connectivity and is well-equipped with impressive amenities like gym, jogging track, cricket pitch, swimming pool, multipurpose hall, jacuzzi and steam, indoor games, children play area to name a few. Highpoints This RERA certified project offers Occupancy Certificate (OC) for every apartment along with a flexible payment plan with a booking amount of only Rs.1,00,000/- This project offers low rise towers with just Basement, Ground and 4 Floors. It is a prime residential pincode with several important landmarks like Karmelaram Railway Station, Krupanidhi College and Wipro Corporate Office. 50% open space of the total project area assures fresh & airy environment to breathe a new life. Book now in this ideally situated project that provides an excellent payment plan.

column2: M1 Aureus Whitefield, Bangalore is a project by M1 Advisory and is located skilfully in posh Whitefield in Bangalore city, Karnataka. It is an ultra-luxurious project offering 4 and 5 BHK villas spread over 29 units. It is under construction at the moment.    Project Details:M1 Aureus Whitefield, Bangalore is a project by M1 Advisory in Whitefield, Bangalore. It is offering 4 BHKs and 5 BHK villas and the area of 4 BHK Villas ranges from 3156 sqft to 4590 sqft and the 5 BHK villas ranges from 2750 sqft to 5576 sqft. The price range of this premium villa construction is in the range of â?¹ 1.99 Cr - 3.80 Cr.   M1 Aureus Whitefield is designed with all the details in mind like RCC framed structure, vitrified tiles flooring, concealed insulated copper wiring, modular switches and sufficient electrical points, thick granite kitchen counter top, the windows are fitted with Aluminum Sliding Window with Mosquito Mesh Shutters, branded sanitary ware and CP fittings, etc. for every unit. It has the best features for its occupants like as 24/7 power supply with back up, lift, 24 hour security facilities, banquet hall, children’s play area, aerobics room, meditation, car parking space, gated community with CCTV camera surveillance etc. among many more.Highpoints:These ultra luxury villas are exquisitely built with world class standards and features. Its basement has a four-car park, and all the villas are fitted with a personal elevator. Staying here will put you in close proximity to Kadugodi bus stop, Whitefield Railway station, International Airport, Family Super Market, New Life Hospital, There are good restaurants and the Forum Value Mall located close by as well. if you are inspired by this and want to buy a villa for your family then contact us today.

column2: Elegant Whispering Winds from the word go wanted to be different from its peers. Be the architectural design that stands out with simple yet very modern streaks in true to the future. It has in its mind the one unique feature in town, lofty balcony, large living rooms, hearty open spaces and fine detailing that is unmatched with choicest branded fittings.The one over-riding feature is its architecture you'll find is a seamless flow of space with every life activity in mind. This intelligent space utilization is yet another architectural mainstay with provisioned for happy family get-togethers in the central atrium, full lap swimming pool to stress out or relax, Landscape gardens for a timeless walk with party area for everlasting memories, Billiards and card room for the luxury work out and many in the list to give you a luxurious living with nature!
column3: Elegant Builders and Developer works with an impeccable reputation for quality, integrity and on schedule delivery.For most people, a home is the most important investment they will ever make. Understanding the magnitude of the task of creating a lifetime dream for a customer, we at Elegant Builders and Developer developed every residential project as if it were our own. For us, it's not just a business, but also pleasure to deliver dreams and to delight our customers. And our commitment does not end there.Elegant builders and developers is an integrated property development company headquartered in Bangalore, India. Founded in 2004, has grown into a company renowned for its classy developments in Residential Multistorey Apartment. In a short span of just 7 years ELEGANT BUILDERS AND DEVELOPERS has completed around 18 projects in south Bangalore. A phenomenal growth fueled by the resolute and dynamic leadership of its founding Managing Director, Mr. M.Subramani

column2: Bollineni Silas is a pristine and brand new residential development by the well known BSCPL Infrastructure Limited Developers at Whitefield, in the vicinity of Bangalore. The Bollineni Silas offers a choice of 2 and 3 BHK flats with vast open spaces at a budgeted price starting from Rs. 43.4 Lakhs. Bollineni Silas dwelling is carefully designed with a world class design and constructional features.Project detailsThe 499 housing units are sprawled across an area of 10 acres and the floor plan of this project comprises of 2 and 3 BHK flats which are very spacious and designed as per the latest architectural features. The possession of these flats which are spread across 1060 to 1600 sqft area is slated in December 2018.Bollineni Silas provides an extensive range of facilities to the residents like yoga and aerobics, squash court, indoor badminton court, card room, carom, table tennis, pool table, children's play area and club house. There are also provisions for the intercom, 24 x 7 security, power backup and maintenance staff. This RERA Certified project is a home that everyone dreamt to be lived in. Most importantly it provides you a space that liberates and sets you comfortable and free.HighpointsAt, Bollineni Silas you will discover the pleasure of world class living. One of the major advantages of this project is the location. You are never truly far from a hospital, school, hotel, a cinema, a mall or even any recreational centers when living in Whitefield. Also, Bollineni Silas enjoys fantastic connectivity to the surrounding MNC Companies.All these above features make this project stand apart from the regular lot of projects offered by developers. To experience beauty and perfection like never before all you have to do right now is book a flat of your choice.
column3: BSCPL, a name that conjures up images of major highway projects in India and overseas. column2: OverviewFerns Builders and Developers, one of the trusted builders has developed this Ferns City Marathahalli  located in Marathahalli, Bangalore. This project offers you 170 residential units that are inviting you to spend your life in this lavish project. The price list of Ferns City Marathahalli is Rs. 2.85 Cr onwards where per sqft is been charged  Rs.9,500.Project detailsIf you are in search for a perfect address for your dream home then Fern City Bangalore Address can be the right choice for you. The  floor plan offers plots, 3BHK villas and 4BHK villas that are spanning over 3000 sqft to 4000 sqft. However, you can choose from the options listed above. Ferns City Plot for sale are spanning over 3000 sqft offering you investment opportunity and freedom to construct your own house. Furthermore, if you are thinking of owning luxurious villas, then Ferns City Marathahalli offers you well designed villas spread across 2000 sqft to 2000 sqft.  All of these are enclosed within gated community and are offered with freehold ownership rights.These villas stand out from the rest as they are unique and are fully designed with contemporary style. They are filled with cool breeze and ample sunlight that are best for living. Ferns City Bangalore reviews are a proof how highly appreciated this project is. Also, you can get an idea by Ferns City Marathahalli photos that are available on the website. The lush green surroundings and excellent infrastructures are enough to attract you to this project.HighpointsWith various modes of transport in proximity, this project is hardly 3.2km away from DRDO 2nd Phase Bus Stop. To cater to your educational needs, you can find Kephee Preschool i.e. 5km away from this project. During medical emergencies, there is Sankara Eye Hospital nearby.Dont miss this golden opportunity and book now in Ferns City Marathahalli, Bangalore.

column2: Mera Homes is located in Whitefield, the IT hub of Bangalore, it is easily accessible and self-contained in everyway.The sprawling 5.5 acres of idyllic private living space comprises of 476 apartments in 2, 3 BHK configuration across 8 blocks plus basement, ground and 14 floors. These lavish homes will confer upon you with all the modern day amenities and luxuries that you can imagine.It's always pleasantly surprising to find a refreshing oasis in the midst of a bustling city. Imagine if you lived in it.At Mera Homes, you can enjoy the expansive feel of a cozy home and the luxury of time. It's the kind of place that cultivates genteel family traditions - a long, leisurely breakfast, tea or coffee in the afternoons, cocktail hour when the day turns into evening. This is where family bonding is as natural as the place that inspires it.Step inside an apartment and you will find yourself in the midst of spacious and well ventilated independent homes that are open from 3 sides. Mera Homes brings together 472 homes build around your aspirations.Plentiful natural lighting, beautiful vitrified and wooden floor finishes, elegant fixtures and well thought out interior layout creates a sense of living in an independent home. The family area, kitchen and dining make up a cozy family hub.

column2: Overview Purva Fountain Square located in Marathahalli, Bangalore is brand new project by Puravankara Projects Ltd offering freehold 2 and 3 BHK apartments ranging from 1280 – 1750 sqft. The flat prices of Purva Fountain Square cost within Rs. 89.0 Lacs  1.0 Cr. Check out Purva Fountain Square photos, floor plans and reviews and see why this project is worth investing. The project features 16 towers spread across 16 acres and comprises of 1150 premium units. About the project Purva Fountain Square 2 BHK for sale are available with various floor plans measuring from 1280 sqft to 1386 sqft while the floor plan of 3 BHK apartments vary from 1500 sqft to 1750 sqft. Purva Fountain Square 3 BHKs for rent are highly appreciated with good reviews for its spacious floor plan and premium specifications.   Replete with ample natural light and excellent ventilation, these apartments enjoy a cheerful ambiance round the year, which will definitely uplift your senses and keep you active. Conveniently located in Old Airport Road, Marathahalli  this luxurious residence is well connected to various workplaces of Bangalore, thus making these homes a true blessing for working professionals. Apart from being well-appointed with all the prime necessities like round the clock water supply, power backup, security, etc., the society offers numerous recreational options with a clubhouse, swimming pool, gym, cycling and jogging track, indoor games room and much more. Highpoints Marathahalli is one of the most desired residential neighbourhood of Bangalore and possess good public transport connectivity all along the day. The availability of top-rated schools and hospitals in and around this area has been the prime USP of this neighbourhood. Embraced within the arms of mother’s nature, Purva Fountain Square is the right address for a happy and contented life with your beloved family. So, cash in and book a flat today

column2: Lead Developers presents Lead Grandeur, one of the residential projects in Whitefield, Bangalore. It will offer 2 BHK, 3 BHK and 4 BHK apartments with amenities such as 24 hour power back up, play area, swimming pool, gymnasium, indoor games, terrace club house, terrace party area, multipurpose hall and security. It is in closer proximity to Kadugodi Junction, Whitefield Railway Station and Sai Baba Ashram.SRS White Pearl located in TC Palya, Bengaluru, a project by SRS Shelters Builders offering luxurious possession within 6 months 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. SRS White pearl apartments are designed with a RCC framed structure, teak wood main doors, vitrified floorings for living, kitchen, bedroom and balconies, ceramic tiling in toilets, granite kitchen counter top, concealed copper wiring, etc.SRS White pearl has provided many essential facilities for its residents like lifts, 24x7 water supply, 24x7 power back up, intercom, car parking, gym, club house, childrens play area, swimming pool and other lifestyle amenities like community hall, and eco-friendly facilities like rain water harvesting.BDA approved, and designing of the homes ensures utmost privacy to every section of the house. Large windows keep the rooms well-ventilated at any time of the day. The project has been crafted in a manner to amaze you with all the facilities. Halehalli, KR Puram has gained prominence in recent years as a mid-point between East Bangalore and the East Business Districts. The main connecting link which has worked for KR Puram is the NH-4, which links the locality with Airport road and Bangalore city.KR Puram is also well-connected to the Bengaluru International Airport on one end and Varthur on another, via ORR. The locality is also close to important economic centres of Bellandur, Sarjapur Road and Whitefield.

column2: Located at AECS layout, Bangalore, the DSR Spring Beauty is a sight to behold. Strategically located, this project is definitely an investment of a lifetime. The most attractive feature of this project is the fact that it is developed by DSR group which is a well-known name as far as construction and project development is concerned. This project has a total of 208 spacious residential apartments that are divided into 4 blocks. The best emphasis on the location of this project can be given by the fact that this project is just 12 KM away from MG Road and 7 KM away from Indiranagar. Schools, hospitals, commercial and industrial setups are located very near to this project. The apartments in this project come in two variants, 2 and 3 BHK ones. The 2 BHK ones have a covered area of 1180 Sft. and the 3 BHK ones have of 1520 Sft. This project has also got all the modern facilities like, garden, Swimming Pool, Play Area, 24Hr Backup, Security, Club House, Tennis Court, Badminton Court, Gymnasium, Basket Ball Court etc. and is designed aesthetically and by keeping all the modern practices in mind.
column3: DSR Group was established more than 2 decades ago in 1988 with the vision of transforming the real estate industry and today after the journey of so many years, its projects stand testimony to the shining excellence and brilliance in execution. Commanding an unparalleled expertise, the group has spread its operations across South India across many real estate verticals, catering to various categories of clients. DSRs repertoire has a wide array of exclusive projects which have been crafted to international standards.With diversified business interests across many portfolios, DSR today has achieved staggering success, thanks to its partners, associates, and employees. Its success is shared and cherished among its people who work towards the common goal of a promising and prosperous future. Customer satisfaction is the corner stone of our companys philosophy. We constantly strive for perfection in our service by understanding the customer needs and providing innovative and customized real estate solutions. The locations of our projects are so carefully chosen that they provide immense potential for investment.All through its existence, DSRs ideals of quality, innovation, and attention to the needs of its clients have always been of utmost importance. These ideals remain at the core of every endeavor of DSR. The DSR brand itself stands for quality, commitment, and innovation which manifest in all that it does and stands for. The group has several projects underway in Bangalore, Hyderabad, and Chennai catering to the customer with varied needs and tastes. Professional to the core and passionate about standards in construction, the company is moving fast forward into the future.

column2: Overview Satko Palm Trees Apartments Marathahalli, Bangalore is a mesmerising society, which has been well-designed by Satko Developers. Successfully constructed, this project offers 84 ready-to-move-in flats spread across 3 towers. The units are mainly available with 2 and 3 BHK floor plans, that range from 1204 sqft to 1948 sqft. Satko Palm Trees Apartments price list is reasonably quoted, which will surely impress you. Project details Satko Palm Trees address is the preferred choice among home-buyers who aspire to live in lively neighbourhood of Marathahalli, Bangalore. Skilfully designed, the 2 BHK flats occupy an area of 1204 sqft and 1300 sqft while the 3-bedroom flats cover an area of 1948 sqft. Satko Palm Tree Marathahalli rent option is available for families seeking short-term accommodations. All these residential apartments are exclusively designed for excellent ventilation and maximum sunlight. Satko Palm Trees Apartments reviews are favourable and the society is well-packed with a large troupe of modern amenities for a complete blissful life.Clubhouse, aerobics room, gym, swimming pool, aerobics room are few ideal place to spend your leisure time.In-house retail shop is also available to for all your grocery needs and other daily needs. Reserved parking space is available abundantly to park good number of vehicles.To enliven yourself, there is a wonderful park and lovely flower gardens right next door. Highpoints The two main aspects of this residence are vaastu compliant layouts and air-conditioned apartments. Marathahalli is a sought-after residential neighbourhood blessed with lots of top-ranked schools, hospitals and shopping malls. Proximity to numerous workplaces and prominent areas of the city further makes this locality a realty hotspot. Well-provided with a series of modern amenities and well-located a flat in this residence is truly a lucrative asset to own, so book today. To gather more information about the project, take a tour of Satko Palm Trees photos!!!

column2: OverviewAxis Capstone Construction Pvt. Ltd presents to you a residential project named Axis Antara. Being advantageously situated on Bannerghatta Road, Bangalore, this project is offering 128 units of 1 and 2 BHK type that are available in 3 striking towers. Under construction, Axis Antara flats price list lie within the range of Rs. 25.4 Lac - 42.5 Lac. Axis Concept Construction Pvt. Ltd. reviews are all positive and the developer is well known for on time delivery of the project.Project detailsAxis Antara flats are attentively constructed with modern techniques. The area of 1 BHK apartments range from 565 sqft to 745 sqft and the 2 BHK flats are occupying an area that varies from 860 sqft to 945 sqft.Unique amenities offered in this project includeCCTV surveillance, gym, water supply, reserved parking space, intercom facility, kids play area.Power backup, swimming pool, lift, rainwater harvesting system and much more.  HighpointsAxis Antara on Bannerghatta Road stands apart from all the other projects in the city as the concept of this project is based on musical theme. The project falls under Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana and the apartments having up to 60 sq.meters carpet area are excused from service tax.The locality is also the major USP as IT offices like Oracle, Infosys, IBM, Wipro, Accenture, TCS etc., are nearby. Located in investment hotspot Budigere Cross, off Whitefield, close to where 40% of Bengaluru Works. The upcoming Peripheral Ring Road will provide excellent connectivity to all parts on Bengaluru. Proximity to highly reputed educational institutes, hospitals and retail hotspots makes daily life extremely convenient. A short drive from the functional Byapanahalli metro station and the upcoming Ujjval Vidyalaya Metro Station, Whitefield.Envisioned as part of mini city with residential, retail, healthcare, restaurants and educational facility. Designed by renowned architect Hafeez Contractor, with 75% open, green area. A large gated community with well-planned apartments, nearly 5 acres club, several parks and vast central open green area. Shriram Properties 
Shriram Properties are a popular real estate developers & builders exuding fine dedication in building affordable housing & commercial properties across various localities in Chennai, Bangalore, Kolkata and Vizag. The company was established in 1990 and with an experience of over a decade, Shriram Properties aspires to construct projects to satiate needs of the modern lifestyle with world-class amenities. Till now, they have successfully executed 4.8 million sq. ft. of residential & 1.03 million sq. ft. of commercial projects. Shriram Properties in Bangalore is a renowned for their excellent commitment towards the customers, Shriram Properties has elevated its success to new heights. 
With an exceptional proven track record of completing major projects in Tier 1 & Tier 2 cities, Shriram Properties aims to establish their pan-India presence with a portfolio of construction projects comprising of modern integrated townships, residential apartments and commercial, hospitality, SEZs & retail. This construction company offers 1, 2 and 3 BHK apartment ranging between 44 Lakhs and 4.6 Crore. Today, they have partnered with Starwood Capital Group & Sun Apollo and Walton Street Capital for investments. 
Some of the projects by Shriram Properties that are worth mentioning are Shriram Greenfield in Bangalore, Shriram Smrithi in Bangalore, Shriram Sameeksha in Bangalore, Shriram Suhaana in Bangalore, Shriram Chirping Woods in Bangalore, Shriram Summit in Bangalore, Shriram Panorama Hills in Bangalore and much more.

column2: OverviewSowparnika Purple Rose elegantly crafted by Sowparnika Projects is situated in Old Madras Road, Bangalore. This project spans across 4 towers that is inclusive of 369 residential apartments. Sowparnika Purple Rose prices range in between 35 to 39.7 lakhs. Sowparnika Purple Rose floor plan is designed to include 2 and 3 BHK residential apartments. Have a look at Sowparnika Purple Rose photos for a clear view about the project.Project DetailsThe 4 huge opulent towers are a home to few very beautifully crafted apartments. The areas of 2 BHK flats here are in between 929sqft to 1078 sqft area. 3 BHK flats also differ in size lying in the range of 1120 sqft to 1357 sqft area.Sowparnika Purple Rose is a fabulous project that blossoms within the neighbourhood of rose gardens. The project is truly a dream come true for the working professionals who njoy residing in and around greenery and pollution free zone. Designer elevation offers panoramic views. There is no compromise done on comfort and luxury.  Sowparnika Purple Rose Review should be viewed by the buyers so that they get a clear picture about the project.The specifications of Sowparnika Purple Rose are certainly high. High quality vitrified tiles used for flooring, teak wood frame for main door, acrylic paint on the exterior walls, kitchen equipped with granite counter top, sink and drain board etc.Sowparnika Purple Rose offers many basic and modern amenities.-club house, banquet hall, rain water harvesting, security, library and business centre, power back up, intercom facility and kids play area are the amenities available inside the society itself.HighpointsThis project has easy accessibility to all the day to day conveniences. Indian Clinic Noor Khan Hospital is only within 1.1km range. The reputed St.Joseph's English School is located at a radial distance of 1km. Kannurahalli Bus Stop is within the periphery of 1.7km.
column3: Sowparnika Projects and Infrastructure Pvt Ltd, since its inception in 2003, has grown into one of South Indias leading property developers in the Affordable Housing Segment. column2: Overview RERA certified, Prestige Boulevard located in Whitefield, Bangalore is developed by the renowned Prestige Group. The project spans across 3-acres and features 9 grand towers that hold 144 units. The project comprises of 2 and 3 BHK flats and builder floor apartments ranging from 1044, 1640 sqft. Prestige Boulevard flat prices vary from Rs. 51.0 Lacs  1.06 Cr and for further details, browse through Prestige Boulevard photos and brochure. About the project          Have a glimpse at the flexible payment plans and floor plans of Prestige Boulevard and know why this project is so popular and worthwhile. The project is still-under construction and slated possession date is December 2019. Both the flats and builder floor apartments will be offered with freehold ownership, which make them a profitable investment asset. Available for both resale and rent, Prestige Boulevard apartments assure great and wonderful living spaces that will simply amaze you. The 2 BHK builder floor apartments are spread across 1044, 1064 sqft while the 2 BHK flats vary from 1043, 1068 sqft. Similarly, the 3 BHK builder floor apartments range from 1585, 1636 sqft and the 3 BHK flats measure within 1584, 1640 sqft. Well-constructed to meet all the needs of modern age buyers, this project is conceptualized with sheer elegance and is armed with an abundance pool of modern amenities. These apartments are well-aligned for sufficient natural light and excellent cross ventilation. Highpoints A series of high-end amenities like club house, swimming pool, gym, kids play area and various sports facilities is the exclusive feature of this residential enclave. Reliable connectivity to workplaces of ITPL and MG Road via good public transport connectivity is an added advantage, which make this area a preferred residential destination. For a jubilant, comfortable and convenient lifestyle with your family, book a flat now in Prestige Boulevard located in Whitefield, Bangalore

column2: Overview Sumadhura Shikharam Whitefield, Bangalore is an impressive residential project by Sumadhura Infracon Private Limited. Located just a stone’s throw from all the prime necessities, this residential society spread across 4-acres of blooming greenery offers 392 well-designed units spread among 6 towers. The project offers a wide range of  3-bedroom flats ranging between 1600-1945 sqft. About the Project Strategically located, this residential project is a perfect place if you are looking for a luxurious home within the affordable budget. So, hurry up and a book a flat now in Sumadhura Shikharam Whitefield, Bangalore. All these residential permanents are offered with Occupancy Certificate (OC) which make these properties worth consideration. Furthermore, filled with lots of fresh air & natural light, the well-ventilated residential apartments of Sumadhura Shikharam Whitefield welcome you to breathe a new life and live in contentment. Soak in the serene atmosphere of this society and unwind yourself from all the stress of life. To usher an active life, this residential project offers a bunch of world-class sporting & other recreational amenities like jogging track, amphitheatre, party lawn, well-equipped gym, swimming pool, meditation hall, aerobics room, tennis courts, etc. This is a safe and secured gated community with CCTVs installed across all the towers. Highpoints Convenient location is the prime factor which make Sumadhura Shikharam Whitefield is preferred residential place. Forum Value Mall, Hope Farms and Satya Sai Hospital are the famous landmarks to this residence. VIBGYOR High, DPS and Whitefield Global are some of the prominent schools found within close proximity. This stunning residential project also offers good connectivity to public transport facilities. Whitefield also enjoys good proximity to major IT companies/parks like CapGemini, KIADB, HP, ITPL and KIADB to name a few.

column3: DSR Group was established more than 2 decades ago in 1988 with the vision of transforming the real estate industry and today after the journey of so many years, its projects stand testimony to the shining excellence and brilliance in execution. Commanding an unparalleled expertise, the group has spread its operations across South India across many real estate verticals, catering to various categories of clients. DSRs repertoire has a wide array of exclusive projects which have been crafted to international standards. With diversified businesses interests across many portfolios DSR today has achieved staggering successes, thanks to its partners, associates and employees. Its success is shared and cherished among its people who work towards the common goal of a promising and prosperous future. Customer satisfaction is the corner stone of our companys philosophy. We constantly strive for perfection in our service by understanding the customer needs and providing innovative and customized real estate solutions. The locations of our projects are so carefully chosen that they provide immense potential to investment. All through its existence, DSRs ideals of quality, innovation and attention to the needs of its clients have always been of utmost importance. These ideals remain at the core of every endeavour of DSR. The DSR brand itself stands for quality, commitment and innovation which manifest in all that it does and stands for. The group has several projects underway in Bangalore, Hyderabad and Chennai catering to the customer with varied needs and tastes. column2: OverviewFive Summit a prestigious project situated in Whitefield, Bangalore is developed by the renowned The Address Makers. Five Summit encompasses 5 magnificent towers comprising of 224 residential flats. The price list of Five Summit ranges in between 1.18 to 1.60 crores. The sizes of these flats lie in the range of 1779 sqft to 5366 sqft area. Five Summit photos in the image gallery give a better view about the project design.About the ProjectThis project is designed to include 3 and 4 BHK residential flats of different sizes. The size of area included in this property is different according to the number of BHK's. The Five Summit Address spans over an area of 5 acres with 12 floors. The floor plan of The Five Summit Address is designed in such a way that these Apartments comprise of wide space with proper ventilation at every corner of the house. The interiors are elegantly crafted with granite countertop in kitchen, designer tiled floor, huge windows for proper sunlight and high end sanitary fittings in the bathroom.According to The Five Summit reviews, a number of facilities are available such as swimming pool, clubhouse, tennis and badminton court, jacuzzi, squash court, steam and sauna, skating rink, table tennis, billiards, carom board, kids play area gym etc. These awesome amenities ensure residents experience a wonderful lifestyle in this project. HighpointsThe Five Summit Address enjoys a great location offering easy accessibility to various areas in and around Bangalore. Location is a prominent one as well with a number of school, hospitals, gardens, shopping centers etc being situated nearby. High end security devices ensure round the clock security and safety of the residents. This project adopts excellent security measures to protect this gated community. So come and book your dream home now.
column3: THE ADDRESS MAKERS is a professionally managed Real Estate development arm of Piramal Fund Management. Piramal Fund Management is a leading Real Estate Private Equity and Debt platform promoted by Piramal Enterprises, a multi-billion dollar business conglomerate with diverse interests such as pharmaceuticals, specialty glass, real estate and financial services with operations in over 100 countries across three continents. Piramal Fund Management encompasses an overall corpus of over INR 7500 crores across 7 Funds and 3 third party mandates. The fund has investments across various real estate projects in Mumbai, NCR, Bengaluru, Pune, Hyderabad and Chennai. THE ADDRESS MAKERS has carved out a vision that it foresees to achieve in residential offerings. The expertise and practical understanding of real estate industry offers an inherent assurance of successful implementation and timely delivery of real estate projects.

column2: Overview: A beautifully designed residential venture in the upbeat locality of Whitefield, Bangalore- Sumadhura LNR Lake Breeze is by one of the reputed builders namely Sumadhura Infracon Private Limited. Sumadhura LNR Lake Breeze floor plans are one of the best you have come across with space utilisation and efficient construction. Sumadhura LNR Lake Breeze photos are quite remarkable too, priced at a range of Rs 73.1 Lac - 1.18 Cr which are quite pocket friendly for a lifestyle with class. Spread across 3 towers with about 192 units, Sumadhura LNR Lake Breeze apartments are targeted to offer best of the necessities and conveniences. About the project : Favoured with tons of positive and confident reviews Sumadhura LNR Lake Breeze, don’t have second thoughts while choosing a flat offered by this project. Sumadhura lake breeze address is sited in one of the best localities of Bangalore with all the amenities and necessities at hand. Aeshetically designed with vaastu complaint floor plans, built with up to date technology, high-quality construction material and encircled with verdant greens, Sumadhura Lake Breeze, is a perfect accommodation who wish to live a peaceful and harmonious lifestyle. The 2 BHK units range from 1260 sq. ft. to 1470 sq. ft., these 2 BHK units are decent and worth every bit of your hard earned money. The 3 BHK units range from 1560 sq. ft. to 1910 sq. ft. The 4 BHKs come in two sizes viz. 2035 sq.ft. and 2045 sq. ft. which are quite comfortable. Highpoints: Commendable connectivity to public transport systems such as autos and taxis, well known educational institutions are within 1.5 km radius, health care and a lot of other basic as well as fundamental necessities is what makes this locality a star. Treat yourself with all the facilities and luxuries, don’t jus wait there book a flat now!!!

column2: Overview: Habitat Eden Heights is a project by Habitat Ventures Private Limited located in Whitefield, Bangalore offering 2 BHK and 3 BHK spacious apartments. The project is ready for possession and consists of 314 units spanned over 4 towers. Habitat Eden Heights price rate start from Rs. 85.9 Lac onward.Project Details:Habitat Eden Heights is a ready to move residential project situated in Whitefield, Bangalore by Habitat Ventures Private Limited offering lavish and thoughtfully designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK spacious apartments. Habitat Eden Heights plot areas for its 2 BHK flat range from 1354 sq. ft. to 1447 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range from 1768 sq. ft. to 2021 sq. ft.Habitat Eden Heights apartment are designed with specifications like water proof terrace and toilet, vitrified tiles and anti skid tiles flooring, hardwood frame doors, concealed electrical wiring with modular switches, concealed plumbing with quality sanitary ware, branded fixtures etc.Habitat Eden Heights has numerous amenities for its residents like a club house, jogging & strolling track, outdoor tennis courts, power back up, swimming pool, lift, 24 hour security, visitor parking, intercom facility, banquet hall, gym, piped gas, rain water harvesting, indoor squash & badminton courts, multipurpose courts, vaastu compliant, waste disposal, fire fighting equipment etc. and many more.Highpoints:Habitat Eden Heights is situated in the heart of the IT hub of eastern part of Bangalore. Habitat Eden Heights locality is one of the most popular neighbourhoods and also has close connectivity to the rest of the city. Several basic civic utilities like Hoodi Bus Stop, Gopalan National School, Phoenix Marketcity, Telerad RxDx Healthcare Whitefield, Syndicate Bank ATM, Big Bazaar, The Zuri Whitefield, PVR Cinema, Hexa Innovation Park, Indian Oil Petrol Pump etc. all lie in close vicinity of the project.
column3: Bengalurus very own International award winning architect developers, Habitat Ventures is a professional integrated real estate development company with expertise in conceptualizing, building and operating innovative developments in Southern India. In 13 years, Habitat has developed 2.5 million sq. ft. and delivered across 15 projects. Habitat has grown into a brand renowned for its classy and state-of-the art real estate developments. The principals at Habitat Ventures are architects with over two decades experience in design, consulting and implementation.

column2: Overview:Duo Marvel developed by Duo Associates, Yelahanka – Bangalore are offering residential plots for sale in Bangalore. The project has a total of 501 units which are in accordance with the needs and requirements of the buyer. Duo Marvel is an ideal setting for your beautiful and lovely dream house. About the Project:Duo Marvel layout associates is a real estate group which focuses in getting the trust and reverence of its customers. Duo Associates is a well-known company and has skilled engineers and attentive constructors who have effectively constructed many residential projects. It has a past of delivering homes in a timely manner and constructing them as per the needs and requirements of the customers.With many specifications and world class amenities, Duo Marvel, Bangalore makes for a perfect place to stay with your loved ones. Some of the specification are covered Storm water drains, water line with individual connections, underground sewage with individual connections, tar road, trees with tree guards, compound wall, underground electrification with individual connections, park, playground, children's playpen, provision for telephone and cable TV connection and round the clock security. Highpoints:Duo Marvel society comes with a fully functional club house, lift, reserved and visitor parking and many other state of the art amenities for a comfortable life. In addition to this, the prime location of the project makes it worthy of your time and investment. With many noted hospitals and schools in the vicinity, the project is one of its kind. Yelahanka junction, CPRF bus stop and Neha Prakash bus stop are located in the area.Updated Duo Marvel photos will give you more details of the project. Make sure to book your plot in Duo Marvel now. It will surely ensure a life of luxury and happiness for you and your family.

Ltd.&cityName=Bangalore&cityId=3327&postingType=P&aboutDeveloper=Value Designbuild Pvt. Ltd. (VDB) is an IS) 9001:2008 certified Bangalore- based company, incorporated in September 2002, under the provisions of The Companies Act, 1956. VDB is engaged in property development and design-build services. The firm is registered with all regulatory authorities in India like Income Tax, KVAT, Service Tax, et.. VDB is a member of CREDAI (Confederation of Real Estate Developers’ Association of India), Bangalore, which is the apex body for private real estate developers in India.

VDB is driven by Koshy Varghese who has over 30 years of experience in the fields of real-estate development, construction and architecture. Prior to setting up VDB, Koshy had worked in various capacities for international companies like WJ Towell, Oman National Development Company, Prestige Estate Projects and Scotts India among others. Apart from Koshy Varghese, VDB is peopled by 20 of the finest professionals, with a collective experience of over 70 years in the construction industry.

The company adheres to a principle of openness in everything it does. To customers this translates into transparency and honesty in every deal. To partners this means a relationship based on complete faith and reliability. To employees this implies approachability and the assurance of being heard. It is upon this foundation of openness that VDB sets about building its empire. &developerLogo=https://img.staticmb.com/mbimages/project/Value-Designbuild-1394623514778-d-logo.gif&yearOfExp=

column2: Legacy Salvador is a project located in Yelahanka, Bangalore. It is offering 2 BHK, 3 BHK, 4 BHK and 5 BHK apartments. The project is currently under construction. It consists of 167 units, 5 floors and 10 towers spanned over a total project area of 3.20 acres.Project Details:Legacy Salvador is offering luxurious and spacious 2, 3, 4 and 5 BHK apartments. They are being skilfully crafted with a well thought infrastructure and lush interiors. Legacy Salvador plot area for its 2 BHK flat range from 1330 sq. ft. to 1350 sq. ft.; 3 BHK flat areas range from 1675 sq. ft. to 1725 sq. ft.; 4 BHK flat areas range from 2100 sq. ft. to 2650 sq. ft. and 5 BHK flat areas range approx. 3050 sq. ft. The price rate starts from Rs. 71 Lac onward.Legacy Salvador is a RERA Certified Project. The apartments are designed with vitrified tiles flooring, hardwood frame doors, aesthetically designed washrooms, modern sanitary ware, modular kitchen, etc.Legacy Salvador will also provide numerous world class amenities to its residents like gated community, fire fighting equipment, basketball court, spa, landscape garden, indoor games, jogging track, children’s play area, swimming pool, gym, security, community hall, sewage treatment, service lift, rain water harvesting, etc. among many others.Highpoints:The project is developed in the prime location of Yelahanka, Bangalore. It aims to provide a unique and modern way of living for its occupants. The locality has seen the fastest growth to any other. It is constant demand from Bangalore’s property seekers. It has great connectivity of 18 km to Kempegowda International Airport, 7 km to Canadian International School, Canadian International School, Yelahanka Government Hospital, Tata Institute of Fundamental Research, Prestige Plaza etc.

column2: Overview Apartments in Krishna Shelton are advantageously located in Yelahanka, Bangalore and are elegantly crafted by Krishna Enterprises. This project is spanning across 260 aesthetically designed apartment units which are embedded in two magnificent towers, these living spaces are very well designed to offer an admirable lifestyle. The price list of Krishna Shelton ranges from Rs. 76.3 Lac, 1.09 Cr which offer living spaces which are ready to move-in. Project details Krishna Shelton in Yelahanka, Bangalore, have excellent connectivity to most of the major destinations which include schools, colleges, medical health care centres and Banks. The flats in Krishna Shelton have excellent configuration and are tucked in with high-end amenities and facilities. The interiors are impressive too, the interiors include high-end electrical fixtures, good quality flooring and premium quality bathroom accessories. The project offers a combination of 2 BHK, 3 BHK units, 3 BHK as well as 4 BHK penthouse are all available at an affordable price, the sizes of which range between 1407 sq. ft. for 2 BHK apartment units, 1755 sq. ft. to 1897 sq. ft. for 3 BHK units, 2079 sq. ft. for a 3 BHK penthouse and 4 BHK penthouse is sized in the range of 2400 sq. ft. which are all available and provide variety of options to the end user. This residential venture is also blessed with amenities such asclub house, swimming pool, Indoor Squash and Badminton Courts, Indoor Games Room to name a few. Highpoints Krishna Shelton photos and reviews are quite commendable and will clear all your doubts regarding the project. The project offers excellent connectivity to most of the major destinations which include educational institutions, medical aid, banks and ATM’s and other such social infrastructures. Don’t just dream, take a step book a flat now

column2: Yelahanka is now a budding place where many residential townships are getting constructed and this place is getting popularity day by day. Nagarjuna Meadows has launched its second phase at Yelahanka where serenity meets comfort. The rich and lavish 2 and 3 BHK homes are designed specifically to make home special for every member of the family. Yelahanka a popular suburb of north Bengaluru is closely connected to ITPL, Manyatha Tech Park etc and is populated with retails and malls for hang out spots. This place is close to the Bengaluru international airport and many hospitality giants have utilized this fact to their advantage.Freshness in every brick, elegant design, world best design and architecture are the advantages of Nagarjuna Meadows. The houses are spacious well lit and aerated. With a club house and a pool side lounge facility this apartment is no less than a five star accommodation. The kids enjoy in their kids pool and there is a separate play area for them that is a vehicle free zone.Nagarjuna Meadows offers the life style that makes one rejoice in happiness.
column3: NCC Urban Infrastructure Ltd. is a Subsidiary of NCC Limited and comes Equipped With a world class building techniques and state-of-the-art building infrastructure that is expertly commandeered by top-notch professionals.NCC Urban Infrastructure's quality operations span across Residential and commercial complexes, townships, SEZs and serviced apartment complexes. The company has an impressive pan India presence across Bangalore, Hyderabad, Kochi, Vizag, Guntur, Ranchi and Dubai. Strict adherence to superior standards on time deliveries and transparent documentation has made preferred destination for individuals who are looking for quality living at affordable prices.NCC Urban has inherited its experience and expertise from NCC Limited. Known for its excellence in the execution of Turn key projects, Industrial Buildings, Multistoried, Commercial structures,Townships, Roads, Bridges, Pipelines etc. and rated as growing Infrastructure Company in India with annual turn over nearly Rs. 6,200 crores.NCC Urban is developing the prestigious National Games Housing Complex Project in Ranchi, Jharkhand. The Company has also acquired lands in and around Bangalore, Chennai, Goa, Gurgaon, Hyderabad, Kakinada, Lucknow, Raipur and Vizag for its Real Estate projects. NCC Urban is all set to deliver 12.8 million sft. of built up area spread over 286 acres in the next three years.

column2: The beautiful project at Yelahanka in Bangalore is located only a few kilometers from the local police station and the project is located just opposite to the BMS IT College of engineering. The ongoing project by the Legacy Global Projects Pvt Ltd is a magnificent structure. The great looking complex is having 58 luxurious apartments. The apartments are having 2 and 3 bedroom features and they are located at the perfect location in the city. The major feature in the location of the apartments is that they are located near the airport. In fact, the project is on the way from the main city to the airport and that makes it a major important property for the dwellers.  The Swimming pool and the parks around them make the beauty of the project a green one and filled up with serenity. The marvelous location of the deluxe high rise project is also provided with the best needful amenities for the dwellers. The Wi-Fi connection in the entire project for the dwellers is also another facility for the computer savvy dwellers that will be staying there. The best things are the security system in the project. The main gate is having the security posting for 24 hours and the fire protection and fire fighting equipments in the tower makes the life of the dwellers a really secured one.

column2: Unishire Panamera is a boutique 32 home limited edition project spanning 8 floors, comprising of duplex 3 and 4 BR apartments situated on a beautiful 60 feet wide road behind Manyata Tech Park, North Bangalore. All homes are large, spacious, airy, well-lit and efficiently designed to offer maximum livable space and unhindered views of the beautiful environs. A modern club house with its unique façade and design is equipped with the best of amenities one could wish for. Additionally every home boasts of top of the line specs and finishes to bask you in complete luxury. Situated behind the IT SEZ Manyata Tech Park this location is one of the most sought after neighborhoods in Bangalore that is developing at a very rapid pace. Numerous commercial Establishments, Entertainment Hubs, Malls, Educational Institutions and Health Care Centers are at immediate vicinity and several under development. The most important facet of this location is its close proximity to the Outer Ring Road (ORR), Bangalore International Airport (BIA) and the Peripheral Ring Road which entails easy access to all parts of Bangalore. With several infrastructural development activities under progress, this location is the destination of tomorrow.

column2: While most people visit art galleries to nourish the souls, a lucky few get to measure in them. That Century Artizan for you. Century Artizan is home to the foremost wonderful assortment of distinctive sculptures, housed in acres of abundant tranquillity brought to you by Century Real Estate. Handily set off the Bial Road, Yelahanka, Bangalore. Century Artizan contains of secluded plots of 50 x 80 providing you a shocking canvas upon that to create your dream home. The project is surrounded by Mallya Aditi College, Ryan International College, Vidyashilp Academy, Canadian International College, Columbia Asia Hospital, Baptist Hospital, Cauvery Medical Centre and much more. The project provides good connectivity to the rest of the city as well as to the surrounding areas. The project undertakes 82 units which are spread across an area of around 1200 sq. feet to 6025 sq. feet. The project provides all the world class facilities and amenities at one roof. Come and book now to life your life king size which is possible only at Century Artizian.
column3: Century Real Estate, with its headquarters in Bangalore, India was founded by Dr.P.Dayananda Pai and Mr.P.Satish Pai in the year 1973 with the primary objective of transacting in the simple buying and selling of land. More than 35 years later, the Company has evolved into an integrated, full service real estate development company that has transformed Bangalores urban landscape and is credited with several of Bangalore's landmark developments such as Manipal Centre, Taj Residency, Vijaya Bank Head Quarters and Diamond District to mention only a few. Century Real Estate has the unique distinction of having purchased land on M.G.Road at INR 5 per square feet way back in 1973 where today the quoted prices are in the range of INR 20,000 per square feet.Regarded as one of the oldest and most respected companies in the Real Estate space in India, the growth of Century Real Estate has practically mirrored the growth of Bangalore as one of Asias fastest growing cities. Today, we are the largest owners of real estate in Bangalore with a land bank in excess of 3000 acres representing more than USD 2 billion in asset value and a development portfolio of over 10 million square feet comprising hotels, office buildings, residences, educational institutions and integrated townships spread across South India.

column2: OverviewPresenting elegant 2 and 3BHK apartments in Purva Venezia, developed by Purvankara, which is located in Yelahanka, Bangalore. This project comprises 1332 units spread across 16 towers. The floor plan comprises proficiently designed, ventilated apartments ranging from 1267 sqft to 1780 sqft.  Purva Venezia flats are available for sale with the price starting from Rs 69.0 Lac 1.20 Crore.About the ProjectPurva Venezia floor plan are thoughtfully designed to deliver perfect homes that are rich in comfort and are spacious too. The apartments of this gorgeous residence are ready for possession and are offered with freehold ownership.Well-located in one of the beautiful neighbourhoods, the rent of Purva Venezia apartments in Yelahanka, is also quite reasonable. Every feature of these abodes have been precisely designed and are also attractive with high-end vitrified flooring.Inspired by the mesmerising landscape of Venice, these eye-catching apartments showcase the fine mastery of true craftsmanship, which will simply leave you amazed. The grandeur of the shimmering waterways, gardens, domed bridges and the infinite pool of modern amenities like gym, swimming pool, Jacuzzi, tennis court and other recreational luxuries invite you to a brand new world of modern living.HighpointsThe incredible view of the 1600 acres of vibrant greenery, which belongs to the University of Agricultural Sciences is one of the prime feature of this project. The convenient location with good public transport connectivity is yet another added advantage. Yelahanka Railway Junction is a easily accessible, which is situated just 4.3kms away from this residence.Availability of top-rated schools,  hospitals and popular shopping malls in around this area make Purva Venezia Yelahanka, Bangalore a sought-after residential address.Enjoying excellent reviews, Purva Venezia aims to provide a plush lifestyle with all the necessities and if the irresistible Purva Venezia photos are anything to go by, then just walk in and book a flat now in this amazing project.

Since its inception in 1975, Puravankara has believed that there is only one mantra for success: Quality. This credo combined with uncompromising values, customer-centricity, robust engineering, and transparency in business operations, has placed it among the ‘most preferred’ real estate brands in both residential and commercial segments.

The Company has grown from strength to strength, having successfully completed 36 residential/commercial projects spanning 7.80 million square feet. Currently, it has 29 million square feet of projects under development, with an additional 88 million square feet in projected development over the next 7-10 years. An ISO 9001 certification by DNV in 1998 and a DA2+ rating by CRISIL are testament to Puravankara’s reputation as a real estate developer of the highest quality and reliability standards.

The Group commenced operations in Mumbai and has established significant presence in the metropolitan cities of Bangalore, Kochi, Chennai, Coimbatore, Hyderabad, Mysore and overseas in Dubai, Colombo and Saudi-Arabia.
&developerLogo=https://img.staticmb.com/mbimages/project/Purvankara-1386411823762-Developerlogo.jpg&yearOfExp=

column2: The Purva Pavilion is located at the Kempapura Main Road, Hebbal, Bangalore, Karnataka. This project is built by a reputed builder the Puravankara Project Limited. They offer you with 100 to 500 units with thirteen blocks having 2BHK and 3BHK apartments. The carpet area covered is 1000 – 1550 SQ. FT and the selling price is Rs. 60.30L – Rs. 75.01L. They are approved by the BMRDA, A Khata, KSPCB, BWSSB, BESCOM, the Standard Chartered Bank, The State Bank of India, Axis Bank, HSBC and HDFC Bank. Amenities: There is a play area with sand pits, and many other facilities are provided.This project also provides you with round the clock security service that will keep you and your family safe. 100% power backup is also provided to everyone.On the other hand, they even provide you with modern facilities such as gym with the latest equipments, a swimming pool for everyone and much more. Highlights:The Chairman’s Club airport and Resort is just 2.6 kilometers away from this project. The herbal Railway Station is just 3.4 kilometers away from this place and is the closest railway station to this project. There are many other hospitals, schools, groceries and many other public utilities just a few blocks away.
column3: Established in 1975 in Mumbai, the Puravankara Projects Ltd has been following its mantra for success that is quality. Today, the group is a known for constructing the best commercial and residential projects and all because of the customer- centric service, sturdy engineering and complete transparency in business operations. Covering around 23.54 million square feet, the group has successfully completed 2 commercial and 48 residential projects till now. The reputed company has got an ISO 9001 certification by DNV in 1998 and a DA2 rating by CRISIL. Following the concept of affordable, group offers luxurious 2BHK, 3BHK, 4BHK and 5BHK apartments that are available on sale from 56 lacks. These flats falls in the size range of 1194 sq.ft. to 3217 sq.ft. so that you do not have to make any compromises.

Established in 1975 in Mumbai, the Puravankara Projects Ltd has been following its mantra for success that is quality. Today, the group is a known for constructing the best commercial and residential projects and all because of the customer- centric service, sturdy engineering and complete transparency in business operations. Covering around 23.54 million square feet, the group has successfully completed 2 commercial and 48 residential projects till now. The reputed company has got an ISO 9001 certification by DNV in 1998 and a DA2+ rating by CRISIL. Following the concept of affordable, group offers luxurious 2BHK, 3BHK, 4BHK and 5BHK apartments that are available on sale from 56 lacks. These flats falls in the size range of 1194 sq.ft. to 3217 sq.ft. so that you do not have to make any compromises. 
The group was established in Mumbai but has also made a name in cities like Chennai, Hyderabad, Kochi, Mysore and Bangalore and overseas in Colombo, Saudi- Arabia and Dubai. The projects offered by Puravankara are Puravankara Limousine Home, Purva Westend, Purva Sunflower, Purva Bluemot, Purva Oceana, Purva Grandbay, Purva Highland, Purva Whiteball, Purva Swanlake etc.

column2: Prestige Monte Carlo, introduced by Prestige Group, is a residential township located at Yelahanka, Bangalore. Priced between Rs. 60 lacs and Rs. 66 lacs (price per sq-ft ranging between Rs. 4299 and Rs. 4784), this residential project has 2 and 3 BHK multi-storey apartments covering areas from 1254 sq-ft to 1535 sq-ft. The best thing that Prestige Monte Carlo in Yelahanka enjoys is the weather that is pleasant all through the year, the place being at a higher altitude compared to the rest of the city. Equipped with basic and advanced lifestyle amenities like elevators, power backup, security, flower gardens, parks, garbage disposal, and kids pay zones, Prestige Monte Carlo is a complete and enjoyable habitat.Located at a distance of only 0.50 kilometer from Goodwill English School, 0.54 kilometer from Jayalaxmi Hospital, 0.27 kilometer from Yelahanka Railway Station, 6.91 kilometers from Esteem Mall, and just 0.39 kilometer from State Bank of Mysore, Prestige Monte Carlo is well-connected and easily accessible to and from all the important points. Prestige Monte Carlo is located at a place that has superior quality shopping areas, eateries, and luxury hotels. The residents of this township can enjoy the weather of the countryside without compromising an urban lifestyle.

column2: Teeming above the city’s sky line like a beacon light in a chaotic world is the realm of luxurious living personified by RMZ Latitude. The high end apartments in North Bangalore are set a midst sprawling 3.9 acres of luscious, verdant greenery and tree lined boulevards. The luxury high end apartments and premium penthouses designed by world renowned architect Oru Bose are architectural embellishments in the exquisitely designed landscape by MPFP of New York, that take luxury homes to unparalleled heights in Bangalore Hebbal. The stellar and distinct interiors of the luxurious apartments have been designed by the Masters in this class – HBA with sensitivity to make urban living pleasurable and relaxing in the exclusive apartments at the RMZ Latitude. The interior of the high end condominiums with inherent luxury and comfort mirrors the uber lifestyle and is a sanctuary to unwind from a busy life.

column9:
https://www.magicbricks.com/propertyDetails/otherProjectsByDeveloper.html?psmid=5008072&devId=58822&devName=RMZ Corp&cityName=Bangalore&cityId=3327&postingType=P&aboutDeveloper=
India's leading corporate real estate developer since 2002, RMZ Corp has given the industry a fresh perspective. The essence of this new approach is captured by our philosophy "Being the Change". Being the Change reflects our commitment to sustainable development.

In the past 10 years, RMZ has acquired and developed over 15 million square feet with 98%+ occupancy across our entire portfolio, positioning the brand as a leading supplier of corporate space. Over 150+ global corporations (several of which are Fortune 500 companies) such as Accenture, British Telecom, Ford, Google, Thomson Reuters, Shell, Ernst & Young, EDS, and Rolls Royce call a RMZ Corp development their home.

Backed with a strong financial credit rating, extensive private and public funding sources, local market knowledge, centralized quality control standards and experienced leadership and management teams, RMZ has been known to excel in the development of Best-in-Class FDI-compliant Commercial Office spaces.

We are committed to bringing global best practices in construction technology and corporate governance to the Indian Real Estate space. Led by a visionary team, RMZ Corp is an institution built on passion, and aspires to be the change it wants to see in the perception of real estate in India.

In the year 2011, RMZ chose to foray into the residential segment. With the introduction of the brand RMZ Homes, we strive to create homes that reflect our motto, "Live Beautifully". Luxury Condominiums, Premium Condominiums and Luxury Villa are amongst the first of our offerings.
&developerLogo=https://img.staticmb.com/mbimages/project/RMZ-Corp-1389004483437-D-Logo.jpg&yearOfExp=

column2: NR Orchid Gardenia is a testimony to exclusivity in the constantly evolving city of Bengaluru. 3 acres of lush greenery form the magnificent backdrop to 4 majestic residential towers with 128 flats ranging from 2470 sq. ft to 4975 sq. ft created with a unique blend of cutting edge design, superb aesthetics and fine functionality. It offers an international standard clubhouse and is located behind Manyata Tech Park in Hebbal, North Bengaluru. The advantages that rest with NR Orchid Gardenia are its proximity to the shopping centers, educational institutions, hospitals, entertainment centers, outer ring road to access other parts of Bengaluru and surely Kempegowda International Airport.

column2: At Brigade Caladium the sublime luxury that greets you on arrival prevails throughout the property. The smooth curves of the building derive inspiration from a droplet of water – the source of life. Set amidst exquisite landscaping the Caladium is the definitive answer to a lifestyle quest. These 3 & 4 bedroom residences range from 3450 to 4450 square feet. All residents have access to the rooftop swimming pool, lounge deck and fitness centre.
column3: Brigade Group was established in 1986, with property development as its main focus. Today, Brigade Group is one of South India's leading property developers. We are headquartered in Bangalore, with branch offices in several cities in South India, a representative office in Dubai and an accredited agent in the USA. We have a uniquely diverse multi-domain portfolio that covers property development, property management services, hospitality and education. Our projects extend across several major cities in South India: Chennai, Chikmagalur, Hyderabad, Kochi, Mangalore and Mysore.

column2: Your quest for a luxurious 2BHK on rent ends right here at Godrej Woodsman Estate Hebbal, Bangalore. Built on 15 acres of property, this successful residential project features 7 towers with total 896 units. Developed by Godrej Properties, this project is one of the best option for families seeking high-end accommodations. The flat rates of Godrej Woodsman Estate Hebbal are exclusively priced within Rs. 1.0 Cr - 1.64 Cr. Project details This is a RERA certified residential project boasting perfectly ready-to-move-in apartments. Choose from a wide range of 2, 3 & 4 BHK flats measuring from 1272 sqft to 1800 sqft. This gorgeous residence offers luxurious penthouses & duplex flats as well. Developed by the award-wining property builders – Godrej Woodsman Estate is indeed applauded with abundant positive reviews for its design, construction quality, intelligent floor plans and the price quoted. Apart from receiving fresh air & sunlight all along the day, the well-ventilated residential apartments of Godrej Woodsman Estate Hebbal also offer the panoramic views of the surrounding area. To keep you entertained in your leisure time, the society provides an extensive range of sporting & recreational amenities like clubhouse, swimming pool, tennis court, etc. Every tower is well-planned with 4 lifts to ensure easy movement. 24x7 security, 24hour water supply and uninterrupted power supply make this society a true dwelling paradise. Highpoints Centrally placed on the bustling Hebbal – Devanahalli corridor, Godrej Woodsman Estate is one of the most preferred residential destination. Columbia Asia Hospital & Presidency College are some of the well-known landmarks to this society. Easy connectivity to public transport facilities assure good proximity to International Airport via MG Road. If you been looking for a plush accommodation surrounded by good schools & hospitals, then this project awaits your attention. So, cash in and book flat now in Godrej Woodsman Estate Hebbal.
column3: Godrej Properties brings the Godrej Group philosophy of innovation and excellence to the real estate industry. The company is currently developing landmark projects in 12 cities across India. Established in 1990, Godrej Properties Limited is the first real estate company to have ISO certification. With projects that span across the country, the company's upcoming development covers 74 million square feet. To create landmark structures, Godrej Properties collaborates with outstanding associates and reputed names. The company aims to deliver superior value to all stakeholders through extraordinary and imaginative spaces created out of deep customer focus and insight.
