column2: Emerson Park gated community project is located in Whitefield, just off the Whitefield-Sai Baba Ashram road. We chose Whitefield because it is a quiet, exclusive residential area with schools, malls, healthcare facilities, software parks, and places of business – all within a 10-15 minute drive.Emerson Park has been designed to define old-world charm in a modern luxurious environment. Our small community concept promotes easier living, greater harmony and peace of mind while retaining exclusivity thus making it a great place to raise your children. The low population density ensures that residents get a sense of privacy even while sharing the swimming pool and the club house facilities. Cobbled one-way interior driveways that require cars to drive slowly add to the safe and practical allure of our residential offerings. 34 homes have been laid out in two blocks making optimal use of the area. The living spaces are located on a mezzanine level, 8 feet above the road guaranteeing complete privacy from pedestrian and vehicular traffic. Each home includes 2 private covered parking spots on the ground level.Openness is an important aspect of our design and we incorporate skylights and windows to provide ambient light and cross-ventilation. Living rooms come with 12 ft high ceilings and small landscaped spaces that bring nature indoors and provide residents with mini green courts. We are proud to share that Emerson Park is Vaastu compliant without compromising the modern design or practical nature of our homes.

Wood shire Developers LLP is a Bangalore-based real estate development company. Brought together by a shared vision, the company is promoted by a group of like-minded individuals with decades of global and local experience in real estate development, commodity export and other diverse fields of business.
The vision of Wood shire Developers is simple to provide clients with luxury homes that offer the best possible value in terms of investment, location and exclusivity. Our design philosophy embraces the construction of stylized homes with old world charm – all priced appropriately to make them attractive in todays challenging economy.

Driven by an ethos of quality and professionalism, Wood shire considers the timely delivery of specification-compliant homes its top priority and mission. We follow sustainable practices to deliver smartly-designed, environment-friendly homes that generate a low carbon footprint using the best possible materials and resources.

column2: Lifestyle finds yet another destination at Kumari Woods and Winds located at Whitefield, Bangalore sprawling across 2 acres. Kumari Woods and Winds consist of 120 units spread across 1 well-designed tower. These individual living spaces developed by Kumari Builders and Developers are available in 2 and 3 BHK configurations. Project details Kumari Woods and Winds provide a place to celebrate the lighter moments in life and a place to experience the true happiness. The 2 BHK apartments are spanning across 1070 to 1240 sqft whereas the 3 BHK apartments cover an area of 1350 to 1640 sqft. The price list of these apartments varies from 49.7 Lac to 75.1 Lac. Bank and legal approvals of Kumari Woods and Winds comprises of all leading banks, BBMP, BESCOM and BWSSB. The amenities in Kumari Woods And Winds comprises of landscaped garden, indoor games, swimming pool, gymnasium, play area, club house, car parking, jogging track, cricket court, basket ball court, senior citizen park, day care center, rock climbing, toddlers pool, skating rink, volley ball, security, yoga, etc. Spacious interiors, friendly budget and a sort after location add value to this project. Highpoints The address of Kumari Woods and Winds is a major plus point for buyers looking to invest in property in Bangalore. Whitefield is an important IT hub of Bangalore and is near to areas like Marathahalli and KR Puram. The locality is known for its good connectivity to the rest of the city, owing a house here will satisfy your housing needs. From health to nature to entertainment, it offers a complete package to satisfy everyone in your family. In short, Kumari Woods and Winds is the best value that you will get for your money. Book an apartment now and gift a deluxe home to your family.

column2: Walk into the environs of aristocratic living and feel like a pampered guest in your own home. Esperanza Towers is designed to look and feel elite and exclusive – wide open spaces with lush, blossoming greenery and the distinctive privileges and conveniences of a posh country club.The first phase of Esperanza Towers stands as a magnificent piece of architecture. The second phase of Esperanza Towers equals the allure and magic of the first. It comes with exceptional amenities, attention to the tiniest detail of comfort and convenience, thoughtfully-planned apartment layouts and a grand view of nature.Esperanza is spread over 7.5 acres. Esperanza Phase I comprises of 98 apartments and 12 Row Houses.Esperanza Phase II Towers are a modern day marvel of eco-living perfectly blended into the urban landscape, with elegantly crafted homes designed to give you best of space and lifestyle. It comprises of 190 Apartments, 12 Row Houses and 10 Town Houses. It uses intelligent Euro Design concepts that keep in mind Indian sensibilities at all levels from groundwork to design and elevations. The Studio and Single Bedroom Units range from 530-940 sqft. & Two, Three and Four Bedroom Units range from 1175-4075 sqft.
column3: Inspired by a philosophy of dynamic forms and strong expressiveness, UKN creates properties that are monumental, yet grounded in an understanding of human contexts and deep engagement with contemporary materials and techniques.In the past decade, weve applied these principles to create Commercial, Retail, Residential and Hospitality Buildings that are aesthetically uplifting as well as supremely functional and, ultimately, humane.Our team is experienced, enthusiastic and committed to working with you to create structures that serve human needs, while elevating human experience. To paraphrase the American architect and visionary Louis Kahn, we begin with the immeasurable and use measurable means to create something that, in the end, must be immeasurable - Investing in Infinity.

VBHC Value Homes Private Limited (formerly known as Value and Budget Housing Corporation Private Limited) was founded and incorporated in July 2008 by former Chairman of Mphasis, Mr. Jaithirth (Jerry) Rao and former Consumer Banking Head of Citibank Mr. P. S. Jayakumar.

An amalgamation of people with rich and vast corporate experience from diverse backgrounds, VBHC believes that good quality living should be within everyone’s reach and grasp. Landmark projects in Mumbai, NCR, Bengaluru and Chennai are testimony to this belief. Recently, we opened an international office in Dubai to serve customers across the Middle East and other parts of the world.

VBHC applies contemporary building technology, computer-aided design methods, a lean manufacturing process and ingenious industrial engineering processes to deliver affordable housing. Exceptional quality of construction, a transparent buying experience, speedy completion and delivery at low cost forms the hallmark of VBHC.

With prestigious investors, such as, HDFC, IFC, Carlyle, Van Herk Groep, Daiwa Group, and Caspian Advisers, VBHC has large-scale expansion plans, and promises to deliver 18,000 homes in the next few years as the company expands its footprint across India

column2: Pursuit of a Radical Rhapsody is a project by Total Environment located in Whitefield, Bengaluru offering luxuriously designed currently under construction 3 BHK, 3.5 BHK, 4 BHK and 5 BHK villa and apartments consisting of 799 units spanned over 34 acres of total project area. Pursuit of a Radical Rhapsody price rate starts at Rs. 2.3 Cr onward.Project Details:Pursuit of a Radical Rhapsody located in Whitefield, Bengaluru is a project by Total Environment offering spacious currently under construction 3 BHK, 3.5 BHK, 4 BHK and 5 BHK villa and apartments. Pursuit of a Radical Rhapsody plot areas for its 3 BHK flat ranges from 2561 sq. ft. to 4154 sq. ft.; 3.5 BHK flat areas range is approx. 3745 sq. ft.; 4 BHK flat areas range 4951 sq. ft. to 6295 sq. ft. and 5 BHK villa range is approx. 4786 sq. ft.The project has designed the apartments with high quality interiors as well as exteriors. It is designed in a close feel to nature, giving the residents green scenery and a quite environment.Pursuit of a Radical Rhapsody is a RERA Certified Project. Pursuit of a Radical Rhapsody is also integrated with numerous amenities like amphitheatre, children’s play area, landscaped garden, sewage treatment, swimming pool, badminton court, jogging track, lift, spa, tennis court, gym, restaurant, squash court and yoga area.Highpoints:Pursuit of a Radical Rhapsody is located in the amazing neighbourhood of Whitefield. Special amenities of the project include heated pool with outdoor infinity pool, a dance room, guest suites for visitors, indoor games zone, central community space, long term maintenance, sky walk and retail centres within the premises. The project has excellent connectivity to major MNC’s like Hindustan Unilever, Britannia, HP, Cap Gemini, Tata Elxsi, ITPL, Bhoruka Tech Park and many more.
column3: Total Environment is an architect-led real estate design and development firm, with projects that range from residential apartments to corporate campuses.Our vision is to provide an unsurpassed living experience through the creation of sensitively designed spaces.We build completely furnished and individually customized spaces with a focus on good design and sensitive detailing.Our design philosophy is about creating physical environments that are in harmony with their surroundings. Our distinctiveness lies in strong attention to detail, and contemporary design that makes living a joyous experience.We have successfully addressed the real-estate requirements of the new, global citizen.Our strength is the ability to understand and meet their needs through innovative concepts, transparency and personalized service.We combine our expertise with cutting edge technology and an out of the box Approach to make living More comfortable, productive and joyous.Our customers have found in us a partner who in a complete departure from the traditionally negative industry perception, seeks to make the whole experience as warm and personal as the homes we deliver.

column2: Alpine Viva is a stunning residential project developed by Alpine Housing. Located in the well-known IT hub of Whitefield, Bangalore – this gorgeous piece of residence is projected across whopping 6.5 acres of vibrant greenery. The project offers 2, 3 & 4 bedrooms flats with varying area size measuring from 1239 – 2495 sqft. The flat rates of Alpine Viva Whitefield, Bangalore are reasonably priced starting from Rs. 58 Lacs onwards. Project details Featuring 4 glorious high-rise towers, this residential project offers 432 elegant homes to choose from. Robustly constructed, these RCC framed structures are earthquake resistant build with solid concrete blocks. The well-ventilated residential apartments of Alpine Viva are thoughtfully constructed with anti-skid tiles in all the bathrooms and fancy vitrified flooring across rest of the homes. Beautiful teakwood doors, huge windows, large balconies and spacious kitchen rooms are some of the impressive features of these abodes which make them worth buying. Applauded with good reviews, Alpine Viva 2BHK apartments are available for both sale & rent. The project is loaded with numerous recreational & entertainment amenities like aerobic, gym, Jacuzzi, indoor swimming pool, party hall, sauna, kids play area, indoor games and much more. Highpoints The handpicked location is indeed one of the strong advantage of this RERA certified residential project which make it desirable. Several well-known IT companies like Wipro, Infosys, TCS, etc., are located in Whitefield and are easily accessible from this residence. The famous Narayana Multispeciality Hospital and the prestigious The Bangalore School are situated within just 5km radius. Reliable connectivity to public transport facilities, Outer Ring Road (ORR), ITPL Main Road and Old Airport Road make this area a favourable residential destination. So, hurry up and book a flat now in Alpine Viva Whitefield, Bangalore and experience a beautiful life with your near & dear ones.

column2: ARK Serene County is one of the popular residential developments in Whitefield, Bangalore. It is the gateway to the good life in a global destination.ARK’s Serene County at Whitefield is set in a vast 3.5 acres of land. The premium quality venture presents 274 plush apartments. Amidst a beautifully landscaped layout, a vibrant cosmopolitan community flourishes in an environment of fully loaded clubhouse and total security.Cocooned in flawless green spaces, with plenty of recreation facilities, the luxury project offers 2,3 bedroom apartments to celebrate a lifestyle filled with vigor and vitality.Here is a home that meets all your expectations, an elevated lifestyle that matches your aspirations. It is a blend of lifestyle, value & affordability in a location that is world class. The complete experience is on offer for a price that is wonderfully affordable.Your search for an ideal home ends here.

ARK began its successful journey as an integrated construction and infrastructure development company with a strategic emphasis on residential projects. Since its establishment in 1989, ARK has remained faithful to its commitment to create exceptional spaces that are beautiful and deliver unparalleled experiences.

Headquartered in Hyderabad with a regional office in Bengaluru, ARK’s residential and commercial projects have stood out for their craftsmanship and unique visual language. Making use of both modern and cultural nuances, ARK designs spaces that spell exclusivity in form, function and aesthetics. From design development through project building, and until construction closeout, ARK collaborates with all stakeholders to achieve the most cost-effective and highest quality solutions that will stand the test of time.

ARK has a rich legacy of delivering quality-laden residential, commercial and infrastructure projects for individuals, corporates, Government and Defence sectors through the Country.

column2: Overview: Mantri Global Heights is a unique designed project developed by Mantri Developers located primly in Whitefield, Bangalore offering elegant and lavishly designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK spacious apartments. The infrastructure is ready to move into and consists of 111 units spread over 2 meticulously developed towers.  Project Details:Mantri Global Heights, a residential venture developed in the locality of Whitefield, Bangalore by the well experienced Mantri Developers is offering elegant and lavishly designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK spacious apartments. Mantri Global Heights floor plan for its 2 BHK flat areas range from 1315 sq. ft. to 1355 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range from 1625 sq. ft. to 1990 sq. ft.Mantri Global Heights apartments are developed on earthquake resistant frame structure and designed with interior features like good quality vitrified and ceramic tiles flooring in all rooms, teak wood doors with shutters, granite kitchen counter with stainless steel sink, fire resistant concealed electrical wiring with modular switches, teak wood window shutters with glass good quality sanitary ware and branded CP fittings etc. You can check out Mantri Global Heights photos on magicbricks.Mantri Global Heights Bangalore features numerous world class amenities such as club house, cafeteria, jogging track, cycling track, power back up, swimming pool, lift, 24 hour security facilities, park, reserved parking, maintenance staff, gymnasium, kids play area, rain water harvesting, multipurpose courts, waste disposal, event space and fire fighting equipment etc. including many more. Highpoints: Mantri Global Heights redefines way of living for the modern families of Bangalore. The infrastructure is uniquely designed and cross ventilated. Mantri Global Heights Bangalore locality includes many civic utilities like Bevina Mara Bus Stop, Aegis Medicare, HDFC ATM, Deepthi Pharma and General Store, Five Star Chicken, Rose Garden, and Indian Oil Petrol Pump etc.

Mantri Developers  
Mantri Developers is one such builder who has steadily established itself as a trusted realty organization. The passionate Mantri Developers Pvt. Ltd. was built in 1999 by Mr. Sushil Mantri to lead real estate sector with its innovative construction projects involving 2bhk, 3bhk & 4 bhk residential apartments across Bangalore with an area starting from 950 sqft at apartment price starting from Rs. 55 Lac. The group is ground-breaking in significantly changing the infrastructure of south India its several construction projects pertaining to residential building & commercial shops and education, retail & hospitality sectors in just 14 years. The Mantri Developers are renowned for offering Villas, Row Houses, Luxury Apartments, Super Luxury Apartments and Semi-Luxury Apartments in Bangalore with a proven record of delivering 1.4 homes in a single day.
Till date, the company owns a diversified construction portfolio of over 20 million sq. ft. with 11 million sqft under various stages of construction. Recently, they have made tried their feet in the high-growth area of office leasing in Bangalore, Pune and Hyderabad which is spread over 11 mn sqft of the area. Some of the popular projects by Mantri Developers are Mantri Blossom in Bangalore, Mantri Centrium in Bangalore, Mantri Manyata Energia in Bangalore, Mantri New Launch in Bangalore, Mantri Classic in Bangalore, Mantri Lakeview in Bangalore, Mantri Splendor in Bangalore and Mantri Lavendula in Pune, these are just a few of many projects executed by the developers.

column2: Green CountyOverviewGreen County is a residential project by Anish Projects and well-located in Whitefield, Bangalore. Green County layout plan has 248 units. This project is under construction. Project DetailsGreen County Bangalore provides independent homes in a tranquil area. Green County floor plan has residential plots (1200 sqft, 1500 sqft, 1600 sqft, 2000 sqft, 2400 sqft), 3 BHK villas (1520 sqft, 1506 sqft) and 4 BHK villas (2089 sqft, 1987 sqft, 3015 sqft, 3174 sqft). The bedrooms will have laminated wooden floorings. Vitrified tiles will be used for kitchen and dining or living area flooring. The balcony and toilet flooring will have ceramic tiles. The exterior and interior walls will have emulsion paint. The kitchen will have a black granite working counter and stainless steel sink with single drain board. Toilets have provision for geyser. The price is  21.6 Lac -  30.0 Lac (1,800 per sqft -  2,000 per sqft). The average price in the locality is  5257 per sqft. Axis Bank, Punjab National Bank, Indiabulls and LIC Housing Finance are providing loan for buying properties in Green County.Green County complex will have a club house for giving a platform to the residents of the society to interact.Jogging and strolling track will give the society an aesthetic look.All the modern day amenities will be provided including tennis courts, swimming pool, safety or security, park, banquet hall for parties, gymnasium, indoor games room, rainwater harvesting for capturing rainwater, indoor squash courts, badminton courts and meditation area.HighlightsGreen County Bangalore is an attractive residential area as it is quite close to atms, hospitals, grocery stores, academic institutions, food joints, cinema hall, shopping mall, healthcare centres, fitness centre and petrol pumps. Green County photos are available online at magicbricks website.

column2: Isha Misty Green is a unique residential project positioned in S G Whitefield, Bangalore. Offered housing options at Isha Misty Green consist of 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments of different dimensions. The homes available in this project do not share common walls resulting in utmost privacy. Project details The project comprises of world class architectural design, superior technology and all the amenities for luxury living. Every section of house is properly ventilated and gives enough natural light. Isha Misty Green includes 560 units divided into 11 towers and the rates of this project ranges between Rs. 49.9 Lakhs to Rs. 55.0 Lakhs. This RERA registered project offers 2 BHK apartment spread across 1227 to 1403 sqft as well as 3 BHK which covers an area of 1436 to 1844 sqft. Isha Misty Green includes a wide range of comfy and coveted features that cooperatively along with a great site guarantee a tranquil living. Children will enjoy in specialized and totally safe play area and various gaming facilities included here. Security is one of the biggest concerns while purchasing a new property. This venture has hi-tech safety provisions. Highpoints The aesthetic design and vibrant atmosphere makes this project ideal place for recreation and peace of mind. The address of this project that is in Whitefield Bangalore is the main highlight. Residents here will unquestionably get quick access to finer utilities like colleges, hospitals, shopping areas, recreational areas, public gardens and several public facilities. Apart from this, Whitefield Railway Station, Forum Value Mall, ITPL, Vydehi Hospital, Q Cinemas, upcoming metro station and many other facilities are accessible within few minutes. At Isha Misty Green elegantly Built, innovatively structured and spaciously planned living spaces are ready for possession hence book a flat now as per your ease and preference.

column2: Overview Vaswani Exquisite is a grand project developed by Vaswani Group that offers homes that cannot be called anything less than exquisite. Spread across 4.50 acres of area this project is situated in Whitefield, Bangalore. Vaswani Exquisite which is RERA certified offers 3 and 4 BHK apartments whose possession will be given in 2019. Project details The project Vaswani Exquisite is one such effort that comes up to provide you with all the amenities of life, where you can stay in complete peace of spirit. The 3 and 4 BHK apartments are available with different price list providing a variety to potential buyers to invest in as per their budget. Vaswani Exquisite encompasses of wonderful 4 towers with 420 airy as well as flawlessly ventilated units. The area covered by 3 BHK as well as 4 BHK apartments range between 1820 to 2850 sqft. This project promises complete privacy and is designed to give you the freedom to grow, flourish and enjoy a lifestyle in an environment which spells class in every sqft. Slim towers rise in an arc, offering you unmatched and breathe taking views of the Hoodi Lake. Vaswani Exquisite offers lot of amenities such as badminton court, basketball court, cricket pitch, jogging track, lawn tennis court, multipurpose court, swimming pool, table tennis etc. Highpoints The project location which is Whitefield is an IT hub located in the eastern quadrant of Bangalore. The locality has witnessed an influx of global lifestyle and rapid urbanization. This has encouraged many builders to launch their new projects. The presence of educational institutions, healthcare centers and essential civic utilities have favored the aforementioned upcoming residential project. This phenomenon project provides extremely life oriented designs and exclusive residential living spaces, that lets life flourish amidst a lively and delightful environ therefore book a flat now.

column2: OverviewSobha Avenue is a famous residential project by Sobha Ltd located in Whitefield, Bangalore.  This wonderful project is spread across 2.97 acres comprising of well designed 175 units distributed in one tower. Sobha Avenue floor plan boasts elegantly crafted 3BHK flats covering an area of 1099 sqft to 1865 sqft. Project detailsThis project is still under construction and possession will be give by Dec 2018. Sobha Avenue reviews and images provide a perfect picture that this project is a unique combination of luxury and comfort. Moreover, Sobha Avenue address is a one stop address for all the home seekers. Sobha Avenue price list  ranges between Rs. 80.8 Lac to 1.20 Crore.These airy, spacious and bright apartments of Sobha Avenue are bordered by IT Hubs, International school and malls. This project offers variety of modern amenities like club house, jogging and strolling track, outdoor tennis courts, swimming pool and kids play area. Moreover, covered car parking is available at basement and visitor’s car parking is provided at ground level. Luxurious amenities, great connectivity and incredible look and feel altogether make it a delightful place to live in. Apart from this, there are various Sobha upcoming projects in Whitefield. HighpointsSobha Ltd project include residential apartments, villas, row houses, luxury and super luxury apartments, plotted development and homes that are well equipped with rich amenities.Close proximity to Kannamangala Gate Bus Stop, Thirumala Lakshmi Grand and Thirumala Vaibhav Appartment Complex, Five Star Chicken, Safal Daily Fresh Regional Center Of Organic Farming, ICICI Bank ATM and Aegis Medicare make this project an ideal residential destination.Within 5km radius, there are well established schools like Chrysalis High Kadugodi, Just4Kids Play School, EuroKids, Kidzee Kadugodi and Government Lower Primary School.Book now and experience a luxurious life in this gorgeous Sobha Avenue,Whitefield, Bangalore.
column3: With three decades of experience in creating resplendent interiors of palaces and masterpieces in the Middle-East, Mr. P.N.C. Menon founded Sobha Limited (formerly Sobha Developers Ltd) in 1995 with a clear vision to transform the way people perceive quality. Today, Sobha, a Rs. 25 billion company, is one of the largest and only backward integrated real estate players in the country.Headquartered in Bangalore, Sobha is primarily focused on residential and contractual projects. The Companys residential projects include presidential apartments, villas, row houses, luxury and super luxury apartments, plotted development and aspirational homes replete with world-class amenities. In all its residential projects, the company lays a strong emphasis on environmental management, water harvesting and high safety standards. .The backward integration model is one of the key competitive strengths of Sobha. This literally means that the Company has all the competencies and in-house resources to deliver a project from conceptualisation to completion. Backward integration includes an interiors division, a metal works and glazing factory, and a concrete products factory. Sobha has also diversified into retail business with spring mattresses under the brand name Sobha Restoplus. More than 27 variants of mattresses are produced by the mattress division using cutting-edge machinery of international quality.
column6:
Highlights


Surrounded by IT Hubs and International school close to Malls USP : Luxurious Amenities, great Connectivity, amazing Look and feel with International Quality Homes

column2: OverviewSmrithi Developers are offering spacious and well-ventilated villas through its one of a kind project - Sobha Azalea. The project is centrally located in Yelahanka, Bangalore and it includes spacious 26 units. Sobha Azalea prices for spacious villas lie in the financial plan of several home seekers.Project detailsSobha Azalea floor plans are brilliantly made to offer 3 BHK and 4 BHK villas, which are available in various area sizes ranging from 2032 sqft to 2600 sqft. These luxurious villas enjoy ample natural light during day time and are also well-ventilated.These villas consist of spacious bedrooms, dining room, kitchen, balconies, bathrooms and a servant room.  The bedrooms are spacious enough and the flooring is made up of stunning vitrified tiles. The kitchen room is also well-equipped with latest technologies and the flooring is done with ceramic tiles. Rest of the rooms flooring is also done with fine looking and high quality tiles.In addition, utility area, common area and staircase are also available for these villas. At Sobha Azalea, you can live a luxurious life in a prime location along with top notch amenities in the premises.Intercom facility, maintenance staff, gymnasium, indoor games room, kids play area, Wi-Fi connectivity, reserved parking and a lot more facilities are available here.HighpointsThe best part of this project is the designer landscape, which adds beauty to these spacious villas. All the air conditioned 3 BHK and 4 BHK villas are properly constructed as per vaastu guidelines to ensure prosperity in the lives of the residents. The location of the villas in Sobha Azalea offer easy access to places like Shivanahalli Bus Stop, Mallya Aditi International School, Dr. Agarwals Eye Hospital, Yelahanka Junction etc.Quickly have a look at the Sobha Azalea photos and then book a villa of your vision.

column3: NCC Urban Infrastructure Ltd. is a Subsidiary of NCC Limited and comes Equipped With a world class building techniques and state-of-the-art building infrastructure that is expertly commandeered by top-notch professionals.NCC Urban Infrastructure's quality operations span across Residential and commercial complexes, townships, SEZs and serviced apartment complexes. The company has an impressive pan India presence across Bangalore, Hyderabad, Kochi, Vizag, Guntur, Ranchi and Dubai. Strict adherence to superior standards on time deliveries and transparent documentation has made preferred destination for individuals who are looking for quality living at affordable prices.NCC Urban has inherited its experience and expertise from NCC Limited. Known for its excellence in the execution of Turn key projects, Industrial Buildings, Multistoried, Commercial structures,Townships, Roads, Bridges, Pipelines etc. and rated as growing Infrastructure Company in India with annual turn over nearly Rs. 6,200 crores.NCC Urban is developing the prestigious National Games Housing Complex Project in Ranchi, Jharkhand. The Company has also acquired lands in and around Bangalore, Chennai, Goa, Gurgaon, Hyderabad, Kakinada, Lucknow, Raipur and Vizag for its Real Estate projects. NCC Urban is all set to deliver 12.8 million sft. of built up area spread over 286 acres in the next three years.

column2: Esteem Northwood tranquility and peace is all yours at Esteem Northwood. Your home puts you in touch with nature and greenery. Lush trees, front lawns for your kids to play in, backyards for your parents to enjoy the evening, deck areas to have your parties at and even terrace gardens to enjoy a view. In short, at Esteem Northwood you are truly enveloped in nature. The first property of its kind on the Yelahanka-Doddaballapur stretch, the project boasts of a green layout with a number of evergreen trees, landscaped gardens giving the feel of an international development. The project is spread across 3.5 acres of land and will consist of 10 villaments, 8 villas and 4 mansions. Phase I which consists of 10 villaments is ready to occupy. Phase II which consists of 8 villas and 4 mansions is currently under construction and will be complete by Dec 2016. A. Villaments: The villaments are designed to give you all the privacy, luxury and space that you yearn for. Every villaments comes with its own private lawn, ample parking space and a terrace that is entirely yours. Ranging from 3600 – 4100 Sq feet. With an option of choosing from either 4 BHK + Study or 5 BHK + a family room, here you will find all the space you need to lead a luxurious lifestyle. B. Villas: Luxury now customized to your liking. We understand that when it comes to your dream home, one size does not fit all. Especially for someone of your stature. Which is why, at Northwood, we give you the option of fully customizing your villa. Two storeys of the ultimate in lavish living welcome you to a sprawling 4000 - 4600 Sq feet. homes. With private lawns, landscaped garden, double height living rooms, complete privacy, and an option to choose from 4 or 5BHK homes, this is the high life you always aspired to. C. Mansions: Every king deserves a kingdom yours is here. It honestly does not get better than these 9000 Sq feet, of land that is all yours. With private plunge pools and private lawns. And a fully landscaped backyard with an option of having a basketball court, or a badminton court or just an open play area as per your whims and a 4500 - 5400 Sq feet. Home that is studded with all the modern aesthetic sensibilities. In fact, it is not a home, but a palace. Everything you can imagine, we have crafted it within.
column3: Esteem Group, established in 1981, is one of Bangalore leading real estate developers building premier residential, commercial and retail projects. Living up to its credo of giving customers a wise investment in every square foot, Esteem Group has delivered over 1500 homes in the best neighbourhoods across Bangalore. Understanding the importance of a convenient location, Esteem Group carefully selects its projects to provide excellent connectivity and accessibility to well knit social infrastructure.
column6:
Highlights


Location AdvantagesMG Road 19 KmEsteem Mall 10.2 KmColumbia Asia Hospital 10 KmBengaluru International Airport 22 KmMalya Aditi International School: 2 KmRMZ Galleria Mall: 2.8 kmProject USPWhat is Esteem Northwood? Esteem Northwood, is a luxury villa development and the first property of its kind on the yelahanka - Doddaballapur stretch.   The project boasts of a green layout with a number of evergreen trees, landscaped gardens giving the feel of an international development. The project is spread across 3.5 acres of land and consisting of 22 units with a spread of 10 Villaments, 8 Villas and 4 Mansions loaded with high end specifications.Where is Yelahanka located? What is the importance of this location? Where the six-lane highway from Bangalore city to the international airport in Devanahalli branches off to the left into Doddaballapur Road, a hoarding proclaims: “Yelahanka is the new Gurgaon”. Put up by a residential builder, it is a defining marker in the growth curve of Yelahanka, a suburb 15 km north of the city that was envisaged as a satellite town but is now under the Bruhat Bengaluru Mahanagara Palike (BBMP). Proximity to the new airport - 20 km away - has given aspirations to the town that has seen a huge property boom in the last five-six years. One of its greatest strengths is its planning in time and is known as one of the few suburbs in India that can boast of infrastructure and connectivity in tandem with development.What other facilities would be provided if I own a Villa/Mansion? One of the advantages of this project besides its high end specification and amenity list is its legal structure. Owners will be buying a plot and a house on it and can modify the house and sell it individually in the future as a plot as well thus giving it an individual house feel in a gated community. You will also be benefited with the in place infrastructure in the layout. Can I customize the villa according to my need? Yes, Esteem Group understands that most people build a house once in their lifetime. We are open to all kinds of internal customizations and changes and even have options of a second floor. While it is under construction, Esteem Group is happy to entertain all kinds of internal changes besides structural changes. Our design team will work with you to customize your villa and make it your home. 



Discussion





Esteem Northwood Discussion Group

column2: Sobha Developers Pvt. Ltd. launches another great project named as Sobha Althea, located at Yelahanka near Dodaballapur in Bangalore. The venture is spread across an area of 8 acres of land providing over 176 spacious houses offering 3BHK residential apartments ranging from 1800 sq. feet to 2128 sq. feet and 4BHK ranging from 2996 sq. feet to 2998 sq. feet. BDA has approved this residential project providing home loans from many renowned banks such as Axis Bank, ICICI Bank, HDFC Bank, and much more. The project offers great connectivity to the rest of the city and to place places such as MG Road which is just 20 Kilometres away, 2 kilometres away from the food world, 6 kilometres away from Ryan International School and much more. Sobha Althea is just another name for relaxation and comfort with amenities such as swimming pool, well equipped gymnasium, 24 hours round the clock security, Library for peace of mind and concentration, Jogging track and much more. Come now and take along with you a lifetime experience of living.
column3: Sobha DevelopersSobha Developers established in 1995 has significantly elevated new heights of success by becoming a Rs. 26 billion enterprises. Recognized as one of the major real estate players in the country, Sobha Developers has demonstrated skills in developing world-class residential apartments/fats, commercial buildings, housing complex, and professional hubs. The group is also listed on stock exchanges with an annual turnover of Rs. 15 billion. It has a presence in 24 cities and 13 states across India with popularity throughout the Middle East. Their persistent excellence in construction and customer satisfaction has been the top priority of their business. column2: Overview Located in Yelahanka, Bangalore – Prestige Oasis is one of the best-selling residential project developed by the leading & trusted builders Prestige Group. Projected across 33 acres of verdant greenery, this magnanimous project is inclusive of total 182 independent plush villas. These plush homes villas are available with 3 & 4 – bedroom configurations measuring from 2710 – 4200 sqft. The well-designed villas of Prestige Oasis are priced starting from Rs. 2.10 Cr - 2.25 Cr. Project details Finely crafted as per Japanese Haiku (a lyrical 3-line ode to nature), these exquisite & cadenced villas are counted as one of the Bangalore’s most luxurious residential properties. Symbolizing the true essence of modern design, this residential oasis is an ultimate option for families looking for a handsome villa with an affordable price tag. The positive reviews, dynamic floor plans and the artistic design of Prestige Oasis make it one of the sought-after residential address of Yelahanka, Bangalore. The wide collection of top-notch amenities and the convenient location make this residential paradise worth every penny of your money. The well-ventilated villas of Prestige Oasis welcome you to live a hearty & healthy life with your loving family. Along with all the desired modern amenities, this well-planned residential development also provides all the prime necessities like 24hours water supply, power backup and round the clock security promising a safe and smooth lifestyle. Highpoints Placed in Yelahanka, Bangalore – this RERA certified project offers easy connectivity to all kinds of public transports and adjoining areas. Stonehill International School and the Bettahalasur Railway Station lie within just 5 km radius. Hassle-free conveyance to Bellary Road and Outer Ring Road (ORR) is an additional benefit. So, if you are looking to live a luxurious lifestyle with all the conveniences at an arm’s distance, then hurry up and book a flat now in Prestige Oasis.

The Prestige Group owes its origin to Mr. Razack Sattar, who envisioned a success story waiting to take shape in the Retail Business in 1956 itself. Since its formation in 1986, Prestige Estates Projects has grown swiftly to become one of South India's leading Property Developers, helping shape the skyline across the Residential, Commercial, Retail, Leisure & Hospitality sectors.

Prestige Constructions, an ISO 9001:2000 certified company is the only Real Estate Developer in Bangalore to have won the reputed FIABCI Award for its software and residential facilities. Prestige was also recently awarded the Crisil DA1 Developer Rating in recognition of the quality of their projects and the ability to deliver completed projects in a timely manner, making them the ONLY Property Developer across India to have received this distinction.
Today, Prestige stands as a giant and with aggressive growth plans across the Residential, Commercial, Retail and Hospitality Sectors in Bangalore, Goa, Hyderabad, Mangalore, Cochin and Chennai, lies a bright future ahead!

column2: An intimate and elegant community of townhouses awaits you at Prestige Garden Bay in Yelahanka, North Bangalore. Set across 6.2 acres of lush, landscaped verdure, Garden Bay promises a life that glides through luxury with peace reigning all around!The development is completed with 184 homes, spread across 8 blocks, of 5 storey’s each. Spacious four bedroom duplexes with private gardens and commodious three bedroom flats make up this new Prestige project!Needless to say, as all other developments from Prestige, Garden Bay too comes with their stamp of unqualified class… Which means that you can expect within this residential development as well, lifestyle amenities that include a Gym, a Rooftop Party Hall, a Theatrette, a Toddlers Crèche, a Lawn Tennis Court, an Indoor Squash and Badminton Court, a Basketball Practice Court, a Swimming/Wading Pool, a Health Club, Billiards and Table-Tennis Tables and a dedicated Children’s Play Area.

column2: OverviewNagarjuna Meadows - II is ready to move in a residential project where you get a perfect chance to live a life in serenity and opulence. This beautiful place is surrounded by verdant opulence and Nagarjuna Meadows - II, Yelahanka, Bangalore is also well-connected with rest of the world. Nagarjuna Meadows in Bangalore is a luxurious project that comes with detailed and elegantly designed apartments. Here you will enjoy life between the acres of lush greenery and pure environment. You can choose your space from a wide option of 58 units that comes in a shape of 2bhk and 3bhk apartments.Project DetailsThis unique architecture structure Nagarjuna Meadows - II, Yelahanka, Bangalore is fully designed and developed for a lavish lifestyle and also offers you everything from the goodness of nature to all the modern amenities. The project features well-designed 3 bedroom apartments at Nagarjuna Meadows - II, Yelahanka, Bangalore. The project is a perfect investment option for those who are looking for a greater return in Bangalore. This project is perfectly designed to offer you all the benefits that you have ever imagined in your perfect home. Search for details like Nagarjuna Meadows – II photos, Nagarjuna Meadows – II price, Nagarjuna Meadows – II layout, Nagarjuna Meadows – II floor plan at Magicbricks.This project is the gateway to a peaceful and exuberant life and it is situated in North Bangalore, where you will find everything nearby. Nagarjuna Meadows – II in Bangalore is highly attractive amongst the new home buyers due to its perfect location and modern facilities.-          Here you will enjoy the easy accessibility to all the places in the city Bangalore, for example, schools, hospitals, marketplaces, shopping mall and much more.-          The project is well equipped with clubhouse, jogging track and strolling track, outdoor tennis courts, cycling track, power back-up, swimming pool, lift, maintenance staff, banquet hall, rainwater harvesting, intercom facility, kids play area, visitor parking area, service goods lift, park, security system, gymnasium, indoor games room, flower garden and much more.
column3: NCC Urban Infrastructure Ltd. is a Subsidiary of NCC Limited and comes Equipped With a world class building techniques and state-of-the-art building infrastructure that is expertly commandeered by top-notch professionals.NCC Urban Infrastructure's quality operations span across Residential and commercial complexes, townships, SEZs and serviced apartment complexes. The company has an impressive pan India presence across Bangalore, Hyderabad, Kochi, Vizag, Guntur, Ranchi and Dubai. Strict adherence to superior standards on time deliveries and transparent documentation has made preferred destination for individuals who are looking for quality living at affordable prices.NCC Urban has inherited its experience and expertise from NCC Limited. Known for its excellence in the execution of Turn key projects, Industrial Buildings, Multistoried, Commercial structures,Townships, Roads, Bridges, Pipelines etc. and rated as growing Infrastructure Company in India with annual turn over nearly Rs. 6,200 crores.NCC Urban is developing the prestigious National Games Housing Complex Project in Ranchi, Jharkhand. The Company has also acquired lands in and around Bangalore, Chennai, Goa, Gurgaon, Hyderabad, Kakinada, Lucknow, Raipur and Vizag for its Real Estate projects. column2: Overview: Sited in one of the best localities of Bangalore, Whitefield is known as an IT Hub. Having all the necessities at hand Urban Forest apartments, add verdant green to the hustle and bustle of Whitefield. Intellectually constructed by Alembic Real Estate, Urban Forest flats are spanning across over 4 sumptuous towers featuring 636 units, Urban Forest is priced in the range of Rs. 69.0 Lac 1.03 Cr. Every nook and corner of the flat has been designed to give you all the comforts of a modern lifestyle and the bliss of nature. About the project : The society is spanning across over 8.23 acre land, of which 2-acre has been dedicated for recreational amenities which will benefit the well being of the residents, 3-acre has been devoted for lush greenery which is clearly visible if you browse through Urban Forest photos. The apartments have excellent security system which ensures the society and its residents have peaceful nights and are secure. Each of these apartments are elegantly designed to give the residents all they have wished for with up to date civil work and good quality construction work. The Urban Forest floor plans include mixture of 2BHK, 3BHK and 4BHK units, of which 2 BHK measures 1314 sq. ft., 3 BHKs are sized 1762 sq.ft. and 1890 sq.ft, the 4 BHK units measure 2628 sq.ft. and have all the necessities a family would require to live a comfortable lifestyle. Highpoints: Loaded with a pool of amenities, the project has all the advanced as well as basic recreational niceties which include an outdoor gym, tree houses, an amphitheatre, a shaded jogging track, outdoor tennis courts, swimming pool, indoor squash and badminton courts to name a few. ITPL, Ujjwal Vidyalaya and proposed Metro Station and Columbia Asia Hospital are within close proximity. With remarkable Urban Forest reviews, grab this opportunity and book a flat now.
column3: BUILDING BETTER SPACESTransformation is a fascinating phenomenon in which something achieves the qualities to become something better. Having built happy homes for over 900 happy families and having earned the respect of customers and peers alike within a short span of five years, Alembic Real Estate now transforms into Alembic Real Estate and endeavors to continue building better spaces for happier lives.logoSince 1907, the Alembic Group has unflinchingly pursued a singular goal To enhance the quality of life through high quality products and services. This is evident in every product manufactured by Alembic Pharmaceuticals Ltd., our flagship company, and across our diversified business portfolio which includes healthcare, glassware, engineering and chemicals. Alembic Real Estate is building upon this heritage of excellence, trust and professionalism.At Alembic Real Estate, we understand the challenges of new-age life and develop projects that address these issues. Thus to balance the chaotic lifestyle and rapidly degrading environment, we design and build elegant, tranquil and inspiring spaces for people to live, work and play.

column2: Overview DNR Atmosphere by the prominent DNR Corporation in Whitefield, Bangalore is a high-end real estate project featuring 276 residential apartments spread across 4 towers. Ready to move in, the apartments in this project are available in the price range of Rs.1.07 crore and Rs.1.92 crore. About the Project DNR Atmosphere is a brilliantly crafted residential project offering 4 towers of 3BHK and 4BHK residential apartments spread across 4 acres of land. The residential condominiums are meticulously designed featuring a simple yet an elegant design where one gets to enjoy unrestricted 270° views of the surroundings. Offering complete value for money, DNR Atmosphere on Varthur Main Road is right next to Adarsh Palm Meadows and is only minutes away from hospitals, schools and malls. The beautiful and scenic Varthur Lake is also situated at a short distance. Some of the schools, hospitals, IT Parks and malls found in the vicinity of few kilometres include Global India International School, Chrysallis High School, ITPL, Columbia Asia and Forum Value Mall. DNR Atmosphere, Whitefield truly creates an atmosphere of joy, bliss and serenity, which everyone today desires from their little haven of peace and safety. To provide an atmosphere where one gets to enjoy an abundance of recreational and leisure facilities, DNR Atmosphere offers a plethora of awesome facilities. Some of these include basketball court, indoor games, cycling and jogging track, swimming pool, gym, multipurpose hall, amphitheatre, sauna and steam, library etc. Highpoints The prominent highpoint of DNR Atmosphere is undoubtedly its expansive 20000 sq.ft. elegantly designed clubhouse surrounded by beautiful landscapes and water bodies and offering a bunch of recreational, fitness and indoor games facility. DNR Atmosphere is undoubtedly a sought after project in Whitefield and it is worth every penny as one gets to discover an exhilarating lifestyle.

column2: BM Magnolia Park is a residential project by BM Developers. This prestigious project is located at Whitefield, Bangalore. It has 525 Units of 2 Towers offering a wide range of 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments.Project Details:BM Magnolia Park is poised to be one of the most attractive residential gated societies in   India. It has 2 towers, Cedar and Aspen built on 5 acres of landscaped area, so that your family can live in an open environment. The project offers 2 BHK apartments with many range options of 1080 sqft, 1155 sqft, 1175 sqft, 1185 sqft, 1190 sqft, 1215 sqft, 1220 sqft,1225 sqft, 1230 sqft, 1235 sqft, 1240 sqft, 1250 sqft, 1260 sqft, 1270 sqft, 1275 sqft, 1280 sqft, 1285 sqft, 1290 sqft, 1300 sqft, 1305 sqft, 1320 sqft, 1325 sqft, 1350 sqft, 1385 sqft, 1410 sqft and 3 BHK apartments range from 1450 sqft, 1455 sqft, 1480 sqft, 1515 sqft, 1570 sqft, 1590 sqft, 1620 sqft, 1920 sqft etc. BM Magnolia Park is a RERA Certified Project. Special Amenities of this project are Jogging and Strolling Track, Swimming Pool, Banquet Hall, Gymnasium, Kids Play Area, Library and Business Centre, Indoor Squash & Badminton Courts. Book with us today to fulfil your desire of a dream home.Highpoints: The project is 200 Meters from proposed 270 feet Peripheral Ring Road (PRR) Whitefield, Bangalore which is 3 KM from Proposed Metro rail station and also Whitefield railway station. It has three way connectivity to ITPL SEZ, Whitefield Main Road and Forum Value Mall and Ascendas Park square Mall. Unique features include Easy approachability to Multiple super specialty hospitals, International schools (CBSE and ICSE), and Multiple Shopping Malls with multiplex screens. 700+ IT companies are present within 5 KM Radius. BM Magnolia Park has easy accessibility to famous restaurants including BMTC bus facility from the project main gate onwards.
column3: At BM Dvelopers, we create comfortable, well-planned urban spaces for both residential and commercial purposes. As one of the foremost builders in Bangalore, our team of professionals ensure that your property is among the best of real estate in Bangalore. Founded by Mr. Gajendra Naidu in the year of 1996, BM Developers brings alive the creativity, integrity and versatility encompassed within each of its projects, with the sole aim of providing superior contemporary living spaces envisioned with a traditional approach, to bring every customer close to nature. Our customer-centric approach focuses on creating harmonious energy and positivity for quality living and lasting relationships with our customers.With an experience over 20 project in past 8 years. Has proven track record on deliver, quality and timeline. Currently we have over 8 ongoing project ranging from 20.5 lakhs onwards. Project are spread across South and East Bangalore.
column6:
Highlights


200 Meters from proposed 270 feet Peripheral Ring Road (PRR) Whitefield, Bangalore (connecting Tumkur to Electronic City via Bellary Road, Hennur Road, Whitefield Road and Sarjapur Road).3 KM from Proposed Metro rail station and also Whitefield railway station.Three way connectivity to ITPL SEZ, Whitefield Main Road and Forum Value Mall and Ascendas Parksquare Mall.Easy accessibility to Multiple super specialty hospitals, International schools (CBSE and ICSE), and Multiple Shopping Malls with multiplex screens.700+ IT companies within 5 KM Radius including IT SEZ's like I.T.P.L, Brigade IRV center, Sigma Technology Park, GR Tech Park, H M Tech Park, Brigade Tech Park and many more.Easy accessibility to famous Restaurants, PUB's, Micro Breweries and leading 3 and 5 star hotels (Biere Street, Windmill Craftworks, Taj Vivanta, Barbique Nation as a sample and many more within 2 to 4 KM radius).BMTC bus facility from the project main gate onwards.USPBBMP Approved Vaastu Compliant appartments in a prime locality

column2: If you are looking for a luxurious and peaceful lifestyle surrounded by greenery then Parimala Sunridge by Vishnu Priya group is the right choice for you. Apart from the luxurious design and layout of the apartments is the added advantage of being located in Whitefield. Whitefield as we know is the IT hub of Bangalore and provides many features for the residents. These multistory apartments offer a covered area of 1185 sq-ft to 1800 sq-ft which makes them quite spacious. These 2 and 3 BHK apartments offer you 24 different floor designs to choose from which ensures that your personal requirements are taken care of. These apartments feature excellent cross ventilation and natural light which makes living conditions healthy.These apartments are located close to kundalahalli junction, Sigma Tech Park, Forum valley Mall, ITPL, Hypercity mall, and is close to three world class schools. Children can have fun at the kids play area, skating rinks, cricket nets, basketball court, and the swimming pool. Some of these amenities can also be enjoyed by adults. At the same time, there is a separate niche area for senior citizens. All in all this residential complex is very family oriented and takes care of all the members of the family.

column2: OverviewIf you are someone who wants to live a peaceful life and yet do not want to make any compromises with your modern lifestyle then Elv Marvel is an ideal place to live. Designed to fulfil all your modern day needs, the Elv Marvel in Whitefield, Bangalore is surrounded with lush greens. Thoughtful design and smart floor plan are the two facts that makes the society an attractive place to live. Featuring 2 towers and 84 residential apartments, the Elv Marvel is a modern project that is designed to offer affordable housing in Whitefield, Bangalore. Reasonably priced, these 2BHK and 3BHK residential flats are available in various sizes.Project detailDesigned with huge open spaces inside as well as outside the residential flats, the Elv Marvel is constructed with a smart floor plan to offer complete privacy and proper cross- ventilation and natural light. If you book a flat in Elv Marvel, you are sure to get comfort and peace with your family. The society is constructed by the ELV Constructions that is a known name in the real estate world and has been delivering best residential spaces mainly in East Delhi including ITPL, Whitefield and Kundanahalli.At Magicbricks, you can explore Elv Marvel photos, Elv Marvel floor plan, Elv Marvel price, flat/apartment price in Elv Marvel and all the other important information. The residential flats in Elv Marvel feature RCC framed structure, 6’’ thick concrete solid block for external walls and 4 inch thick cement concrete solid block for internal walls, vitrified ties in entire flat, main door with teal wood frame with moulded panel shutter, internal doors with salwood frame with moulded panel shutters, powder coated aluminum frames with aluminum glass sliding shutters and MS safety grills, granite platform with stainless steel sink and 2 ft height ceramic tiles dado on cooking platform, concealed copper wiring with switches, toilets with anti- skid ceramic tiled flooring and glaze tile dado upto door height etc. Fulfilling all your modern day needs, the Elv Marvel is loaded with all latest amenities and facilities.Swimming pool, gym, basketball court, badminton court, table tennis and jogging track are perfect for fitness and sports freaks.Spend quality time in toddlers pool, elders park, aroma park, garden area, party area and pool side.Strategically located, the Elv Marvel offers easy connectivity to public transport, IT companies, lake view, shopping malls like Park square mall, Inorbit mall, Forum mall etc., Vaidehi hospital, Columbia Asia, schools, hospitals etc.
column3: Over the last decade ELV Constructions has evolved into one of leading builders in Reals Estate primarily focused in East Bangalore (ITPL, Whitefield, Kundanahalli), India. column2: There is a time and a place for the old and the new to meet halfway and enter into a gentlemen agreement not to interfere in each others lives. The time is now. The place is Prestige Silver Oak. Where Bangalore generation gap is bridged forever. Not far from ITPB, one of the most recognized icons of Bangalore silicon city label, if you strike out into the hinterland off Whitefield Road, you will come upon a quiet residential enclave whose sylvan tranquility is almost amazing. Here in an elegantly designed independent villa, ensconced in its own private garden, you can come home to the quiet life. The way it used to be in the good old days. Leisurely, relaxed and in no hurry to reach anywhere.

column2: Located in Whitefield, Bangalore, Ozone Promenade by Ozone Group is an ongoing residential development boasting luxurious abodes loaded with all the top-notch amenities. Spread across 5.6acres of land parcel, this gorgeous project offers various 2, 2.5 and 3 BHK well-planned flats with varying area size from 1365 sqft to 2095 sqft. The project features total 549 residential units distributed among 8 towers. The flat rates of Ozone Promenade Whitefield, Bangalore are priced between Rs 85.85 Lacs – Rs. 1.31 Cr. Project details With possession by December-2019, Ozone Promenade Whitefield apartments are designed with modern construction standards to provide extremely blissful living to its occupants. The impressive floor plans of of Ozone Promenade Whitefield apartments will certainly impress you. Drawing lots of fresh air & light, all the well-ventilated residential apartments of Ozone Promenade Whitefield assure you a happy & healthy life. The apartments of Ozone Promenade Whitefield are also available for rent. This is a RERA certified residential project and is one of the best project to invest your money. Some of the exclusive amenities provided include swimming pool, club house, table-tennis, gym, jogging track, cricket, kid’s play area and much more. Highpoints Situated bang on Mahadevpura main road, Ozone Promenade Whitefield enjoys all the advantageous of a good location. Connectivity to public transport facilities and a proposed Namma Metro Station within just 130mts make this project sought-after. Well-known IT companies like TCS, Capgemini and Dell are situated within close vicinity. Narayana Multispeciality Hospital, VIBGYOR High School and St.Joseph's Convent School are found within just 4km radius. The popular Phoenix Mall is situated right opposite to this project.  If you have been looking for an ultimate luxurious residential destination for your family, then this project is the best option. So, cash in and book a flat now in Ozone Promenade Whitefield, Bangalore.

column2: Overview Prestige White Meadows is award-wining 28-acre residential project developed by the real estate giant Prestige Group. Well-placed in the plush neighborhood of Whitefield, Bangalore – this remarkable project offers 288 luxurious sky villas spread across 4 towers and 66 3-storyed independent bungalows. The independent bungalows are available with sizes varying from 5576 sqft to 6219 sqft. The sky villas of Prestige White Meadows, Whitefield are priced from Rs. 3.80 Cr onwards while the bungalows cost starting from Rs. 8.70 Cr. Project Details Beautifully carved by skilled engineers & artisans, these stunning sky villas and bungalows are spaciously planned to provide unmatched privacy and comfort. All the fittings & fixtures have been finely installed and are of top brands to elevate the standards of high-class living. If you are seeking a luxurious paradise for your precious family, then Prestige White Meadows, Whitefield is the place to look for. The moment you enter this residency you will be enthralled with the peaceful surroundings filled with lots of positive vibes. Besides, being splendidly appointed, the well-ventilated residential apartments & bungalows of Prestige White Meadows, Whitefield are blessed with enough fresh air & sunlight. Badminton court, children's play area, gymnasium, squash court, tennis court, swimming pool and much more attractive amenities make this township more appealing. Highpoints Prestige White Meadows Whitefield, Bangalore was honored with “High-Rise Project of the Year” at Construction Week India Awards – 2015 and “Asia's Best Real Estate Project” during the WCRC Leaders Excellence Awards – 2014. Prestige White Meadows, Whitefield is conveniently located with good proximity to several IT companies/parks like HP, Cap Gemini, ITPL and Brigade Tech Park. Connectivity to public transport facilities is added advantage. The Deen's Academy and VIVERO International Pre-School are few prominent schools found close by. Narayana Multispeciality and Columbia Asia are two major hospitals situated within close vicinity.

Prestige Group
With more than three decades of experience in building world-class projects, Prestige Group has transformed the Real Estate Industry by exuding high business ethics. Initiated in 1986, the group has successfully completed around 210 projects covering over 80 million sqft of land that is affordably priced. With the state-of-the-art engineering techniques and highest quality materials in its construction projects, Prestige Group has decisively recognized itself as one of the prominent developers. Presently the group has 53 ongoing residential & commercial projects covering 54 million sqft. There are 35 forthcoming projects with over 48 million sqft of top-notch property area. 
Being the outstanding realty player of the country, the company assures in presenting sustainable habitats and workplaces featuring all modern amenities. With 147 individual dwellings set on about 14 acres. These spacious units are designed to be trendy and timeless bringing out the old world charm of old Bangalore. Nature Walk is for those who will not settle for anything but the best from life. It offers the best of everything – aesthetics, design, fittings, landscape, connectivity and all that you could want from a home and community. column2: Overview Assetz Marq in Whitefield, Bangalore is a prominent residential project spread across 22-acre enclave featuring 4 signature towers housing around 469 units. The price range for the apartments vary between Rs.59.8lakhs and Rs.96.3lakhs for residential apartments in the configuration of 2BHK and 3BHK. About the Project This thoughtfully designed project, situated in the prime location of Whitefield is revolutionary in many aspects as it aims to provide every conceivable convenience within the premises. Each floor only has 4 apartments, which means every apartment receives plenty of natural light and fresh air and privacy is also maintained. Super built up area for a 2BHK unit is around 1277sq.ft. while 3BHK super built up area is around 1041sq.ft. and 1101sq.ft. Assetz Marq has been designed in a manner to provide a comprehensive lifestyle where the aim is to ensure residents are able sit back and relax and literally not worry about a thing in their little private haven. The well ventilated residential apartments along with a suite of exclusive amenities is a testimony to the luxury and comfort this project provides. Top-notch facilities are provided such as clubhouse, infinity pool, indoor badminton court, party hall, gym, multipurpose sports facilities, indoor games and courtyard. Every minute detail in this project has been given due consideration to ensure only the highest quality standards are met. Highpoints behind Assetz Marq has been intelligently planned by the award-winning master planner Ross Bonthorne from Australia. He has ensured that every apartment is equipped with fibre-to-the-home technology. This project also boasts 5 acres of retail Town Center. Whitefield is a prime location boasting connectivity to Old Madras Road and city center. Location, technological advancement and green surroundings are just few of the reasons on why booking an apartment in Assetz Marq is a wisest decision one can make.
column3: Founded in 2006, Assetz Property Group is a front-runner among multinational developers in India with over 10 million square feet under development. Assetz, headquartered in Singapore, is a multi-faceted real estate development and asset management company with four business verticals: Commercial, Residential, Warehousing and Fund Management.Assetz has built two world-class IT tech parks in Bangalore: Vrindavan Tech Village (now Embassy Tech Village) - Indias first Platinum LEED certified IT SEZ, and Global Technology Park. And, its residential portfolio includes ten projects in prominent locations across Bangalore.

column2: OverviewBrigade Lakefront by the Brigade Group is a gated community of charming lakefront of 2BHK, 3BHK and 4BHK residential apartments at an affordable price starting from Rs.77lakh onwards. With a super built up area varying between 109 to 312sq.m., these homes offer a seamless blend of serenity, bliss, utmost luxury & comfort.  About the ProjectBrigade Group has been instrumental in developing some of the finest edifices in the country and their ethos of building yet another residential landmark is evident in Brigade Lakefront, a spectacular residential development in the heart of Whitefield, Bangalore.  These well-ventilated residential apartments are available in the configuration of 2, 3 and 4BHK units in the size ranging between 124 and 312 square meters. Each apartment is meticulously designed offering thoughtfully designed layouts and spacious living spaces. The flat rates in Brigade Lakefront range between Rs.73 lakhs to Rs.2.20crore. Adding to the charm of these gracefully designed residences are an exclusive array of amenities for the residents to enjoy and experience a holistic lifestyle. 2,787 square meter of space has been reserved for leisure and recreational facilities such as a rooftop swimming pool, children’s play area, mini theatre, tennis court, basketball court, cricket pitch, senior citizen court & large open green spaces. Brigade Lakefront is suitably positioned in terms of location too, as it enjoys proximity to various social infrastructural facilities. Areas such as EPIP Zone, ITPL & Brookefields are easily accessible within a short distance of 3 to 4km. Malls, hospitals & schools are also situated within easy reach of Brigade Lakefront. HighpointsWhat sets Brigade Lakefront apart is the amount of open space residents get to enjoy. Spacious interiors combined with vast open spaces help one to rejuvenate & revive amid natural greens despite being situated in the heart of the city. To breathe in fresh air every morning, book a flat in this project offering premium lifestyle & plenty of lung space.
column3: Brigade Group was established in 1986, with property development as its main focus. Today, Brigade Group is one of South India's leading property developers. We are headquartered in Bangalore, with branch offices in several cities in South India, a representative office in Dubai and an accredited agent in the USA. We have a uniquely diverse multi-domain portfolio that covers property development, property management services, hospitality and education. Our projects extend across several major cities in South India: Chennai, Chikmagalur, Hyderabad, Kochi, Mangalore and Mysore.

column2: Positioned on Whitefield-Sarjapur Road, Prestige Lakeside Habitat is a luxury residential building spread over 102 acres. This project by Prestige group consists of 3426 luxury apartments with 271 villas having their own private gardens. Nothing be more satisfying than owning your house in such a wonderful location. The Prestige Lakeside Habitat, Whitfield is specially designed around the Disney theme to present you the exquisite habitat in Bangalore at affordable prices. From striking flooring to the kitchen with high-quality tiles, spacious rooms and what not makes this an ideal apartment in Bangalore. Each and every little detail has been carefully designed for you to experience a luxurious lifestyle. The Prestige Lakeside Habitat comprises of 2BHK, 3BHK and 4BHK Luxurious Apartments choice in the Varthur of Whitefield that is encircled with a stunning & magical atmosphere. Enjoy calm living at a home which is away from the chaos and full of serenity. The luxurious development of Prestige Lakeside Habitat offers exceptional chances to relive the relaxed and easy-going lifestyle without giving up the pleasures of urban life. The project is estimated to be completed by May 2018, let’s have a look at the details of this habitat.Project DetailsThe Prestige Lakeside Habitat features with amenities like Intercom, Indoor Games, Aerobics & Meditation Room, Play Area, Swimming Pool, Yoga, Landscaped Garden, Tennis Court, Health Facilities, Gymnasium, Basket Ball Court, Badminton Court, Club House and excellent Security. This project is the result of development through premium quality raw materials. There are 80 acres of open space available that allows you to breathe in fresh & pollution free air. It is also close to many corporate giants such as Wipro, HLL, ITPL, etc. Price range and unit details, the project covers an area of around 1195 to 4934 sqft per unit and consist of 3697 units build across 24 towers. The 2 BHK flats are available in area range of 1195-1346 sqft per unit and price range start from around 61 lacs. The 3 BHK flats and villas are available at a price range starting from approximately 2.5 cr. and 4 BHK flats are available in price range starting from approximately 1.5 cr. You can consider these price range and unit details prior to investing in the property.Highpoints: Why buy Prestige Lakeside Habitat? The price of Prestige Lake Side Habitat, Bangalore is reasonable for those looking for both luxurious & affordable Villas in Whitfield. Also, the project enjoys the location advantage of being the nearby location to many colleges, schools, recreational areas, hospitals, parks and other facilities close to Varthur. Many international schools are situated within 2-3 km and Hospitals like Sai Baba Hospital and Vydehi Hospitals are also quite close to it.

Presently the group has 53 ongoing residential

With more than three decades of experience in building world-class projects, Prestige Group has transformed the Real Estate Industry by exuding high business ethics. Initiated in 1986, the group has successfully completed around 210 projects covering over 80 million sqft of land that is affordably priced. With the state-of-the-art engineering techniques and highest quality materials in its construction projects, Prestige Group has decisively recognized itself as one of the prominent developers. Presently the group has 53 ongoing residential & commercial projects covering 54 million sqft. There are 35 forthcoming projects with over 48 million sqft of top-notch property area. 
Being the outstanding realty player of the country, the company assures in presenting sustainable habitats and workplaces featuring all modern amenities. Some of the projects by Prestige Group Are Prestige Four Seasons, Prestige Gulmohar, Prestige Kew Gardens, Prestige Boulevard, Prestige Shantiniketan, Prestige Glenwood, Prestige Garden Bay, Prestige Technostar and the list is endless.

column2: Overview Designed to offer international flavour of living Brigade Cosmopolis Whitefield is a global city in itself offering the residents with the choice of 2BHK, 3BHK and 4BHK residential apartments & penthouses spread across 12 blocks. The built up area of these premium units range from 116 - 373 sqm with the budgeted price starting from Rs. 90 Lac. The flats are up for sale and if required can also be rented out. About the Project The picturesque surroundings of this global township will soothe your mind and soul, ensuing a balanced a peaceful living. Experience a standard living by booking an affordable flat in Brigade Cosmopolis.The well-ventilated residential apartments of Brigade Cosmopolis are a dream place to have a pleasurable living experience. Spacious and splendidly appointed with high-end fittings & fixtures, these premium residential apartments will make you live a royal life with with your loved ones.Located in the posh locality of Whitefield, Bangalore – Brigade Cosmopolis enjoys good proximity to all the prime necessities essential for leading a comfortable life. Connectivity to public transports is added advantage of this township. Some of the famous and established workplace close by include Brigade Tech Park and ITPB.  Some of the well-known landmarks at an arm’s distance from this global city include the reputed The Brigade School, Greenwood High International School, Forum Value Mall, Phoenix Market City, Sri Sathya Sai Super Speciality Hospital, Four Points by Sheraton and the ravishing five-star hotel Marriot. Highpoints A luxurious 3,000 sqm clubhouse with a super-stylish rooftop swimming pool offering panoramic views of the city skyline is the star attraction of Brigade Cosmopolis Whitefield. Other key features of this global township include landscaped sky & terrace gardens, well-equipped badminton & basketball courts, a spectacular cricket pitch and many more.

Brigade Group was established in 1986, with property development as its main focus.

Today, Brigade is one of South India's leading property developers. We are headquartered in Bangalore, with branch offices in several cities in South India and in Dubai. We have a uniquely diverse multi-domain portfolio that covers property development, property management services, hospitality and education. Our projects extend across several major cities in South India: Chennai, Chikmagalur, Hyderabad, Kochi, Mangalore and Mysore.A reputation for innovation, quality and trust.

We are known to be a professionally managed organisation with a stable and confident business model. We have shown an impressive compounded annual growth rate—even during difficult market and business cycles (like the depression of 1996, the post-9/11 shadow period and the present recession). And in the process of successfully negotiating changing conditions, Brigade has created a brand name that stands for trust, reliability and innovation, across all our domains.

column2: Overview:Mighty Marvel, Bangalore is a project encompassing brilliantly constructed 2 and 3 BHK flats that are a feast for the eyes of the buyer. The project is developed by the famous Mighty Developers, Whitefield – Bangalore and it has ready to move in homes that are sure to hold your attention. Project Details:The project comprises of a total 76 units that are divided in a single tower and the apartments in Mighty Marvel have been built with optimum utilisation of space and resources giving you a huge living space. The floor plan of Mighty Marvel is innovatively designed making the infrastructure of this venture a state of the art affair. The project has been built using materials that are branded and safe giving you a secure living environment. The reviews of Mighty Marvel specifically mention the gorgeous vitrified tiled flooring with anti-skid ceramic tiles in the bathrooms and the intricately made teak wood door frames.The 2 BHK flats in Mighty Marvel are built over an area range from 1055 sqft to 1235 sqft, while the 3 BHK flats span over an area between 1470 sqft and 1520 sqft.Round the clock security, kids play area, park, reserved parking for residents, flower gardens, kids club, visitor parking, etc. are some amenities in these vaastu compliant homes.The other features include power back up, internet/Wi-Fi connectivity, intercom facility, swimming pool, fire fighting equipment, maintenance staff, lift, etc. Highpoints:The main pulls of this venture are the huge and fully operational club house along with the jogging tracks that help keep you fit, healthy and entertained. The project also has many basic conveniences in the neighbourhood making sure that you do not have to wander far from home for schools, hospitals or markets.Those looking to purchase a home here can go through the updated Mighty Marvel photos to gain further details. Hurry and book your home today.
